tika-vin07t:14_0: Tattha kāci suvitthiṇṇā, dukkhogāhā ca ganthato;
tika-vin07t:15_0: Viraddhā atthato cāpi, saddato cāpi katthaci.
tika-vin07t:23_0: Vinayasaṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayaṃ namassitukāmo tassa visiṭṭhaguṇayogasandassanatthaṃ yo kappakoṭīhipītiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:23_2: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin07t:23_3: Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā,
tika-vin07t:23_5: Tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:23_7: Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇena hi rāgādidosavigamato paññādiguṇapāṭavato āyuādivaḍḍhanato puññātisayabhāvādito
tika-vin07t:24_0: Tattha paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ kattukāmo “yo kappakoṭīhipi…pe…
tika-vin07t:24_2: Imissā pana vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānañāṇasamuṭṭhitatāya karuṇāppadhānameva thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:24_5: Karuṇāggahaṇena cettha aparimeyyappabhāvā sabbepi buddhaguṇā nayato saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā taṃmūlakattā sesabuddhaguṇānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:24_6: Tattha yoti imassa aniyamavacanassa nāthoti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin07t:24_7: Kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kālanti kappakoṭigaṇanāvasenapi “ettakā kappakoṭiyo”ti pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ kālaṃ. Api-
tika-vin07t:24_11: asaṅkhyeyyavasena pana paricchinditabbato salakkhaṃ caturasaṅkhyeyyakappakālaṃ accantameva nirantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:24_12: pañcamahāpaaccāgādiatidukkarāni karonto khedaṃ kāyikaṃ parissamaṃ pattoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:25_3: Atha vā nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpeti,
tika-vin07t:25_4: nāthati vā yācati veneyye attano hitakaraṇe yācitvāpi niyojetīti nātho,
tika-vin07t:25_6: Mahākāruṇikassāti yo karuṇāya kampitahadayattā lokahitatthaṃ atidukkarakiriyāya anekappakāraṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā āgato,
tika-vin07t:25_14: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-vin07t:25_17: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādheti.
tika-vin07t:26_0: Evaṃ karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ asambudhantiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:26_1: Tattha buddhanisevitaṃ yaṃ asambudhaṃ jīvaloko bhavā bhavaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin07t:26_6: Yanti aniyamato sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo kammabhāvena niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin07t:26_12: maggo pana bhāvanāsevanavasenāpi paccavekkhaṇañāṇādivasena gocarāsevanavasenāpi nisevito.
tika-vin07t:26_14: Atha vā hīnapaṇītādivasena khuddakaṃ mahantañca bhavanti attho.
tika-vin07t:26_21: Vuttappakāro bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavo,
tika-vin07t:26_26: Tattha na vidati dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ na vijānātīti avijjā, aññāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:26_29: teyeva ca sattānaṃ vibādhanaṭṭhena jālasadisāti jālaṃ,
tika-vin07t:26_30: taṃ viddhaṃseti sabbaso vināseti sīlenāti avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī, tassa.
tika-vin07t:27_3: maggassāpi nibbānamāgamma kilesaviddhaṃsanato nibbānampi kilese viddhaṃseti nāma,
tika-vin07t:27_4: maggassa kilesaviddhaṃsanakiccaṃ phalena niṭṭhitanti phalampi “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:27_5: pariyattidhammopi kilesaviddhaṃsanassa upanissayapaccayattā “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vattuṃ arahatīti na koci doso.
tika-vin07t:27_7: Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu saṃsāradukkhe ca apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-vin07t:27_8: Vuttappakāro dhammo eva attano uttaritarābhāvena varo pavaro anuttaroti dhammavaro,
tika-vin07t:28_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepanayeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ guṇehītiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:28_9: Kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ puññātisayavuḍḍhiyā khettasadisattā khettanti āha “khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikāna”nti.
tika-vin07t:28_10: Khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyatīti hi khettaṃ.
tika-vin07t:29_0: Idāni ratanattayapaṇāmajanitaṃ kusalābhisandaṃ yathādhippete payojane niyojetvā attanā saṃvaṇṇiyamānassa
tika-vin07t:29_1: vinayassa sakalasāsanamūlabhāvadassanamukhena saṃvaṇṇanākaraṇassāpi sāsanamūlataṃ dassetuṃ iccevamiccādigāthādvayamāha.
tika-vin07t:29_4: Tassānubhāvenāti tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena balena hatantarāyo vinayaṃ vaṇṇayissanti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:30_0: Aṭṭhitassa susaṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhite patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:30_2: Ṭhiteti pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ hutvā lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhite.
tika-vin07t:30_6: Susaṇṭhitassāti antadvayavirahitāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya suṭṭhu ṭhitassa.
tika-vin07t:30_8: nikāyantaraladdhīhi asammissaṃ katvā anākulaṃ katvā vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:30_9: Nissāya pubbācariyānubhāvanti pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāya,
tika-vin07t:31_0: Atha porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu vijjamānāsu puna vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā kiṃpayojanāti?
tika-vin07t:31_6: Pubbācariyāsabhehīti mahākassapattherādayo pubbācariyā eva akampiyaṭṭhena uttamaṭṭhena ca āsabhā,
tika-vin07t:31_10: Aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhātena ambunā salilena niddhotāni nissesato āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena dhotāni
tika-vin07t:31_11: visodhitāni rāgādīni tīṇi malāni kāmāsavādayo ca cattāro āsavā yehi te ñāṇambuniddhotamalāsavā,
tika-vin07t:31_16: Paṭisambhidāppattesupi mahākassapattherādīnaṃ uccinitvā gahitatāya tesaṃ saddhammasaṃvaṇṇane sāmatthiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:32_1: parikkhārabāhullaṃ vā sallikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho,
tika-vin07t:32_3: idha pana khīṇāsavādhikārattā parikkhārabāhullassa sallikhanavaseneva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:32_7: Nosulabhūpamehīti sallekhapaṭipattiyā “asukasadisā”ti natthi sulabhā upamā etesanti nosulabhūpamā, tehi.
tika-vin07t:32_9: Vihārasīsena hettha tattha nivāsīnañceva tehi samaladdhikānañca sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:32_10: Tasmā tesaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ diṭṭhisīlavisuddhiyā pabhavattena saññāṇabhūtattā dhammasaṅgāhakā mahākassapattherādayo
tika-vin07t:32_12: tehi ayaṃ vinayo saṃvaṇṇito sammā anūnaṃ katvā vaṇṇito.
tika-vin07t:33_0: Evaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanavisesaṃ ajjhesakañca dassetuṃ saṃvaṇṇanātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:33_2: Na kañci atthaṃ abhisambhuṇātīti na kañci atthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin07t:34_0: Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañcātiādinā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya karaṇappakāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:34_1: Tattha tañca idāni vuccamānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhanto sakalāyapi mahāaṭṭhakathāya idha gahetabbato mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ
tika-vin07t:34_2: tassā idāni vuccamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya sarīraṃ katvā mahāpaccariyaṃ yo vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin07t:34_3: tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu yo vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin07t:34_4: tatopi vinicchayato yuttamatthaṃ apariccajanto antogadhattheravādaṃ katvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sammā samārabhissanti padatthasambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:34_5: Ettha ca attho kathīyati etāyāti aṭṭhakathā ttha-
tika-vin07t:34_10: tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:35_2: “Aṭṭhakathaṃyeva gahetvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte aṭṭhakathāsu vuttattheravādānaṃ bāhirabhāvo siyāti
tika-vin07t:36_0: Taṃ meti gāthāya sotūhi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:36_1: Tattha dhammappadīpassāti dhammo eva mohandhakāraviddhaṃsanato padīpasadisattā padīpo assāti dhammappadīpo, bhagavā, tassa.
tika-vin07t:36_2: Patimānayantāti pūjentā manasā garuṃ karontā nisāmentu suṇantu.
tika-vin07t:37_0: Buddhenātiādinā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya āgamanasuddhidassanamukhena pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassetvā anusikkhitabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:37_1: Tattha yatheva buddhena yo dhammo vinayo ca vutto,
tika-vin07t:37_2: so tassa buddhassa yehi puttehi mahākassapattherādīhi tatheva ñāto,
tika-vin07t:37_3: tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matimaccajantā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyā yasmā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:37_6: Vuttoti pāḷito ca atthato ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto.
tika-vin07t:37_7: Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ nāma tantipadaṃ atthi,
tika-vin07t:37_8: tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitapakiṇṇakadesanāyeva hi aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin07t:37_10: tatheva ekapadampi ekakkharampi avināsetvā adhippāyañca avikopetvā ñāto viditoti attho.
tika-vin07t:37_11: Tesaṃ matimaccajantāti tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matisaṅkhātaṃ theraparamparāya uggahetvā ābhataṃ abbocchinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:37_12: pāḷivaṇṇanāvasena ceva pāḷimuttakavasena ca pavattaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāvinicchayaṃ apariccajantā.
tika-vin07t:38_0: Tasmāti yasmā tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ adhippāyaṃ avikopetvā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsu, tasmā.
tika-vin07t:38_3: Hīti nipātamattaṃ hetuatthassa tasmāti imināyeva pakāsitattā,
tika-vin07t:38_7: evaṃ sati tattha pamādalekhāpi pamāṇaṃ siyāti āha “vajjayitvāna pamādalekha”nti,
tika-vin07t:38_8: aparāparaṃ likhantehi pamādena satiṃ apaccupaṭṭhapetvā aññattha likhitabbaṃ aññattha likhanādivasena pavattitā pamādalekhā nāma,
tika-vin07t:38_9: sā ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ tattha tattha sayameva āvibhavissati.
tika-vin07t:38_10: Puna yasmāti padassa sambandhadassanavasena ayaṃ atthayojanā –
tika-vin07t:38_11: yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ idha imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ pamāṇameva,
tika-vin07t:38_12: yasmā ca ayaṃ vaṇṇanāpi bhāsantarapariccāgādimattavisiṭṭhatāya atthato abhinnā,
tika-vin07t:39_2: Vitthāramaggañca samāsayitvāti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu yathāṭhāne vattabbampi padatthavinicchayādikaṃ ativitthiṇṇena
tika-vin07t:39_3: vacanakkamena ceva vuttameva atthanayaṃ appamattakavisesena punappunaṃ kathanena ca tattha tattha papañcitaṃ
tika-vin07t:39_4: tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ pahāya sallahukena atthaviññāpakena padakkamena ceva vuttanayasadisaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:39_6: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana vinayaṭīkāyaṃ “porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu upari vuccamānampi ānetvā tattha tattha papañcitaṃ ñatticatutthena kammena…pe…
tika-vin07t:39_7: upasampannoti bhikkhūti ettha apalokanādīnaṃ catunnampi kammānaṃ vitthārakathā viya tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ saṅkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:39_8: taṃ tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvāti ettheva vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:39_9: Aññattha pāḷiyā vattabbaṃ aññattha kathanañhi tantikkamaṃ vokkamitvā kathanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:39_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tatheva vaṇṇituṃ yuttarūpaṃ hutvā anukkamena āgataṃ pāḷiṃ pariccajitvā saṃvaṇṇanato
tika-vin07t:39_11: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu ayuttaṭṭhāne vaṇṇitaṃ yathāṭhāneyeva vaṇṇanato ca vuttaṃ ‘tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvā”’ti.
tika-vin07t:39_13: Kathaṃ pana vitthāramaggassa saṅkhipane vinicchayo na hīyatīti?
tika-vin07t:39_16: vinicchayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsu sabbāsupi vuttaṃ sabbampi asesayitvā,
tika-vin07t:39_18: Tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvāti kañci pāḷikkamaṃ anatikkamitvā,
tika-vin07t:40_0: Suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthanti verañjakaṇḍādīsu āgatānaṃ jhānakathādīnaṃ suttantavacanānaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin07t:40_1: “suttantikānaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā avaṇṇitabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthaṃ taṃtaṃsuttānurūpaṃ sabbaso paridīpayissāmāti
tika-vin07t:40_5: Ettha ca paṭhamasmiṃ atthavikappe “bhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetvā suttantikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:40_6: vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissatī”ti vaṇṇanāvasena samānakattukatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:40_7: Pacchimasmiṃ atthavikappe pana “heṭṭhā vuttabhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ katvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:40_8: paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā amhehi karīyissatī”ti evaṃ ācariyavasena samānakattukatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:43_0: Idāni saṃvaravinayapahānavinayādīsu bahūsu vinayesu attanā “taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena
tika-vin07t:43_4: tena paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ vavatthapetvā pacchā tassa vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:43_7: tena hetunā etaṃ vinayo nāmātiādikaṃ niyāmakavacanaṃ vuccatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:43_10: So hi niddesapadānaṃ jananīṭhāne ṭhitattā mātā viyāti “mātikā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:44_0: Idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbamatthaṃ mātikaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dassento āha vuttaṃ yenātiādi.
tika-vin07t:44_2: etaṃ tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatītiādinidānavacanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ yena puggalena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:44_8: etaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ vatvā tato tena samayenātiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ anekappakārato dassento vinayassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti.
tika-vin07t:45_0: Ettha ca vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idaṃ vacanaṃ tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādinidānavacanamattaṃ apekkhitvā
tika-vin07t:45_2: idamavocāti nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti vacanato nidānanigamanānipi satthudesanāya anuvidhānattā
tika-vin07t:45_3: tadantogadhānevāti nidānassāpi vinayapāḷiyaṃyeva antogadhattā vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idampi vinayapiṭakasambandhaṃyeva
tika-vin07t:45_5: Mātikāya hi etanti vuttaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃyeva sāmaññato sabbattha sambandhamupagacchati.
tika-vin07t:46_0: Idāni pana taṃ visuṃ nīharitvā dassento tattha vuttaṃ yenātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:46_4: yasmā buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:46_6: Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti attanā paccakkhaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:46_7: Atha vā attano paccakkhakāle dharamānakāle vuttavacanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:46_8: Tadubhayenāpi bhagavato vuttavacanaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:48_5: yadidaṃ kiñci vatvā puna aparaṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ ca-
tika-vin07t:48_7: Yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ sabhāgatthavasena saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-vin07t:48_8: mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti.
tika-vin07t:48_10: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:49_0: Veneyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtāva kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha “dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:49_1: Tattha satipaṭṭhānādidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ,
tika-vin07t:49_7: Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūtaṃ mallarājūnaṃ sālavanuyyānaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:49_8: Tattha nagaraṃ pavisantā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti “upavattana”nti uyyānassa ca nagarassa ca majjhe sālavanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t:49_9: Kusinārāya hi dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya taṃ uyyānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:49_10: tato uyyānato sālavanarājivirājito maggo pācīnābhimukho gantvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho uttarena nivatto,
tika-vin07t:49_13: Tattha kira upavattane aññamaññasaṃsaṭṭhaviṭapānaṃ sampannachāyānaṃ sālapantīnamantare bhagavato parinibbānamañco paññatto,
tika-vin07t:49_24: Ettha ca saṅghasaddassa bhikkhusatasahassasaddasāpekkhattepi gamakattā therasaddena samāso yathā devadattassa garukulanti.
tika-vin07t:49_25: Āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:50_3: sattāhaparinibbute subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena vuttavacanamanussarantoti sambandho. Alaṃ,
tika-vin07t:50_7: tato mahāsamaṇato suṭṭhu muttā mayanti attho,
tika-vin07t:50_11: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu.
tika-vin07t:50_28: Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjīpuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin07t:51_0: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti parinibbānamañce nipannena bhagavatā vuttanti attho.
tika-vin07t:51_1: Desito paññattoti suttābhidhammapiṭakasaṅgahitassa dhammassa ceva vinayapiṭakasaṅgahitassa vinayassa ca atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-vin07t:51_2: Tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:51_3: So vo mamaccayena satthāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā mayi parinibbute satthukiccaṃ sādhessati.
tika-vin07t:52_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ vibhāvento āha yañcāhaṃ bhagavatātiādi.
tika-vin07t:52_1: Tattha yañcāhanti etassa anuggahitoti etena sambandho.
tika-vin07t:52_6: Dhāressasītiādikaṃ bhagavatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ kātukāmena vuttavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:52_8: tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vadati,
tika-vin07t:52_11: Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimayo papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni.
tika-vin07t:52_12: Rathikādīnaṃ yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu kūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ.
tika-vin07t:52_13: Atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūlasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:52_16: Ekameva taṃ cīvaraṃ anekāvayavattā bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:52_18: sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:53_0: Idāni navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanatthāya bhagavatā
tika-vin07t:53_1: vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷiṃ peyyālamukhena ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā dassento āha ahaṃ,
tika-vin07t:53_6: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti ettha navānupubbavihāro nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbabhāvato
tika-vin07t:53_9: Attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti “ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ yattake samāpattivihāre abhiññāyo ca vaḷañjemi,
tika-vin07t:53_10: tathā kassapopī”ti evaṃ yathāvuttauttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapanena,
tika-vin07t:53_13: Bhagavato hi guṇavisesaṃ upādāya sāvakā paccekabuddhā ca kalampi kalabhāgampi na upenti,
tika-vin07t:53_14: tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:53_17: Potthakesu hi kesuci “tassa me”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-vin07t:53_19: Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti ettha cīvarassa nidassanavasena kavacasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:54_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvento āha yathāhātiādi.
tika-vin07t:54_6: Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti pañcasatikakkhandhake āgataṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ idha ānetvā vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:55_1: Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti iminā “yaṃ na icchissāma,
tika-vin07t:55_2: na taṃ karissāmā”ti etaṃ pariyantaṃ subhaddakaṇḍapāḷiṃ dassetvā idāni avasesaṃ ussāhajananappakārappavattaṃ
tika-vin07t:55_4: Tattha pure adhammo dippatīti ettha “adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto adhammo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:55_5: Dhammasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ ussāhajananappasaṅgattā pana dhammavinayānaṃ asaṅgāyanahetudosagaṇo sambhavati,
tika-vin07t:55_6: so eva ettha adhammo dippati tappaṭipakkho dhammo ca paṭibāhīyatīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:55_7: Api ca “adhammavādino balavanto honti dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuccamānattā yena adhammena te subhaddavajjiputtakādayo adhammavādino,
tika-vin07t:55_8: yena ca dhammena itare dhammavādinova honti.
tika-vin07t:55_11: tappaṭipakkho sīlasampadādihetuko appicchatādiguṇasamūho dhammoti ca gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:55_13: Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-vin07t:56_4: Atthakāmena pariyāpuṇitabbato diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthapariyattibhāvato ca “pariyattī”ti tīṇi piṭakāni vuccanti,
tika-vin07t:56_7: Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā.
tika-vin07t:56_9: tadeva navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ pariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadharā.
tika-vin07t:57_9: Ānandattherassa kadāci asaññatāya navakāya saddhivihārikaparisāya janapadacārikācaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:57_10: tesañca saddhivihārikānaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppabbajjanañca paṭicca mahākassapatthero taṃ niggaṇhanto evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti.
tika-vin07t:57_13: ayaṃ kumāro attano pamāṇaṃ na paṭijānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
tika-vin07t:58_0: Kiñcāpi sekkhoti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:58_3: tathāpi thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū”ti evamettha sambandho veditabbo,
tika-vin07t:59_0: Rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaranti ettha gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro,
tika-vin07t:60_0: Sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesūti ettha saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā sādhukaṃ eva pūjāvasena kīḷanato sādhukīḷanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:61_7: Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ bhesajjapānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:64_3: Ekasmiṃ pānīyatitthe sannipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesaṃ janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva nipatantīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:64_9: Atha vā daṭṭhabbo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo, maṇḍapo.
tika-vin07t:64_11: Vividhāni kusumadāmāni ceva muttolambakāni ca viniggalantaṃ vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:64_14: Ettha ca maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalaṃ maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t:66_2: Pubbe vuttampi hi sabbaṃ majjhimabhāṇakā vadantiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:66_5: “te sabbepi tathā tathā āgatadivasānampi atthitāya ekamekaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā vadiṃsū”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:67_0: Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti kaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:67_1: Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ parisāya dhammakathikānaṃ hatthakukkuccavinodanamukhavikārapaṭicchādanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:67_3: Teneva hi accantasaññatappattā buddhāpi sāvakāpi dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatādassanatthameva cittabījaniṃ gaṇhanti. Paṭhamaṃ,
tika-vin07t:67_5: pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti ettha kathaṃ saṅgītiyā pubbe paṭhamabhāvo siddhoti?
tika-vin07t:67_7: Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāleyeva iminā anukkamena sajjhāyitāni,
tika-vin07t:67_8: teneva kamena pacchāpi saṅgītāni visesato vinayābhidhammapiṭakānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:67_11: rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antarā,
tika-vin07t:67_17: Yasmā panetaṃ na bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:67_23: tasmā sā vedena ñāṇena īhati ghaṭati vāyamatīti “vedehī”ti pākaṭanāmā jātāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:68_0: Evaṃ nimittapayojanakāladesadesakakārakakaraṇappakārehi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu
tika-vin07t:68_1: dhammavinayesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ekavidhādibhede dassetuṃ tadetaṃ sabbampītiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:68_2: Tattha anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti ettha anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:68_8: Avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammoti ettha yadipi dhammo eva vinayopi pariyattiyādibhāvato,
tika-vin07t:69_1: ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t:69_2: taṃ bodhiñāṇaṃ anibbisaṃ alabhanto eva abhinīhārato pabhuti ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ imaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ,
tika-vin07t:69_3: yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
tika-vin07t:69_4: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
tika-vin07t:69_6: Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi.
tika-vin07t:69_7: Puna gehanti puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ.
tika-vin07t:69_11: Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:69_12: Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ mama cittaṃ.
tika-vin07t:69_13: Ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaphalaṃ ajjhagā pattosmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:69_14: Keci pana “visaṅkhāragataṃ cittameva taṇhānaṃ khayaṃ ajjhagā”ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:70_1: Pāṭipadadivaseti idaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannāti etena sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:71_4: Tathā hi parivārapāḷiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattantiādinā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:71_5: Paññattivāro kathāpattivāro vipattivāro saṅgahavāro samuṭṭhānavāro adhikaraṇavāro samathavāro samuccayavāroti ime aṭṭha vārā,
tika-vin07t:71_6: tadanantaraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti evaṃ paccayamattavisesena
tika-vin07t:71_7: puna vuttā teyeva aṭṭha vārā cāti imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ vārānaṃ vasena bhikkhuvibhaṅgassa ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgassa
tika-vin07t:71_8: ca pakāsitattā soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhito parivāro “soḷasaparivāro”ti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:73_3: Veneyajjhāsayānulomena vuttattāti vinayaṃ viya issarabhāvato āṇāpatiṭṭhāpanavasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānulomena caritānurūpaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:73_4: Anupubbasikkhādivasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ kālantare abhinibbattiṃ dassento āha “sassamiva phala”nti.
tika-vin07t:73_5: Upāyasamaṅgīnaṃyeva nippajjanabhāvaṃ dassento “dhenu viya khīra”nti āha.
tika-vin07t:73_7: akāle vā avijātaṃ vā dohanto khīraṃ paṭilabhati.
tika-vin07t:74_2: Abhidhammeti supinantena sukkavissaṭṭhiyā anāpattibhāvepi akusalacetanā upalabbhatītiādinā vinayapaññattiyā saṅkaravirahite dhamme,
tika-vin07t:74_6: Yaṃ panettha avisiṭṭhanti ettha vinayapiṭakantiādīsu tīsu saddesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:74_8: Mā piṭakasampadānenāti pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhitthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:75_0: Desanāsāsanakathābhedanti ettha desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedanti bhedasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin07t:75_3: Sikkhā ca pahānāni ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāpahānagambhīrabhāvo,
tika-vin07t:75_6: Yahiṃ yasmiṃ vinayādike yaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñca yathā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin07t:75_8: Atha vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ vipattiñca yahiṃ yathā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin07t:75_10: Paridīpanā vibhāvanā cāti heṭṭhā gāthāsu vuttassa anurūpato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:76_2: So hi mahākāruṇikatāya ca aviparītato desakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā ca āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahati.
tika-vin07t:76_8: Pacuro bahuko bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesante pacurāparādhā.
tika-vin07t:77_0: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti ettha khuddako mahanto ca saṃvaroti attho.
tika-vin07t:77_3: Suttantapāḷiyaṃ vivicceva kāmehītiādinā samādhidesanābāhullato suttantapiṭake “adhicittasikkhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:77_7: Anusayavasena santānamanuvattantā kilesā pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedavasena vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassā”ti.
tika-vin07t:77_8: Pariyuṭṭhānappahānanti okāsadānavasena citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā samuppattivasena ṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:77_10: Anusayappahānanti ariyamaggena appahīnabhāvena santāne kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo
tika-vin07t:77_11: satta kilesā santāne anu anu sayanato anusayā nāma,
tika-vin07t:78_0: Tadaṅgappahānanti tena tena dānasīlādikusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:78_2: taṃ santānaṃ sammā kileseti upatāpetīti saṃkileso,
tika-vin07t:78_4: Samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā suttantapiṭake taṇhāsaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:79_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti ettha etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekekasmiṃ piṭaketi attho.
tika-vin07t:79_2: buddhānaṃ sabhāvaniruttibhāvato ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷi pantīti pāḷi,
tika-vin07t:79_4: Sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassa anurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu ekantena bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpito
tika-vin07t:79_6: Desanāya dhammassa ca ko visesoti ce?
tika-vin07t:79_7: Yathāvuttanayena manasā vavatthāpitadhammassa paresaṃ bodhanabhāvena atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā “desanā”ti veditabbā. Tenāha –
tika-vin07t:79_9: Tadubhayampi pana paramatthato saddo eva paramatthavinimuttāya sammutiyā abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:79_10: Imameva nayaṃ gahetvā keci ācariyā “dhammo ca desanā ca paramatthato saddo evā”ti voharanti,
tika-vin07t:79_14: Na hi “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā nibbattitaparamatthavisayāyevā”ti sakkā vattuṃ itthipurisādiākāraparivitakkapubbakānaṃ
tika-vin07t:79_16: Paramatthadhammamūlakattā panassa parikappassa paramatthavisayatā sakkā paññapetuṃ,
tika-vin07t:79_18: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā gambhīrāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:79_19: Ettha ca piṭakāvayavānaṃ dhammādīnaṃ vuccamāno gambhīrabhāvo taṃsamudāyassa piṭakassāpi vutto yevāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:79_21: dukkho vā ogāho ogāhanaṃ antopavisanametesūti dukkhogāhā.
tika-vin07t:80_2: Visayato asammohato cāti lokiyalokuttarānaṃ yathākkamaṃ avabodhappakāradassanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:80_4: Lokiyo hi dhammatthādiṃ ālambitvāva pavattanato visayato avabodhoti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:80_5: Lokuttaro pana nibbānārammaṇatāya taṃ anālambamānopi tabbisayamohaviddhaṃsanena dhammādīsu pavattanato asammohato avabodhoti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:81_4: Yo cetthāti etāsu dhammatthadesanāsu yo paṭivedhoti attho.
tika-vin07t:82_0: Alagaddūpamāti ettha alagaddasaddena alagaddaggahaṇaṃ vuccati vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇātiādīsu viya,
tika-vin07t:82_4: Tasmā alagaddassa gahaṇaṃ upamā etissāti alagaddūpamā.
tika-vin07t:82_7: jīvitaharaṇasamattho vā visasaṅkhāto gado assāti “alaṃgado”ti vattabbe “alagaddo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:83_0: Vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanaṃ etissāti nissaraṇatthā.
tika-vin07t:83_6: Ettha ca upārambho nāma pariyattiṃ nissāya paravambhanaṃ. Ādi-
tika-vin07t:83_10: Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti tañca assa dhammassa sīlaparipūraṇādisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino nānubhonti na vindanti.
tika-vin07t:84_0: Idāni tīsu piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo niddhāretvā dassento āha vinaye panātiādi.
tika-vin07t:84_1: Tattha tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ vinaye pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:84_3: Dutiye tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ tissannampi vijjānaṃ chasu abhiññāsu antopaviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin07t:84_6: Abhidhammapiṭake hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā ca vuttā eva.
tika-vin07t:84_7: Paṭisambhidānaṃ tattheva sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ tatthevāti avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:85_1: yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanato catuttiṃseva suttantā vaggasaṅgahavasena tayo vaggā yassa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho,
tika-vin07t:85_11: Suttantānaṃ sahassāni satta suttasatāni cāti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ sattasahassāni satta suttasatāni cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:86_4: Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikā tehiyeva desitāni dve sahassāni gaṇhiṃ.
tika-vin07t:86_10: parinibbute pana bhagavati ānandattherena desitānaṃ subhasutta gopakamoggallānasuttānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:86_11: tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ moggaliputtatissattherena kathitakathāvatthuppakaraṇassa ca vasena dhammakkhandhānaṃ caturāsītisahassatopi adhikatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:87_7: Antarāpattīti sikkhāpadantaresu aññasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattā āpatti.
tika-vin07t:91_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā,
tika-vin07t:91_2: Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparāti tasmiṃ jambudīpe ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ paveṇī paṭipāṭi.
tika-vin07t:91_4: Jambusirivhayeti jambusadiso sirimanto avhayo nāmaṃ yassa dīpassa,
tika-vin07t:91_6: Mahantena hi jamburukkhena abhilakkhitattā dīpopi “jambū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:91_8: Vinayavaṃsantiādīhi tīhi vinayapāḷiyeva kathitā pariyāyavacanattā tesaṃ.
tika-vin07t:91_12: sabbesaṃ pāmokkho hutvā gaṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:92_1: Jotayitvā ca sabbadhīti tameva saddhammaṃ sabbattha pakāsayitvā.
tika-vin07t:93_8: Tattha siṅgena loṇaṃ pariharitvā aloṇakapiṇḍapātena saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ kappati,
tika-vin07t:93_10: Kappati dvaṅgulakappoti dvaṅgulaṃ atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:93_11: Kappati gāmantarakappoti “gāmantaraṃ gamissāmī”ti pavāritena anatirittabhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:93_12: Kappati āvāsakappoti ekasīmāya nānāsenāsanesu visuṃ visuṃ uposathādīni saṅghakammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:93_13: Kappati anumatikappoti “anāgatānaṃ āgatakāle anumatiṃ gahessāmā”ti tesu anāgatesuyeva vaggena saṅghena kammaṃ katvā pacchā anumatiṃ gahetuṃ kappati,
tika-vin07t:93_15: Kappati āciṇṇakappoti ācariyupajjhāyehi āciṇṇo kappatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:93_18: Kappati amathitakappoti yaṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:93_19: taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:93_20: Kappati jaḷogiṃ pātunti ettha jaḷogīti taruṇasurā,
tika-vin07t:93_23: Jātarūparajatanti ettha sarasato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti jātaṃ rūpaṃ etassāti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:94_2: upavasantīti ca sīlasamādānena vā anasanādinā vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
tika-vin07t:94_5: Sabbaṃ tāva vattabbanti iminā sattasatikakkhandhake āgatā sabbāpi pāḷi idha ānetvā vattabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:96_1: “Bhagavato vacanaṃ thenetvā attano vacanassa dīpanato abbudanti corakamma”nti eke.
tika-vin07t:96_5: Sādhu sappurisāti ettha sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto,
tika-vin07t:96_9: pītimā hi puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā “udaggudaggo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:97_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye dutiyaṃ saṅgītiṃ akariṃsu,
tika-vin07t:97_2: Taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsūti taṃ vajjiputtakehi uppāditaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu nāgamiṃsu.
tika-vin07t:97_9: Durabhisambhavaṃ anabhibhavanīyaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aniccataṃ evaṃ ñatvāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:100_2: ito aññattha gantvā bhikkhaṃ pariyesathāti attho.
tika-vin07t:101_1: Tayo eva kira vedā aṭṭhakādīhi dhammikehi isīhi lokassa saggamaggavibhāvanatthāya katā.
tika-vin07t:101_3: Āthabbaṇavedo pana pacchā adhammikehi brāhmaṇehi pāṇavadhādiatthāya kato.
tika-vin07t:101_4: Purimesu ca tīsu vedesu teheva dhammikasākhāyo apanetvā yāgavadhādidīpikā adhammikasākhā pakkhittāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:101_9: Ettha ca kiriyākappavikappoti vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo,
tika-vin07t:101_15: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato ca nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo,
tika-vin07t:101_19: Āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto porāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā,
tika-vin07t:102_0: Yassa cittantiādi pañhadvayaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:102_2: Na nirujjhatīti nirodhakkhaṇaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati.
tika-vin07t:102_3: Tassa cittanti tassa puggalassa taṃ cittaṃ kiṃ nirujjhissati āyatiñca nuppajjissatīti pucchā,
tika-vin07t:102_4: tassā ca vibhajjabyākaraṇīyatāya evamettha vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:102_5: Arahato pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tassa cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:102_10: Ṭhapetvā pana pacchimacittasamaṅgiṃ khīṇāsavaṃ itaresaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgicittaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya
tika-vin07t:102_13: aññaṃ pana tasmiṃ vā aññasmiṃ vā attabhāve uppajjissati ceva nirujjhissati cāti.
tika-vin07t:102_14: Yassa vā panātiādi dutiyapañhe pana nirujjhissati nuppajjissatīti yassa cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya
tika-vin07t:102_16: tassa khīṇāsavassa taṃ cittaṃ kiṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti pucchā,
tika-vin07t:102_18: Uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ asakkontoti uparimapade vā heṭṭhimapadaṃ heṭṭhimapade vā uparimapadaṃ atthato
tika-vin07t:102_19: samannāharituṃ ghaṭetuṃ pubbenāparaṃ yojetvā atthaṃ paricchindituṃ asakkontoti attho.
tika-vin07t:103_0: Sotāpannānaṃ sīlesu paripūrakāritāya samādinnasīlato natthi parihānīti āha “abhabbo dāni sāsanato nivattitu”nti.
tika-vin07t:103_2: Dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantaponaṃ vuccati dantakaṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:103_3: Abhinavānaṃ āgantukānaṃ lajjīsabhāvaṃ khantimettādiguṇasamaṅgitañca katipāhaṃ suṭṭhu vīmaṃsitvāva hatthakammādisampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-vin07t:103_4: saṅgahakaraṇañca yuttanti sāmaṇerassa ceva aññesañca bhikkhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:103_5: thero tassa bhabbarūpataṃ abhiññāya ñatvāpi puna sammajjanādiṃ akāsi.
tika-vin07t:103_8: Sakalavinayācārapaṭipatti upasampannānameva vihitāti tappariyāpuṇanamapi tesaññeva anurūpanti āha “ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭaka”nti.
tika-vin07t:103_9: Tassa citte ṭhapitampi buddhavacanaṃ saṅgopanatthāya niyyātitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “hatthe patiṭṭhāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:104_3: Devatā eva divase divase āharantīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:104_10: Asuttamayikanti suttehi abaddhaṃ dibbasumanapuppheheva kataṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:104_14: Nava vāhasahassānīti ettha catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo,
tika-vin07t:104_25: Vimalaketumālāti ettha ketumālā nāma sīsato nikkhamitvā uparimuddhani puñjo hutvā dissamānarasmirāsīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:106_0: Pubbe va sannivāsenāti pubbe vā pubbajātiyaṃ vā sahavāsenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:106_2: Evaṃ imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi taṃ sinehasaṅkhātaṃ pemaṃ jāyate.
tika-vin07t:106_9: yathā uppalañca sesañca padumādi udake jāyamānaṃ dve kāraṇāni nissāya jāyati udakañceva kalalañca,
tika-vin07t:107_3: tadā sāsanakiccassa nāyakabhāvena saṅghapariṇāyakatañca rañño ñāpetuṃ saṅgho tassa bhāramakāsīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:107_5: Sāsanassa dāyādoti sāsanassa abbhantaro ñātako homi na homīti attho.
tika-vin07t:107_8: sakalasāsanadhāraṇe samatthānaṃ attano orasaputtānaṃ pariccattattā na paccayamattadāyakāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya thero “na kho, mahārāja,
tika-vin07t:107_10: Kathañcarahīti ettha carahīti nipāto akkhantiṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:107_13: Sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpesunti pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādīsu vikālabhojanā veramaṇipariyosānāsu chasu sikkhāsu pāṇātipātā
tika-vin07t:107_14: veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā samādānavasena sikkhāsammutidānānantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:108_0: Sabbaṃ theravādanti dve saṅgītiyo āruḷhā pāḷi.
tika-vin07t:108_2: Ayañhi vibhajjavādo mahākassapattherādīhi asaṅkarato rakkhito ānīto cāti “theravādo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:108_4: Tattha “aṭṭhakathāsu āgatatheravādasahitaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ tipiṭakasaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacana”nti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:109_2: Na kho panetaṃ sakkā imesaṃ majjhe vasantena vūpasametunti tesañhi majjhe vasanto tesuyeva antogadhattā ādeyyavacano na hoti,
tika-vin07t:109_7: Pañcātapena tappentīti catūsu ṭhānesu aggiṃ jāletvā majjhe ṭhatvā sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ullokentā sūriyātapena tappenti.
tika-vin07t:109_8: Ādiccaṃ anuparivattantīti udayakālato pabhuti sūriyaṃ olokayamānā yāva atthaṅgamanā sūriyābhimukhāva parivattanti.
tika-vin07t:110_2: Migavaṃ nikkhamitvāti araññe vicaritvā migamāraṇakīḷā migavaṃ,
tika-vin07t:110_3: taṃ uddissa nikkhamitvā migavadhatthaṃ nikkhamitvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:110_7: Ākāse uppatitvāti ettha ayaṃ vikubbaniddhi na hotīti gihissāpi imaṃ iddhiṃ dassesi adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā appaṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:111_2: Ekekaṃ bhikkhusahassaparivāranti ettha “gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti āṇākārena vuttepi therā bhikkhū sāsanahitattā gatā.
tika-vin07t:111_5: Thero nāgacchīti kiñcāpi “rājā pakkosatī”ti vuttepi dhammakammatthāya āgantuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:111_7: “mahānubhāvo thero yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiko pamāṇabhūto”ti rañño ceva ubhayapakkhikānañca attani bahumānuppādanavasena
tika-vin07t:111_14: Passantānaṃ atidukkarabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “padesapathavīkampanaṃ dukkara”nti āha.
tika-vin07t:111_15: Adhiṭṭhāne panettha visuṃ dukkaratā nāma natthi.
tika-vin07t:112_0: Dīpakatittiroti sākuṇikehi samajātikānaṃ gahaṇatthāya posetvā sikkhetvā pāsaṭṭhāne ṭhapanakatittiro.
tika-vin07t:112_1: Na paṭicca kammaṃ phusatīti gāthāya yadi tava pāpakiriyāya mano nappadussati,
tika-vin07t:112_2: luddena taṃ nissāya katampi pāpakammaṃ taṃ na phusati.
tika-vin07t:112_3: Pāpakiriyāya hi appossukkassa nirālayassa bhadrassa sato tava taṃ pāpaṃ na upalimpati,
tika-vin07t:113_1: Atha vā ko katamo vādo kiṃvādo,
tika-vin07t:113_3: Attānañca lokañca sassatoti vādo etesanti sassatavādino.
tika-vin07t:113_4: Sattesu saṅkhāresu vā ekaccaṃ sassatanti pavatto vādo ekaccasassato,
tika-vin07t:113_7: nevanto nānanto”ti evaṃ antānantaṃ ārabbha pavattā cattāro vādā antānantā,
tika-vin07t:113_11: tathātipi me notiādinā pavattā diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca,
tika-vin07t:113_13: Atha vā amarā nāma macchajāti duggahā hoti,
tika-vin07t:113_14: tassā amarāya viya vikkhepo etesanti amarāvikkhepikā.
tika-vin07t:113_15: Adhicca yadicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā samuppanno attā ca loko cāti vāde niyuttā adhiccasamuppannikā.
tika-vin07t:113_18: “Kāyassa bhedā satto ucchijjatī”ti evaṃ ucchedaṃ vadantīti ucchedavādā.
tika-vin07t:113_20: tasmiṃyeva yathākāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇaparibhogena nibbānaṃ dukkhūpasamaṃ vadantīti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā.
tika-vin07t:113_22: Sabbaṃ ekarūpena avatvā yathādhammaṃ vibhajitvā nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvā yathā diṭṭhisandehādayo vigacchanti,
tika-vin07t:113_26: āyatiṃ uppajjanakañca sabbaṃ paravādaṃ kathāvatthumātikāvivaraṇamukhena nimmaddanaṃ karontoti attho.
tika-vin07t:116_0: Kenābhatanti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjentena jambudīpe tāva yāva tatiyasaṅgīti,
tika-vin07t:116_1: tāva dassetvā idāni sīhaḷadīpe ācariyaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhantiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:116_3: Tasmiṃ dīpe nisīditvā ācariyena aṭṭhakathāya katattā “imaṃ dīpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:116_11: Nikāye pañcāti vinayābhidhammānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā tabbinimuttā pañca nikāyā gahetabbā.
tika-vin07t:116_13: Tīṇi piṭakāni svāgatāni assāti “tepiṭako”ti vattabbe “tipeṭako”ti chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:116_15: Pupphanāmoti ettha mahāpadumatthero sumanatthero ca ñātabboti dvikkhattuṃ “pupphanāmo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:117_4: Chinnabhinnapaṭadharoti satthakena chinnaṃ raṅgena bhinnaṃ paṭaṃ dhāraṇako.
tika-vin07t:117_6: Makkhaṃ asahamānoti therassa ānubhāvaṃ paṭicca attano uppannaṃ paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhaṃ tathā pavattaṃ kodhaṃ asahamāno.
tika-vin07t:117_8: Me mama bhayabheravaṃ janetuṃ paṭibalo na assa na bhaveyyāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:117_11: Isivātapaṭivātāti bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaracalanakāyacalanehi sañjanitavātehi parito samantato bījayamānā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin07t:117_17: Samantato rakkhaṃ ṭhapesīti tesaṃ appavesanatthāya adhiṭṭhānavasena rakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-vin07t:118_0: Rājagahanagaraparivattakenāti rājagahanagaraṃ parivattetvā tato bahi taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gatamaggena,
tika-vin07t:118_8: Sīhakumārassa puttoti ettha “kaliṅgarājadhītu kucchismiṃ sīhassa jāto sīhakumāro”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:118_9: Jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ vā mūlanakkhattaṃ vā hotīti āha “jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattaṃ nāma hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t:118_14: Ekā latāyaṭṭhi nāmāti ekā rajatamayā kañcanalatāya paṭimaṇḍitattā evaṃ laddhanāmā.
tika-vin07t:118_16: sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ nānappakārā migapakkhino vicittakammakatā viya khāyantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:118_32: Alaṃ gacchāmāti “purassa accāsannattā sāruppaṃ na hotī”ti paṭikkhipanto āha.
tika-vin07t:119_1: Upasaṅkamantoti ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkamīti attho.
tika-vin07t:119_4: Evañhi sati upari vuccamānaṃ dvāsaṭṭhi arahantoti vacanaṃ sametī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:119_5: Dasabhātikasamākulanti muṭasivassa puttehi devānaṃpiyatissādīhi dasahi bhātikehi samākiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:119_11: Pokkharavassanti pokkharapatte viya atemitukāmānaṃ upari atemetvā pavattanakavassaṃ.
tika-vin07t:119_13: Pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā apasakkantoti ettha puratthābhimukho ṭhitova piṭṭhito apasakkanena pacchimadisāya
tika-vin07t:120_3: Vivādo hotīti ettha kiriyākālamapekkhitvā vattamānappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:120_7: “channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā cā”ti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:120_8: Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi evāti dassetuṃ evaṃ acintiyātiādigāthamāha.
tika-vin07t:120_9: Rakkhaṃ karontoti attanā upāyena palāpitānaṃ yakkhānaṃ puna appavisanatthāya parittānaṃ karonto.
tika-vin07t:121_2: Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenāti siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ raṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena.
tika-vin07t:121_14: na sakalapathavīpāsādādivatthunā tassa sattāhaṃ demītiādinā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā dātuṃ ayuttattā.
tika-vin07t:121_15: Evañhi dento tāvakālikaṃ deti nāma vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa,
tika-vin07t:121_17: Niyamitakāle pana āyādayo pariccattā evāti tato paraṃ apariccattattā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:121_18: Tasmā vuttanayenettha ito parampi āyādidānavaseneva rajjadānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:121_19: Pupphuḷakā hutvāti ketakīpārohaṅkurā viya udakapupphuḷakākārā hutvā.
tika-vin07t:121_22: gavakkhena ca suttādimayajālena ca sadisanti vā attho.
tika-vin07t:122_1: tassa acchasukkhatāya ākāsamiva khāyamānassa animittagajjitaṃ devadundubhi nāma,
tika-vin07t:122_4: Pabbatānaṃ naccehīti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ naccehi.
tika-vin07t:123_0: Devatākulānīti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:123_5: Idamassa tatiyanti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitasākhābodhiyā rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:123_6: Tato pana pubbe ekavāraṃ rajjasampadānaṃ acchinnāya sākhāya mahābodhiyā eva kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:123_7: tena saddhiṃ catukkhattuṃ rājā rajjena pūjesi.
tika-vin07t:123_8: Rajjena pūjitadivasesu kira sakaladīpato uppannaṃ āyaṃ gahetvā mahābodhimeva pūjesi.
tika-vin07t:124_2: idañca tasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe vohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:124_3: idha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī,
tika-vin07t:124_5: Tasmā iminā vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti vattabbaṃ siyā kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadassa idha paṭhamapāṭipadattā.
tika-vin07t:124_9: Supaṇṇarūpenāti mahābodhiṃ balakkārena gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ netukāmāni nāgarājakulāni iddhiyā gahitena garuḷarūpena santāseti.
tika-vin07t:124_10: Taṃ vibhūtiṃ passitvāti devatādīhi karīyamānaṃ pūjāmahattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:124_11: mahābodhiyā ca ānubhāvamahattaṃ disvā sayampi tathā pūjetukāmā theriṃ yācitvāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:124_12: Samuddasālavatthusminti yasmiṃ padese ṭhatvā rājā samudde āgacchantaṃ bodhiṃ therānubhāvena addasa,
tika-vin07t:124_13: yattha ca pacchā samuddassa diṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pakāsetuṃ samuddasālaṃ nāma sālaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-vin07t:124_18: Aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi aṭṭhahi brāhmaṇakulehi cāti soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi.
tika-vin07t:124_22: “Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānenā”ti karaṇavacanena vattabbe vibhattipariṇāmena “saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā”ti nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:124_27: Purime pana mahāvihāraṭṭhāne pūjāmattasseva katattā anāgate saṅghassapi navakatā avanditabbatā ca pakāsitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:124_28: Anāgate pana metteyyādibuddhā paccekabuddhā ca buddhabhāvakkhaṇaṃ uddissa vanditabbāva sabhāvena visiṭṭhapuggalattāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_0: Mahāariṭṭhoti pañcapaññāsāya bhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_1: Meghavaṇṇābhayaamaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti meghavaṇṇaabhayassa rañño amaccena kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne.
tika-vin07t:125_2: Maṅgalanimittabhāvena ākāse samuppanno manoharasaddo ākāsassa ravo viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī”ti.
tika-vin07t:125_3: Na hi ākāso nāma koci dhammo atthi,
tika-vin07t:125_7: vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesīti idaṃ vinayaṃ vācetuṃ āraddhadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_12: tesaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha tesaṃ therānantiādi.
tika-vin07t:125_13: Tattha tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikāti mahindattherādīnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhimahātherānaṃ ariṭṭhādayo antevāsikā
tika-vin07t:125_14: ca mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumanādayo cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_15: Antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikāti ubhayattha vuttaantevāsikānaṃ antevāsikaparamparā cāti attho.
tika-vin07t:125_16: Pubbe vuttappakārāti mahindo iṭṭiyo uttiyotiādigāthāhi pakāsitā ācariyaparamparā.
tika-vin07t:126_6: Mātāpituṭṭhāniyoti vatvā tamevatthaṃ samatthetuṃ āha tadāyattāhītiādi.
tika-vin07t:126_8: Attano sīlakkhandho suguttoti lajjino vinayadhāraṇassa alajjiaññāṇatādīhi chahi ākārehi āpattiyā anāpajjanato
tika-vin07t:126_9: attano sīlakkhandho khaṇḍādidosavirahito sugutto surakkhito hoti.
tika-vin07t:126_10: Kukkuccapakatānanti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena pakatānaṃ upaddutānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ yathāvinayaṃ
tika-vin07t:126_11: kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanena paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:126_13: “Evaṃ kathentassa doso evaṃ na doso”ti ñatvāva kathanato nibbhayova saṅghamajjhe voharati.
tika-vin07t:126_15: Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena vacanena sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā yathā te asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin07t:127_12: Parinibbānatthāyāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānābhāvena taṃparinibbānatthāyāti paccayattena vuttaṃ anantarādipaccayattā.
tika-vin07t:127_13: Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etassa anupādāparinibbānassa atthāyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:127_17: Upanisāti upanisīdati ettha phalanti upanisā, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:127_19: Sotāvadhānanti imissā paramparapaccayakathāya attānaṃ samanatthāya sotāvadhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:127_22: Yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattamaggasaṅkhāto,
tika-vin07t:127_25: Atha vā yo ayaṃ kañci dhammaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkho vimuccanaṃ vigamo parinibbānaṃ etadatthā kathāti
tika-vin07t:127_26: evaṃ upasaṃharaṇavasena yojetumpi vaṭṭati maggaphalavimokkhassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:132_2: Aniyamaniddesavacananti attano atthaṃ sarūpena niyametvā niddisatīti niyamaniddeso,
tika-vin07t:132_6: Parivitakkoti “katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”tiādinā pavatto.
tika-vin07t:132_7: Pubbe vā pacchā vāti tenātipadato heṭṭhā vuttapāṭhe vā upari vakkhamānapāṭhe vāti attho.
tika-vin07t:132_9: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassananti tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ upāyamattanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:132_10: Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin07t:133_2: Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttakālo,
tika-vin07t:133_11: Samayopi kho te bhaddālīti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadāvilaṅghanassa hetu, ko so?
tika-vin07t:133_13: so samayasaṅkhāto hetu tassā appaṭividdhoti attho.
tika-vin07t:133_15: Uggahamānoti kiñci kiñci uggahetuṃ samatthatāya uggahamāno,
tika-vin07t:133_20: ekāva nivāsā sālā etthāti “ekasālako”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:133_21: Atthābhisamayāti yathāvuttassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikassa atthassa hitassa paṭilābhato.
tika-vin07t:133_27: Vipariṇāmoti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo,
tika-vin07t:134_0: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo uddhaṭo.
tika-vin07t:134_1: Tattha saṅgamavasena paccayānaṃ phaluppādanaṃ paṭi ayanaṃ ekato pavatti etthāti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-vin07t:134_2: Vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṅgame sati enti ettha sattā pavattantīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-vin07t:134_4: sayaṃ vā eti āgacchati vigacchati cāti samayo, kālo.
tika-vin07t:134_7: Paccayantarasaṅgame eti āgacchati etasmā phalanti samayo, hetu.
tika-vin07t:134_8: Saññāvasena vipallāsato dhammesu eti abhinivisatīti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-vin07t:134_11: Sammadeva sahitānaṃ vācānaṃ ayanaṃ vigamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:134_13: sahitānaṃ vā saccānaṃ ayanaṃ jānananti samayo,
tika-vin07t:134_15: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:135_0: Ettha ca samayasaddassa sāmaññena anekatthatā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:135_1: Na hi ekasmiṃ atthavisese vattamāno saddo tadaññepi vattati.
tika-vin07t:135_2: Tasmā atthā viya taṃtaṃvācakā samayasaddāpi bhinnā evāti gahetabbā.
tika-vin07t:136_6: yathā udaye sati cande jāto rājaputtoti.
tika-vin07t:136_7: Adhikaraṇañhītiādi abhidhamme samayasaddo kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātesu pañcasu atthesu vattati,
tika-vin07t:136_9: tesu ca kālasamūhatthā dve tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttā.
tika-vin07t:136_10: Khaṇasamavāyahetuatthā pana tayopi attano bhāvena phassādīnaṃ bhāvassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena niddisituṃ
tika-vin07t:136_13: dhammasamūhe vā samaye adhikaraṇabhūte kusalaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:136_15: dhammasamūhe vā samaye phassādayo hontīti evaṃ adhikaraṇatthayojanā,
tika-vin07t:136_17: samavāye hetumhi vā samaye sati vijjamāne kusalaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:136_18: tasmiññeva khaṇādimhi samayepi vijjamāne phassādayo hontīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthayojanā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:137_0: Hoti cetthāti ettha yathāvuttaatthavisaye saṅgahagāthā hoti.
tika-vin07t:138_1: Iriyāpathotiādīsu iriyāya sabbadvārikakiriyāya patho pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ tabbinimuttakammassa abhāvāti ṭhānādayo iriyāpatho,
tika-vin07t:138_3: Brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā parahitacittādivasappavattito mettādayo brahmavihāro nāma.
tika-vin07t:138_4: Tadavasesā pana mahaggatā sabbanīvaraṇavigamanādisiddhena jotanādiatthena dibbavihāro nāma.
tika-vin07t:138_5: Brahmavihārabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā mettādayo idha asaṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:139_0: Rukkhādimūleyeva mūlasaddassa niruḷhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ aparena mūlasaddena visesetvā “mūlamūle”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:140_0: Tattha siyāti tattha verañjāyantiādīsu padesu kassaci codanā siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:141_2: tassa anu anu yogo punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ attakilamathānuyogo.
tika-vin07t:141_5: taṃsahacarite kāme sukhe vā ārammaṇabhūte allīnā pavattatīti kāmasukhallikā taṇhā,
tika-vin07t:141_6: tassā kāmasukhallikāya anu anu yogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo.
tika-vin07t:142_0: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha diṭṭhītiādi.
tika-vin07t:142_1: Ettha ca “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-vin07t:142_2: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā.
tika-vin07t:142_5: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito samaṇagaṇo,
tika-vin07t:142_10: Evañhi pāṭhe saddato attho yuttataro hoti.
tika-vin07t:143_7: Mante sajjhāyatīti iruvedādike mantasatthe sajjhāyatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:143_10: samitapāpattā samaṇo”ti yathāvuttamatthadvayaṃ udāharaṇadvayena vibhāvetuṃ vuttañhetantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:143_11: “Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti pavuccatī”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā “samitapāpattā ‘samaṇo’ti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:143_12: bāhitapāpoti idaṃ pana aññasmiṃ gāthābandhe vuttavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:144_0: Gottavasenāti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ, go-
tika-vin07t:144_1: saddena cettha abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:144_5: Itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacananti itthaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto āpannoti itthambhūto,
tika-vin07t:144_8: Atha vā “itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jāto”ti evaṃ kathanattho itthambhūtākhyānattho,
tika-vin07t:144_12: tena yogato taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthepi samāne itthambhūtākhyānadīpanato “itthambhūtākhyānatthe”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:144_13: tenevāha “tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho”ti.
tika-vin07t:145_1: yathā sādhu devadatto mātaramabhīti ettha abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:145_2: evamidhāpi taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo uggatoti abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacananti.
tika-vin07t:145_3: Sādhu devadatto mātaramabhīti ettha hi “devadatto mātaramabhi mātari visaye mātuyā vā sādhū”ti evaṃ adhikaraṇatthe
tika-vin07t:145_4: vā sāmiatthe vā bhummavacanassa sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānatthajotakena abhisaddena yoge
tika-vin07t:145_6: yathā cettha devadatto mātuvisaye mātusambandhī vā so vuttappakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:145_7: evamidhāpi bhoto gotamassa sambandhī kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanapakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-vin07t:145_8: Tattha hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:145_9: tattha mātaranti vacanaṃ viya idha taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:145_10: tattha sādhusaddaggahaṇaṃ viya idha uggatasaddaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:145_12: na kevaloti dassanatthaṃ visesitanti āha “kitti evā”ti.
tika-vin07t:145_14: tassā pakāsako saddo kittisaddoti dassetuṃ “thutighoso vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:146_1: yo so samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampento anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-vin07t:146_6: Iminā ca iminā cāti etena arahantiādipadānaṃ paccekaṃ anekaguṇagaṇaṃ paṭicca pavattabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:147_0: Suvidūravidūreti dvīhi saddehi ativiya dūreti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:147_2: Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti iminā paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti tesaṃ vāsanāya appahīnattā,
tika-vin07t:147_3: vāsanā ca nāma nikkilesassāpi sakalañeyyānavabodhādidvārattayappayogaviguṇatāhetubhūto kilesanihito ākāro
tika-vin07t:147_4: ciranigaḷitapādānaṃ nigaḷamokkhepi saṅkucitatāgamanahetuko nigaḷanihito ākāro viya.
tika-vin07t:147_9: kāraṃ sānussaraṃ katvā niruttinayena “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:147_10: Evaṃ uparipi yathārahaṃ niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:147_14: Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ kāraṇattā samudayoti āha “āsavasamudayamayenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:150_0: Evaṃ vutto saṃsārova cakkaṃ viya paribbhamanato cakkaṃ,
tika-vin07t:150_1: tassa cakkassa sabbe arā hatāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:150_4: taṃ ettha maṇḍaṃ pasannaṃ jātanti bodhimaṇḍo.
tika-vin07t:150_6: taṃ chinditabbaṃ abhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ paricchindatīti dassetuṃ kammakkhayakaravisesanavisiṭṭhaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:151_0: Evaṃ katipayaṅgehi saṃsāracakkaṃ tadavasesaṅgehi phalabhūtanāmarūpadhammehi tibhavarathañca tasmiṃ rathe
tika-vin07t:151_1: yojitasaṃsāracakkārānaṃ hananappakārañca dassetvā idāni sabbehipi dvādasahi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgehi rathavirahitameva
tika-vin07t:151_6: Avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyosānattāti idaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ dasannaṃ arabhāvena ekattaṃ samāropetvāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:151_7: Na hi tesaṃ paccekaṃ avijjāmūlakatā jarāmaraṇapariyosānatā ca atthi tathā paṭiccasamuppādapāḷiyaṃ avuttattā.
tika-vin07t:151_8: Atha vā tesampi yathārahaṃ atthato avijjāmūlakattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:151_9: attano attano lakkhaṇabhūtakhaṇikajarāmaraṇavasena tappariyosānatañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:151_10: Evañca tesaṃ paccekaṃ arabhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-vin07t:152_0: Evaṃ sabbākāraṃ saṃsāracakkameva dassetvā idāni yena ñāṇena imassa saṃsāracakkassa arānaṃ chedo bhagavato siddho,
tika-vin07t:152_1: tassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti mātikā vuttattā bhavacakkāvayavesu
tika-vin07t:152_2: avijjādīsu paccayapaccayuppannattā pariggahavasena pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā parato tassa atthassa nigamanavasena
tika-vin07t:152_3: vuttena evamayaṃ avijjāhetūtiādikena paṭisambhidāpāḷisahitena pāṭhena sarūpato dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:152_4: tassa ca tesuyeva avijjādīsu catusaṅkhepādivasena pavattivibhāgañca dassetvā tato paraṃ iti bhagavātiādipāṭhena
tika-vin07t:152_5: bhagavato tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena paṭiccasamuppādassa sabbākārato paṭividdhabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna iminā
tika-vin07t:152_6: dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenātiādinā bhagavato tena ñāṇena saṃsāracakkārānaṃ viddhaṃsitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ tattha dukkhādīsu
tika-vin07t:153_3: Tebhūmakadhammavisayassa sabbassāpi rāgassa kilesakāmabhāvato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti āha “kāmupādānapaccayāyeva mettaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
tika-vin07t:153_6: idhekacco “natthi paraloko ucchijjati attā”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:153_8: aparo “asukasmiṃ bhave attā ucchijjatī”ti diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā kāmarūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ karotītiādinā ca diṭṭhupādānamūlikā yojanā,
tika-vin07t:153_10: Aparo “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti asuddhimaggaṃ “suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā
tika-vin07t:153_11: kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā sabbabhavesu sīlabbatupādānamūlikā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:154_0: Idāni yassa saṃsāracakkārānaṃ ghātanasamatthassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādipaccayapaaggahākāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:154_1: kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotītiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo dassito,
tika-vin07t:154_2: tameva ñāṇaṃ avijjādīsu pavattiākārena saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento evamayantiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:154_3: Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ pana “idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:154_4: paccayo hotītiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo dassito,
tika-vin07t:154_5: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento evamayantiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:154_7: Tattha ca kāmabhave ca avijjātiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena vutto na hoti tassa ca avijjā nābhi,
tika-vin07t:154_8: mūlattātiādinā pubbeva dassitattā upari cakkarūpato payogattena upasaṃhārābhāvā ca.
tika-vin07t:154_9: “Api ca tameva paccayapaccayuppannabhāvaṃ nigamanavasena dassento”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:154_10: na cettha paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo nigamanavasena padhānattena dassito,
tika-vin07t:154_11: atha kho paccayapariggahavasappavattaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇameva yathāvuttapaccayapariggahākārassa nigamanavasena dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:154_14: ubhopete dhammā hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:154_19: saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā”tiādi pana paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuccamānattā tassa paccayapariggahākāraparidīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:155_1: evanti anantare vuttanayena ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ hetu,
tika-vin07t:155_3: Ubhopeteti yasmā ayaṃ avijjā paraparikappitapakatiissarādi viya ahetukā niccā dhuvā na hoti,
tika-vin07t:155_4: atha kho “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato sayampi sahetukā saṅkhatā aniccāyeva hoti,
tika-vin07t:155_6: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttanayena paccayapariggaṇhane yā paññā,
tika-vin07t:155_7: taṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhāte kāraṇe yāthāvato pavattattā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ nāmāti.
tika-vin07t:156_0: Ettha hi ñāṇassa visayavibhāvanavaseneva avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto,
tika-vin07t:156_3: tasmā etassa ñāṇassa paccayapariggahākāradassanatthameva heṭṭhāpi kāmabhave ca avijjātiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto,
tika-vin07t:157_0: Tattha ca paccayuppannadhammesu adiṭṭhesu hetūnaṃ paccayabhāvopi na sakkā daṭṭhunti “saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā”ti
tika-vin07t:157_2: Etena nayenāti avijjāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅkhārā hetu,
tika-vin07t:157_3: viññāṇaṃ hetusamuppannantiādinā sabbāni jātipariyosānāni padāni vitthāretabbāni.
tika-vin07t:158_0: Evaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tassa tesu paccayesu
tika-vin07t:158_1: aññehipi ākārehi pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ tatthātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:158_3: Saṅkhippanti ettha avijjādayo hetusāmaññena phalasāmaññena vāti saṅkhepo, saṅgaho,
tika-vin07t:158_5: So pana jātito duvidhopi kālabhedavasena catubbidho jāto.
tika-vin07t:158_8: Avijjādikilesavaṭṭampi vipākadhammadhammatāsarikkhatāya idha kammavaṭṭamevāti āha ime pañca dhammātiādi.
tika-vin07t:158_9: Vipākā dhammātiādīsu kammajaarūpakkhandhānameva vipākasaddavacanīyattepi nāmarūpādipadesu rūpamissampi
tika-vin07t:158_10: phalapañcakaṃ arūpappadhānatāya ca tabbahulatāya ca “vipākavaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:158_15: Jātijarāmaraṇāpadesenāti paramatthadhammavinimuttajātijarāmaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti tadapadesena tesaṃ kathanena taṃmukhenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:159_0: Evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu anekehi pakārehi pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tehi,
tika-vin07t:159_1: avuttehi ca sabbehi ākārehi bhagavato paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭividdhabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin07t:159_2: tassa ca ñāṇassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇasaddappavattinimittataṃ paṭisambhidāpāḷinayena dassetuṃ upasaṃhāravasena iti bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:159_5: Sabbākāratoti idha kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayotiādinā idha vuttehi ca avuttehi
tika-vin07t:159_6: ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgādīsu āgatehi sabbehi pakārehi paṭivijjhati.
tika-vin07t:159_7: Tanti yena ñāṇena bhagavā evaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin07t:160_0: Idāni yamidaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ paccayapariggahākārabhedehi saddhiṃ papañcato dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:160_1: tasmiṃ araghāte etassa upayogitaṃ dassetuṃ iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:160_2: Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena are hanīti sambandho. Kathanti?
tika-vin07t:160_4: Te avijjādike dhamme mahāvajirañāṇāvudhena tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā tena balavavipassanāvudhena
tika-vin07t:160_5: nibbindanto ariyamaggāvudhena virajjanto vimuccanto are hanīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:161_0: Ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjemīti dhammakkhandhaṃ ārabbha pavattāpi vihārakaraṇapūjā bhagavati
tika-vin07t:161_1: pemeneva pavattattā sadhātukādicetiyapaṭimaṇḍitattā ca bhagavatova pūjāti āha bhagavantaṃ uddissātiādi.
tika-vin07t:162_3: Sabbadhammānanti idaṃ kassaci visayavisesassa aggahitattā siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:162_4: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:162_8: “Sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati.
tika-vin07t:162_9: Sabbadhammānanti idaṃ pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:162_11: Abhiññeyyeti lakkhaṇādito aniccādito ca abhivisiṭṭhena lokiyalokuttarañāṇena jānitabbe catusaccadhamme.
tika-vin07t:162_12: Pariññeyyeti aniccādivasena paricchinditvā jānitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha.
tika-vin07t:162_15: Bahuvacananiddeso panettha sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ apekkhitvā kato.
tika-vin07t:163_0: Abhiññeyyanti gāthāya pahātabbabhāvetabbānaṃ samudayamaggasaccānaṃ hetudhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva tapphalānaṃ
tika-vin07t:163_1: dukkhasaccanirodhasaccānampi siddhito pariññātabbañca pariññātaṃ sacchikātabbañca sacchikatanti idampettha
tika-vin07t:164_8: Taṇhāyapi saṅkhāradukkhapariyāpannatāya pariññeyyattā dukkhasaccabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “cha taṇhākāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:164_10: tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā samudayasaccanti gahetabbā.
tika-vin07t:164_13: Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayo saññībhavādayo tayo ekavokārabhavādayo tayo cāti nava bhavā.
tika-vin07t:164_14: Cattāri jhānānīti ārammaṇavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā sāmaññato cattāri jhānāni vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:164_16: Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhāsamuṭṭhāpikāti veditabbā,
tika-vin07t:164_17: kiriyadhammānaṃ pana tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā taṇhā.
tika-vin07t:165_0: Vijjāti attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā.
tika-vin07t:165_4: Manomayiddhiyāti ettha “idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”ti vuttattā sarīrabbhantarajhānamanena
tika-vin07t:165_5: aññassa sarīrassa nibbattivasena pavattā manomayiddhi nāma,
tika-vin07t:165_7: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca.
tika-vin07t:165_8: Gacchati amataṃ disanti dukkhanittharaṇatthikehi daṭṭhabbato amataṃ nibbānameva disaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin07t:165_9: iminā ca caraṇānaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaariyamaggabhāvato nibbānatthikehi ekaṃsena icchitabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:165_10: Idānissā vijjācaraṇasampadāya sāvakādiasādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ tattha vijjāsampadātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:165_12: caraṇadhammabhūtesu jhānesu antogadhāya mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā vasena mahākāruṇikatā sijjhatīti āha “vijjā…pe…
tika-vin07t:165_20: Asajjamāno bhavesu apaccāgacchantoti pahīnānaṃ punānuppattito na puna upagacchanto.
tika-vin07t:166_7: Sundaro gado vacanamassāti “sugado”ti vattabbe niruttinayena da-
tika-vin07t:167_5: okāsaloke kāyagamanena ñātabbaṃ pattabbanti nāhaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:167_6: Idañca rohitadevaputtena lokassa kāyagativasena antagamanassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:168_1: parimitaṭṭhāne eva taṃ ñāṇagamanena gacchantānaṃ dassemīti dassento api cātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:168_10: Adesampi hi nibbānaṃ yesaṃ nirodhāya hoti,
tika-vin07t:168_11: upacārato tannissitaṃ viya hotīti “byāmamatte kaḷevare lokanirodhampi paññapemī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:168_17: Tasmāti yasmā taṃ gamanena pattuṃ na sakkā, tasmā.
tika-vin07t:169_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato lokaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato taṃ dassetuṃ api ca tayo lokātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:169_3: lokiyanti ettha kammakilesā tabbipākā cāti “loko”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:169_6: lokiyanti ettha tassādhārā ca ādheyyabhūtāti “loko”ti ca pavuccati.
tika-vin07t:169_7: Indriyānindriyabaddhā pana sabbeva upādānakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkhataṭṭhena lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ca “saṅkhāraloko”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:169_9: Tena tiṭṭhanasīlā uppajjitvā yāva bhaṅgā pavattanasīlāti āhāraṭṭhitikā,
tika-vin07t:169_11: Sabbe sattāti ca imināpi veneyyānurūpato puggalādhiṭṭhānattā desanāya saṅkhārāva gahitā.
tika-vin07t:170_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti pavattanti.
tika-vin07t:170_1: Virocanāti tesaṃ virocanahetu obhāsanahetūti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:170_2: Disā bhantīti sabbā disā yāvatā vigatandhakārā paññāyanti.
tika-vin07t:170_4: Tasmā virocamānā candimasūriyā yattakā disā bhanti obhāsentīti attho.
tika-vin07t:170_5: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakena pamāṇena sahassappakāro okāsaloko,
tika-vin07t:171_1: Assāti anena bhagavatā saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:171_2: Eko lokoti yvāyaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ paccayāyattavuttito tena sāmaññena saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho,
tika-vin07t:171_4: Sabbatthāpi lokiyadhammāva lokoti adhippetā lokuttarānaṃ pariññeyyattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:171_6: Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti tathā tathā samuppannā pajāyeva vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:171_11: heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā sattavidhā pajāyeva viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_0: Tattha sabbamanussā ca cha kāmāvacaradevā ca nānattakāyā nānattasaññino nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_3: Tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca nānattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_4: Tesu hi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi sarīraṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisaṃ,
tika-vin07t:172_8: Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā ca parittābha appamāṇābha ābhassarā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_13: pañca ca suddhāvāsāti navasu bhūmīsu sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_14: Ābhānānattena pana sabbattha kāyanānattaṃ na gayhati,
tika-vin07t:172_21: tehi saddhiṃ imā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:173_0: Aṭṭha lokadhammāti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha lokassa sabhāvattā lokadhammā.
tika-vin07t:173_1: Lābhālābhādipaccayā uppajjanakā panettha anurodhavirodhā vā lābhādisaddehi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:173_2: Nava sattāvāsāti heṭṭhā vuttā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo eva asaññasattacatutthāruppehi saddhiṃ “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:173_5: atthato tathā pavattā pajā eva idha saṅkhāralokabhāvena gayhantīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:174_0: Ettha ca tīsu bhavesu assādadassanavasena tisso vedanāva lokabhāvena vuttā,
tika-vin07t:174_6: Tesaṃ gahaṇeneva tannissayatappaṭibaddhā tadārammaṇā sabbe tebhūmakā nāmarūpadhammā atthato gahitā eva honti.
tika-vin07t:174_7: Sesehi pana ekavidhādikoṭṭhāsehi sarūpeneva te gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:175_0: Āsayaṃ jānātītiādīsu āhacca cittaṃ ettha setīti āsayo,
tika-vin07t:175_1: aññasmiṃ visaye pavattitvāpi cittaṃ yattha sarasena pavisitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:178_0: Etaṃ duvidhampi āsayaṃ sattānaṃ appavattikkhaṇeyeva bhagavā sabbathā jānāti.
tika-vin07t:178_13: Taṃ duvidhampi adhimuttiṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti.
tika-vin07t:178_17: Upanissayabhūtehi tikkhehi saddhādiindriyehi mudukehi ca samannāgatā tikkhindriyā mudindriyā ca.
tika-vin07t:178_18: Heṭṭhā vuttehi āsayādīhi sundarehi asundarehi ca samannāgatā svākārā dvākārā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:178_23: Evaṃ sattasantānagatadhammavisesajānaneneva sattalokopi vidito dhammavinimuttassa sattassa abhāvāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:179_6: dve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca yojanāni yāni ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ bahalattena ayaṃ vasundharā saṅkhātāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:179_8: Sandhārakaṃ jalaṃ ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhitanti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:179_13: himavā pañcāti yojanānaṃ pañcasatāni ucco ubbedho.
tika-vin07t:179_17: āyāmato ca vitthārato ca satayojanavitthārāti attho.
tika-vin07t:179_20: lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhitoti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi taṃ parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhito,
tika-vin07t:179_21: ayaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāmāti attho, ma-
tika-vin07t:179_23: Atha vā taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhitoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:180_4: so pana catunnaṃ lohabhittīnamantarā yojanasatāyāmavitthāropi samantā soḷasahi ussadanirayehi saddhiṃ dasasahassayojano vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:180_6: Lokānaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare vivare bhavattā lokantarikā.
tika-vin07t:180_7: Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā āsannaṭṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu
tika-vin07t:180_8: ekeko lokantarikanirayo aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo sītanarako sattānaṃ akusalavipākena nibbattati.
tika-vin07t:180_9: Anantānīti tiriyaṃ aṭṭhasu disāsu cakkavāḷāni ākāso viya anantāni.
tika-vin07t:180_11: Anantena buddhañāṇenāti ettha anantañeyyapaṭivedhasāmatthiyayogatova ñāṇaṃ “ananta”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:181_5: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
tika-vin07t:181_21: Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti,
tika-vin07t:182_13: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ yathā satthavāhotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:182_17: Corādīhi adhiṭṭhitaaraññappadesāpi duggamanaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya kantārātveva niruḷhāti sāmaññato “kantāraṃ
tika-vin07t:183_4: Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti pubbabuddhuppādesu saddhammassavanaparicayena “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare ākāraṃ gaṇhi.
tika-vin07t:183_5: Pubbābhiyogavaseneva hi īdisānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ dhammassavanādīsu pasādo uppajjati vagguliādīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:183_8: bhagavā anantacakkavāḷesu sabbasattānampi ekakkhaṇe sappāṭihāriyadhammaṃ sāvetuṃ sakkotīti sabbasattānampi ito pubbeva vimuttippasaṅgo siyā.
tika-vin07t:183_9: Ye pana devamanussanāgasupaṇṇādayo pakatiyāva kammassakataññāṇādiyuttā honti,
tika-vin07t:183_10: teyeva pubbe anupanissayāpi bhagavato saddhammassavanādinā paṭhamaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pasādaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-vin07t:183_12: Are ahampi nāmāti ettha “kutohaṃ idha nibbattoti oloketvā maṇḍūkabhāvatoti ñatvā”ti idaṃ ettakampi are
tika-vin07t:183_13: ahampi nāmāti vimhayavacaneneva sijjhatīti avuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:183_17: Udake jātānampi kacchapādīnaṃ thalagocaratāpi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “vārigocaro”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:184_0: Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenāti ettha sabbaso kilesehi vimuccatīti vimokkho,
tika-vin07t:184_6: Idāni sammāsambuddhapadato buddhapadassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ yasmā vātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:185_0: Guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa
tika-vin07t:185_8: tena sāvakādīnaṃ asādhāraṇatāya garubhūtena mahantena gāravena yuttoti garugāravayutto.
tika-vin07t:185_9: Atha vā garu ca sabbalokassa sikkhakattā teneva gāravayutto cātipi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:186_3: Adhicca yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ adhivacanavasena anapekkhitvā pavattaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:186_13: te guṇā satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:186_16: Yaṃguṇanemittikanti yehi guṇehi nimittabhūtehi etaṃ nāmaṃ nemittikañca jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:187_1: Maggaphalādiariyaguṇaṃ araññādivivekaṭṭhānañca bhaji sevi sīlenāti bhajī.
tika-vin07t:187_5: Rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavāti vuccatīti sabbattha sambandho.
tika-vin07t:187_14: Tattha tattha bhagavāti saddasiddhi niruttinayeneva veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:188_0: Idāni bhagī bhajīti niddesagāthāya navahi padehi dassitamatthaṃ bhagyavāti gāthāya chahi padehi saṅgahetvā
tika-vin07t:188_1: padasiddhiṃ atthayojanānayabhedehi saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ pana aparo nayotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:188_4: teneva vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:189_2: Akkocchimantiādinā punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano kodhova upanāho.
tika-vin07t:189_3: Paresaṃ pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa nipuñchano makkho nāma.
tika-vin07t:189_4: Bahussutādīhi saddhiṃ yugaggāho attano samakaraṇaṃ palāso.
tika-vin07t:189_11: Jātiādiṃ nissāya majjanākārappatto mānova mado nāma.
tika-vin07t:189_28: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyacaraṇañca pañca cetovinibandhā.
tika-vin07t:189_43: Cattāro sassatavādā tathā ekaccasassatavādā antānantikā amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa
tika-vin07t:189_44: saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
tika-vin07t:189_46: Rūpataṇhādichataṇhā eva paccekaṃ kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhāvasena aṭṭhārasa honti,
tika-vin07t:189_50: Sabbadarathapariḷāhakilesasatasahassānīti sabbāni sattānaṃ darathasaṅkhātapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni,
tika-vin07t:189_51: ārammaṇādivibhāgato pavattiākāravibhāgato ca nesaṃ evaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:190_0: Evaṃ bhagyavā bhaggavāti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vibhajitvā idāni tehi dvīhi gahitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ bhagyavantatāya cassātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:190_2: Sakacitte issariyaṃ nāma paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivasappavattiyā ceva cetosamādhivasena ca attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanameva.
tika-vin07t:190_4: saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:190_13: aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā,
tika-vin07t:190_19: Bhagā assa santīti bhagavāti idaṃ saddasatthanayena siddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:191_9: Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena vipariṇāmaṭṭho āvibhūtoti.
tika-vin07t:191_10: Ekasseva sabhāvadhammassa sakabhāvato itarasaccattayanivattito ca parikappetabbattā cattāro atthā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:192_3: visayabhūtassa maraṇadhammassa vā dukkhassa dassanena amataṭṭho.
tika-vin07t:192_9: Ete eva ca pīḷanādayo soḷasa ākārāti vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:193_4: tehi catūhi vivittaṃ nibbānaṃ upadhiviveko nāma.
tika-vin07t:194_0: Anattānupassanāya paṭiladdho dukkhāniccānupassanāhi ca paṭiladdho ariyamaggo āgamanavasena yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin07t:195_0: Yathā loke ekekapadato ekekamakkharaṃ gahetvā “mekhalā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:196_0: Saha devehītiādīsu saha devehi vattatīti sadevako loko.
tika-vin07t:196_4: Tassāpi sadevakapade antobhūtattā avayave samudāyopacāravasena vohāro kato.
tika-vin07t:196_5: Itarathā tena devavisiṭṭhalokasseva gahaṇato pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ na siyā,
tika-vin07t:196_7: Samārakavacanena mārasaddena tena sahacaritā sabbe vasavattidevā ca gahitāti āha “chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t:196_9: Te ādi yesaṃ āruppapariyantānaṃ brahmānaṃ tesaṃ brahmānaṃ gahaṇaṃ brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ. Loka-
tika-vin07t:196_10: saddassa okāsalokādīnampi sādhāraṇattā sattalokāveṇikameva pajāgahaṇaṃ katanti āha “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t:196_15: Sattalokāveṇikassa pajāsaddassa visuṃ gahitattā sadevakaṃ lokanti ettha lokasaddaggahaṇaṃ okāsalokameva niyametīti āha “tīhi padehi okāsaloko”ti.
tika-vin07t:196_17: Okāsalokavisesanassa panettha devamārādisattalokassāpi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ sāmatthiyato gamyamānattā saputto āgatotiādīsu puttādīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:196_18: Imasmiñca naye sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ okāsalokaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ sadevamanussaṃ pajañcāti ca-
tika-vin07t:196_20: okāsasattalokānaṃ gahaṇena cettha tadubhayasammutinimittabhūto saṅkhāralokopi tadavinābhāvato gahito evāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:196_21: Apare pana “sadevakantiādīhi pañcahi padehi sattalokova attano avayavabhūtadevādivisesanehi visesetvā gahito,
tika-vin07t:196_23: tadubhayapaññattivisayo saṅkhāraloko ca gahitā eva hontī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:196_24: Tesañca pajanti idaṃ lokasaddassa visesanaṃ katvā sadevakaṃ pajaṃ lokaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:197_0: Arūpāvacaraloko gahito pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:197_1: Māraggahaṇena tappadhānā taṃsadisā ca upapattidevā saṅgayhantīti āha “chakāmāvacaradevaloko”ti.
tika-vin07t:197_3: cātumahārājikādīnaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ sadevakādipadehi saṅgahitattā idha sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti iminā
tika-vin07t:197_5: sadevamanussanti iminā khattiyaparisā gahapatiparisā ca vuttāti āha “catuparisavasenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:198_0: Vikappantaraṃ dassento āha “sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko”ti.
tika-vin07t:198_2: samaṇabrāhmaṇamanussapadehi sesamanussā ca gahitāti evaṃ vikappadvayepi manussaṃ pajaṃ manussiṃ pajanti pajā-
tika-vin07t:198_4: saddena visesetvā taṃ puna saha devehi vattatīti sadevā, pajā.
tika-vin07t:198_5: Sadevā ca sā manussā cāti sadevamanussā,
tika-vin07t:198_7: Puna kiṃ bhūtaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti evaṃ yathā pajāsaddena manussānaññeva gahaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:198_9: itarathā manussānaññeva gahaṇaṃ na sampajjati sabbamanussānaṃ visesanabhāvena gahitattā aññapadatthabhūtassa kassaci manussassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:198_10: Idāni pajanti iminā avasesanāgādisattepi saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “avasesasabbasattaloko vā”ti.
tika-vin07t:198_11: Etthāpi catuparisavasena avasesasabbasattaloko sammutidevamanussehi vā saha avasesasabbasattalokoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:199_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekapadena abhāgaso sabbalokānaṃ gahaṇapakkhepi
tika-vin07t:199_1: tassa tassa visesanassa sapphalataṃ dassetuṃ api cetthātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:199_2: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedatoti ukkaṭṭhānaṃ devagatipariyāpannānaṃ paricchinnavasena jānanavasena kittisaddo sayaṃ
tika-vin07t:199_3: attano avayavabhūtena sadevakavacanena taṃ suṇantānaṃ sāvento abbhuggatoti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:200_4: Buddhasubodhitatāyāti idaṃ tikaṃ dhammassa hetusarūpaphalavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:200_7: Kiccasuddhiyāti dhammaṃ sutvā yathāsutavasena paṭipajjantānaṃ suppaṭipattisaṅkhātakiccasuddhiyā.
tika-vin07t:201_0: Idāni ādikalyāṇādippakārameva dhammaṃ desento bhagavā sotūnaṃ yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
tika-vin07t:201_1: tappakāsakassa brahmacariyapadassa sātthantiādīni padāni visesanabhāvena vuttāni,
tika-vin07t:201_2: na dhammapadassāti dassanamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ vivaritukāmo sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu panātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:201_3: Tattha tisso sikkhā sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:201_4: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento sīlādike viya tappakāsakaṃ tantidhammampi pakāseti eva saddatthasamudāyattā pariyattidhammassa.
tika-vin07t:201_7: uparūpari adhigantabbavisesasaṅkhātaatthasampattiyā ca saha atthena payojanena vattatīti sātthameva,
tika-vin07t:201_9: tantidhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ yathāvuttena atthena sātthaṃ sabyañjanañca.
tika-vin07t:201_10: Kirātādimilakkhavacanānampi sātthasabyañjanatte samānepi visiṭṭhatthabyañjanayogaṃ sandhāya sahattho
tika-vin07t:201_11: devadatto savittotiādi viya “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti vuttanti āha “atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:201_13: Tattha yaṃ atthaṃ sutvā tathā paṭipajjantā sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin07t:201_16: Byañjanasampatti nāma sithiladhanitādibyañjanaparipuṇṇāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā gambhīrampi atthaṃ
