tika-vin07t:202_0: Idāni nettippakaraṇanayenāpi (netti 4 dvādasapada) atthaṃ dassetuṃ saṅkāsanātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:202_1: Tattha saṅkhepato kāsīyati dīpīyatīti saṅkāsananti kammasādhanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:202_7: Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ uttānīkaraṇapaññattiyo.
tika-vin07t:202_9: Atthapadasamāyogatoti yathāvuttāni eva cha padāni pariyattiyā atthavibhāgattā atthapadāni,
tika-vin07t:202_24: niddesehi paññapetī”ti vacanato saṅkāsanapakāsanasaṅkhaātauddesatthavācakāni vacanāni akkharapadāni nāma.
tika-vin07t:203_5: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
tika-vin07t:203_7: Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā atthasabhāgattā ca vuttaṃ “atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha”nti.
tika-vin07t:203_8: Dhammadesanānaṃ atthasannissitattepi sayaṃ byañjanarūpattā vuttaṃ “dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana”nti.
tika-vin07t:203_17: saddo idha sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ dīpetīti āha sikkhattayapariggahitattātiādi.
tika-vin07t:204_0: Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ aparenāpi pariyāyena dassetuṃ api cātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:204_7: pavedetī’ti evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti ca,
tika-vin07t:204_10: desento ca sātthasabyañjanādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti ca,
tika-vin07t:204_11: “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti ca assosi,
tika-vin07t:204_12: sutvā ca atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
tika-vin07t:205_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā atha kho verañjo…pe…
tika-vin07t:205_1: upasaṅkamī”ti evaṃ sādhu kho panātiādipāṭhassa brāhmaṇassa parivitakkanabhāvena vuttattā brahmacariyaṃ
tika-vin07t:205_2: pakāsetīti padānantarameva assosīti padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ viya paññāyati,
tika-vin07t:205_3: tathāpi “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ yathāvuttanidassanatthena iti-
tika-vin07t:205_4: saddena paricchinditvā vuttattā pana aññattha iti-
tika-vin07t:205_5: saddassa adassanato ca atha kho verañjotiādinā kattabbantaradassanamukhena pāḷiyā pakārantare pavattito
tika-vin07t:205_6: ca yathāvuttavaseneva “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti vacanānantarameva assosīti
tika-vin07t:205_8: Aṭṭhakathācariyena hi brāhmaṇassa attanā sutavaseneva ajjhāsayo uppajjatīti upasaṅkamanahetudassanamukhena
tika-vin07t:205_9: dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvātiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:206_1: Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakenāti idaṃ ukkamena mukhāruḷhavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:206_2: anupasantasabhāvatāya brāhmaṇasseva uṇhodakaṃ viya sītodakenāti attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t:206_3: ñāṇatejayuttatāya vā bhagavā uṇhodakopamoti katvā tabbirahitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sītodakaṃ viya katvā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:206_12: Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇatthāya lahuṃ akicchena uṭṭhātuṃ yoggatāya lahuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:206_13: Balanti sarīrassa sabbakiccakkhamaṃ balaṃ kacci atthīti pucchati.
tika-vin07t:206_15: Saraṇīyameva dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttanti āha “saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīya”nti.
tika-vin07t:207_10: Vibhavānaṃ mahantattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallakoti āha “vibhavamahattatāya samannāgate”ti.
tika-vin07t:207_12: Na abhivādeti vāti abhivādetabbanti na sallakkheti,
tika-vin07t:207_14: Rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti etthāpi niccapakatikaṃ aniccapakatikaṃ vāti attho.
tika-vin07t:208_3: olokesīti ettha dvāraṃ pidhāya nikkhantotiādīsu viya gamanato pure katampi olokanaṃ pacchā kataṃ viya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:208_4: Olokesinti ca lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte maṃsacakkhunā volokesīti attho.
tika-vin07t:209_6: Yassa abhivādādikaraṇasaṅkhātassa sāmaggirasassa bhagavati abhāvaṃ maññamāno brāhmaṇo “arasarūpo”ti āha,
tika-vin07t:209_7: tabbidhurassa rūpataṇhādikasseva sāmaggirasassa abhāvena bhagavā “arasarūpo”ti dassetuṃ sāmaggirasasaddassa
tika-vin07t:210_0: Tālāvatthukatāti ucchinnamūlānaṃ tālānaṃ vatthu viya nesaṃ rūparasādīnaṃ vatthu cittasantānaṃ katanti
tika-vin07t:210_1: imasmiṃ atthe majjhepadalopaṃ dīghañca katvā niddesoti āha tālavatthu viyātiādi.
tika-vin07t:210_2: Tālavatthu viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te tālāvatthukatāti visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:210_5: taṃ viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te rūparasādayo tālāvatthukatā,
tika-vin07t:210_6: ayaṃ aññapadatthavasena atthaggāho heṭṭhā vuttanayena sugamoti visesamatthaṃ dassento āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti.
tika-vin07t:210_7: Evañca matthakasadisesu rūparasādīsu rāgesu chinnesupi tabbatthubhūtassa tālāvatthusadisassa cittasantānassa
tika-vin07t:210_9: Yathārutato pana visesanasamāsavasena atthe gayhamāne rūparasādīnaṃ tālāvatthusadisatāya ṭhānaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:210_10: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ etaṃ dosaṃ pariharituṃ rūparasādīnaṃ kusalākusalattaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:210_13: khīṇāsavānampi yāva parinibbānā kusalākusalānaṃ phaluppattito tesaṃ matthakacchinnatālasadisatāpi na yuttāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:210_14: Atha vā matthakacchinnatālassa ṭhitaṃ aṭṭhitañca amanasikatvā puna anuppattidhammatāsadisamattaṃ upametvā
tika-vin07t:210_15: tālāvatthu viya katāti visesanasamāsavasena atthaggahaṇepi na koci doso. Anu-
tika-vin07t:210_16: saddo pacchāti atthe vattatīti āha pacchābhāvo na hotītiādi.
tika-vin07t:210_17: Anu abhāvaṃ gatāti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena abhāvaṃ gatā.
tika-vin07t:210_18: Anacchariyāti anu anu uparūpari vimhayakatāti attho.
tika-vin07t:210_19: Yañca kho tvaṃ vadesīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggīrasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi,
tika-vin07t:211_1: Sandhāya bhāsitamatthanti yaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha,
tika-vin07t:211_2: bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-vin07t:213_1: Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassāti rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu ativiya saṅgavasena niyuttassa kāmarāgassa,
tika-vin07t:213_2: etena anāgāmīnaṃ vatthābharaṇādīsu saṅganikantivasena uppajjanakāmarāgassa kāmarāgatābhāvaṃ dasseti tassa rūparāgādīsu saṅgahato.
tika-vin07t:215_3: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-vin07t:216_2: Tañhi dhamme yāthāvato dhāreti upadhāretīti “dhammadhātū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:216_3: Desanāvilāsappattoti abhirucivasena parivattetvā desetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso,
tika-vin07t:216_10: Vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtanti vaṭṭato uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya vaṭṭe niccalabhāvena ṭhitaṃ khāṇu viya bhūtaṃ.
tika-vin07t:216_11: Jātānaṃ maccānaṃ niccaṃ maraṇato bhayanti āha ajja maritvātiādi.
tika-vin07t:216_12: Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvanti asadisaṃ ariyāya jātiyā paṭhamajātabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin07t:217_2: Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi upaghātaṃ akarontiyā sammadeva upari sayitāni,
tika-vin07t:218_3: bujjhanti vā tenāti maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi bodhi.
tika-vin07t:218_5: Antarā ca bodhinti dutiyamudāharaṇaṃ vināpi rukkha-
tika-vin07t:218_9: Tisso vijjāti arahattamaggo attanā saha vattamānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇañceva itarā dve
tika-vin07t:218_10: mahaggatavijjā ca tabbinibandhakakilesaviddhaṃsanavasena uppādanato “tisso vijjā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:219_4: Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti.
tika-vin07t:219_6: Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
tika-vin07t:219_7: sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita”nti evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:220_0: Chando kāmotiādīsu patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho icchanaṭṭhena chando.
tika-vin07t:220_6: Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākārabhedena avatthābhedena ca vutto.
tika-vin07t:222_15: Evañhi satīti ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati.
tika-vin07t:223_3: Etesanti yathāvuttanayena vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekadvayassa vācakabhūtānaṃ vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehīti imesaṃ padānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:223_13: Tattha “upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato”ti “nīvaraṇānaṃ tāneva vibhaṅge vuttānī”tipi atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:224_1: Rūpaṃ rūpantiādinā visaye ākoṭentassa visayappavattiāhananaṃ upari āhanananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:224_11: Vicārena saha uppajjamānopi vitakko ārammaṇe abhiniropanākārena pavattiṃ sandhāya “paṭhamābhinipāto”ti vutto.
tika-vin07t:224_15: Aṅgavinimuttassa jhānassa abhāvaṃ dassento rukkho viyātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:225_8: Sampayuttānaṃ pīḷanajjhupekkhanaṃ akatvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā anuggaho.
tika-vin07t:225_11: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvatoti iminā iṭṭhārammaṇādipaṭilābhasamayepi sukhaṃ vijjamānampi apākaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:225_13: paṭiladdharasānubhavanasamaye ca vijjamānapītitopi sukhameva pākaṭataranti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:225_15: na kāyikasukhavasena tassa pītisampayogasseva abhāvena idhānadhippetattā.
tika-vin07t:225_18: Dutiyavikappena aññapadatthasamāsavaseneva “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”nti idaṃ ekaṃ padanti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:226_2: ciṇṇavasīnaṃ pana yogīnaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi jhānaṃ uppajjateva.
tika-vin07t:226_4: Aniccādilakkhaṇavisayāya vipassanāya upanijjhāyanaṃ kathaṃ nibbānālambanassa maggassa hotīti āha vipassanāyātiādi.
tika-vin07t:226_5: Tattha maggena sijjhatīti niccādivipallāsappahāyakena saha maggeneva taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ asammohato attano sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:229_1: Jhānañhi ajjhattajjhattaṃ na hoti chaḷindriyānameva tabbhāvato.
tika-vin07t:231_1: Upapattito ikkhatīti paññāya sahacaraṇaparicayena yathā samavāhibhāvo hoti,
tika-vin07t:231_6: Upekkhābhedaṃ dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ upekkhaṃ pakāsetuṃ upekkhā panātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:231_7: Tattha tatramajjhattatāva khīṇāsavānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanākārena ajjhupekkhanato “chaḷaṅgupekkhā”ti ca,
tika-vin07t:231_12: catutthajjhānasahagatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhitāya “pārisuddhupekkhā”ti ca tena tena avatthābhedena chadhā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:232_0: Vīriyameva pana anaccāraddhaanatisithilesu sahajātesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārena pavattaṃ “vīriyupekkhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:232_1: Aṭṭhannaṃ rūpārūpajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhato pubbabhāge eva nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ pahānābhimukhībhūtattā
tika-vin07t:232_2: tesaṃ pahānepi abyāpārabhāvūpagamanena majjhattākārappavattā samādhivasena uppannā aṭṭha paññā ceva upādānakkhandhabhūtesu
tika-vin07t:232_3: saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhanākārappavattā vipassanāvasena uppannā catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge tassa tassa
tika-vin07t:232_4: adhigamāya catasso catunnaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ pubbabhāge tassa tassa adhigamāya appaṇihitavimokkhavasena
tika-vin07t:232_5: pavattā catasso suññataanimittavimokkhavasena dveti dasa paññā cāti ime aṭṭhārasa paññā saṅkhārupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin07t:232_8: Imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ “tattha tattha āgatanayato vibhāgo dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena
tika-vin07t:232_10: Tattha tattha āgatanayatoti idampi hi tāsaṃ vibhāgadassanassa bhūmipuggalādipadaṃ viya visuṃ mātikāpadavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:232_11: na pana bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgadassanassa āgataṭṭhānaparāmasanaṃ āgataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhasāliniyātiādinā vuttattā,
tika-vin07t:232_12: tasmā sāratthadīpaniyaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ “imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgo tattha
tika-vin07t:232_13: tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dassento āha evamayaṃ dasavidhātiādī”ti,
tika-vin07t:232_15: Tattha tattha āgatanayatoti “idha (khīṇāsavo) bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
tika-vin07t:232_17: upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno”tiādinā chaḷaṅgupekkhā āgatā,
tika-vin07t:232_18: “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā āgatāti iminā nayena
tika-vin07t:232_19: dasannampi upekkhānaṃ tattha tattha vuttapadesesu āgatanayadassanato ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi upekkhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:233_3: brahmavihārupekkhā puthujjanādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi puggalānantiādinā puggalato ca,
tika-vin07t:233_9: Tasmā ekakkhaṇe ca tāsu ekāya sati itarā na uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t:233_14: Vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpī”ti evaṃ kusalattikavasena ca,
tika-vin07t:233_15: “saṅkhepato cattāro ca dhammā vīriyavedanātatramajjhattatāñāṇavasenā”ti evaṃ saṅkhepavasena ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi
tika-vin07t:234_0: Ettha cetā kiñcāpi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena sarūpato uddharitvā na vuttā,
tika-vin07t:234_1: tathāpi tattha vuttappakāreheva tāsaṃ bhūmipuggalādivibhāgo nayato uddharitvā sakkā ñātunti tattha sarūpato
tika-vin07t:234_2: vuttañca avuttañca ekato saṅgahetvā tattha tattha āgatanayatotiādīhi navahi pakārehi atideso kato,
tika-vin07t:234_4: Tathāhi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ādimhi vutte chaḷaṅgupekkhā rūpādiārammaṇatāya bhūmito
tika-vin07t:234_5: kāmāvacarā ca puggalato asekkhānameva ca uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:234_8: kusalattikato abyākatā cāti paṇḍitehi sakkā ñātuṃ,
tika-vin07t:234_9: tathā chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā
tika-vin07t:234_10: ca atthato ekātiādimhi vutte panassa saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitattā brahmavihārupekkhādīhi saha ekakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:234_13: evaṃ sesānampi yathārahaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttanayato bhūmiādivibhāguddhāranayo ñātabbo.
tika-vin07t:235_5: Yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhanti imassa tasmā etamatthantiādinā sambandho.
tika-vin07t:235_7: Taṃsamuṭṭhānenāti taṃ yathāvuttanāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yassa rūpassa tena taṃsamuṭṭhānena rūpena.
tika-vin07t:235_12: kāriyopacārato “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dassentoti attho.
tika-vin07t:235_16: Atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:237_0: Kattha cuppannanti ettha katthāti hetumhi bhummaṃ,
tika-vin07t:237_2: Nānāvajjaneti appanāvīthiāvajjanato nānā bhinnaṃ purimavīthīsu āvajjanaṃ yassa upacārassa,
tika-vin07t:237_5: Upacāre vātiādi pakkhantaradassanaṃ ekāvajjanūpacārepi vāti attho.
tika-vin07t:237_6: Pītipharaṇenāti iminā appanāvīthiyā viya ekavīthiyampi kāmāvacarapītiyā pharaṇamattassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:237_22: tasmā tatthassa siyā uppattīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:238_2: Siyā uppattīti idañca paccayamattadassanena sambhāvanamattato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:238_4: vitakkavicārarahite pana dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe taduppattisambhāvanāpi na yuttā kātunti.
tika-vin07t:238_5: Itarathā kusalacittakkhaṇe akusaladomanassuppattiyā asambhavato “tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:238_8: Dutiyajjhāneti etthāpi anantaravīthīsupi na tveva uppajjatīti attho,
tika-vin07t:238_11: Pahīnāti vuttāti idaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti vuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:238_16: majjhattārammaṇampi hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu eva paviṭṭhaṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:241_1: Arūpajjhānānampi aṅgasamatāya catutthajjhāne saṅgahoti āha kesañci abhiññāpādakānītiādi,
tika-vin07t:241_3: Tesu ca catutthajjhānameva abhiññāpādakaṃ nirodhapādakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:241_5: Dūrakāraṇataṃ pana sandhāya “cattāri jhānānī”ti nesampi ekato gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:241_6: Cittekaggatatthānīti idaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha khīṇāsavānantiādi.
tika-vin07t:241_9: Idañhi jhānaṃ bhagavato sabbabuddhaguṇadāyakassa maggañāṇassa padaṭṭhānattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:242_2: Icchāvacarānanti icchāya vasena otiṇṇānaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ tadekaṭṭhatañca appattānaṃ attukkaṃsanādivasappavattānaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_3: aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ evarūpaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyātiādinayappavattānaṃ mānādīnaṃ.
tika-vin07t:242_5: so pamādapāṭhoti gahetabbo “jhānappaṭilābhapaccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ abhāvassa nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena parisuddho”ti
tika-vin07t:242_7: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_8: kopaappaccayānanti atthoti ayampi pāṭho ayutto evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:242_9: Tato eva ca visuddhimagge ayaṃ pāṭho sabbena sabbaṃ na dassito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:242_10: Tattha ca nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti evaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvappattadosānaṃ parāmaṭṭhattā ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhittoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:243_1: saddena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvasseva lobhassa mānādīnañca gahaṇaṃ jhānappaṭilābhapaccayānanti anuvattamānattā.
tika-vin07t:243_2: Ubhayampīti anaṅgaṇattaṃ vigatūpakkilesattañcāti etaṃ ubhayampi yathākkamaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:243_3: Tesu ca suttesu kiñcāpi nīvaraṇasabhāvappattā thūladosāpi vuttā,
tika-vin07t:243_4: tathāpi adhigatacatautthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā idha sukhumā eva te gahitā.
tika-vin07t:244_0: Pubbenivāsānussatiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇanti nibbacanaṃ dassento āha pubbenivāsānussatimhītiādi.
tika-vin07t:244_1: Idāni pubbenivāsaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiṃ tattha ñāṇañca vibhāgato dassetuṃ tatthātiādi vuttaṃ. Pubba-
tika-vin07t:244_3: saddo ca kammasādhanoti āha “pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthakkhandhā”ti.
tika-vin07t:244_7: saddassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā”ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ gocaranivāsenātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:244_8: Gocarabhūtāpi hi dhammā ñāṇena nivutthā nāma honti,
tika-vin07t:244_9: te pana saparaviññāṇagocaratāya duvidhāti dassetuṃ attanotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:244_12: Anamataggepi hi saṃsāre attanā aviññātapubbānaṃ sattānaṃ khandhā pareheva kehici viññātattā paraviññāṇaviññātā nāma vuttā,
tika-vin07t:244_13: tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ purimato dukkaraṃ yehi parehi viññātatāya te paraviññāṇaviññātā nāma jātā,
tika-vin07t:244_15: Te ca paraviññāṇaviññātā duvidhā parinibbutā aparinibbutāti.
tika-vin07t:244_16: Tesu ca parinibbutānussaraṇaṃ dukkaraṃ sabbaso susamucchinnasantānattā.
tika-vin07t:244_17: Taṃ pana sikhāppattaparaviññātaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dassetuṃ “chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:244_18: Tattha chinnavaṭumakā atīte parinibbutā khīṇāsavā chinnasaṃsāramaggattā. Ādi-
tika-vin07t:244_19: saddena aparinibbutānaṃ paraviññāṇaviññātānampi sīhokkantikavasaena anussaraṇaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:245_4: Vihitanti vā payuttaṃ vaṇṇitanti atthaṃ gahetvā “anekehi pakārehi vihita”nti vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhanti āha “anekehi…pe…
tika-vin07t:246_0: Āraddhappakāradassanattheti anussarituṃ āraddhānaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhānaṃ dassanatthe.
tika-vin07t:246_2: So ekakammamūlako ādānanikkhepaparicchinno khandhappabandho idha “jātī”ti adhippetoti āha ekampītiādi.
tika-vin07t:246_4: so pana atthato kālo tathāpavattadhammamupādāya paññatto,
tika-vin07t:246_5: tesaṃ vasenassa parihāni ca vaḍḍhi ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:246_6: Saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vināso assa atthīti saṃvaṭṭo,
tika-vin07t:246_8: Saṃvaṭṭena vināsena saha tiṭṭhati sīlenāti saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī.
tika-vin07t:246_13: Vitthārato panāti puthulato pana saṃvaṭṭasīmābhedo natthi,
tika-vin07t:246_15: Ekanagariyā viya assa jātakkhaṇe vikārāpajjanato jātikkhettavohāroti dassetuṃ “paṭisandhiādīsu kampatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:246_16: Ānubhāvo pavattatīti tadantogadhānaṃ sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ rogādiupaddavo vūpasammatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:246_17: Yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyāti vuttanti yaṃ visayakkhettaṃ sandhāya ekasmiṃ eva khaṇe sabbattha sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:246_18: attano rūpakāyadassanañca paṭijānantena bhagavatā “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:247_8: Cutipaṭisandhivasenāti attano parassa vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā
tika-vin07t:247_9: paṭisandhiyā eva gahaṇavasena evaṃ jānanaṃ icchitappadesokkamananti āha tesañhītiādi.
tika-vin07t:249_1: Divi bhavattā dibbanti devānaṃ pasādacakkhu vuccatīti āha “dibbasadisattā”ti.
tika-vin07t:249_9: imassa dibbavihārapaayāpannaṃ attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ nissāya
tika-vin07t:249_14: iminā “cakkhati rūpaṃ vibhāvetī”ti nibbacanato cakkhuttaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:249_15: Cakkhukiccakaraṇenāti idaṃ cakkhumiva cakkhūti upamāya sadisanimittadassanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_1: Tattha vicikicchātiādīsu bhagavato bodhimūle anabhisambuddhasseva dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni passantassa “idaṃ nu kho kiṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_2: idaṃ nu kho ki”nti vicikicchā uppannā,
tika-vin07t:250_3: tato pana vicikicchānivattanatthaṃ tāni rūpāni amanasikaroto amanasikarontassa thinamiddhaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_4: tato nivattanatthaṃ puna sabbarūpāni manasikaroto rakkhasādīsu chambhitattaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_5: “kimettha bhāyitabba”nti bhayavinodanavasena manasikaroto attano manasikārakosallaṃ paṭicca uppilasaṅkhātā samādhidūsikā gehasitapīti uppannā,
tika-vin07t:250_6: tannisedhāya manasikāravīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karontassa kāyālasiyasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_8: puna tannisedhāya vīriyaṃ sithilayato atilīnavīriyaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:250_9: tannisedhetvā dibbarūpāni passato abhijappāsaṅkhātā taṇhā uppannā,
tika-vin07t:250_10: tannisedhāya hīnādinānārūpāni manasikaroto nānārammaṇavikkhepasaṅkhātā nānattasaññā uppannā.
tika-vin07t:250_11: Puna taṃ vihāya ekameva manasikaroto atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ ativiya cintanaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-vin07t:250_13: Na ca rūpāni passāmīti “parikammobhāsamanasikārapasutatāya dibbacakkhunā rūpāni na passāmī”ti evaṃ uppattikkamasahito attho veditabbo,
tika-vin07t:250_14: manussānaṃ idanti mānusakaṃ mānusakacakkhugocaraṃ thūlarūpaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t:250_15: Tadeva manussānaṃ dassanūpacārattā manussūpacāroti āha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:251_0: Yasmā niyamena purejātaṭṭhitarūpārammaṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ āvajjanaparikammehi vinā na uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:251_1: na ca uppajjamānaṃ bhijjamānaṃ rūpamassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti dubbalattā,
tika-vin07t:251_7: saddassa saṇṭhānavācakataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvātiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:251_9: Iminā pana padenāti yathākammupageti iminā padena.
tika-vin07t:252_0: Nerayikānaṃ aggijālasatthanipātādīhi vibhinnasarīravaṇṇaṃ disvā tadanantarehi kāmāvacarajavaneheva ñātaṃ
tika-vin07t:252_2: Evaṃ manasikarotīti tesaṃ kammassa ñātukāmatāvasena pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya parikammavasena kinnu khotiādinā manasikaroti.
tika-vin07t:252_3: Athassa taṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āvajjanaparikammādīnaṃ upari uppannena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānena sampayuttaṃ yaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:252_6: Visuṃ parikammanti pubbenivāsādīnaṃ viya dibbacakkhuñāṇaparikammaṃ vinā visuṃ parikammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin07t:252_9: Kammasīsena taṃsampayutte ca dhamme ārammaṇaṃ katvā appanāvīthi uppajjati.
tika-vin07t:252_13: Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ vasībhūtānampi abhiññānaṃ pādakajjhānādiparikammaṃ vinā anuppattito.
tika-vin07t:252_14: Pādakajjhānādimattena ca visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma na hotīti dibbacakkhunāva etāni ñāṇāni siddhānīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:252_15: Evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassāpīti dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhassa sattassa anāgate pavattiṃ ñātukāmatāya pādakajjhānādīnamanantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:252_16: ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ anāgatesu anekakappesu uppajjanārahe pubbe attabhāvapariyāpanne pañcakkhandhe tappaṭibaddhe
tika-vin07t:252_17: tadārammaṇe ca sabbe lokiyalokuttaradhamme sammutiñca ekakkhaṇe ālambitvā uppajjanakassa catutthajjhānasampayuttassa
tika-vin07t:252_18: anāgataṃsañaāṇassāpi visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:253_2: atha kho tadanantaresu kāmāvacarajavanakkhaṇesu eva hoti nāmaparikappakāle itaraparikappāsambhavā kammenuppattiyañca pariyantābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:253_3: Sabbaparikammanimittesu pana dhammesu atthesupi ekakkhaṇe abhiññāya diṭṭhesu yathārucivasena pacchā evaṃnāmotiādinā
tika-vin07t:253_4: kāmāvacaracittena vikappo uppajjati cakkhunā diṭṭhesu bahūsu rūpesu thambhakumbhādivikappo viya.
tika-vin07t:253_6: tampi vikappanārahanti sabbaṃ nāmagottādito vikappitameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:253_8: evaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiyampi parikappārahatampi sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ evaṃnāmotiādinā apadesasahitameva vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:253_12: pubbe diṭṭhassa puna vohārakālepi parikappetabbato parikappārahadhammadassanameva tehipi atthato upagataṃ.
tika-vin07t:253_13: Eke pana “so tato cuto amutra udapādintiādivacanato kameneva atītānāgatadhammajānanena nāmagottādīhi saddhiṃ gahaṇaṃ sukara”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:253_14: taṃ ayuttameva buddhānampi sabbaṃ ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sabbaññutāhānippasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t:253_15: Pāḷiyaṃ ime vata bhontotiādi yathākammupagañāṇassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:254_6: parisadūsako eva amhākaṃ lajjitabbassa karaṇato”ti adhippāyena hīḷetvā vuttattā guṇaparidhaṃsanena upavadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:254_7: Āvusotiādinā thero uparimagguppattimassa ākaṅkhanto karuṇāya attānamāvikāsi.
tika-vin07t:254_11: Anāgāmī arahā ca āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya na khameyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:254_12: sesā dosenapīti āha “sace so na khamatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:255_3: Sīlasampannotiādīsu nippariyāyato aggamaggaṭṭho adhippeto tasseva aññārādhanā niyamato,
tika-vin07t:255_4: sesāpi vā pacchimabhavikā sīlādīsu ṭhitā tesampi aññuppattiniyamato.
tika-vin07t:255_14: “Sabbametaṃ pajahissāmī”ti cittena accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanavasena appahāya appaṭinissajjitvā.
tika-vin07t:255_15: Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito,
tika-vin07t:255_17: ariyūpavādenevassa idaṃ niyamena niraye nibbattanaṃ yathā maggena phalaṃ sampajjati,
tika-vin07t:256_0: Micchādiṭṭhi sabbapāpamūlattā paramā padhānā yesaṃ vajjānaṃ tāni micchādiṭṭhiparamāni vajjāni,
tika-vin07t:256_2: Avītarāgassa maraṇato paraṃ nāma bhavantarupādānamevāti āha “paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe”ti.
tika-vin07t:256_4: tassa upacchedeneva kāyo bhijjatīti āha “kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassupacchedā”ti.
tika-vin07t:258_3: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena ṭhānaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma.
tika-vin07t:258_5: Kilesavasenāti yesaṃ āsavānaṃ khepanena idaṃ ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:258_7: tesaṃ āsavānaṃ vasena sabbakilesānaṃ saṅgahaṇato pariyāyato pakārantaratoti attho.
tika-vin07t:258_8: Pāḷiyaṃ atītakālavasena “abbhaññāsi”nti vatvāpi abhisamayakāle tassa tassa jānanassa paccuppannataṃ upādāya
tika-vin07t:258_9: “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato”ti vattamānakālena niddeso kato.
tika-vin07t:258_10: Kāmāsavādīnaṃ vimuccaneneva tadavinābhāvato diṭṭhāsavassāpi vimutti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:259_1: vusitaṃ brahmacariyantiādijānanaṃ maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇavasena hotīti āha “khīṇā jātītiādīhi tassa bhūmi”nti.
tika-vin07t:259_3: tīsu kālesupi jātikkhayaṃ pati ujukameva vāyāmāsambhavepi taṃ pati vāyāmakaraṇassa sātthakataṃ,
tika-vin07t:259_4: tassa anāgatakkhandhānuppattiphalatañca dassetuṃ yā panātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:259_5: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattātiādinā hi maggenāvihatakileseheva āyatiṃ khandhānaṃ jāti hessati,
tika-vin07t:259_6: tesañca kilesānaṃ maggena vināse sati khandhā na jāyissanti,
tika-vin07t:259_7: kilesānañca tekālikatāya jātiyaṃ vuttanayena kenaci paccayena vināsayogepi cittasantāne kilesaviruddhaariyamaggakkhaṇuppādanameva
tika-vin07t:259_8: tabbināso viruddhapaccayopanipātena āyatiṃ anuppajjanato bījasantāne aggikkhandhopanipātena āyatiṃ bījattānuppatti viya,
tika-vin07t:259_9: iti maggakkhaṇuppattisaṅkhātakilesābhāvena kilesaphalānaṃ khandhānaṃ āyatiṃ anuppattiyeva jātikkhayoti ayamattho vibhāvīyati,
tika-vin07t:259_11: Ettha cāyamattho kilesābhāvasaṅkhātassa maggassa bhāvitattā uppāditattā paccayābhāvena anuppajjantī khandhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:259_12: jāti tena āyatiṃ anuppajjanasaṅkhātena anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena vohārato khīṇā me jātīti.
tika-vin07t:259_13: Na hi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paccayantarena vināso sambhavati,
tika-vin07t:262_8: atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento atha vātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:262_10: desanāpasādādivisesāpekkhāyapi tatheva tiṭṭhati pubbe nipphannattāti āha “abhikkantaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:263_0: Gamudhātussa dvikammakattābhāvā gotamaṃ saraṇanti idaṃ padadvayampi na upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:263_2: pacchimaṃ pana paccattavacananti dassetuṃ “gotamaṃ saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:263_6: Tātāti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā nissakkasseva yuttattā.
tika-vin07t:263_7: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodheti padadvayenāpi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā,
tika-vin07t:263_8: na maggaṭṭhāti dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha.
tika-vin07t:263_19: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā teti te aṭṭha puggalā ariyadhammassa diṭṭhattā dhammadasā.
tika-vin07t:264_2: tadeva me ratanattayaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇanti buddhasubuddhatādiguṇavasena tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:264_3: Yathāvuttena iminā cittuppādena samannāgato saraṇaṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin07t:264_4: Etassa ca saraṇagamanassa lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho pabhedo.
tika-vin07t:264_6: Lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ catudhā pavattati ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa pariccajāmītiādinā attaniyyātanena,
tika-vin07t:264_12: Evaṃ ñātiādivasena titthiyaṃ vandato saraṇaṃ na bhijjati,
tika-vin07t:264_14: Lokiyassa saraṇagamanassa nibbānappattiniyamaṃ sadisaphalaṃ saraṇagatassa anāgate nibbānappattiniyamato.
tika-vin07t:264_21: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanassa sabbathā saṃkileso vā bhedo vā natthīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:265_1: Tattha yo gahaṭṭho manusso vā amanusso vā vuttanayena tisaraṇaṃ gato,
tika-vin07t:265_3: Yo ca saraṇagamanādikiriyāya ratanattayaṃ upāsanato “upāsako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:265_5: Pañcamicchāvāṇijjādipāpājīvaṃ pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanamassa ājīvo.
tika-vin07t:266_5: Etena ca vacīpavattiyā pubbabhāge ṭhānakaraṇānaṃ calanapaccayo vāyodhātuyā vikārākāro visuṃ kāyaviññatti na hoti,
tika-vin07t:266_6: tena visuṃ viññāpetabbassa adhippāyassa abhāvā vacīviññattiyameva saṅgayhati tadupakārattā.
tika-vin07t:266_7: Yathā kāyena kāyakaṇḍuyanādīsu sadduppattihetubhūto pathavīdhātuyā ākāravikāro visuṃ adhippāyassa aviññāpanato vacīviññatti na hoti,
tika-vin07t:266_11: Evañca bahiddhā rukkhādīsu calanasadduppattipaccayānaṃ yathāvuttappakārānaṃ vikārākārānaṃ aviññattitā samatthitā hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:266_12: Keci vācaṅganti “hotu sādhū”ti evamādivācāya avayavantiādiṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:267_3: Ativiya appagghepi yadā kiñcideva datvā bahuṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t:267_8: etena “vuttaṃ salākā eva hoti etthāti salākāvuttā”ti visesanassa paranipātena nibbacanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:267_9: Atha vā “sabbaṃ sassaṃ salākāmattameva vuttaṃ nibbattaṃ sampannaṃ etthāti salākāvuttā”tipi nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:267_11: “Salākāya vuttaṃ jīvikā etissanti salākāvuttā”tipi nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ salākāya vātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:268_2: Paggayhati etena bhikkhāti hi paggaho, patto.
tika-vin07t:268_5: uñchatthāya gahetabbo pattoti sijjhatīti āha “pattaṃ gahetvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:269_9: Sā ca mandirā yasmā parimaṇḍalākārena bahuvidhā ca katā,
tika-vin07t:270_10: Ñāti ca pasatthatamaguṇayogato seṭṭho cāti ñātiseṭṭho.
tika-vin07t:270_11: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpoti āmisassa dullabhakālesu parikathobhāsādiṃ akatvā paramasallekhavuttiyā
tika-vin07t:270_12: ājīvasuddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā bhagavato adhippāyānuguṇaṃ āmisaṃ vicārentena nāma ñātisinehayuttena ariyasāvakeneva
tika-vin07t:271_2: Tampīti uttarakuruṃ vā tidasapuraṃ vā āvaṭṭeyya.
tika-vin07t:273_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo”ti. –
tika-vin07t:274_5: Byāmappabhāyāti samantato heṭṭhā ca upari ca asītihatthamatte ṭhāne ghanībhūtāya chabbaṇṇāya pabhāya,
tika-vin07t:274_6: yato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo taḷākato mātikāyo viya nikkhamitvā dasasu disāsu dhāvanti,
tika-vin07t:274_9: Yasmā anubyañjanāni ca paccekaṃ bhagavato sarīre pabhāsampattiyuttā ākāse candasūriyādayo viya vibhātā virocanti,
tika-vin07t:274_10: tasmā tāni byāmappabhāya saha kenaci anabhibhavanīyāni vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:275_3: dhammadesanādiko vā attho uppajjati etāyāti aṭṭhuppatti,
tika-vin07t:276_0: Ekaṃ gahetvāti dhammadesanāsikkhāpadapaññattisaṅkhātesu dvīsu dhammadesanākāraṇaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin07t:276_1: Ratticchedo vāti sattāhakaraṇīyavasena gantvā bahi aruṇuṭṭhāpanavasena vutto,
tika-vin07t:276_3: Etena ca vassacchedapaccaye sattāhakaraṇīyena gamanaṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:276_4: Na kismiñcīti kismiñci guṇe sambhāvanāvasena na maññanti.
tika-vin07t:276_5: Pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmāti ājīvahetu santaguṇappakāsanena ājīvavipattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:277_1: “Āyasmāti piyavacanameta”nti uccanīcajanasāmaññavasena vatvā puna uccajanāveṇikavaseneva dassento “garugāravasappatissādhivacana”nti āha.
tika-vin07t:277_6: Pappaṭakojanti ādikappe udakūpari paṭhamaṃ pathavībhāvena sañjātaṃ navanītapiṇḍasadisaṃ udakepi uppilanasabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:277_8: Yaṃ ādikappikehi manussehi rasataṇhāya gahetvā bhuñjamānaṃ tesaṃ kammabalena uparibhāge kakkhaḷabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā heṭṭhā purimākāreneva ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:277_9: yassa ca balena ayaṃ mahāpathavī sapabbatasamuddakānanā heṭṭhāudake animujjamānā avikiriyamānā kullupari viya niccalā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:277_17: te tattha saṅkāmessāmīti ettha manussāmanussatiracchānagatitthīnampi hatthasaṅkāmane kiṃ anāmāsadoso na hotīti? Na hoti, kasmā?
tika-vin07t:277_21: teneva bhagavāpi anāmāsadosaṃ adassetvā “vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu”nti āha,
tika-vin07t:279_2: tadaññesañca sikkhāpadānaṃ pātimokkhuddesakkamena yebhuyyena apaññattataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:279_4: Teneva thero bhagavantaṃ “sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya uddiseyya pātimokkha”nti pātimokkhuddesena saha sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ yāci.
tika-vin07t:279_5: Khandhake hi ānandattherādīnaṃ pabbajjato puretarameva rāhulabhaddassa pabbajjāya “na,
tika-vin07t:279_8: yo pabbājeyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti paññattasikkhāpadaṃ dissati.
tika-vin07t:279_11: “ratticchedo vassacchedo vā na kato”ti ca vuttattā pubbeva sāmapākādipaṭikkhepo atthīti paññāyati.
tika-vin07t:279_12: Evaṃ katipayasikkhāpadānaṃ paññattisabbhāvepi apaññattapārājikādike sandhāya “na tāva,
tika-vin07t:279_14: satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”ti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:279_15: Puthuttārammaṇato paṭinivattitvā sammadeva ekārammaṇe cittena līno paṭisallīno nāmāti āha “ekībhāvaṃ gatassā”ti,
tika-vin07t:280_2: sāriputto puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño”ti āgatā cha paññā ca navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā
tika-vin07t:280_3: ca arahattamaggapaññā cāti evaṃ soḷasavidhena āgatāya paññāya.
tika-vin07t:280_5: teyeva loke pākaṭāti vipassīādayova idha uddhaṭā,
tika-vin07t:280_7: Teneva āṭānāṭiyasutte devāpi attano pākaṭānaṃ tesaññeva gahaṇaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-vin07t:281_5: Pāṇaṃ na hane na cādinnamādiyetiādinā ovādasikkhāpadānaṃ vijjamānattā vuttaṃ sattāpattikkhandhavasenātiādi.
tika-vin07t:281_6: Channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ osānadivasaṃ apekkhitvā “sakiṃ saki”nti vuttattā tadapekkhamettha sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:281_7: Sakalajambudīpe sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ akāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:282_0: Khantī paramantiādīsu titikkhāsaṅkhātā khanti sattasaṅkhārehi nibbattāniṭṭhākhamanakilesatapanato paramaṃ tapo nāma.
tika-vin07t:282_1: Vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā nibbānaṃ sabbadhammehi paramaṃ uttamanti buddhā vadanti.
tika-vin07t:282_2: Yathāvuttakhantiyā abhāvena pāṇavadhaṃ vā chedanatāḷanādiṃ vā karonto parūpaghātī parassaharaṇaparadārātikkamanādīhi
tika-vin07t:282_3: musāpesuññapharusādīhi ca paraṃ viheṭhayanto ca bāhitapāpatāya abhāvena pabbajito vā samitapāpatāya abhāvena
tika-vin07t:282_5: Sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpassa anuppādanaṃ lokiyasamādhivipassanāhi kusalassa upasampādanaṃ nipphādanaṃ sabbehi
tika-vin07t:282_6: maggaphalehi attano cittassa parisodhanaṃ pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ yaṃ,
tika-vin07t:282_9: Anupaghātoti kāyena kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ vuttāvasese ca pātimokkhasaṅkhāte sīle attānaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:282_12: lokiyalokuttarasamādhimhi taduppādanavasena āyogo anuyogo ca yaṃ,
tika-vin07t:283_5: ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:283_6: sikkhāpadapaññattikaālato pana pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisantīti idaṃ pātimokkhuddesakkameneva paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:283_10: Aparisuddhāya parisāyāti alajjīpuggalehi vomissatāya asuddhāya parisāya,
tika-vin07t:283_11: na kevalaṃ buddhānaññeva aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhuddeso ayutto,
tika-vin07t:283_13: Codanāsāraṇādivasena pana sodhetvā saṃvāsakaraṇaṃ sāvakānaññeva bhāro,
tika-vin07t:283_14: buddhā pana sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā uposathādikaraṇavidhānaṃ sikkhāpetvā vissajjenti,
tika-vin07t:283_16: teneva bhagavā asuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhaṃ anuddisitvā sakalarattiṃ tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
tika-vin07t:283_17: Bhikkhū ca bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā asuddhapuggalaṃ bahi nīhariṃsu.
tika-vin07t:283_18: Tasmā sāvakānampi asuddhāya parisāya ñatvā uposathādisaṅghakammakaraṇaṃ brahmacariyantarāyakaraṇaṃ vinā na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:284_0: Sammukhasāvakānanti buddhānaṃ sammukhe dharamānakāle pabbajitānaṃ sabbantimānaṃ sāvakānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:284_1: Uḷārātisayajotanatthaṃ “uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vā”ti puna uḷārasaddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Ādi-
tika-vin07t:285_0: Apaññattepi sikkhāpade yadi sāvakā samānajātiādikā siyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:285_1: attano kulānugataganthaṃ viya bhagavato vacanaṃ na nāseyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t:285_4: tasmā vināsesunti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ yasmā ekanāmā…pe…
tika-vin07t:285_6: Ciraṭṭhitikavāre pana sāvakānaṃ nānājaccādibhāve samānepi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paripuṇṇatāya sāsanassa cirappavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:285_7: Yadi evaṃ kasmā sabbepi buddhā sikkhāpadāni na paññapentīti?
tika-vin07t:285_8: Yasmā ca sāsanassa cirappavattiyā na kevalaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva hetu,
tika-vin07t:285_9: atha kho āyatiṃ dhammavinayaṃ gahetvā sāvakehi vinetabbapuggalānaṃ sambhavopi,
tika-vin07t:285_10: tasmā tesaṃ sambhave sati buddhā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti,
tika-vin07t:285_11: nāsatīti paripuṇṇāpaññattiyeva veneyyasambhavassāpi sūcanato sāsanassa cirappavattiyā hetu vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:285_13: ovadatīti ettha sahassasaṅkhyāparicchinno saṅgho sahasso sahassilokadhātūtiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:285_15: Sahassasaddassa ekavacanantatāya “bhikkhusahassassā”ti vatvā avayavāpekkhāya “ovadiyamānāna”nti bahuvacananiddeso katoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:286_0: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti ettha āsavehīti kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:286_3: Tasmā āsavehi kattubhūtehi anupādāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimocitānīti evamettha attho gahetabboti āha tesañhi cittānītiādi.
tika-vin07t:286_4: Yehi āsavehīti etthāpi kattuatthe eva karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:286_11: Aggahetvā vimucciṃsūti ārammaṇavasena tāni cittāni aggahetvā āsavā tehi cittehi muttavanto ahesunti attho.
tika-vin07t:286_14: Tasmā kañci saṅkhatadhammaṃ taṇhādivasena anupādiyitvā cittāni vimuttavantāni ahesunti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:286_15: Purimavacanāpekkhanti aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍeti vuttavacanassa apekkhanaṃ tasmiṃ purimavacaneti evaṃ apekkhananti attho,
tika-vin07t:286_17: Bhiṃsanassa bhayassa kataṃ karaṇaṃ kiriyā bhiṃsanakataṃ,
tika-vin07t:286_22: kārassa lopaṃ katvā vuttanti pakārantarena atthaṃ dassento āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:286_23: Bahutarānaṃ sattānaṃ vāti yebhuyyenāti padassa atthadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:286_24: Tena ca yo kocīti padassāpi yo yo pavisatīti vicchāvasena nānatthena attho gahetabboti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:287_0: Nigamananti pakate atthe yathāvuttassa atthassa upasaṃhāro.
tika-vin07t:287_3: vipassīādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ attano parinibbānato upari pariyattivasena vinetabbānaṃ puggalānaṃ abhāvena
tika-vin07t:287_4: tesaṃ atthāya vitthārato sikkhāpadapaññattiyaṃ kilāsutā appossukkatā,
tika-vin07t:287_5: yā ca upanissayasampannānaṃ veneyyānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca bhiṃsanakavanasaṇḍepi gantvā ovadantānaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:287_10: yena vipassīādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosīti.
tika-vin07t:287_15: Satasahassaṃ saṭṭhimattāni ca vassasahassānīti idaṃ bhagavato jātito paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:287_16: bodhito paṭṭhāya pana gaṇiyamānaṃ ūnaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:288_2: Ko anusandhīti purimakathāya imassa ko sambandhoti attho.
tika-vin07t:288_8: Lokāmisabhūtanti lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbato lokāmisabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin07t:288_15: Idāni atthayojanaṃ dassento āha ayaṃ vā hetthātiādi.
tika-vin07t:288_20: Atha satthāti padassa atthaṃ dasseti “tadā satthā”ti.
tika-vin07t:288_21: Ropetvāti phālitaṭṭhāne ninnaṃ maṃsaṃ samaṃ vaḍḍhetvā.
tika-vin07t:289_3: Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvāti anavajjasabhāvena sāvajjasabhāvaṃ sammissetvā.
tika-vin07t:289_5: yathā dhammo ca vinayo ca vinassissati,
tika-vin07t:289_13: so ca atthato apāyesu khipanako diṭṭhiādiakusaladhammo evāti āha “ye dhammā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:289_14: Idāni sabhāvavaseneva atthaṃ dassetuṃ vinipatanaṃ vātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:290_2: Pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvāti “āgāminiyā puṇṇamiyā pavāressāmā”ti anumatidānavasena datvā,
tika-vin07t:290_4: etena nayena kenaci paccayena pavāraṇukkaḍḍhanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:290_8: Idañca nidassanamattaṃ veneyyānaṃ aparipākaṃ paṭicca phussamāsato parañca ekadviticatumāsampi tattheva vasitvā sesamāsehi cārikāya pariyosāpanato.
tika-vin07t:290_10: Manussā pana imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā honti.
tika-vin07t:290_11: Itaracakkavāḷesu pana manussānaṃ imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe uppattiyā chanduppādanatthaṃ anantampi cakkavāḷaṃ
tika-vin07t:291_1: saddo āgacchāti iminā samānatthoti āha “āgaccha yāmā”ti,
tika-vin07t:291_3: Suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāhīti vilīnasuvaṇṇajalaṃ viya piñjarāhi suvaṇṇavaṇṇāhīti attho.
tika-vin07t:292_10: Dutiye atthavikappe etthāti imassa vivaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ temāsabbhantareti.
tika-vin07t:294_9: Samantapāsādikāyāti samantato sabbaso pasādaṃ janetīti samantapāsādikā, tassā.
tika-vin07t:295_1: te pakāre vitthāretvā dassetuṃ tatridantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:295_3: tatra tassaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ samantapasādikabhāve idaṃ vakkhamānagāthāvacanaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:295_7: Sikkhāpadanidānanti pana vesālīādi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā kāraṇabhūtadesaviseso veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:301_2: Evaṃ payojitassa mūlassa saha vaḍḍhiyā gahaṇavāyāmo uddhāro nāma.
tika-vin07t:301_3: Asukadivase dinnantiādinā pamuṭṭhassa satuppādanādi sāraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:301_12: Tenevassa mātādiakalyāṇamittasamāyogena katavītikkamanaṃ nissāya uppannavippaṭisārena adhigamantarāyo jāto.
tika-vin07t:301_13: Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pubbabuddhuppādesu laddhabyākaraṇānaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin07t:301_14: Teneva aṅgulimālattherādayo akusalaṃ katvāpi adhigamasampannā eva ahesunti.
tika-vin07t:301_16: Saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovitaṃ saṅkhalikhitanti āha dhotaiccādi.
tika-vin07t:301_20: Kasāyato nibbattatāya ca hi rasopi “kasāyaraso”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:302_3: tadā tassa payoge sappino jānāti madhuno jānātītiādīsu viya karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddasatthavidū icchantīti āha “kiñci dukkhena nānubhosī”ti.
tika-vin07t:302_5: kiñcīti etthāpi hi karaṇatthe sāmivacanassa lopo kato,
tika-vin07t:302_6: teneva vakkhati “vikappadvayepi purimapadassa uttarapadena samānavibhattilopo daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t:302_9: tadā mātu saratītiādīsu viya upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddasatthavidū vadantīti āha “atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ nassaratīti attho”ti,
tika-vin07t:302_14: Samānāya sāmivacanabhūtāya vibhattiyā “kassaci dukkhassā”ti vattabbe “kiñci dukkhassā”ti lopoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:302_15: Maraṇenapi mayaṃ teti ettha teti padassa sahatthe karaṇavasenapi atthaṃ dassetuṃ tayā viyogaṃ vā pāpuṇissāmāti atthantaraṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:303_4: Sukhūpakaraṇehi attano paricaraṇaṃ karonto yasmā laḷanto kīḷanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:304_1: Cuddasa bhattānīti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ āgantukaṃ gamikaṃ gilānaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākaṃ vihāra- dhura-
tika-vin07t:304_3: Ettha ca senāsanādipaccayattayanissitesu āraññakaṅgādipadhānaṅgānaṃ gahaṇavasena sesadhutaṅgānipi gahitāneva hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:305_3: abhidosaṃ vā paccūsakālaṃ gato patto atikkanto ābhidosiko,
tika-vin07t:307_1: Taddhitalopanti pitāmahato āgataṃ “petāmaha”nti vattabbe taddhitapaccayanimittassa e-
tika-vin07t:308_0: 35. Attanāti sayaṃ. Sapatino dhanasāmino idaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, dhanaṃ. Tadeva vibhavo.
tika-vin07t:309_2: Dinnāpi paṭisandhīti pitarā dinnaṃ sukkaṃ nissāya uppannassa sattassa paṭisandhipi tena dinnā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:309_5: Na hi pitu saṃyogakkhaṇeyeva sattassa uppattiniyamo atthi sukkameva tathā patiṭṭhānaniyamato.
tika-vin07t:309_6: Sukke pana patiṭṭhite yāva satta divasāni,
tika-vin07t:309_8: taṃ gabbhasaṇṭhānassa khettameva hoti mātu maṃsassa lohitalesassa sabbadāpi vijjamānattā.
tika-vin07t:309_9: Pubbepi paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāvato apaññatte sikkhāpadeti imassa paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade aṭṭhapiteti attho vutto.
tika-vin07t:310_3: Itthiyā eva chandarāgavasena nābhiparāmasanaṃ visuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:310_4: Sāmapaṇḍitassa hi mātā puttuppattiyā sañjātādarā nābhiparāmasanakāle kāmarāgasamākulacittā ahosi,
tika-vin07t:310_7: vatthuvasena vā etaṃ nābhiparāmasanaṃ kāyasaṃsaggato visuṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:310_8: Mātaṅgapaṇḍitassa diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi.
tika-vin07t:310_10: tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosīti āha eteneva nayenātiādi.
tika-vin07t:311_2: Mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontīti iminā sukkassa sambhavaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t:311_3: mātā ca utunī hotīti iminā soṇitassa.
tika-vin07t:311_9: te viya tatra tatra bhavesu nānāvesaggahaṇato ayampi “gandhabbo”ti vutto,
tika-vin07t:311_10: so mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātakkhaṇato pacchāpi sattāhabbhantare tatra upapanno “paccupaṭṭhito”ti vutto.
tika-vin07t:311_12: Tañhi idha “gabbho”ti adhippetaṃ sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhītiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:311_14: Pāḷiyaṃ nirabbudo vata bho bhikkhusaṅgho nirādīnavoti imassa anantaraṃ tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅgheti ajjhāharitvā sudinnena…pe…
tika-vin07t:311_18: Yāva brahmalokā abbhuggatopi devānaṃ tāvamahanto saddo tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya manussānaṃ gocaro na hoti.
tika-vin07t:311_19: Tasmā pacchā sudinnena vutte eva jāniṃsūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:312_1: Maggabrahmacariyanti maggapadaṭṭhānaṃ sikkhattayameva upacārato vuttaṃ tasseva yāvajīvaṃ caritabbattā.
tika-vin07t:312_5: Cintayīti iminā pajjhāyīti padassa kiriyāpadattaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:313_7: Upādārūpaṃ bhūtarūpamukheneva mandanaṃ pīnanañca hotīti āha pasādaiccādi.
tika-vin07t:313_10: padassa visuṃ vuccamānattāti āha “so pana tva”nti. No-
tika-vin07t:313_12: saddo viya pucchanatthoti āha “kacci nu tva”nti.
tika-vin07t:313_15: kārena nivattitāya pana tadaññāya anabhiratiyā vijjamānattaṃ dassetuṃ adhikusalānantiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:314_4: Jātiṃ nissāya uppajjanakamāno eva madajananaṭṭhena madoti mānamado.
tika-vin07t:314_7: rāgo eva vā purisamado”ti keci. Ādi-
tika-vin07t:314_9: Tebhūmakavaṭṭanti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākā pavattanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:314_12: tā pana yavanti tāhi sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā hontīti “yoniyo”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:315_0: Ñātatīraṇapahānavasenāti ettha lakkhaṇādivasena sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho ñātapariññā nāma.
tika-vin07t:315_3: Idha pana ñātatīraṇakiccānampi asammohato maggakkhaṇe sijjhanato ariyamaggameva sandhāya tividhāpi pariññā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:315_5: Kāmesu pātabyatānanti vatthukāmesu pātabyatāsaṅkhātānaṃ subhādiākārānaṃ tadākāragāhikānaṃ taṇhānanti attho.
tika-vin07t:316_10: Ativiya dukkhavipākanti gahaṭṭhānaṃ nātisāvajjampi kammaṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhagavato āṇāvītikkamato ceva
tika-vin07t:316_18: saddena vutto kāraṇe kāriyopacārenāti āha “dubbharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa asaṃvarassā”ti.
tika-vin07t:316_20: Dubbharatanti attanā upaṭṭhākehi ca dukkhena bharitabbataṃ.
tika-vin07t:316_21: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikāti āha gaṇasaṅgaṇikāyātiādi.
tika-vin07t:316_28: aciravuṭṭhito gelaññāti ekanti imāni aṭṭha kusītavatthūni nāma.
tika-vin07t:316_31: Vināpi hi bhāvajotanapaccayaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā paṭassa sukkanti.
tika-vin07t:316_34: Saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttanti sīlasaṃvarādīhi pañcahi saṃvarehi ceva tadaṅgappahānādīhi pañcahi pahānehi ca upetaṃ.
tika-vin07t:316_35: Asuttanta vinibaddhanti tīsu piṭakesu pāḷisaṅkhātasuttantavasena aracitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:316_38: Tena ca aṭṭhakathāsu yathānurūpaṃ saṅgahitanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:316_40: Okkantikadhammadesanā nāma tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pasaṅge otāretvā otāretvā nānānayehi kathiyamānā dhammadesanā,
tika-vin07t:317_1: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge yā tasmiṃ samaye kāmesumicchācārā ārati viratītiādinā niddiṭṭhaviratiyo ceva,
tika-vin07t:317_2: yā tasmiṃ samaye cetanā sañcetanātiādinā niddiṭṭhacetanā ca,
tika-vin07t:317_4: avikkhepotiādinā niddiṭṭhaphassādidhammā ca sikkhāpadanti dassetuṃ “ayañca attho sikkhāpadavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:317_5: “Yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyoti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:318_2: Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvanassa abhāvato sahajīvitāti sukhavihārova vutto.
tika-vin07t:318_5: sesasikkhāpadapasaṅge tehi tehi vītikkamehi khaṇḍachiddādibhāvappattiyā dūsitasīlā adhippetā.
tika-vin07t:318_7: Sabbasikkhāpadānampi dasa atthavase paṭicceva paññattattā upari dussīlapuggale nissāyāti etthāpi eseva nayo,
tika-vin07t:318_16: Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:318_19: sāmaggī na hotīti iminā alajjīhi saddhiṃ uposathādisakalasaṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati dhammaparibhogattāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:318_20: Uposathapavāraṇānaṃ niyatakālikatāya ca avassaṃ kattabbattā saṅghakammato visuṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:319_0: Cuddasa khandhakavattāni nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikagamikaanumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikaāraññakasenāsanajantāgharavaccakuṭiupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaācariyaantevāsikavattanti
tika-vin07t:319_2: etāni ca sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sabbadā ca yathārahaṃ caritabbāni.
tika-vin07t:319_3: Dve asīti mahāvattāni pana tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni,
tika-vin07t:319_6: Tāni pana “pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ārabhitvā “na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:319_7: na chamāya caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti vuttāvasānāni chasaṭṭhi,
tika-vin07t:319_10: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikena vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ,
tika-vin07t:319_14: abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”ntiādinā vuttavattāni pakatattena caritabbehi
tika-vin07t:319_15: anaññattā visuṃ agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā
tika-vin07t:319_16: ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitāni pañcāti ekasattativattāni ca ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu ca vuttaṃ “na pakatattassa
tika-vin07t:319_18: nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba”nti idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t:319_19: “na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo”tiādīni ca dasāti evaṃ dvāsīti vattāni honti,
tika-vin07t:319_20: etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāni kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsītiyeva.
tika-vin07t:319_21: Aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti asītikhandhakavattānīti āgataṃ.
tika-vin07t:319_22: Atha vā purimehi cuddasavattehi asaṅgahitāni vinayāgatāni sabbāni vattāni yathā dvāsīti vattāni,
tika-vin07t:320_0: Saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro
tika-vin07t:320_1: yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-vin07t:320_3: Pahānavinayoti tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:320_9: Tampi hi bhagavato sikkhāpadapaññattiyāva anuggahitaṃ hoti tabbhāve eva bhāvato.
tika-vin07t:320_10: Saṅkhalikanayaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanañca katvā yaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:320_11: Tattha purimapurimapadassa anantarapadeneva yojitattā ayosaṅkhalikasadisanti “saṅkhalikanaya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:320_12: Dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ padaṃ tadavasesehi navanavapadehi yojitattā “ekekapadamūlika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:321_0: Atthasataṃ dhammasatanti ettha yo hi so parivāre yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu,
tika-vin07t:321_2: taṃ vinayānuggahāyāti pariyosānaṃ khaṇḍacakkavaseneva saṅkhalikanayo vutto,
tika-vin07t:321_4: taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhūti idampi yojetvā baddhacakke kate purimapurimāni dasa dhammapadāni,
tika-vin07t:321_5: pacchimapacchimāni dasa atthapadāni cāti vīsati padāni honti.
tika-vin07t:321_6: Ekamūlakanaye pana ekasmiṃ vāre naveva atthapadāni labbhanti.
tika-vin07t:321_7: Evaṃ dasahi vārehi navuti atthapadāni navuti dhammapadāni ca honti,
tika-vin07t:321_8: tāni saṅkhalikanaye vuttehi dasahi atthapadehi dasahi dhammapadehi ca saddhiṃ yojitāni yathāvuttaṃ atthasataṃ dhammasatañca hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:321_10: pārājikakaṇḍa 2.39) saṅkhalikanayepi ekamūlakanayepi paccekaṃ atthasatassa dhammasatassa yojanāmukhaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:321_11: taṃ tathā siddhepi atthasataṃ dhammasatanti gāthāya na sameti dve atthasatāni dve dhammasatāni cattāri niruttisatāni aṭṭha ñāṇasatānīti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:321_12: Tasmā idha vuttanayeneva atthasataṃ dhammasatanti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:321_13: Dve ca niruttisatānīti atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ,
tika-vin07t:321_14: dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnañca vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni.
tika-vin07t:321_17: dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
tika-vin07t:325_1: Pacuratthe hi vattamānavacananti ekadā paṭisevitvā pacchā anoramitvā divase divase sevanicchāya vattamānattā
tika-vin07t:325_2: sevanāya abhāvakkhaṇepi iha mallā yujjhantītiādīsu viya abbocchinnataṃ bāhullavuttitañca upādāya paṭisevatīti
tika-vin07t:326_3: Taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ tatheva hotīti manussāmanussādipuggalavisesaṃ kiñci anupādiyitvā sāmaññato “yo pana bhikkhu
tika-vin07t:326_4: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti vuttattā manussāmanussatiracchānagatānaṃ itthipurisapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanānaṃ
tika-vin07t:326_5: tiṃsavidhepi magge methunaṃ sevantassa taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ mūlacchejjakaraṃ hoti evāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:326_6: Etena yaṃ anupaññattimūlapaññattiyā eva adhippāyappakāsanavasena subodhatthāya vatthuvasena pavattānaṃ visesatthajotakavasenāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:326_9: Ghaṭṭanaṃ pana tato daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa saṅghaṭṭanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:327_4: Tattha sacittakapakkheti idaṃ kiñcāpi acittakasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāyeva vattuṃ yuttaṃ tasseva sacittakapakkhasambhavato,
tika-vin07t:327_5: tathāpi sacittakasikkhāpadānampi asañcicca caṅkamanādīsu loke pāṇaghātavohārasambhavena acittakapakkhaṃ
tika-vin07t:327_7: Itarathā sacittakasikkhāpadānaṃ imasmiṃ vākye lokavajjatālakkhaṇaṃ na vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:327_8: “Sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti vutte pana sacittakasikkhāpadānaṃ cittaṃ akusalameva,
tika-vin07t:327_11: Tattha pana yathāsambhavaṃ kusalaṃ vā siyā,
tika-vin07t:327_13: abyākataṃ vāti ayamattho sāmatthiyato sijjhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:327_15: na paṇṇattivijānanacittena tathā sati sabbasikkhāpadānampi lokavajjatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t:327_16: “Paṭikkhittamidaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti jānantassa hi paṇṇattivajjepi anādariyavasena paṭighacittameva uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:327_17: tasmā idaṃ vākyaṃ niratthakameva siyā sabbasikkhāpadānipi lokavajjānīti ettakamattasseva vattabbatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t:328_0: Ettha ca sacittakapakkheyeva cittaṃ akusalanti niyamassa akatattā surāpānādīsu acittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalaṃ na hotevāti na sakkā niyametuṃ,
tika-vin07t:328_3: evañca surāti ajānitvā pivantānampi akusalacitteneva pānaṃ gandhavaṇṇakādibhāvaṃ ajānitvā limpantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vināpi akusalacittena limpanañca,
tika-vin07t:328_5: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti vacanato acittakassa vatthuajānanavasena
tika-vin07t:328_6: acittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:328_8: Acittakesu hi terasasu lokavajjesu surāpānasseva acittakapakkhepi akusalacittaniyamo,
tika-vin07t:328_10: Yaṃ pana evaṃ kenaci anicchamānaṃ saddatopi apatīyamānamimaṃ niyamaṃ parādhippāyaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yadi
tika-vin07t:328_11: hi acittakassa acittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalameva siyā,
tika-vin07t:328_12: sacittakapakkheti idaṃ visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:328_13: taṃ niratthakameva evaṃ niyamassa kenaci anadhippetattā.
tika-vin07t:328_14: Na hi koci saddasatthavidū niyamaṃ icchati,
tika-vin07t:328_15: yena sacittakapakkheti idaṃ visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyātiādi vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:328_17: acittakapakkhe pana cittaṃ aniyataṃ akusalameva vā siyā,
tika-vin07t:328_20: Acittakasikkhāpadānaṃ sacittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamena lokavajjatā ca sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:328_21: Tesu ca surāpānasseva acittakapakkhepi lokavajjatā akusalacittatā ca,
tika-vin07t:328_22: itaresaṃ pana sacittakapakkhe evāti vādopi na virujjhatīti na kiñcettha anupapannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:329_3: Yañca tamatthaṃ sādhetuṃ gaṇṭhipadesu āgatavacanaṃ dassetvā bahuṃ papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:329_4: taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāhi viruddhattā.
tika-vin07t:329_5: Tathā hi “vatthuajānanatāya cettha acittakatā veditabbā akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:329_6: Yañcetassa “sacittakapakkhe akusaleneva pātabbato lokavajjatā”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:329_8: “Sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti sabbesaṃ lokavajjānaṃ idheva pārājikaṭṭhakathāya sāmaññato vatvā
tika-vin07t:329_9: surāpānasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “akusaleneva pātabbatāyā”ti evaṃ acittakapakkhepi akusalacittatāya visesetvā vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:329_10: Na hi “sāmaññato idha vuttova attho puna surāpānaṭṭhakathāyampi vutto”ti sakkā vattuṃ vuttasseva puna vacane payojanābhāvā,
tika-vin07t:329_12: nāpi ekattha vutto nayo tadaññesupi ekalakkhaṇatāya vutto eva hotīti “surāpānasikkhāpadeyeva vutto”ti
tika-vin07t:329_13: sakkā vattuṃ acittakalokavajjānaṃ sabbapaṭhame uyyuttasikkhāpadeyeva vattabbato,
tika-vin07t:329_14: surāpānasikkhāpadeyeva vā vatvā eseva nayo sesesu acittakalokavajjesupīti atidisitabbato ca.
tika-vin07t:330_0: Apica vuttamevatthaṃ vadantena “sacittakapakkhe akusaleneva pātabbatāyā”ti pubbe vuttakkameneva vattabbaṃ sandehādivigamatthattā puna vacanassa.
tika-vin07t:330_3: Tathā hi bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni,
tika-vin07t:330_4: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cā”ti giraggasamajjādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:330_5: sacittakapakkhe eva lokavajjatā akusalacittatā ca visesetvā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:330_7: Tassa pana pakkhadvayassāpi sādhāraṇavasena “akusaleneva pātabbatāyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:330_9: Tasmā idaṃ surāpānaṃ sacittakācittakapakkhadvayepi lokavajjaṃ akusalacittañcāti dassetumeva “akusaleneva
tika-vin07t:330_10: pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti visuṃ vuttanti suṭṭhu sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:330_11: Eteneva yaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “sacittakapakkhe akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti vuttassa imasseva
tika-vin07t:330_12: adhippāyassa paṭipādakametanti saññāya iminā eva hi adhippāyena aññesupi lokavajjesu acittakasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin07t:330_15: Teneva bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “giraggasamajjaṃ cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇi itthālaṅkāro
tika-vin07t:330_16: gandhavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhunīādīhi ummaddanaparimaddanānīti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni
tika-vin07t:330_18: ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni,
tika-vin07t:330_19: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:330_20: tampi paṭisiddhaṃ hoti tabbiparītasseva atthassa yathāvuttanayena sādhanato.
tika-vin07t:330_21: Tasmā surāpānassa acittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalamevāti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetumeva idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:330_22: Ayañhettha attho vatthuajānanatāya cetthāti ettha ca-
tika-vin07t:330_24: Tasmā yadidaṃ aññesu acittakalokavajjesu vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni,
tika-vin07t:330_25: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti lokavajjatāya akusalacittatāya ca lakkhaṇaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin07t:330_27: idha pana viseso atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:330_29: Vatthuajānanatāya eva vatthujānanacittena vināpi āpajjitabbatāya eva acittakatā veditabbā,
tika-vin07t:330_31: Kintu vatthuajānanasaṅkhātaacittakapakkhepi akusalacitteneva surāmerayassa ajjhoharitabbatāyāti imassa
tika-vin07t:330_32: sikkhāpadassa sacittakapakkhepi acittakapakkhepi lokavajjatā akusalacittatā ca veditabbāti ayamettha viseso.
tika-vin07t:330_33: Idha hi “citte pana satī”ti avisesetvā “akusalenevā”ti sāmaññato vuttattā ubhayapakkhepi lokavajjatā akusalacittatā ca siddhāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:330_34: Teneva paramatthajotikāya khuddakaṭṭhakathāya sikkhāpadavaṇṇanāya “surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ kāyato ca kāyacittato cāti dvisamuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:330_35: Surāti jānanacittābhāveneva hettha cittaṅgavirahito kevalopi kāyo ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ vutto,
tika-vin07t:330_38: Teneva tattheva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭhamā cettha pañca ekantaakusalacittasamuṭṭhānattā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pakativajjato veramaṇiyo,
tika-vin07t:330_39: sesā paṇṇattivajjato”ti evaṃ pañcannampi sāmaññato akusalacittatā lokavajjatāsaṅkhātā pakativajjatā ca vuttā.
tika-vin07t:330_41: Tathā hi “surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānassa pana surādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hoti madanīyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:330_44: pīte ca pavisatīti imāni cattāri aṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:330_45: na pana surāti jānanaṅgena saddhiṃ pañcāti.
tika-vin07t:330_46: Yadi hi surāti jānanampi aṅgaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:330_50: evaṃ aññāsupi suttapiṭakādiaṭṭhakathāsu katthaci jānanaṅgaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:330_51: Tasmā “akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti imassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa acittakapakkhepi “akusaleneva
tika-vin07t:330_52: pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti evameva atthoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:331_0: Apica yaṃ gaṇṭhipadesu “etaṃ sattaṃ māressāmīti tasmiṃyeva padese nipannaṃ aññaṃ mārentassa pāṇasāmaññassa atthitāya yathā pāṇātipāto hoti,
tika-vin07t:331_1: evaṃ etaṃ majjaṃ pivissāmīti aññaṃ majjaṃ pivantassa majjasāmaññassa atthitāya akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:331_2: yathā pana kaṭṭhasaññāya sappaṃ ghātentassa pāṇātipāto na hoti,
tika-vin07t:331_3: evaṃ nāḷikerapānasaññāya majjaṃ pivantassa akusalaṃ na hotī”ti pāṇātipātena saddhiṃ sabbathā samānattena upametvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:331_4: taṃ ativiya ayuttaṃ sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ pāṇātipātādiakusalānañca aññamaññaṃ samānatāya niyamābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:331_9: Tasmā payogaṅgādīhipi bhinnānameva saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sabbathā samīkaraṇaṃ ayuttameva.
tika-vin07t:331_10: “Pāṇātipāto viya adinnādānamethunādīnipi pariyāyakathādīhi sijjhantī”ti kenaci vutte taṃ kinti na gayhati tathā vacanābhāvāti ce?
tika-vin07t:331_11: Idhāpi “tathā pāṇātipātasadisaṃ surāpāna”nti vacanābhāvā idampi na gahetabbameva.
tika-vin07t:331_12: Kiñci aṭṭhakathāvacaneneva siddhamevatthaṃ paṭibāhantena vinayaññunā suttasuttānulomādīhi tassa virodhaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:331_13: na pana payogaṅgādīhi accantavibhinnena sikkhāpadantarena saha samīkaraṇamattena.
tika-vin07t:331_14: Na hi “surāti ajānitvā pivantassāpi akusalamevā”ti ettha suttādivirodho atthi,
tika-vin07t:331_15: vinayapiṭake tāva etassa atthassa viruddhaṃ suttādikaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin07t:332_0: Yaṃ panettha keci vadanti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti vuttattā sabbāni akusalāni pubbe vītikkamavatthuṃ jānantasseva hontī”ti.
tika-vin07t:332_2: Na hi “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ pubbe vītikkamavatthuṃ jānantasseva akusalā dhammā uppajjantīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t:332_3: atha kho kusalākusalā dhammā uppajjamānā uppādapaccayaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ sahajātacittaṃ nissāyeva uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t:332_5: Na hettha “surāti ajānitvā pivantassa akusalamevā”ti vutte sahajātacittaṃ vināpi lobhādiakusalacetasikā dhammā uppajjantīti ayamattho āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:332_6: Yena taṃ nisedhāya idaṃ suttaṃ āharaṇīyaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:332_7: abhidhammavirodhopettha natthi pubbe nāmajātiādivasena ajānantasseva pañcaviññāṇavīthiyaṃ kusalākusalajavanuppattivacanato.
tika-vin07t:333_0: Apica bālaputhujjanānaṃ chasu dvāresu uppajjamānāni javanāni yebhuyyena akusalāneva uppajjanti.
tika-vin07t:333_1: Kusalāni pana tesaṃ kalyāṇamittādiupanissayabalena appakāneva uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t:333_2: tuṇhībhūtānampi niddāyitvā supinaṃ passantānampi uddhaccādiakusalajavanasseva yebhuyyappavattito kusalākusalavirahitassa javanassa tesaṃ abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:333_3: Akusalā hi visayānuguṇaṃ vāsanānuguṇañca yathāpaccayaṃ samuppajjanti,
tika-vin07t:333_6: ye ca jānanādiṃ vināpi sijjhamānā surāpānamicchādiṭṭhiādayo,
tika-vin07t:333_7: te te tathā tathā yāthāvato ñatvā sammāsambuddhena niddiṭṭhā,
tika-vin07t:333_8: tesañca yathāniddiṭṭhavasena gahaṇe ko nāma abhidhammavirodho.
tika-vin07t:333_10: aṭṭhakathāya ca vuttattā yathāvuttavasenevettha attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:333_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “sāmaṇero jānitvā pivanto sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin07t:333_13: Nāyaṃ doso sīlabhedassa bhagavato āṇāyattattā ukkhittānuvattikādīnaṃ sīlabhedo viya.
tika-vin07t:333_14: Na hi tāsaṃ akusaluppattiyā eva sīlabhedo hoti saṅghāyattasamanubhāsanānantareyeva vihitattā.
tika-vin07t:333_19: Teneva sāmaṇerānaṃ purimesu pañcasu sikkhāpadesu ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbānipi sikkhāpadāni bhijjanti.
tika-vin07t:333_22: Tasmā sāmaṇerassa ajānitvā pivantassa sīlabhedābhāvepi kammapathappattaṃ akusalamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:334_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “sāmaṇerassa surāti ajānitvā pivantassa pārājikaṃ natthi,
tika-vin07t:334_1: akusalaṃ pana hotī”ti kehici vuttavacanaṃ “taṃ tesaṃ matimatta”nti paṭikkhipitvā “bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:334_3: na ajānitvāti ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:334_4: akusalaṃ pana hotīti na vutta”nti tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:334_6: Na hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ jānitvā pivane eva sīlabhedo,
tika-vin07t:334_7: na ajānitvāti sīlabhedakathanaṭṭhāne akusalaṃ pana hotīti avacanaṃ ajānanapakkhe akusalābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:334_9: vattabbaṭṭhāne eva “akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti vuttattā ca.
tika-vin07t:334_10: Na ca te “akusalaṃ pana hotī”ti vadantā ācariyā imaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ sīlabhedappakāsakaṃ khandhakaṭṭhakathāpāṭhameva gahetvā avocuṃ,
tika-vin07t:334_12: atha kho surāpānaṭṭhakathāgataṃ suttapiṭakaṭṭhakathāgatañca anekavidhaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:334_16: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ kehici “sāmaṇerassa surāti ajānitvā pivantassa pārājikaṃ natthi,
tika-vin07t:335_0: Yañca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “ajānitvā pivantassāpi sotāpannassa mukhaṃ surā na pavisati kammapathappattaakusalacitteneva
tika-vin07t:335_1: pātabbato”ti kehici vuttavacanaṃ “na sundara”nti paṭikkhipitvā “bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu
tika-vin07t:335_2: sīlaṃ viya hi idampi ariyasāvakānaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti veditabba”nti vatvā dhammatāsiddhattaṃyeva samatthetuṃ
tika-vin07t:335_3: “bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati,
tika-vin07t:335_5: Sace pissa surañca khīrañca missetvā mukhe pakkhipanti,
tika-vin07t:335_8: Yathā koñcasakuṇānaṃ khīramissake udake khīrameva pavisati,
tika-vin07t:335_11: idampi dhammatāsiddhanti veditabba”nti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:335_13: Yathā hi bodhisattamātu sīlaṃ viya ariyasāvakānaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti ettha bodhisattamātu dhammatā nāma
tika-vin07t:335_14: bodhisattassa ca attano ca pāramitānubhāvena akusalānuppattiniyamo eva.
tika-vin07t:335_15: Tathā ariyasāvakānampi bhavantare pāṇātipātādīnaṃ dasannaṃ kammapathānaṃ aññesañca apāyahetukānaṃ akusalānaṃ
tika-vin07t:335_16: accantappahāyakassa maggassa ānubhāvena taṃtaṃsīlavītikkamahetukassa akusalassa anuppattiniyamo eva dhammatā.
tika-vin07t:335_17: Na hi sabhāvavādīnaṃ dhammatā viya ahetukatā idha dhammatā nāma.
tika-vin07t:335_18: Yathā vā evaṃdhammatānaye kāraṇassa bhāve abhāve ca kāriyassa bhāvo abhāvo ca dhammatā,
tika-vin07t:335_20: evamidhāpi pāṇātipātādikammapathānaṃ hetubhūtassa kilesassa accantābhāvena tesaṃ abhāvo,
tika-vin07t:335_21: tadavasesānaṃ akusalānaṃ hetuno bhāvena bhāvo ca dhammatā,
tika-vin07t:335_23: Tasmā apāyahetuno rāgassa abhāveneva ariyānaṃ ajānitvāpi surāya anajjhoharaṇanti suvuttamevidaṃ kehici
tika-vin07t:335_24: “ajānitvā pivantassāpi sotāpannassa mukhaṃ surā na pavisati kammapathappattaakusalacitteneva pātabbato”ti,
tika-vin07t:335_25: taṃ kena hetunā na sundaraṃ jātanti na ñāyati,
tika-vin07t:335_26: dhammatāsiddhanti vā kathanena kathaṃ taṃ paṭikkhittanti.
tika-vin07t:336_3: Tathā hi “bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi pāṇaṃ na hanati,
tika-vin07t:336_5: na suraṃ pivatī”ti vutte “purimānaṃ tāva catunnaṃ kammapathānaṃ sacittakattā viramaṇaṃ sukaraṃ,
tika-vin07t:336_6: pacchimassa pana surāpānassa acittakattā kathaṃ viramaṇaṃ bhaveyyā”ti codanāsambhavaṃ manasikatvā vatthuajānanavasena
tika-vin07t:336_8: tādisī ca akusalappavatti ariyasāvakassa maggeneva hatā,
tika-vin07t:336_9: tasmāssa paragalaṃ surāya pavisanaṃ natthīti atthato gamyamānatthaṃ parihāravacanaṃ vadatā “sace pissa surañca khīrañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:336_11: na surāti idaṃ surāya sabbathāpi paragalappavesābhāvadassanaparaṃ,
tika-vin07t:336_14: yadi hi surāmisse khīre kiñci paviseyya,
tika-vin07t:336_16: Khīre pana surāya aviyutte na kiñci pavisatīti.
tika-vin07t:336_17: Idaṃ yonisiddhanti udakassa mukhe appavisanaṃ yonisiddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:336_19: Tasmā koñcajātikānaṃ mukhatuṇḍasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ khīramissaudakajjhoharaṇahetuttābhāvena taṃ appavisanaṃ siddhanti attho.
tika-vin07t:336_20: Idampi hi khīramissāya surāya khīre pavisantepi paragalāpavisananti.
tika-vin07t:336_22: Evamettha acittakapakkhepi surāya akusalacitteneva pātabbato ariyasāvakānaṃ apivanaṃ samatthitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:336_23: Athāpi siyā ajānanapakkhe akusalacittena vināva pātabbattepi surāya apivanaṃ ariyānaṃ dhammatāti samatthanaparametanti, taṃ na,
tika-vin07t:337_0: Apica pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kammapathānaṃ bhavantarepi akaraṇaṃ ariyānaṃ dhammatāsīlameva,
tika-vin07t:337_2: Surāpānaṃ viya itarānipi cattāri ajānantenāpi ariyasāvakena na kattabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:337_3: tathā ca ajānantānaṃ ariyānaṃ kusalābyākatacittehipi viramaṇaparamāraṇaparasantakagahaṇādīsu kāyavacīpavatti na sampajjeyya,
tika-vin07t:337_7: Tasmā surāpānassa acittakapakkhepi akusaleneva pātabbatāya surā ariyānaṃ paragalaṃ na pavisatīti visesetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:338_0: Nanu vatthuṃ jānantasseva sabbe kammapathā vuttāti? Na,
tika-vin07t:338_3: aniccādiṃ niccādito ca gahaṇantī diṭṭhi vatthuṃ vijānāti.
tika-vin07t:338_6: Sā ca kammapathesu gaṇitāti kuto jānantasseva kammapathappavattiniyamo.
tika-vin07t:338_7: Atha sabbaññuṃ sabbaññūti gaṇhantīpi “ayaṃ satto”ti tassa sarūpaggahaṇato diṭṭhipi vatthuṃ vijānātīti ce? Na,
tika-vin07t:338_9: “Aya”nti ca vatthuparāmasanepi “surā”ti visesavijānanābhāvā na jānātīti ce?
tika-vin07t:338_10: “Aya”nti puggalattaṃ jānantīpi “asabbaññū”tipi visesajānanābhāvā diṭṭhipi vatthuṃ na jānātīti samānameva.
tika-vin07t:338_11: Evañhi tesaṃ buddhāti ahitoti ahitaṃ vā pūraṇakassapādiṃ hito paṭighassa vā anunayassa vā uppādanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:339_0: Apica surāya pīyamānāya niyamena akusaluppādanaṃ sabhāvo pītāya viya.
tika-vin07t:339_1: Khīrādisaññāya pītasurassa puggalassa mātubhaginiādīsupi rāgadosādiakusalappabandho vatthusabhāveneva uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:339_4: pacchā ca buddhādīsu agāravādiakusalappabandho yāva surāvigamā pavattittha.
tika-vin07t:339_5: Teneva bhagavāpi tassa agāravādiakausalappavattidassanamukhena surādosaṃ pakāsetvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
tika-vin07t:339_6: Na hi pañcanīvaraṇuppattiṃ vinā jhānaparihāni hoti.
tika-vin07t:339_7: Tasmā ajānantassāpi surā pīyamānā pītā ca attano sabhāveneva akusaluppādikāti ayamattho sāgatattherassa jhānaparihāniyā anvayatopi,
tika-vin07t:339_8: ariyānaṃ kilesābhāvena mukhena surāya appavesasaṅkhātabyatirekatopi sijjhatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:340_2: taṃ pana gaṇṭhipadakārakādīhi “paravādo”ti ajānantehi attano matiyā saṃsanditvā likhitaṃ vibhajjavādīmaṇḍalampi pavisitvā yāvajjatanā sāsanaṃ dūseti,
tika-vin07t:340_3: purāpi kira imasmimpi damiḷaraṭṭhe koci bhinnaladdhiko nāgaseno nāma thero kuṇḍalakesīvatthuṃ paravādamathananayadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:340_4: damiḷakabbarūpena kārento “imaṃ surāpānassa jānitvāva pivane akusalanayaṃ,
tika-vin07t:340_5: aññañca desakālādibhedena anantampi ñeyyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ salakkhaṇavaseneva ñātuṃ na sakkoti ñāṇena
tika-vin07t:340_8: “paramatthadhammesu nāmarūpantiādibhedo viya puggalādisammutipi visuṃ vatthubhedo evā”ti ca evamādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:340_9: bahuṃ viparītatthanayaṃ kabbākārassa kavino upadisitvā tasmiṃ pabandhe kāraṇābhāsehi satiṃ sammohetvā
tika-vin07t:340_11: tañca kabbaṃ nissāya imaṃ bhinnaladdhikamataṃ idha vibhajjavādīmate sammissaṃ ciraṃ pavattittha.
tika-vin07t:340_12: Taṃ pana pacchā ācariyabuddhappiyamahātherena bāhirabbharikaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ vighāṭetvā idha parisuddhaṃ
tika-vin07t:340_13: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpentena sodhitampi sāratthadīpaniyā vinayaṭīkāya surāpānassa sacittakapakkheyeva cittaṃ
tika-vin07t:340_14: akusalanti samatthanavacanaṃ nissāya kehici vipallattacittehi puna ukkhittasiraṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:340_15: tañca mahātherehi vinicchinitvā gārayhavādaṃ katvā madditvā laddhigāhake ca bhikkhū viyojetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena cireneva vūpasamitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:340_16: Tenevettha mayaṃ evaṃ vitthārato idaṃ paṭikkhipimha “mā aññepi vibhajjavādino ayaṃ laddhi dūsesī”ti.
tika-vin07t:340_17: Tasmā idha vuttāni avuttāni ca kāraṇāni suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā yathā āgamavirodho na hoti,
tika-vin07t:341_0: Sesanti yassa vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalamevāti niyamo natthi,
tika-vin07t:341_2: Rundhantīti “tiracchānagatitthiyā doso natthī”tiādinā anāpattiyā lesaggahaṇaṃ nivārentī.
tika-vin07t:341_3: Dvāraṃ pidahantīti “tañca kho manussitthiyā”tiādinā lesaggahaṇassa kāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ dvāraṃ pidahantī.
tika-vin07t:341_4: Sotaṃ pacchindamānāti tadubhayalesaggahaṇadvārānaṃ vasena avicchinnaṃ vītikkamasotaṃ pacchindamānā.
tika-vin07t:341_5: Gāḷhataraṃ karontīti yathāvuttehi kāraṇehi paṭhamapaññattisiddhaṃ āpattiññeva daḷhaṃ karontī,
tika-vin07t:341_8: avisayatāya abbohārike vītikkame ca lokavajjepi sithilaṃ karontī uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:341_9: tasmā tathā uppattiṃ uppattikāraṇañca dassento āha aññatra adhimānātiādi.
tika-vin07t:341_10: Aññatra adhimānāti imissā anupaññattiyā “vītikkamābhāvā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:341_12: Tattha vītikkamābhāvāti pāpicchāya avijjamānassa uttarimanussadhammassa vijjamānato pakāsanavasappavattavisaṃvādanādhippāyasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin07t:341_14: Adhimānikassa hi anadhigate adhigatasaññitāya yathāvuttavītikkamo natthi.
tika-vin07t:341_17: sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato mocanassādacetanāya upakkamanassa ca vijjamānattepi thinamiddhena abhibhūtatāya avasattena abbohārikattā,
tika-vin07t:341_21: Vuttāti duvidhāpi cesā anupaññatti anāpattikarā vuttāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:342_0: Akate vītikkameti āpadāsupi bhikkhūhi sikkhāpadavītikkame akate,
tika-vin07t:342_1: kukkuccā na bhuñjiṃsūtiādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ akatvā bhikkhūhi attano dukkhuppattiyā ārocitāyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:342_2: Sithilaṃ karontīti paṭhamaṃ sāmaññato baddhasikkhāpadaṃ mocetvā attano visaye anāpattikaraṇavasena sithilaṃ karontī.
tika-vin07t:342_4: Aparāparampi anāpattiṃ kurumānāti dinnena tena dvārena uparūpari anāpattibhāvaṃ dīpentī.
tika-vin07t:342_5: Paññattepi sikkhāpade udāyinā “muhuttikāya vesiyā na doso”ti lesena vītikkamitvā sañcarittāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā “kate vītikkame”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:346_2: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseviṃsū”ti ettha te ñātikulaṃ gantvā gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā “gihibhūtā maya”nti saññāya methunaṃ paṭiseviṃsūti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:346_4: Ñātīnaṃ vināso rājadaṇḍādikāraṇena hotīti āha rājadaṇḍaiccādi.
tika-vin07t:346_6: tesampi rājadaṇḍādināva vināsoti āha “esa nayo dutiyapadepī”ti.
tika-vin07t:346_7: Na sabbaññubuddhotiādinā tīsu vatthūsu appasannāva sāsane abhabbāti saññāya attano bhabbataṃ pakāsentā na mayantiādimāhaṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:346_10: Vibhattā kusalā dhammāti “imasmiṃ ārammaṇe idaṃ hotī”ti vibhāgaso dassitā saupacārajjhānā mahaggatakusalā dhammā.
tika-vin07t:346_13: Duppariccāgānaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ vasena sabbepi palibodhā saṅgahitā evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:347_1: Asaṃvāsoti idaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve kenacipi pariyāyena bhikkhu hutvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nārahatīti
tika-vin07t:347_3: Paññattaṃ samūhaneyyāti “so āgato na pabbājetabbo”ti avatvā “na upasampādetabbo”ti ettakasseva vuttattā
tika-vin07t:347_6: “Yo pana bhikkhū”ti vuttattā paccakkhātasikkho yasmā bhikkhu na hoti,
tika-vin07t:347_8: tasmāssa “āgato upasampādetabbo”ti upasampadaṃ anujānanto pārājikaṃ na samūhanati nāma,
tika-vin07t:349_6: suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”tiādipāḷito suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīhariṃsu.
tika-vin07t:349_7: “Anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti bhaṇatī”ti evamādito ācariyavādaṃ.
tika-vin07t:349_11: sā ca therassa attanomati suttena saṅgahitattā suttaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:349_14: Atha vā nīharitvāti vibhajitvā sāṭṭhakathaṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttādīsu catūsu padesesu pakkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:349_15: catudhā vibhajitvā vinayaṃ pakāsesuṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:349_17: Kaṇṭhādivaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānakaraṇādīhi āharitvā attano vacīviññattiyāva bhāsitavacanaṃ āhaccapadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:349_20: rasoti vā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivatthukaṃ anuddharitvā lakkhaṇānulomena vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:349_21: Dhammasaṅgāhakādiācariyavaṃsena ābhatā aṭṭhakathā ācariyavaṃsoti āha “ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo”ti.
tika-vin07t:350_4: bhikkhave”tiādipāḷivasena akappiyānulomato kappiyānulomato ca puggalehi nayato tathā tathā gayhamānā atthanayā eva.
tika-vin07t:350_5: Te hi bhagavatā sarūpato avuttesupi paṭikkhittānulomesu,
tika-vin07t:350_6: anuññātānulomesu ca sesesu kiccesu nivattipavattihetutāya mahāgocarāti “mahāpadesā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin07t:350_9: mayā idaṃ na kappatī”tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva tassā sutte paviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin07t:350_12: na hesā sādhippāyā pāḷi sutte otāretabbā,
tika-vin07t:350_15: Tasmā imaṃ pāḷiadhippāyaṃ nissāya puggalehi gahitā yathāvuttaatthāva suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin07t:350_16: Tappakāsakattā pana ayaṃ pāḷipi suttānulomanti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:350_18: Yaṃ bhikkhavetiādipāḷinayena hi puggalehi gahetabbā ye akappiyānulomādayo atthā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:351_0: Bhagavato pakiṇṇakadesanābhūtā ca suttānulomabhūtā ca aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin07t:351_3: etena ca aṭṭhakathā suttasuttānulomesu atthato saṅgayhatīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:351_6: Na hi bhagavato vacanaṃ vacanānulomañca anissāya aggasāvakādayopi attano ñāṇabalena suttābhidhammavinayesu
tika-vin07t:351_8: tasmā sabbampi vacanaṃ sutte suttānulome ca saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t:351_9: Visuṃ pana aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ saṅgahitattā tadavasesaṃ suttasuttānulomato gahetvā catudhā vinayo niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin07t:351_10: Suttādayo nissāyeva pavattāpi attanomati tesu sarūpena anāgatattā vuttaṃ “suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā”ti,
tika-vin07t:351_12: Tattha suttādīni anugatāya eva buddhiyā tehi laddhanayaggāhena cāti attho.
tika-vin07t:352_1: Suttādiṃ nissāyeva viparītatopi attanomati uppajjatīti āha taṃ panātiādi.
tika-vin07t:352_3: Pāḷinti attano gāhassa nissayabhūtaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiṃ.
tika-vin07t:352_5: attanā gahitaṃ atthaṃ nissāya pāḷiñca saṃsanditvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:352_7: Otarati ceva sameti cāti attanā uddhaṭehi saṃsandanavasena otarati,
tika-vin07t:352_9: Sabbadubbalāti asabbaññupuggalassa dosavāsanāya yāthāvato atthasampaṭipattiabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:352_10: Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyāti āha “itaro na gahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t:353_1: evarūpāva atthā mahāpadesato uddharitabbāti dasseti tathā tathā uddhaṭaatthānameva suttānulomattā,
tika-vin07t:353_6: Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetītiādīsu yo yathābhūtamatthaṃ gahetvā kathanasīlo,
tika-vin07t:353_9: Paravādīti mahāvihāravāsī vā hotu aññanikāyavāsī vā,
tika-vin07t:353_12: Suttānulomanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ vā anāruḷhaṃ vā yaṃkiñci vipallāsato vā vañcanāya vā “saṅgītittayāgatamida”nti dassiyamānaṃ suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin07t:353_14: taṃ na yuttaṃ sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāruḷhasuttādīnaṃ eva gahetabbato.
tika-vin07t:353_15: Tathā hi vakkhati “tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin07t:353_17: Na hi sakavādī aññanikāyasuttādiṃ pamāṇato gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:353_18: yena tesu suttādīsu dassitesu tattha ṭhātabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:353_19: vakkhati ca “paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti…pe…
tika-vin07t:353_21: Tasmā paravādināpi saṅgītittaye anāruḷhampi anāruḷhamicceva dassīyati,
tika-vin07t:353_22: kevalaṃ tassa tassa suttādino saṅgītittaye anāgatassa kūṭatā,
tika-vin07t:353_23: āgatassa ca byañjanacchāyāya aññathā adhippāyayojanā ca viseso.
tika-vin07t:353_27: tassa viparītatāsandassanatthaṃ tadaññena suttādinā saṃsandanā karīyati.
tika-vin07t:353_28: Yo pana paravādinā gahito adhippāyo suttantādinā saṃsandati,
tika-vin07t:353_29: so sakavādināpi attano gāhaṃ vissajjetvā gahetabboti ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāgatameva suttādipamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:353_30: Teneva kathāvatthuppakaraṇe sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassampi adhippāyaggahaṇanānattena saṅgītittayāgatameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:354_2: Sutte otāretabbanti yassa suttassa anulomanato idaṃ suttānulomaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin07t:354_3: tadanurūpe vā aññatarasmiṃ sutte attanā gahitaṃ suttānulomaṃ atthato saṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:354_4: “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ sutte saṃsandatī”ti saṃsanditvā dassetabbanti attho.
