tika-vin07t:514_5: rakkhatīti tena payogena tassa icchitaṭṭhānaṃ āgatattā rakkhati.
tika-vin07t:514_7: Kapiñjaro nāma aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpanatthāya bālajanehi posāvaniyapakkhijāti.
tika-vin07t:516_1: Vehāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ chinnamatte muttamatteti yathā chinnaṃ muttañca pakatiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:518_1: Udakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandamānaudake nikkhittaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti āha “asandanake udake”ti.
tika-vin07t:518_2: Anāpattīti hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭāpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:518_5: Na udakaṃ ṭhānanti attanā kataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhānattā.
tika-vin07t:518_7: Kalāpabandhanti hatthakavasena khuddakaṃ katvā baddhaṃ kalāpabaddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:518_10: Pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vāti idaṃ kaddamassa anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:518_13: Avahārena so na kāretabboti iminā pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropane āpattiyā sabbattha na muccatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:518_16: tiṭṭhantīti ettha matamacchānaṃyeva tesaṃ santakattā amate gaṇhantassa natthi avahāro.
tika-vin07t:520_1: Nāvaṭṭhakathāyaṃ thullaccayampi pārājikampi hotīti ettha paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā acāvetvā mutte thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin07t:520_2: paṭhamaṃ pana ṭhānā cāvetvā mutte pārājikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:520_3: Pāse baddhasūkaro viyātiādinā vuttaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha yutti pubbe vuttāevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:520_5: bhijjitvā vā vināsaṃ patvā udake nimujjitvā heṭṭhā bhūmitalaṃ appatvā sāmikehi ca apariccattālayā vuccati.
tika-vin07t:520_6: Balavā ca vāto āgammāti iminā asati vāte ayaṃ payogo katoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:520_7: Puggalassa natthi avahāroti sukkhamātikāyaṃ ujukaraṇanayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:520_8: Taṃ attano pādena anakkamitvā hatthena ca anukkhipitvā aññasmiṃ daṇḍādīsu bandhitvā ṭhapite yujjati,
tika-vin07t:520_9: attano pādena akkamitvā hatthena ca ukkhipitvā ṭhitassa pana balavavātena chattacīvarādīsu pahaṭesu pakatiṃ
tika-vin07t:520_10: vijahitvā daḷhataraṃ akkamanagahaṇādipayogo abhinavo kātabbo siyā.
tika-vin07t:520_14: Tasmā īdise abhinavappayoge sati avahārena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:520_15: Sukkhamātikāyaṃ ujukatāya udakāgamanakāle kātabbakiccaṃ natthīti taṃ idha nidassanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:520_16: Dāsaṃ pana pakatiyā palāyantaṃ “sīghaṃ yāhī”ti vatvā pakatigamanato turitagamanuppādanādinā idha nidassanena bhavitabbanti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t:520_18: Vāte āgatepi yattha atilahukattā nāvāya kañci payogaṃ akatvā pakatiyā avahārako tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:522_1: Yānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ubhosu passesūti catunnaṃ thambhānaṃ upari caturassaṃ dārusaṅghāṭaṃ āropetvā tassa vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
tika-vin07t:522_2: ubhosu vātātapādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ garuḷapakkhino ubho pakkhā viya katā sandamānikā.
tika-vin07t:522_5: Kappakatāti dvinnaṃ sikhānaṃ sandhiṭṭhāne gosiṅgāni viya dve koṭiyo ṭhapetvā upatthambhanī kappakatā nāma,
tika-vin07t:522_8: Tīṇi vā cattāri vā ṭhānānīti akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā ca dvinnaṃ cakkānañca vasena tīṇi ṭhānāni,
tika-vin07t:522_10: tathā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitassa tīṇi ṭhānānīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:522_12: Akkhuddhīhīti akkhadārunā sampaṭicchakā heṭṭhimabhāge kappakatā dve dārukhaṇḍā akkhuddhiyo nāma,
tika-vin07t:522_13: tāsaṃ kappakatānaṃ dvinnaṃ kappasīsāni cattāri idha “akkhuddhiyo”ti vuccanti,
tika-vin07t:522_15: Tāhi patiṭṭhitāhi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānāni cattāri dhurena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ekanti pañca ṭhānāni honti.
tika-vin07t:522_17: uddhikhāṇukānaṃ abhāve akkhasīsānaṃ patiṭṭhānokāsaṃ dassento āha samameva bāhaṃ katvātiādi.
tika-vin07t:522_18: Tattha samamevāti uddhiyo heṭṭhā anolambetvā bāhuno heṭṭhimabhāgaṃ samaṃ katvā dvinnaṃ bāhudārūnaṃ majjhe
tika-vin07t:522_19: akkhasīsappamāṇena chiddaṃ katvā tattha akkhasīsāni pavesitāni honti,
tika-vin07t:522_20: tena bāhānaṃ heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sabbaṃ bhūmiṃ phusitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:522_22: Sesaṃ nāvāyaṃ vuttasadisanti iminā yadi pana taṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ pakatigamanaṃ pacchinditvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ neti,
tika-vin07t:522_24: Sayameva yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ ṭhānā acālentova vikkiṇitvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t:522_26: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti imaṃ nayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t:524_1: Bhāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ bhāraṭṭhanti mātikāpadassa bhāro nāmāti idaṃ atthadassananti āha “bhāroyeva bhāraṭṭha”nti.
tika-vin07t:524_5: Sāmikehi anāṇattoti idaṃ yadi sāmikehi “imaṃ bhāraṃ netvā asukaṭṭhāne dehī”ti āṇatto bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:524_7: tañca theyyacittena sīsādito oropentassāpi avahāro na siyā,
tika-vin07t:524_8: sāmikānaṃ pana dhuranikkhepe eva siyāti tato upanikkhittabhaṇḍabhāvato viyojetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:526_1: Ārāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ārāmaṃ abhiyuñjatīti idaṃ abhiyogakaraṇaṃ paresaṃ bhūmaṭṭhabhaṇḍādīsupi kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t:526_2: Ārāmādithāvaresu pana yebhuyyena abhiyogavaseneva gahaṇasambhavato ettheva pāḷiyaṃ abhiyogo vutto,
tika-vin07t:526_3: iti iminā nayena sabbatthāpi sakkā ñātunti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:526_7: “Kiṃ karomi kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ kiṅkārameva paṭissuṇanto viya caratīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvī,
tika-vin07t:526_12: Ayaṃ vatthusāmītiādikassa ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepakaraṇahetuno payogassa karaṇakkhaṇeva pārājikaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:526_13: Sace pana sāmikassa vimati ca dhuranikkhepo ca kamena uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t:526_19: Dhuranikkhepavaseneva parājayoti sāmiko “ahaṃ na muccāmī”ti dhuraṃ anikkhipanto aṭṭo parājito nāma na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:528_2: Pariveṇanti tassa vihārassa abbhantare visuṃ visuṃ pākārādiparicchinnaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:528_4: Gaṇasantake paricchinnasāmikattā sakkā dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetunti āha “dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassā”ti.
tika-vin07t:528_5: Idhāpi sace ekopi dhuraṃ na nikkhipati,
tika-vin07t:530_1: Khettaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nirumbhitvā vātiādīsu gaṇhantassāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:530_2: tattha nirumbhitvā gahaṇaṃ nāma vīhisīsaṃ acchinditvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:530_4: Yasmiṃ bīje vātiādi nirumbhitvā gahaṇādīsu yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:530_5: “Tasmiṃ bandhanā mocitamatte”ti vacanato tasmiṃ bījādimhi bandhanā mutte sati tato anapanītepi ṭhānantarassa abhāvā pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t:530_6: Yassa pana sīsādikassa santarādinā saha saṃsibbanaṃ vā ekābaddhatā vā hoti,
tika-vin07t:530_12: Ettha ca khīlasaṅkamanādīsu sahapayogo dhuranikkhepo cāti ubhayaṃ sambhavati.
tika-vin07t:530_14: Tasmiñca kate yadi sāmikā dhuraṃ na nikkhipanti puna gaṇhitukāmāva honti,
tika-vin07t:530_16: “khīlaṃ saṅkāmetvā khettādiṃ asuko rājavallabho bhikkhu gaṇhitukāmo”ti ñatvā tassa balaṃ kakkhaḷādibhāvañca
tika-vin07t:530_17: nissāya khīlasaṅkamanādikiriyāniṭṭhānato paṭhamameva sāmikā dhuraṃ nikkhipanti,
tika-vin07t:530_18: na avahāro etassa payoganiṭṭhānato puretarameva dhurassa nikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:530_22: Khīlādīnaṃ saṅkamitabhāvaṃ ajānitvā sāmikānaṃ sampaṭicchanampettha dhuranikkhepoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:530_26: tasmiṃ āgate pārājikanti sace dārūni nikhaṇitvā tattakeneva gaṇhitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t:530_28: Sace tattha kaṇṭakasākhādīhi pādānaṃ antaraṃ paṭicchādetvā kassaci appavesārahaṃ katvā gahetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t:530_31: dārūni ca nikhaṇitvā sākhāparivārañca katvā eva attano santakaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:532_0: 105. Vatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānanti iṭṭhakasilādārūnaṃ vasena tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:533_0: 106. Gāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gāmo nāmā”ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ sabbaso gāmalakkhaṇassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:535_2: Lakkhaṇacchinnassāti araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhantehi kataakkharādisaññāṇassa.
tika-vin07t:535_3: Challiyā pariyonaddhanti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirāpekkhatāya cirachaḍḍitabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t:535_7: Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontīti tāni gehādīni katāni pariniṭṭhitāni manussehi ca ajjhāvutthāni ca honti.
tika-vin07t:535_10: te ca yadi gahaṇakāle disvā sālayā hutvā vārenti,
tika-vin07t:535_12: “Dehī”ti vutte dātabbamevāti “dehī”ti vutte “dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchantassa “dehī”ti avutte adatvā gamane āpatti natthi.
tika-vin07t:536_2: Ārakkhaṭṭhānampi suddhacittena atikkamitvā theyyacitte uppannepi avahāro natthi ārakkhaṭṭhānassa atikkantattā.
tika-vin07t:536_3: Keci pana “yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaññeva santakattā puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t:536_7: sahasā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamatītiādinā ca ārakkhaṭṭhānātikkameyeva āpattiyā vuccamānattā,
tika-vin07t:536_8: ārakkhaṭṭhānātikkamameva sandhāya “idaṃ pana theyyacittena pariharantassa ākāsena gacchatopi pārājikamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:536_9: Yañca “yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaññeva santakattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:536_10: tampi ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahi pārājikāpajjanassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti bhaṇḍadeyyabhāvasseva kāraṇattā.
tika-vin07t:536_11: Tesaṃ santakatteneva hi bahi katassāpi bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:536_12: itarathā ca bhaṇḍadeyyampi na siyā suṅkaghātātikkame viya.
tika-vin07t:536_13: Addhikehi dinnameva suṅkikānaṃ santakaṃ hoti, nādinnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:536_14: tena taṃ ṭhānaṃ yato kutoci paccayato suddhacittena atikkantassa bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti.
tika-vin07t:536_15: Idha pana araññasāmikānaṃ santakattā sabbatthāpi bhaṇḍadeyyameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:536_16: tenevetaṃ araññe ārakkhaṭṭhānaṃ suṅkaghātatopi garutaraṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:536_17: Yadi hi ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahipi theyyacitte sati avahāro bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:536_18: ārakkhaṭṭhānaṃ patvātiādinā ṭhānaniyamo niratthako siyā yattha katthaci theyyacitte uppanne pārājikanti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:536_19: Tasmā ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahi theyyacittena gacchantassa avahāro na bhavati evāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:536_20: Idaṃ pana theyyacittena pariharantassāti yasmiṃ padese atikkante tesaṃ araññaṃ ārakkhaṭṭhānañca atikkanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:536_21: taṃ padesaṃ ākāsenāpi atikkamanavasena gacchantassāpīti attho.
tika-vin07t:538_6: Taḷākarakkhaṇatthāyāti “mahodakaṃ āgantvā taḷākamariyādaṃ mā chindī”ti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:538_7: Nibbahanaudakanti ettha taḷākassa ekena unnatena passena adhikajalaṃ nibbahati nigacchati etenāti “nibbahana”nti adhikajalanikkhamanamātikā vuccati.
tika-vin07t:538_9: Niddhamanatumbanti sassādīnaṃ atthāya iṭṭhakādīhi kataṃ udakanikkhamanapanāḷi.
tika-vin07t:538_10: Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvāti ettha dubbalaṃ akatvāpi yathāvuttappayoge kate mariyādaṃ chinditvā nikkhantaudakagghānurūpena avahārena kattabbameva.
tika-vin07t:538_11: Yattakaṃ tappaccayā sassaṃ uppajjatīti bījakasikammādibbayaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ adhikalābhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:538_13: Na hi tehi kātabbaṃ vayakaraṇampi etassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:538_14: Idañca taruṇasasse jāte udakaṃ vināsentassa yujjati,
tika-vin07t:538_15: sasse pana sabbathā akateyeva udakaṃ vināsentena ca udakagghameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:538_16: na tappaccayā sakalaṃ sassaṃ tena vināsitabhaṇḍasseva bhaṇḍadeyyattā,
tika-vin07t:538_17: itarathā vāṇijjādiatthāya parehi ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ avaharantassa tadubhayampi gahetvā bhaṇḍagghaṃ kātabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:538_19: Sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenāti ettha ekassa santake taḷāke khette ca jāte tasseva dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t:539_3: Asampattevāti taḷākato nikkhamitvā mahāmātikāyaṃ eva ṭhite.
tika-vin07t:539_4: Anikkhante baddhā subaddhāti taḷākato anikkhante bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti sabbasādhāraṇattā udakassāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:539_5: Nikkhante pana pāṭipuggalikaṃ hotīti āha “nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti.
tika-vin07t:539_6: Idha pana khuddakamātikāyaṃ appaviṭṭhattā avahāro na jāto,
tika-vin07t:539_7: “taḷākato aniggate paresaṃ mātikāmukhaṃ asampattevā”ti heṭṭhā vuttassa vikappadvayassa “anikkhante baddhā subaddhā,
tika-vin07t:539_8: nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathākkamena yojanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:539_13: na sametīti ettha taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā parasantakavatthu na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:541_1: Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthīti “yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti abhājetvāva
tika-vin07t:541_2: yāvadicchakaṃ gahaṇatthameva ṭhapitattā arakkhitattā sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ viya na hotīti
tika-vin07t:541_4: puna sāmaṇerā āharissantīti keci therā vadeyyunti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:543_1: Vanappatikathāyaṃ sandhāritattāti chinnassa rukkhassa patituṃ āraddhassa sandhāraṇamattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:543_2: na pana maricavalliādīhi pubbe veṭhetvā ṭhitabhāvena.
tika-vin07t:543_3: Tādise hi chinnepi avahāro natthi araññaṭṭhakathāyaṃ veṭhitavalliyaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:543_4: Ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti iminā sabbaso chindanameva valliādīhi asambaddhassa rukkhassa ṭhānācāvanaṃ pubbe
tika-vin07t:543_5: viya ākāsādīsu phuṭṭhasakalapadesato mocananti āveṇikamidha ṭhānācāvanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:543_6: Keci pana “rukkhabhārena kiñcideva bhassitvā ṭhitattā hotiyeva ṭhānācāvana”nti vadanti, tanna,
tika-vin07t:543_7: rukkhena phuṭṭhassa sakalassa ākāsapadesassa pañcahi chahi vā ākārehi anatikkamitattā.
tika-vin07t:543_8: Vātamukhaṃ sodhetīti yathā vāto āgantvā rukkhaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin07t:543_9: evaṃ vātassa āgamanamaggaṃ rundhitvā ṭhitāni sākhāgumbādīni chinditvā apanento sodheti.
tika-vin07t:543_10: Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ vāti maṇḍūkānaṃ naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhitakaṇṭakanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:545_3: pārājikamevāti “antaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti asallakkhitattā sāmaññato “gaṇhissāmi eta”nti sallakkhitasseva
tika-vin07t:545_4: paṭassa ekadesatāya tampi gaṇhitukāmovāti pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:545_10: Ekamantaṃ paṭikkammāti bhayeneva anupagantvā maggato sayaṃ paṭikkamma.
tika-vin07t:545_11: Santajjetvāti pharusavācāya ceva āvudhaparivattanādikāyavikārena ca santajjetvā.
tika-vin07t:545_13: Ālayena anadhimuttampi bhaṇḍaṃ anajjhāvutthakaṃ nāma hotīti āha “āharāpente dātabba”nti,
tika-vin07t:545_14: iminā paṭhamaṃ pariccattālayānampi yadi pacchāpi sakasaññā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:545_16: balakkārenāpi sakasaññāya tassa gahaṇe doso natthi,
tika-vin07t:545_21: balakkārena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati sakasaññābaleneva puna gahetabbabhāvassa āpannattā.
tika-vin07t:545_22: “Adentassa pārājika”nti vacanato corassa sakasaññāya vijjamānāyapi sāmikesu sālayesu adātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:545_24: Vicāraṇāyeva natthīti iminā tatthāpi paṭikkhepābhāvato ayameva atthoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:547_1: Upanidhikathāyaṃ saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanappayogaṃ
tika-vin07t:547_2: vinā nāhaṃ gaṇhāmītiādinā aññasmiṃ payoge akate rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle “na dāni tassa dassāmi,
tika-vin07t:547_3: na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī”ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe katepi avahāro natthi.
tika-vin07t:547_8: “na dāni tassa dassāmī”ti theyyacittuppattikkhaṇe pana sāmino dhuranikkhepacittuppattiyā hetubhūto kāyavacīpayogo natthi,
tika-vin07t:547_12: rakkhati tāvāti avahāraṃ sandhāya avuttattā nāhaṃ gaṇhāmītiādinā musāvādakaraṇe pācittiyameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:547_13: na dukkaṭaṃ theyyacittābhāvena sahapayogassāpi abhāvatoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:547_16: na tāva paṭhamena bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanappayogena tadā theyyacittābhāvā,
tika-vin07t:547_17: nāpi “dassāmī”ti kathanappayogena tadā theyyacitte vijjamānepi payogassa kappiyattāti? Vuccate –
tika-vin07t:547_18: sāminā “dehī”ti bahuso yāciyamānopi adatvā yena payogena attano adātukāmataṃ sāmikassa ñāpeti,
tika-vin07t:547_19: yena ca so “adātukāmo ayaṃ vikkhipatī”ti ñatvā dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin07t:547_21: Na hettha upanikkhittabhaṇḍe pariyāyena mutti atthi.
tika-vin07t:547_23: kattha te dinnantiādipariyāyavacanenāpi sāmikassa dhure nikkhipāpite āpattiyeva.
tika-vin07t:547_27: Parasantakassa parehi gaṇhāpane eva pariyāyato mutti,
tika-vin07t:547_29: Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti ettha attano hatthe sāminā dinnatāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ca ṭhānācāvanepi natthi avahāro,
tika-vin07t:547_30: theyyacittena pana gahaṇe dukkaṭato na muccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:548_0: Eseva nayoti uddhāreyeva corassa pārājikaṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin07t:548_2: Aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti saññāṇato okāsato ca tena sadisameva aññaṃ gaṇhante yujjati,
tika-vin07t:548_3: corena sallakkhitappadesato taṃ apanetvā kehici tattha tādise aññasmiṃ patte ṭhapite taṃ gaṇhanteyeva yujjatīti adhippāyo,
tika-vin07t:548_4: tena corena divā sallakkhitapattaṃ aññattha apanetvā tadaññe tādise patte tattha ṭhapitepi corassa pacchā
tika-vin07t:548_5: rattibhāge uppajjamānaṃ theyyacittaṃ divā sallakkhitappadese ṭhapitaṃ aññaṃ tādisaṃ pattameva ālambitvā
tika-vin07t:548_7: Padavārenāti therena nīharitvā dinnaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā gacchato corassa padavārena.
tika-vin07t:548_8: Atādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti atādisassa therena gahaṇakkhaṇe avahārābhāvato pacchā hatthapattaṃ “ta”nti
tika-vin07t:548_9: vā “añña”nti vā saññāya “idaṃ gahetvā gacchāmī”ti gamane padavāreneva avahāro yujjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:549_0: Pārājikaṃ natthīti padavārepi pārājikaṃ natthi upanidhibhaṇḍe viyāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:549_1: Gāmadvāranti bahigāme vihārassa patiṭṭhitattā gāmappavesassa ārambhappadesadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:549_3: Dvinnampi uddhāreyeva pārājikanti therassa abhaṇḍāgārikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:549_6: upanikkhittabhaṇḍe ca theyyacittena gaṇhatopi na tāva therassa avahāro hoti,
tika-vin07t:549_8: Ubhinnampi dukkaṭanti therassa attano santakatāya corassa sāmikena dinnattā avahāro na jāto,
tika-vin07t:550_0: Āṇattiyā gahitattāti “pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti evaṃ therena kataāṇattiyā gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:550_3: asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti therena vihārato paṭṭhāya gāmamaggepi sakalepi gāme vicaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:550_4: niyamitattā maggato okkamma gacchantasseva padavārena āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:550_5: Vihārassa hi parabhāge upacārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa gāmassa parato upacāro,
tika-vin07t:550_6: tāva sabbaṃ daharassa therāṇattiyā sañcaraṇūpacārova hoti,
tika-vin07t:550_11: Aṭṭhatvā anisīditvāti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā sīsādīsu bhāraṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā tiṭṭhanto vā nisīdanto
tika-vin07t:550_12: vā vissamitvā theyyacitte vūpasante puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati ce,
tika-vin07t:550_14: Sace bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā puna taṃ gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t:550_18: “Asukaṃ nāma gāma”nti aniyametvā “antogāmaṃ gamissāmā”ti avisesena vutte vihārasāmantā pubbe piṇḍāya
tika-vin07t:550_21: Purimasadisamevāti anāṇattiyā gahitepi sāmikassa kathetvā gahitattā heṭṭhā vuttavihārūpacārādi sabbaṃ khettamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:550_22: Eseva nayoti antarāmagge theyyacittaṃ uppādetvātiādinā vuttaṃ nayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t:551_0: Nimitte vā kateti cīvaraṃ me kiliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:551_1: ko nu kho rajitvā dassatītiādinā nimitte kate.
tika-vin07t:551_2: Vuttanayenevāti anāṇattassa therena saddhiṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gamanavāre vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin07t:551_3: Ekapasseti vihārassa mahantatāya attānaṃ adassetvā ekasmiṃ passe.
tika-vin07t:551_4: Theyyacittena paribhuñjanto jīrāpetīti theyyacitte uppanne ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhāreneva paribhuñjanto jīrāpeti,
tika-vin07t:551_5: ṭhānā cāventassa pana theyyacitte sati pārājikameva sīse bhāraṃ khandhe karaṇādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:551_6: Yathā vā tathā vā nassatīti aggiādinā nassati,
tika-vin07t:551_7: añño vā kocīti iminā yena ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:552_1: Itaraṃ gaṇhato uddhāre pārājikanti ettha “pavisitvā tava sāṭakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti imināva upanidhibhāvato mocitattā,
tika-vin07t:552_2: sāmikassa itaraṃ gaṇhato attano sāṭake ālayassa sabbhāvato ca “uddhāre pārājika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:552_3: Sāmiko ce “mama santakaṃ idaṃ vā hotu, aññaṃ vā, kiṃ tena,
tika-vin07t:552_4: alaṃ mayhaṃ iminā”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu nirālayo hoti,
tika-vin07t:552_6: Na jānantīti tena vuttavacanaṃ asuṇantā na jānanti.
tika-vin07t:552_7: Eseva nayoti ettha sace jānitvāpi cittena na sampaṭicchanti,
tika-vin07t:552_9: Paṭikkhipantīti ettha cittena paṭikkhepopi saṅgahitovāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:552_10: Upacāre vijjamāneti bhaṇḍāgārassa samīpe uccārapassāvaṭṭhāne vijjamāne.
tika-vin07t:552_11: Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭheti ettha “taṃ māressāmā”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭati gilānapakkhe ṭhitattā avisayoti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:552_12: Maraṇato hi paraṃ gelaññaṃ avisayattañca natthi.
tika-vin07t:552_13: “Dvāraṃ chinditvā parikkhāraṃ harissāmā”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t:552_14: Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi bhikkhācārādīhi pariyesitvā attano santakepi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:552_15: Ayaṃ sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:553_5: Corānaṃ paṭipathaṃ gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraññeva gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ abhimukhaṃ gatesu,
tika-vin07t:553_6: “corehi haṭabhaṇḍaṃ āharissāmā”ti tadanupathaṃ gatesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:553_7: Nibaddhaṃ katvāti “asukakule yāgubhattaṃ vihāravārikānaññevā”ti evaṃ niyamanaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:553_8: Dve tisso yāgusalākā cattāri pañca salākabhattāni ca labhamānovāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:553_9: tato ūnaṃ vā hotu adhikaṃ vā attano veyyāvaccakarassa ca yāpanamattaṃ labhanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:553_10: Nissitake jaggentīti tehi vihāraṃ jaggāpentīti attho.
tika-vin07t:553_12: Attadutiyassāti appicchassa attā sarīrameva dutiyo assa nāññoti attadutiyo.
tika-vin07t:553_14: etena sabbena ekekassa vāro na pāpetabboti dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:553_17: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ ārāmikādīhi diyyamānaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin07t:553_18: Na gāhāpetabboti ettha abbhokāsikassāpi attano adhikaparikkhāro vā ṭhapito atthi,
tika-vin07t:555_1: Suṅkaghātakathāyaṃ suṅkaṃ yattha rājapurisā hananti adadantānaṃ santakaṃ acchinditvāpi gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t:555_2: taṃ ṭhānaṃ suṅkaghātanti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:555_4: Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmetīti ettha paṭhamapādaṃ paricchedato bahi ṭhapetvā dutiyapāde uddhaṭamatte pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin07t:555_5: Uddharitvā bahi aṭṭhapitepi bahi ṭhito eva nāma hotīti katvā evaṃ sabbattha padavāresupīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:555_7: pārājikanti idaṃ sayaṃ bahi ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ abbhantarimaṃ ukkhipitvā vā samakaṃ ukkhipitvā vā parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:555_8: Bahi ṭhatvā ukkhittamatte hi sabbaṃ bahigatameva hotīti.
tika-vin07t:555_9: Sace pana so bahi ṭhatvāpi bāhirapuṭakaṃ paṭhamaṃ anto ṭhapetvā pacchā abbhantarimaṃ ukkhipitvā bahi ṭhapeti,
tika-vin07t:555_10: tadāpi ekābaddhatāya avijahitattā avahāro na dissati.
tika-vin07t:555_11: Keci pana “bhūmiyaṃ patitvā vattantaṃ puna anto pavisati,
tika-vin07t:555_12: pārājikamevāti vuttattā bāhirapuṭake antopaviṭṭhepi bahigatabhāvato na muccati,
tika-vin07t:555_14: pacchā eva vā bahi ṭhapitamatte vā pārājikamevā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:555_16: Bahi bhūmiyaṃ pātitassa kenaci saddhiṃ ekābaddhatāya abhāvena antopaviṭṭhepi pārājikamevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:555_17: idaṃ pana ekābaddhattā tena saddhiṃ na sameti.
tika-vin07t:555_18: Tasmā yathā antobhūmigatena ekābaddhatā na hoti,
tika-vin07t:555_19: evaṃ ubhayassāpi bahigatabhāve sādhiteyeva avahāroti viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:555_21: Ye pana parivattitvāti imassa nivattitvāti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:555_22: tehi pana abbhantarimaṃ bahi ṭhapetīti ayamattho gahito hotīti tattha saṅkāyeva natthi.
tika-vin07t:555_23: Ekābaddhanti kājakoṭiyaṃ rajjuyā bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:555_25: pārājikanti bahi gahitakājakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ yadi pādaṃ agghati,
tika-vin07t:555_29: ṭhapetīti suṅkaghātaṃ pavisitvā appavisitvā vā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin07t:555_30: Suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhitanti yānādīhi nīhaṭattā bahi ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:555_31: Keci pana “bahi ṭhapita”nti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā suṅkaṭṭhānato pubbeva bahi ṭhapitanti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:555_33: suṅkaṭṭhāne pavisitvā yāne ṭhapitepi pavattitvā gate viya dosābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:555_34: Yo pana suṅkaṭṭhānassa antova pavisitvā “suṅkaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā theyyacittena āgatamaggena paṭinivattitvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t:555_35: tassāpi yadi tena disābhāgena gacchantānampi hatthato suṅkaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t:557_1: Pāṇakathāyaṃ āṭhapitoti mātāpitūhi iṇaṃ gaṇhantehi “yāva iṇadānā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ santike hotū”ti iṇadāyakānaṃ niyyātito.
tika-vin07t:557_2: Avahāro natthīti mātāpitūhi puttassa apariccattattā mātāpitūnañca asantakattā avahāro natthi.
tika-vin07t:557_3: Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti iminā āṭhapetvā gahitadhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā saha āṭhapitaputtahārakassa gīvāti dassitanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:557_5: Dāsikucchiyaṃ pana adāsassa jātopi ettheva saṅgahito.
tika-vin07t:557_7: Sukhaṃ jīvāti vadatīti theyyacittena sāmikānaṃ santikato palāpetukāmatāya vadati,
tika-vin07t:557_8: tathā pana acintetvā kāruññena “sukhaṃ gantvā jīvā”ti vadantassa natthi avahāro,
tika-vin07t:557_12: Anāpatti pārājikassāti tassa vacanena vegavaḍḍhane akatepi dukkaṭā na muccatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:557_13: “Adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyyā”ti ādānasseva vuttattā vuttapariyāyena muccatīti.
tika-vin07t:559_1: Catuppadakathāyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāvasesāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi hatthi ādīhi aññe pasu-
tika-vin07t:559_3: Bhiṅkacchāpanti “bhiṅkā bhiṅkā”ti saddāyanato evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ hatthipotakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:559_6: aparikkhittanagare pana antonagare ṭhitassāpi ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:559_8: Eko nipannoti etthāpi bandhoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:559_10: Ghātetīti ettha theyyacittena vināsentassa sahapayogattā dukkaṭamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:561_1: Ocarakakathāyaṃ pariyāyena hi adinnādānato muccatīti idaṃ āṇattikapayogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:561_2: sayameva pana abhiyuñjanādīsu pariyāyenapi mokkho natthi.
tika-vin07t:563_2: Oṇirakkhassa santike ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ upanidhi viya guttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṅgopanatthāya anikkhipitvā yathāṭhapitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:563_3: eva muhuttamattaṃ olokanatthāya ṭhapitattā tassa bhaṇḍassa ṭhānācāvanamattena oṇirakkhakassa pārājikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:565_1: Tena nesaṃ dukkaṭāpattiyoti āṇattivasena pārājikāpattiyā asambhave satīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:565_2: Yadi hi tena āṇattā yathāṇattivasena haranti,
tika-vin07t:565_5: āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti etthāpi āṇāpakānaṃ āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti,
tika-vin07t:565_8: tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikantiādīsupi evameva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:565_9: Sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassa aṅgaṃ na hotīti bhinnakālikattā aññamaññassa aṅgaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:565_10: Tathā hi sahatthā avaharantassa ṭhānācāvanakkhaṇe āpatti,
tika-vin07t:567_1: Saṅketakammakathāyaṃ ocarake vuttanayenevāti ettha avassaṃ hāriye bhaṇḍetiādinā vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin07t:567_2: Pāḷiyaṃ “taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā”ti tassa saṅketassa pure vā pacchā vāti attho.
tika-vin07t:567_3: “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā”ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:569_2: tasmā taṅkhaṇeyeva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin07t:569_3: Nimittakammānantarameva gaṇhituṃ āraddhattā teneva nimittena avaharatīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:569_4: Yadi evaṃ purebhattappayogova esoti vādo pamāṇabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin07t:569_6: Na hi saṅketakammaṃ viya nimittakammaṃ kālaparicchedayuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:569_9: “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin07t:569_10: mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattī”ti idaṃ pana nimittakaraṇato pure gaṇhantassa ceva nimittakamme ca katepi gaṇhituṃ
tika-vin07t:569_11: anārabhitvā pacchā sayameva gaṇhantassa ca vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:571_1: Āṇattikathāyaṃ asammohatthanti yasmā saṅketakammanimittakammāni karonto na kevalaṃ purebhattādikālasaṅketakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:571_6: so aññassa pāvadatūtiādinā puggalapaṭipāṭiyā ca āṇāpeti,
tika-vin07t:571_7: tasmā pubbaṇhādikālavasena akkhinikhaṇanādikiriyāvasena bhaṇḍapuggalapaṭipāṭivasena ca āṇatte etesu saṅketakammanimittakammesu
tika-vin07t:571_10: Yaṃ āṇāpakena nimittasaññaṃ katvā vuttanti pubbaṇhādīsu akkhinikhaṇanādīsu vā gahaṇatthaṃ āṇāpentena
tika-vin07t:571_11: īdisavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiyuttaṃ gaṇhāti evaṃ gahaṇassa nimittabhūtasaññāṇaṃ katvā yaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:571_12: Ayaṃ yutti sabbatthāti heṭṭhā vuttesu upari vakkhamānesu ca sabbattha āṇattippasaṅgesu āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikādīnaṃ bhāvasaṅkhātā vinayayutti,
tika-vin07t:571_13: sā ca āṇattassa kiriyāniṭṭhāpanakkhaṇe āṇāpakassa payoge theyyacittānaṃ abhāvā āṇattikkhaṇe ekā eva āpatti
tika-vin07t:571_14: hotīti evaṃ upapattiyā pavattattā yuttīti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:571_15: “Mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccaya”nti vuttattā saṅgharakkhitena paṭiggahitepi buddharakkhitadhammarakkhitānaṃ dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin07t:571_16: kasmā panettha ācariyassa thullaccayanti āha “mahājano hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:571_19: Idañca mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayābhāvadassanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ āṇattikkhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:571_20: na pana saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā puna dukkaṭasambhavaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t:571_21: Na hi so ekapayogena dukkaṭadvayaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:571_23: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti sāmaññena vuttattā idaṃ saṅgharakkhitassa dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:571_26: Na hi tassa paṭiggahaṇappayoge anāpatti hotīti.
tika-vin07t:571_27: Imināva heṭṭhā āgatavāresupi paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:571_28: “Paṇṇe vā silādīsu vā ‘coriyaṃ kātabba’nti likhitvā ṭhapite pārājikamevā”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:571_29: taṃ pana “asukassa gehe bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ niyametvā likhite yujjati,
tika-vin07t:571_31: Maggānantaraphalasadisāti iminā yathā ariyapuggalānaṃ maggānantare phale uppanne kilesapaṭippassaddhipariyosānaṃ bhāvanākiccaṃ nipphannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:571_32: evametissā atthasādhakacetanāya uppannāya āṇattikiccaṃ nipphannamevāti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:574_3: Āmasati phandāpeti ṭhānā cāvetīti imehi tīhi padehi pubbapayogasahitaṃ pañcamaṃ avahāraṅgaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:574_5: Āṇattikādayo sabbepi payogā dhuranikkhepo ca idha saṅgahetabbāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:575_1: Ṭhānācāvananti idaṃ pāḷianusārato vuttaṃ dhuranikkhepassāpi saṅgahetabbato.
tika-vin07t:575_3: Tattha hi na ca sakasaññīti iminā parapariggahitatā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:575_4: na ca vissāsaggāhī na ca tāvakālikanti imehi parapariggahitasaññitā,
tika-vin07t:575_5: tīhi vā etehi parapariggahitatā parapariggahitasaññitā ca vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:575_7: Chaḍḍitanti paṭhamaṃ pariggahetvā pacchā anatthikatāya chaḍḍitaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
tika-vin07t:575_8: Chinnamūlakanti naṭṭhaṃ pariyesitvā ālayasaṅkhātassa mūlassa chinnattā chinnamūlakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:575_9: Assāmikanti anajjhāvutthakādīhi tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ assāmikavatthu.
tika-vin07t:577_1: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve nibbattāti tasmiṃyeva matasarīre petattabhāvena nibbattā.
tika-vin07t:577_2: Rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva natthīti manussehi agopitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:577_3: sace panetaṃ devālayacetiyarukkhādīsu niyuttehi purisehi rakkhitagopitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:577_6: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ adinnādānābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:577_7: Jighacchitapāṇinā khādiyamānamaṃsassa acchinditvā khādanaṃ nāma kāruññahānito lolabhāvato ca asāruppameva.
tika-vin07t:577_8: Teneva hi ariyavaṃsikā attano patte bhattaṃ khādantampi sunakhādiṃ tajjetvā na vārenti,
tika-vin07t:577_9: tiracchānānaṃ āmisadāne kusalaṃ viya tesaṃ āmisassa acchindanepi akusalamevāti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:579_0: Bahu ekato dāruādibhāriyassa ekassa bhaṇḍassa ukkhipanakāle “gaṇhatha ukkhipathā”ti vacīpayogena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:579_3: ahaṃ añña”nti evaṃ pavatte pana avahāre attanā gahitaṃ sāhatthikameva,
tika-vin07t:579_5: teneva tadubhayagghena pañcamāsepi pārājikaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:579_7: Vuttañhi “sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:579_8: Upanikkhittabhaṇḍaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca adātukāmatāya “demi dammī”ti vikkhipanto tuṇhībhāvena viheṭhentopi
tika-vin07t:579_9: tena tena kāyavikārādikiriyāya parassa dhuraṃ nikkhipāpesīti “kiriyāsamuṭṭhānañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:582_1: Vinītavatthūsu niruttiyeva taṃtaṃatthaggahaṇassa upāyatāya pathoti niruttipatho,
tika-vin07t:582_3: Yathākammaṃ gatoti tato petattabhāvato matabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:582_8: Sīse vātiādi adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale padese cittavikārappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:582_10: Matasarīrampi hi yena kenaci ākārena sañcicca phusantassa anāmāsadukkaṭamevāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:582_12: Na hi apārājikavatthukepi cittādiitthirūpe bhavantaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pārājikavatthubhūte matitthisarīre nivattati.
tika-vin07t:584_3: gaṇhissāmīti anāgatavacanaṃ pasibbakaggahaṇato puretaraṃ samuppannaparikappadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:584_5: gaṇhāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ gaṇhātīti evamettha adhippāyo gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t:584_6: na pana bahi nīharitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā gahessāmīti,
tika-vin07t:584_9: pacchā andhakāre jāte vijānanakāle vā gaṇhissāmi,
tika-vin07t:584_10: idāni olokento viya hatthagataṃ karomī”ti gaṇhantassāpi gahaṇakkhaṇe avahāro bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:584_11: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ tadā gahaṇe sanniṭṭhānābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:584_13: Na hi “pacchā vadhissāmī”ti pāṇaṃ gaṇhantassa tadeva tasmiṃ matepi pāṇātipāto hoti vadhakacetanāya payogassa akatattā,
tika-vin07t:584_14: evamidhāpi atthaṅgate sūriye avaharissāmītiādinā kālaparikappanavasena ṭhānā cāvitepi tadāpi avahāro na hoti okāsaparikappe viya,
tika-vin07t:584_15: tasmiṃ pana yathāparikappitaṭṭhāne kāle āgate bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāpi theyyacittena gacchato padavārena avahāroti khāyati.
tika-vin07t:584_16: Tasmā bhaṇḍaparikappo okāsaparikappo kālaparikappoti tividhopi parikappo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:584_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana okāsaparikappe samodhānetvā kālaparikappo visuṃ na vuttoti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t:584_19: Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā vīmaṃsitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:585_1: na tadā tesaṃ matena avahāroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:585_2: Disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissatīti pacchā pana bahi vīmaṃsitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā tato pacchā
tika-vin07t:585_3: theyyacittena haṭattā pubbe katassa parikappassa avahārānaṅgattā “sutta”nti ñatvā haraṇe viya theyyāvahāro eva siyā.
tika-vin07t:585_5: Sāṭako ce bhavissatītiādikassa parikappassa tadā avijjamānattā kevalaṃ avahāro eva,
tika-vin07t:585_10: taṃ adiṭṭhaṃ parikappitabhāve ṭhitaṃyeva uddharantassa avahāro”ti.
tika-vin07t:585_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā okāsapaappāvahāro bhaṇḍaṃ disvā avaharantassa parikappāvahāro siyāti?
tika-vin07t:585_13: pubbeva disvā ñātabhaṇḍasseva hi okāsaparikappo vutto.
tika-vin07t:585_14: Taṃ maññamāno taṃ avaharīti idaṃ suttaṃ kiñcāpi “taññeveta”nti niyametvā gaṇhantassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:585_15: tathāpi “tañce gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ pavatte imasmiṃ parikappepi “gaṇhissāmī”ti gahaṇe niyamasabbhāvā avahāratthasādhakaṃ hotīti uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:587_1: Kusaṃ pātetvāti vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ pātetvā.
tika-vin07t:587_2: Parakoṭṭhāsato kuse uddhaṭepi na tāva kusassa parivattanaṃ jātanti vuttaṃ “uddhāre rakkhatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:587_3: Hatthato muttamatte pārājikanti iminā ṭhānācāvanaṃ dhuranikkhepañca vinā kusasaṅkāmanaṃ nāma visuṃ ekoyaṃ avahāroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:587_4: Sabbepi hi avahārā sāhatthikāṇattikādhippāyayogehi nipphādiyamānā atthato ṭhānācāvanadhuranikkhepakusasaṅkāmanesu tīsu samosarantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:587_6: uddhāre pārājikanti purimassa attano koṭṭhāse ālayassa avigatattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:587_7: ālaye pana sabbathā asati avahāro na hoti,
tika-vin07t:588_1: saddena tattha vematikopi hutvā theyyacittena gaṇhantopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t:589_2: Tasmiṃ pācittiyanti adinnādānabhāvena sahapayogassāpi abhāvā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_5: Bhaṇḍadeyyanti sammatādīhi dinnattā na parājikaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:589_6: asantaṃ puggalaṃ vatvā gahitattā pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_7: Aññena diyyamānanti sammatādīhi catūhi aññena diyyamānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_9: Aparassāti asantaṃ puggalaṃ adassetvā pana “aparaṃ bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato gihisantake
tika-vin07t:589_10: sāminā ca “imassa dehī”ti evaṃ āṇattena ca dinne bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti,
tika-vin07t:589_11: saṅghasantake pana hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ asammatena vā anāṇattena vātiādi puna vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_12: Itarehi diyyamānanti sammatena āṇattena vā diyyamānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_13: Evaṃ gaṇhatoti “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato.
tika-vin07t:589_16: tena “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhante sāmikena sayaṃ dente vā dāpente vā viseso atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:589_18: Heṭṭhā pana sāmikena tena āṇattena vā diyyamānaṃ gihisantakaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato
tika-vin07t:589_19: aparassa abhāvato sāmisantakameva hotīti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:589_20: idha pana tehiyeva diyyamānaṃ “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato “dehī”ti
tika-vin07t:589_21: vuttattā aññātakaviññattimattaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na hotīti sudinnamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_22: Assāmikena pana āṇattena dinnaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhato bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:589_24: saṅghasantake pana “dehī”ti vuttepi sāmikassa kassaci abhāvā sammatena dinnepi bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:590_1: Āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyanti “gahite attamano hotī”ti vacanato anattamanassa santakaṃ gahitampi puna dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:590_2: “Sammukhībhūtehi bhājetabba”nti vacanato bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ upacārasīmaṭṭhānameva pāpuṇātīti āha “antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:590_3: Bhaṇḍadeyyanti ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāvepi corassa adatvā sāmikasseva dātabbaṃ corenāpi sāmikasseva dātabbato.
tika-vin07t:591_6: theyyacitte pana sati kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya gaṇhatopi pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t:591_8: Senāsanatthāya niyamitanti idaṃ issaravatāya dadato thullaccayadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:591_9: Itarapaccayatthāya dinnampi atheyyacittena issaravatāya kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya vā ñātakādīnaṃ vā dadato dukkaṭaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca hoteva.
tika-vin07t:591_12: Thullaccayanti kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya vā aññathā vā kāraṇena dadato senāsanatthāya niyamitassa garubhaṇḍatāya thullaccayaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca.
tika-vin07t:591_13: Gīvāti ettha senāsanatthāya niyamite thullaccayena saddhiṃ gīvā,
tika-vin07t:591_15: Sukhāditamevāti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā bhājetvā attano santakaṃ katvā khāditattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:591_16: Saṅghikañhi vihārapaṭibaddhaṃ vebhaṅgiyaṃ bahiupacārasīmaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ antoupacāraṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi eva bhājetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:592_1: “Vutto vajjemī”ti vuttabhikkhusmiṃ “vutto vajjehī”ti vuttassa pacchā uppajjanakapārājikādidosāropanato,
tika-vin07t:592_2: gahaṭṭhānaṃ vā “bhadantā aparicchedaṃ katvā vadantī”ti evaṃ dosāropanato.
tika-vin07t:593_1: Chātajjhattanti tena chātena jighacchāya udaragginā jhattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:593_5: bhaṇḍadeyyanti ettha ekasūkaragghanakabhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ ekasmiṃ bandhe aññesaṃ tattha abajjhanato.
tika-vin07t:593_7: yena ajjhotthaṭattā migā palāyituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin07t:593_8: Pacchā gacchatīti tena katapayogena agantvā pacchā sayameva gacchati,
tika-vin07t:593_9: heṭṭhā vuttesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:593_10: Rakkhaṃ yācitvāti rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā anuddissa rakkhaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin07t:594_7: Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti senāsane nirantaraṃ vasantānaṃ cīvaratthāya dāyakehi bhikkhūhi vā niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā,
tika-vin07t:594_8: āgantukehipi icchantehi tasmiṃ vihāre vassānādīsu pavisitvā cīvaratthāya gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:594_9: Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti sabbāni phalāphalāni abhājetvā “ettakesu rukkhesu phalāni bhājetvā paribhuñjissāma,
tika-vin07t:594_12: “kiñcipi abhājetvā catupaccayatthāyeva upanemā”ti vā evaṃ sammā upanentānaṃ āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:595_1: Ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvāti vuttamevatthaṃ puna byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:595_2: senāsanasaṅkhātavatthuno mūlacchedaṃ katvā sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:595_3: Keci panettha “ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā lāmakato paṭṭhāya vissajjentehipi senāsanabhūmiyo
tika-vin07t:595_5: tampi yuttameva imassāpi atthassa avassaṃ vattabbato,
tika-vin07t:595_6: itarathā keci saha vatthunāpi vissajjetabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t:596_0: Paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettake rukkhe rakkhitvā tato ettakaṃ gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin07t:596_2: Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo ye keci gopenti,
tika-vin07t:596_6: Taṃ sabbampi āharitvāti anāpucchitvāpi tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā.
tika-vin07t:596_7: Ayameva bhikkhu issarotiādito paṭṭhāya attano santakehi dārusambhārādīhi ca kārāpitattā paṭijaggitattā
tika-vin07t:596_8: ca saṅghikasenāsane bhāgitāya ca ayameva issaro,
tika-vin07t:596_9: na ca so tato vuṭṭhāpetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:596_17: Tato āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti sāmantagāmavāsīhi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitavihārato dārusambhārādiṃ āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:597_1: “Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjatī”ti vuttamatthaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “āgatāgatānaṃ vuḍḍhatarānaṃ na detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:597_5: pārājikassā”ti sāmikehi thullanandaṃ uddissa etissā hatthe dinnattā,
tika-vin07t:598_1: Tassa kulassa anukampāya pasādānurakkhaṇatthāyātiādinā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ nākāsīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:598_3: tāva pāsādo tesaṃ santike hotū”ti pubbe kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhitattā eva yathākālaparicchedameva tattha tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:598_4: tato paraṃ pāsādo sayameva yathāṭhānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin07t:598_5: tathāgamanañca iddhivissajjanena sañjātaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharī”ti.
tika-vin07t:598_6: Yasmā evaṃ iddhividhañāṇena karontassa kāyavacīpayogā na santi theyyacittañca natthi pāsādasseva vicāritattā,
tika-vin07t:598_7: tasmā “ettha avahāro natthī”ti thero evamakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:598_8: Atha vā dārakesu anukampāya ānayanatthameva pāsāde upanīte pāse baddhasūkarādīnaṃ āmisaṃ dassetvā ṭhānācāvanaṃ
tika-vin07t:598_9: viya karamarānītesu dārakesu pāsādaṃ āruḷhesupi puna paṭisaṃharaṇe ca idha avahāro natthi kāruññādhippāyattā,
tika-vin07t:598_11: Kāyavacīpayoge satiyeva hi āpatti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin07t:598_18: iddhicittassa visaye āpatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:598_19: Kiṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “īdisāya adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin07t:598_22: iddhimassa iddhivisaye”ti hi imināyeva suttena adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā appaṭikkhittabhāvo sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:598_24: “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti āgatañca adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma,
tika-vin07t:598_27: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma.
tika-vin07t:598_28: Attano pana pakatirūpaṃ yathāsabhāvena ṭhapetvāva bahi hatthiādidassanaṃ vikubbaniddhi nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t:598_29: attano rūpameva hatthiādirūpena nimmānaṃ vikubbaniddhīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:599_3: tena dutiyapārājikasikkhāpadena samaṃ aññaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:599_8: Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvasena vā attanāva attano vītikkamārocanavasena vā saṅghamajjhe adinnādānavatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe.
tika-vin07t:599_11: Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti attanā gahetuṃ yutte mātāpitādīnaṃ santakepi.
tika-vin07t:605_1: Yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hotītiādinā rājagahassa buddhuppādeyeva vepullappatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t:605_2: sā etthāpi samānāti dassetuṃ “idampi ca nagara”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:605_3: tena ca na kevalaṃ rājagahādayo evāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:605_5: dīghabhāṇakā pana “himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāvana”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:605_11: “Kesalomādi”nti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ yepi hītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:605_12: Pañcapañcappabhedenāti ettha pañca pañca pabhedā etassa pariyāyassāti pañcapañcappabhedo,
tika-vin07t:605_13: tena pañcapañcappabhedenāti evaṃ bāhiratthasamāsavasena pariyāyavisesanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:606_7: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ vasena tividhakalyāṇatā,
tika-vin07t:606_8: tesaṃyeva ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:606_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dasalakkhaṇavibhāvaneneva tannissayabhūtā tividhakalyāṇatāpi jhānassa pākaṭā hotīti tatrimānītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:607_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷīti tasmiṃ dasalakkhaṇavibhāvanavisaye ayaṃ pāḷi.
tika-vin07t:607_1: Paṭipadāvisuddhīti gotrabhupariyosānāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya jhānassa nīvaraṇādiparibandhato visuddhi,
tika-vin07t:607_2: sāyaṃ yasmā upekkhānubrūhanādīnampi paccayattena padhānā purimakāraṇasiddhā ca,
tika-vin07t:607_4: Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā,
tika-vin07t:607_5: sā pana paribandhavisuddhisamakālavibhāvinīpi tabbisuddhiyāva nipphannāti dīpanatthamāha “upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe”ti.
tika-vin07t:607_6: Sampahaṃsanāti vatthudhammādīnaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā,
tika-vin07t:607_7: sā pana yasmā kattabbassa sabbakiccassa nipphattiyāva siddhā nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:607_9: Tīṇipi cetāni kalyāṇāni ekakkhaṇe labbhamānānipi paccayapaccayuppannatādivasena pavattantīti dassanatthaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānabhāvena vuttāni,
tika-vin07t:607_10: na pana jhānassa uppādādikkhaṇattaye yathākkamaṃ labbhamānattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:607_11: Majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ paṭipajjatītiādīsu majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva.
tika-vin07t:607_12: So hi līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ ubhinnaṃ antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo,
tika-vin07t:607_13: savisesaṃ cittassa ekattārammaṇe ṭhapanato samādhiyeva uparivisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato “samādhinimitta”nti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:607_15: Evaṃ paṭipannattā majjhimena samādhinimittena tattha ekattārammaṇe appanāgocare pakkhandati upatiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:607_16: evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa cittassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto puggalo visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
tika-vin07t:607_17: Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
tika-vin07t:607_18: samathapaṭipannabhāvato evamassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
tika-vin07t:608_0: Tattha jātānantiādīsu ye pana te evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tasmiṃ jhānacitte jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā,
tika-vin07t:608_1: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anativattanasabhāvena sampahaṃsanā visodhanā pariyodapanā ca,
tika-vin07t:608_2: saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasatāya sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t:608_3: yañcetaṃ tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:608_4: tassa tadupagavīriyassa vāhanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t:608_5: tasmiṃ khaṇe yathāvuttadhammānaṃ āsevanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t:608_6: pariyodapanā ca pariyodapanakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivaseneva ijjhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:608_7: Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni.
tika-vin07t:608_9: Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiññeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena samādhinā sampannaṃ,
tika-vin07t:610_1: Vaggumudāti ettha “vaggumatā”ti vattabbe lokikā “mudā”ti vohariṃsūti dassento āha “vaggumatā”ti.
tika-vin07t:611_6: “Ayaṃ samaṇakuttako yathāsamuppannasaṃvegamūlakena samaṇabhāvūpagamanena atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti cintetvā avoca,
tika-vin07t:611_7: na pana “arahattappattiyā tīsu bhavesu appaṭisandhikatāya taṃ atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti maraṇeneva sattānaṃ saṃsāramocanaladdhikattā devatāya.
tika-vin07t:611_8: Na hi matānaṃ katthaci paṭisandhi gacchati.
tika-vin07t:611_9: Iminā atthena evameva bhavitabbanti iminā paresaṃ jīvitā voropanatthena evameva saṃsāramocanasabhāveneva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:611_11: aññamaññampi jīvitā voropentī”ti vuttattā sabbānipi tāni pañcabhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:611_12: Tasmā ye attanāpi attānaṃ aññamaññañca jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin07t:611_13: te puthujjanabhikkhū ṭhapetvā tadavasese ca puthujjanabhikkhū,
tika-vin07t:611_14: sabbe ca ariye ayaṃ jīvitā voropesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:612_2: Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano attano ācariyānaṃ santike gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t:612_3: gahetvā ca ācariyehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin07t:612_4: Tadā pana uddesādidāyakā tanubhūtehi bhikkhūhi bhagavantaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin07t:614_1: Dasānussatīsu antogadhāpi ānāpānassati tadā bhikkhūnaṃ bahūnaṃ sappāyataṃ dassetuṃ puna gahitā.
tika-vin07t:614_2: Tathā hi taṃ bhagavā tesaṃ desesi.
tika-vin07t:614_4: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:614_7: Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:614_8: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti appamussanatāya tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:614_10: Idāni sativaseneva puggalaṃ niddisitukāmena yo assasatītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:614_12: tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:614_15: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti.
tika-vin07t:615_0: Bāhirakā ānāpānassatiṃ jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti,
tika-vin07t:615_2: Evamassetaṃ senāsananti ettha evanti bhāvanāsatiyā yathāvuttanayena ārammaṇe cittassa nibandhane satiyeva,
tika-vin07t:615_4: tena muṭṭhassatissa araññavāso niratthako ananurūpoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:615_5: Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti “pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:615_6: Ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlanti gimhānādiututtayassa semhādidhātuttayassa mohādicariyattayassa ca anukūlaṃ.
tika-vin07t:615_11: Pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti sabbathā gahitaṃ sammosapaṭipakkhato niggamanasaṅkhātaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t:616_1: Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni soḷasa padāni assāsapassāsavasena dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttehi dvattiṃsākārehi.
tika-vin07t:616_5: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepapaṭipakkhabhāvato “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato.
tika-vin07t:616_10: tato antomukhaṃ paṭisasanaṃ passāsoti āha assāsoti bahinikkhamanavātotiādi,
tika-vin07t:616_11: suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana ākaḍḍhanavasena anto sasanaṃ assāso,
tika-vin07t:616_12: bahi paṭisasanaṃ passāsoti katvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:617_1: tassa ca paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto nikkhamatīti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin07t:617_2: “Sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānantiādinā dārakānaṃ pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti dīpetī”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t:617_3: Suttanayo eva cettha “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
tika-vin07t:617_4: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā
tika-vin07t:617_5: vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti
tika-vin07t:617_10: Tattha yathā hītiādinā desaddhānaṃ upamāvasena dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:617_11: Idāni tabbisiṭṭhakāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ upameyyavasena vibhāvetuṃ evantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:617_13: Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhakāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā
tika-vin07t:617_14: vuttāti veditabbā attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dīghaṃ addhānaṃ saṇikaṃ pūretvātiādivacanato.
tika-vin07t:617_18: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā,
tika-vin07t:617_21: kassaci tadubhayampi upaṭṭhātīti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vuttā,
tika-vin07t:618_0: Addhānasaṅkhāteti dīghe okāsaddhānasaṅkhāte attabhāve kāladdhānepi vā,
tika-vin07t:618_2: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati.
tika-vin07t:618_4: Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāve ārammaṇassa santataratāya,
tika-vin07t:618_5: kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddakādibhedā taruṇā pīti uppajjati.
tika-vin07t:618_6: Cittaṃ vivattatīti paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
tika-vin07t:618_7: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:618_10: vipassanāvasena assāsapassāsamukhena tannissayanāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:618_11: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti assāsapassāsasaṅkhāto kāyo upagantvā tiṭṭhati ettha satīti upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati,
tika-vin07t:618_12: sati pana sarasato upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhena saraṇaṭṭhena ca upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca.
tika-vin07t:618_14: tannissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā niccādibhāvaṃ vā itthipurisasattajīvādibhāvaṃ vā ananupassitvā
tika-vin07t:618_16: tāya kāyānupassanāya satisaṅkhātassa paṭṭhānassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-vin07t:619_5: Tasmāti yasmā “ādimajjhapariyosānavasena sabbaṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti pubbe
tika-vin07t:619_6: pavattaābhogavasena pacchā tathā samuppannena ñāṇasampayuttacittena taṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ evaṃ viditaṃ
tika-vin07t:619_7: pākaṭaṃ karonto assasati ceva passasati ca,
tika-vin07t:619_8: tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati nāma,
tika-vin07t:619_9: na pana “anāgate evaṃ karissāmī”ti cintanamattena so evaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:619_12: Na aññaṃ kiñcīti sabbakāyaṃ viditaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃ pubbābhogaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:619_16: So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:619_19: Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti hi iminā kāyapariggaho,
tika-vin07t:619_20: parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti iminā cittapariggaho vutto.
tika-vin07t:619_24: Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatīti kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā etaṃ.
tika-vin07t:620_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:621_5: Assāsapassāso sabbathā abhāvaṃ upaneti ceti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:621_6: Vātūpaladdhiyāti assāsapassāsavātassa abhāvena tabbisayāya upaladdhiyā bhāvanācittassa uppādo vaḍḍhi ca na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:621_7: Na ca nanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:621_8: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā,
tika-vin07t:621_9: tattha iti kira sikkhatīti mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:621_10: Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
tika-vin07t:621_11: sukhumā pana atthevāti bhāvanāyapi vaḍḍhi hotevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:622_3: Ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhāmīti ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:622_9: So upacchinditabboti visuddhimagge vuttena tassa tassa palibodhassa upacchedappakārena upacchinditabbo.
tika-vin07t:622_11: Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ vajjetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kasiṇānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:622_13: Yathāvutteneva nayenāti yogānuyogakammassa padaṭṭhānattāti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t:622_15: Mahāhatthipathaṃ nīharanto viyāti kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ mahāhatthimaggaṃ katvā dassento viya.
tika-vin07t:623_0: Vuttappakāramācariyanti “imināva kammaṭṭhānena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin07t:623_8: Kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evamidha nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhatīti upadhāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:623_10: Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāvasena matthakappatti
tika-vin07t:624_0: Aṭṭhārasasenāsanadosavivajjitanti mahattaṃ navattaṃ jiṇṇattaṃ panthanissitattaṃ soṇḍipaṇṇapupphaphalayuttatā
tika-vin07t:624_1: patthanīyatā nagaradārukhettasannissitatā visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitā paṭṭanasannissitatā paccantasannissitatā
tika-vin07t:624_2: rajjasīmasannissitatā asappāyatā kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imehi aṭṭhārasahi senāsanadosehi vivajjitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:625_2: senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ,
tika-vin07t:625_3: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-vin07t:625_4: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti …pe… evaṃ kho,
tika-vin07t:626_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi pañcahi senāsanaṅgehi samannāgataṃ,
tika-vin07t:626_5: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nivāso ekanti evaṃ pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t:627_0: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti dīghānaṃ kesādīnaṃ haraṇena pattacīvarādīnaṃ pacanatunnakaraṇarajanādikaraṇehi ca upacchinnā khuddakā palibodhā yena, tena.
tika-vin07t:628_0: Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anuppavattanā.
tika-vin07t:628_1: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
tika-vin07t:628_2: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne eva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
tika-vin07t:628_6: Pavattato nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vinivaṭṭanā maggo.
tika-vin07t:628_9: Khaṇḍanti “ekaṃ tīṇi pañcā”ti ekantarikādibhāvena gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:628_10: Atha vā khaṇḍanti antarantarā katipayakālaṃ agaṇetvā puna gaṇanavasena antarā odhiparicchedo na dassetabbo.
tika-vin07t:628_11: Tathā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa hi “kammaṭṭhānaninnaṃ pavattati nu kho me cittaṃ,
tika-vin07t:628_14: idañca evaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetvā cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasikarontassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:628_15: So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya.
tika-vin07t:628_17: taṃ gahetvāti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t:628_21: Yo upaṭṭhātīti imināva dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭo hoti,
tika-vin07t:628_22: so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:628_23: Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvā gaṇantasseva kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha “assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hontī”ti.
tika-vin07t:628_25: Evaṃ sīghagaṇanārambhassa okāsaṃ dassetuṃ imassāpi purimanayena gaṇayatotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:628_27: pākaṭā hutvāti iminā dandhagaṇanāya āraddhakāle cittassa avisadatāya sukhumassāsādīnaṃ apākaṭataṃ,
tika-vin07t:628_28: pacchā visadakāle pākaṭatañca tesu ca pākaṭesu dandhagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:628_32: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
tika-vin07t:629_4: Phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthīti iminā yathā gaṇanāya phusanāya ca manasikaroti,
tika-vin07t:629_5: evaṃ anubandhanaṃ vinā kevalaṃ ṭhapanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikāropi natthīti dassentena gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā yāva appanā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:629_6: tāva anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikaroti,
tika-vin07t:629_7: appanāya pana uppannāya anubandhanāya ṭhapanāya ca manasikaroti nāmāti dīpitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:629_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana anubandhanāya vinā ṭhapanāya manasikāro natthīti dassanatthaṃ “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya
tika-vin07t:629_9: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasikarotīti vuccatī”ti ettakameva vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:629_10: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchanati,
tika-vin07t:629_11: sā mānassa samīpeti upamānaṃ siddhasādisena sādhyasādhanaṃ yathā go viya gavayoti.
tika-vin07t:629_19: Anārammaṇamekacittassāti assāsapassāsānaṃ ekakkhaṇe appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayopi ārammaṇaṃ na honti,
tika-vin07t:629_20: nimittena saha assāso passāso vāti dveyeva ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇaṃ hontīti attho.
tika-vin07t:629_21: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa, ca-
tika-vin07t:629_23: tena evañca sati ayaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti byatirekaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:630_1: visesamadhigacchatīti idaṃ parihāragāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ kakacopamāya vivarituṃ pucchāṭhapanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:630_13: Nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vāti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge,
tika-vin07t:630_14: itaro mukhaṃ nimiyati chādiyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
tika-vin07t:631_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena kāyopi cittampi bhāvanākammassa arahaṃ idha padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:631_3: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
tika-vin07t:631_4: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogasaṅkhāto payogo.
tika-vin07t:631_5: Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaapāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti.
tika-vin07t:631_6: Byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti.
tika-vin07t:631_7: Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
tika-vin07t:631_9: Paripuṇṇāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā.
tika-vin07t:632_5: Vicārādīhīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:632_9: vitakkasampayogato vā jhānaṅgesu padhānabhūto samādhi appanāti katvā “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:632_10: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe…
tika-vin07t:632_11: pattaṃ viya hotī”ti upari vakkhamāno gantho purāṇapotthakesu dissati,
tika-vin07t:633_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
tika-vin07t:633_2: Nimittaṃ paṭṭhapetabbanti pubbe gahitākāranimittaggāhikā saññā phusanaṭṭhāne paṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin07t:633_3: Imameva hi atthavasanti imaṃ anupaṭṭhahantassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānavidhisaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca.
tika-vin07t:634_7: yathāvuttanayena nimitte eva cittassa ṭhapane satīti attho.
tika-vin07t:634_13: Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā viya honti.
tika-vin07t:634_14: Assāsapassāseti assāse passāse ca yo nānākāro,
tika-vin07t:634_15: taṃ vibhāvayaṃ assāsapassāsasambhūte vā nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapayaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati nāmāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:634_16: Keci pana vibhāvayanti etassa vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontoti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:634_19: assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento pajānanto tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-vin07t:634_20: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
tika-vin07t:635_11: Sesesu āvāsādīsu yattha yattha asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati,
tika-vin07t:635_14: Yassa pana evaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyameva sevantassapi appanā na hoti,
tika-vin07t:635_15: tena sampādetabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ dassento vatthuvisadakiriyātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:635_16: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma kesanakhacchedanādīhi ajjhattikassa sarīravatthussa,
tika-vin07t:635_21: Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbantiādīsu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ accāraddhatādīhi kāraṇehi uddhatatāya niggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:635_22: tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa niggaṇhanā hoti.
tika-vin07t:635_24: tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:635_26: tadā tassa cittassa aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇādinā sampahaṃsanasaṅkhātā saṃvejanā hoti.
tika-vin07t:635_27: Yadā panassa evaṃ paṭipajjanato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:635_28: tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāpāratāsamāpajjanena ajjhupekkhanā hoti.
tika-vin07t:637_0: Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti phalaṃ adhigantukāmo samāpajjitukāmo ca.
tika-vin07t:637_2: Tato paraṃ sallakkhaṇavasena phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmopīti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:637_4: vasippattanti ettha paṭiladdhajhānato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīsu jhānaṅgesu ekekaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-vin07t:637_8: Taṃ pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t:637_9: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t:637_10: Tatheva lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato bhavaṅguppattivasena vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t:637_12: “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti ca pavattapubbaparikammabhedenettha adhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānavasiyo bhinnā,
tika-vin07t:637_17: Paccavekkhaṇavīthiyañhi sīghaṃ āvajjanuppattiyā āvajjanavasī tadanantarānaṃ javanānaṃ samuppattiyā paccavekkhaṇavasīti
tika-vin07t:637_18: āvajjanavasīsiddhiyāva paccavekkhaṇavasī siddhā eva hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:637_19: Jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvāti jhānacittasampayuttāni jhānaṅgāni lakkhaṇādivasena pariggahetvā.
tika-vin07t:637_20: Tesañca nissayanti tesaṃ vatthunissayānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nissayaṃ.
tika-vin07t:637_21: Idañca karajakāyassa vatthudasakassa bhūtanissayattā suttantanayena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:637_23: Na hi kalāpantaragatāni bhūtāni kalāpantaragatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nissayapaccayā honti,
tika-vin07t:637_25: Paṭṭhāne hi asaṅgahitā sabbe paccayā suttantikanayena upanissayapaccaye saṅgayhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:637_27: Yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ vāti ettha yathāpariggahitakesādirūpārammaṇaṃ tato pubbe vuttanayavatthārammaṇañca
tika-vin07t:637_33: Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati.
tika-vin07t:637_34: Kalāpasammasanavasenāti yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā pañcasu khandhesu atītādikoṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_38: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikanti ca.
tika-vin07t:637_42: Ettha ca obhāsādayo nava nikantisaṅkhātataṇhupakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:637_49: Ekūnavīsatibhedassāti catunnaṃ maggavīthīnaṃ anantaraṃ paccekaṃ uppajjantassa maggaphalanibbānapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
tika-vin07t:638_0: Sappītike dve jhāneti pītisahagatāni catukkanaye dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni.
tika-vin07t:638_5: Ārammaṇe hi vidite tabbisayā cittacetasikā dhammā sayaṃ attano paṭisaṃviditā nāma hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca pacchā gahaṇe sandehābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:638_7: Evaṃ pītiṃ aniccādivasena gahaṇameva asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:639_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena,
tika-vin07t:639_1: pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:639_2: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepāpannaṃ nāma cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
tika-vin07t:639_3: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-vin07t:639_5: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā tadārammaṇajjhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hotīti.
tika-vin07t:639_6: Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:639_7: Evaṃ dassitaṃ pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato ca vibhāgato dassetuṃ āvajjatotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:639_11: tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:639_12: Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa.
tika-vin07t:639_14: Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa.
tika-vin07t:639_15: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasibhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
tika-vin07t:639_19: Abhiññeyyanti visiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ catusaccaṃ vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya maggapaññāya abhijānatotiādi yojanā.
tika-vin07t:640_3: Vipassanābhūmidassanatthanti kāyikasukhādisīsena pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāradassanato vuttaṃ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:640_5: Vuttanayenāti imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāletiādinā kāyasaṅkhāre vuttanayena.
tika-vin07t:640_6: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena vedanā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:640_8: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti imesu dvīsu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-vin07t:640_10: Cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbāti ārammaṇato asammohatotiādinā vuttanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:642_1: Yadipi ariyā neva attanāva attānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vā jīvitā voropenti,
tika-vin07t:642_3: tathāpi yathāvuttehi tīhi pakārehi matānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ antare migalaṇḍikena māritānaṃ ariyapuggalānampi atthitāya “ariyapuggalamissakattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:642_4: Atha vā puthujjanakāle attanāva attānaṃ ghātetvā maraṇasamaye vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin07t:644_1: Byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti jānitvā sañjānitvātiādinā byañjanānurūpaṃ avuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:644_2: Pāṇoti jānantoti idaṃ manussoti ajānitvāpi kevalaṃ sattasaññāya eva pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:644_7: Sikhāppatto atthoti sañciccāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttassapi vītikkamabhūtassa aparakālakiriyāyuttadassanena koṭippatto attho.
tika-vin07t:644_10: Tato vā uddhanti dutiyasattāhādīsu abbudādibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:644_11: Parihīnavegassa santānassa paccayo hotīti sahakārīpaccayo hoti,
tika-vin07t:644_13: Kammameva hi khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ janakapaccayo,
tika-vin07t:644_14: tañca pavattiyaṃ pubbe uppajjitvā ṭhitaṃ anupahataṃ catusantatirūpaṃ sahakārīpaccayaṃ labhitvāva kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin07t:644_16: yena kenaci virodhipaccayena niruddhacakkhādippasādānaṃ puggalānaṃ vijjamānampi kammaṃ cakkhādikaṃ janetuṃ na sakkotīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:645_2: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ sīghapātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin07t:645_6: Mantaṃ payojentīti aloṇabhojanadabbasayanasusānagamanādīhi payogehi mantaṃ parivattenti,
tika-vin07t:645_15: Vijjaṃ parivattetvāti gandhāravijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ katūpacāraṃ mantapaṭhanakkamena parijappitvā.
tika-vin07t:645_24: Taṃ tesaṃ icchāmattanti suttatthato na sametīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:646_0: Itarathāti pariyeseyyāti padassa gavesanamattameva yathārutavasena attho siyā,
tika-vin07t:646_1: tadā pariyiṭṭhamattena pariyesitvā satthādīnaṃ laddhamattenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:646_2: Sasanti hiṃsanti etenāti satthanti vadhopakaraṇassa pāsāṇarajjuādino sabbassāpi nāmanti āha laguḷātiādi.
tika-vin07t:646_5: Parato vuttanayattāti parato nigamanavasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa padabhājane vuttanayattā.
tika-vin07t:646_7: saddassa vicittādianekatthavisayattā itarehi nivattetvā viññāṇatthaṃ niyametuṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t:647_4: Pacchā vā tena rogenāti etena anāgatampi jīvitindriyaṃ ārabbha pāṇātipātassa pavattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:647_6: tadā taṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti āṇattiyā cirena samiddhiyampi āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin07t:647_7: Opātakhaṇanādithāvarapayogesu payogakaraṇato pacchā gahitapaṭisandhikassāpi sattassa maraṇe pāṇātipāto ca anāgatārammaṇo upapanno hoti.
tika-vin07t:647_8: Yaṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni paccuppannārammaṇāyevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:647_12: Dutiyappahārena maratīti paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā dutiyeneva maratīti attho.
tika-vin07t:647_14: Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro sayameva na sakkoti māretuṃ,
tika-vin07t:647_15: dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā sakkonto jīvitavināsahetu hoti,
tika-vin07t:647_16: tasmā paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā maraṇassa asiddhattā “payogo tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto,
tika-vin07t:647_20: Yadi pana dutiyappahāradāyakassāpi puggalassa vadhakacetanā atthi,
tika-vin07t:647_21: tassāpi attano payogenāpi matattā payogakkhaṇe pāṇātipātoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:648_1: “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti viparītaggahaṇepi “ima”nti yathānipannasseva paramatthato gahitattā yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha imaṃ vatthuntiādi.
tika-vin07t:648_2: Ghātako ca hotīti pāṇātipātakammena baddhoti attho.
tika-vin07t:648_3: Mātādiguṇamahante ārabbha pavattavadhakacetanāya mahāsāvajjatāya vuttaṃ “idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t:649_2: Yathādhippāyaṃ gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe,
tika-vin07t:649_3: yodhaṃ pana avijjhitvā kevalaṃ pitari viddhepi visaṅketo natthiyeva pitaripi vadhakacittassa atthitāya,
tika-vin07t:649_5: Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pituvisayaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-vin07t:650_0: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ pādehi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ dhanuṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvātiādinā vijjhanappakārasikkhāpanamukhena āṇāpetīti attho.
tika-vin07t:650_1: Evaṃ paharāti daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā evaṃ pahara.
tika-vin07t:650_2: Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi.
tika-vin07t:650_3: Tattakā ubhinnaṃ pāṇātipātāti anuddisitvā yesaṃ kesañci māraṇatthāya ubhohi payogassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:650_4: Sace hi āṇāpako “evaṃ viddhe asuko evaṃ maratī”ti saññāya “evaṃ vijjhā”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin07t:650_6: Sace āṇatto “asuka”nti niyametvā uddissa saraṃ khipati,
tika-vin07t:651_3: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparā āgataṃ kiriyāvisesampi pāḷisaṃsandanato gahetvā dassento aparo nayotiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:651_7: Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti sīsakaṭāhe cammaṃ saha kesehi uppāṭetvā thūlasakkharāhi sīsakaṭāhaṃ ghaṃsitvā saṅkhavaṇṇakaraṇavasena saṅkhamuṇḍakammakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:651_10: Ure paharitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā gīvāyaṃ paharitvātiādinā sarīrāvayavappadesesu paharaṇavijjhanādiniyamopi
tika-vin07t:651_11: kiriyāviseseyeva saṅgayhati aṭṭhakathāsu saṅkhamuṇḍakādisarīrappadesavisayāyapi ghātanāya tattha pavesitattā,
tika-vin07t:651_12: yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ purato paharitvā mārehītiādikassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa “purimapassādīnampi vatthusabhāgato
tika-vin07t:651_13: vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha purato paharitvātiādī”ti evamadhippāyakathanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:651_14: taṃ saṅkhamuṇḍakādikassa sarīrappadese kammakāraṇākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāya kiriyāvisesavisaye vuttattā na yujjati.
tika-vin07t:651_21: idaṃ pana yathāṇattavatthusmimpi kiriyāvisesavisaṅketena kammabaddhābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttanti paññāyati.
tika-vin07t:651_22: Tena “vatthuṃ avisaṃvādetvā mārentī”ti ettakameva avatvā “yathāṇattiyā”ti kiriyāvisesaniyamopi dassito,
tika-vin07t:651_24: Vatthuniddese ca “vatthūti māretabbo satto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:651_26: Tasmā purato paharaṇādipi kiriyāvisese eva saṅgayhatīti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t:652_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇheti āṇattadivasato aññassapi yassa kassaci divasassa pubbaṇhe.
tika-vin07t:652_1: Etaṃ gāme ṭhitanti gāmo puggalaniyamanatthaṃ vutto,
tika-vin07t:652_5: etena kālokāsaāvudhaiayāpathakiriyāvisesānaṃ niyamicchāya asati yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantassa
tika-vin07t:652_6: āṇāpakassa mukhāruḷhavasena vuttassa desakālādiniyamassa visaṅketepi kammabaddhoyevāti ñāpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:652_7: Yo pana cittena yattha katthaci yadā kadāci yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantopi kālādivisaṅketena
tika-vin07t:652_8: akusalato codanato vā muccitukāmo lesena kālādiniyamaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:652_9: tassa manussaviggahapārājikato pariyāyena amuccanato kālādivisaṅketepi kammabaddhovāti gahetvā vicāraṇato gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:653_0: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato “itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīgha”nti aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena
tika-vin07t:653_3: Ettha ca cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketoti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:653_4: Attānaṃ muñcitvā parapāṇimhi pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:653_5: Attānaṃ uddissa “asukaṭṭhāne nisinna”nti okāsaniyame tasmiṃ padese nisinnassa yassa kassaci jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin07t:653_6: ārabbha vadhakacittaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “neva vadhako muccati na āṇāpako”ti.
tika-vin07t:653_7: Okāsañhi niyametvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ māretukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t:653_9: tasmā okāsena saha tattha nisinnasseva jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:653_11: Sace pana sayaṃ tattheva nisīditvā attano nisinnaṭṭhānameva niyametvā “mārehī”ti vuttepi añño tattha nisinno māriyati,
tika-vin07t:653_12: tassāpi attanopi jīvitaṃ ārabbha vadhakacetanā pavattati,
tika-vin07t:653_13: parasmiṃ tattha mārite āṇāpakassa kammabaddhoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:653_15: na aññesaṃ visayoti āha “tasmā ettha na anādariyaṃ kātabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:654_0: Evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭanti sace āṇattiko yathādhippāyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin07t:654_10: idañca yathāṇattivasena saṅgharakkhitassa jīvitā voropane asati yujjati,
tika-vin07t:654_16: tadā ācariyassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva thullaccayaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:655_3: evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena atthe satīti attho.
tika-vin07t:655_4: Paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyāti vadhakassa “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭāpatti neva siyā,
tika-vin07t:655_6: kimaṅgaṃ pana maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti dassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādi nidassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:655_7: “Aho vata itthannāmo hato assā”ti evaṃ maraṇābhinandanadassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādibhinandane
tika-vin07t:655_8: dukkaṭe sati pageva “ahaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:655_9: Paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭanti avadhāraṇena saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā mūlaṭṭhassa nattheva āpattīti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:655_12: taṃ na yuttaṃ ekena payogena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ asambhavā.
tika-vin07t:655_15: Okāsābhāvenāti mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayassa vuccamānattā paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ okāsābhāvena,
tika-vin07t:656_2: Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti “yo koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ māretū”ti iminā adhippāyena avatvā kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t:656_3: maraṇābhinandanavaseneva vuttattā corāpi nāma taṃ na hanantītiādivācāyapi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:656_6: Ubho uddissa maraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentassa payogasamuṭṭhāpikāya cetanāya ekattepi “dve pāṇātipātā”ti vattabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:656_9: Tattakā pāṇātipātāti yattakā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sutvā marissanti,
tika-vin07t:656_10: tattakānampi vattamānaṃ anāgatañca jīvitindriyaṃ sabbaṃ ālambitvāva cetanāya pavattanato tattakā pāṇātipātā honti,
tika-vin07t:656_11: tattakāhi cetanāhi dātabbaṃ pavattivipākaṃ ekāva sā cetanā dātuṃ sakkotīti attho,
tika-vin07t:656_12: paṭisandhivipākaṃ pana sayañca pubbāparacetanā ca ekekameva dātuṃ sakkotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:657_2: idañca bhikkhuno rūpiyamūlassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:657_5: mūlaṃ pana aggahetvāpi potthakassa potthakasāmino santakattāpādanamevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:657_6: Lekhādassanakotūhalakāti sundarakkharaṃ disvā vā “kīdisaṃ nu kho potthaka”nti vā oloketukāmā.
tika-vin07t:658_1: Opātakhaṇanatthaṃ pana kudālādiatthāya ayobījasamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ akappiyapathaviṃ vā kudāladaṇḍādīnaṃ atthāya bhūtagāmaṃ vikopentassa pācittiyameva.
tika-vin07t:658_2: Pāṇātipātapayogattābhāvā adinnādānapubbapayaoge viya dutiyapariyesanādīsupi ettha dukkaṭaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:658_7: Ettakaṃ alanti niṭṭhāpetukāmatāya sabbantimapayaogasādhikā cetanā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā,
tika-vin07t:658_8: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ekasmiṃ divase avūpasanteneva payogena khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:658_9: itarāsu pana aṭṭhakathāsu “imasmiṃ patitvā marantū”ti adhippāyena ekasmiṃ divase kiñci khaṇitvā aparasmimpi
tika-vin07t:658_10: divase tato kiñci kiñci khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya vuttanti evaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ aññamaññavirodho ñātabbo.
tika-vin07t:658_13: Arahantāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti aññehi pātiyamānānaṃ amaritukāmānampi arahantānaṃ maraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:658_15: Visaṅketoti maritukāmānaṃ māretukāmānañca uddissa khatattā amaritukāmānaṃ maraṇe kammabaddho natthīti attho.
tika-vin07t:659_0: Tattha patitaṃ bahi nīharitvāti idaṃ tattha patanapaccayā maraṇassa pavattattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_1: Āvāṭe patitvā thokaṃ cirāyitvā gacchantaṃ gahetvā mārite tattha patitarogena pīḷitassa gacchato pakkhalitvā
tika-vin07t:659_2: pāsāṇādīsu patanenāpi maraṇepi opātakhaṇako na muccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_3: Amaritukāmā vāti adhippāyassa sambhavato opapātike uttarituṃ asakkuṇitvā matepi pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_6: Yasmā mātuyā patitvā parivattitaliṅgāya matāya so mātughātako hoti,
tika-vin07t:659_8: tasmā patitasseva vasena āpattīti adhippāyena “patanarūpaṃ pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:659_9: idaṃ pana akāraṇaṃ “liṅge parivattepi ekasantānattassa avigatattā.
tika-vin07t:659_10: Manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa kammaṃ ānantariya”nti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_16: evaṃ sante pāḷiyaṃ “yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ patati,
tika-vin07t:659_22: “Yakkho vā peto vā”ti hi paṭhamaṃ sakarūpaṃ dassetvā rūpantaraṃ gahetvāpi ṭhiteyeva yakkhapete dassetuṃ “tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_23: Tasmā tiracchānagataviggaho manussaviggaho vā yakkho vā peto vāti evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t:659_24: Keci pana “manussaviggahena ṭhitatiracchānagatānaṃ āveṇikaṃ katvā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:659_25: taṃ na yuttaṃ tiracchāno vā manussaviggahoti vattabbato,
tika-vin07t:659_27: Yakkhapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti iminā maraṇarūpasseva pamāṇattā thullaccayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t:660_1: So niddosoti tena tattha katapayogassa abhāvato,
tika-vin07t:660_2: yadi pana sopi tattha kiñci karoti,
tika-vin07t:660_3: na muccati evāti dassento evaṃ patitātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:660_4: Tattha evanti evaṃ mayā kateti attho.
tika-vin07t:660_7: Suuddharā vā bhavissantīti idaṃ gambhīrassa opātassa pūraṇe payojanadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:660_8: Uttāne kate opāte sīghaṃ amhehi gahetvā māretuṃ suuddharā bhavissantīti adhippāyo.
