tika-vin07t:880_19: na pana kusalādiparamattharūpānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ khaṇikatāya sayameva samathappattitoti heṭṭhā samatthitamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:881_0: Anuvādoti vipattīhi upavadanā ceva codanā ca.
tika-vin07t:882_2: Diṭṭhamūlake panāti “diṭṭhassa hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto”tiādi pāḷivāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:882_3: Tattha itthiyā saddhiṃ rahonisajjādidassanamattavasena pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto puggalo tena diṭṭho,
tika-vin07t:882_5: Yadi hi tena so tathā diṭṭho bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:882_7: asuddhasaññāya ca suddhaṃ vā asuddhaṃ vā codentassa saṅghādiseso na siyā “anāpatti suddhe asuddhadiṭṭhissa,
tika-vin07t:882_9: Tasmā itthiyā saddhiṃ rahonisajjādimattameva disvāpi “saddho kulaputto,
tika-vin07t:882_10: nāyaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjatī”ti tasmiṃ suddhasaññissa vā vematikassa vā “suto mayā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:882_13: tassa pana diṭṭhaṃ sutanti musāvādādipaccayā lahukāpatti evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:882_14: Yadi pana so tasmiṃ suddhadiṭṭhicāvanādhippāyopi diṭṭhaṃ rahonisajjādimattameva vadati,
tika-vin07t:882_15: adiṭṭhaṃ pana maggenamaggappaṭipādanādipārājikavatthuṃ vā “assamaṇosī”tiādikaṃ vā na vadati,
tika-vin07t:882_17: Adhikaṃ vadantassa pana āpattiyeva “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭha”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:882_18: Yo pana diṭṭhena rahonisajjādinā paṭhamapārājikena asuddhasaññī hutvā cāvanādhippāyo adinnādānaṃ ajjhāpajjanto “diṭṭho”ti vā “suto”ti vā ādiṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t:882_19: tassāpi na saṅghādiseso asuddhe asuddhadiṭṭhitāyāti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t:882_23: Tathā hi vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yena pārājikena codeti,
tika-vin07t:883_7: No kappetītiādi vematikabhāvadīpanatthameva vuttanti mahāpadumattherassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:884_2: Tajjanīyādikammaṃ karissāmītiāpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo kammādhippāyo nāma.
tika-vin07t:884_3: Parivāsadānādikkamena āpattito vuṭṭhāpetuṃ āpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo vuṭṭhānādhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:884_5: pavāraṇaṃ vā saṅghe kātuṃ adānatthāya āpattiyā codayato adhippāyo uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanādhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:885_1: Uposathapavāraṇānaṃ ñattikammabhāvato ñattiyā vattamānāya eva uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:885_4: kāre patte niṭṭhitā nāma hotīti āha “yya-
tika-vin07t:886_0: Anupāsakoti upāsakopi so bhikkhu na hoti saraṇagamanassāpi paṭippassaddhattāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:886_1: “Anodissa dhammaṃ kathentassā”ti iminā odissa kathentena okāsaṃ kāretabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:886_8: cāvanādhippāyena “tvaṃ pārājiko”tiādinā niyametvā sammukhā codanā codāpanā,
tika-vin07t:889_1: Navame mettiyaṃ bhikkhuninti liṅganāsanāya nāsitāyapi tassā bhūtapubbavohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:889_2: Aññabhāgassāti therassa manussajātibhikkhubhāvato aññassa tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhātassa koṭṭhāsassa.
tika-vin07t:889_9: Idāni dvīhipi viggahehi vuttamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yo hi so”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:889_10: Tattha yo hi so chagalako vutto,
tika-vin07t:889_11: so aññassa bhāgassa hotīti ca aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ labhatīti ca yojanā.
tika-vin07t:889_13: Adhikaraṇanti veditabboti etthāpi yo hi so “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto,
tika-vin07t:889_15: Tañhi sandhāyāti “dabbo”ti nāmakaraṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t:890_2: codanā vuttāti “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti,
tika-vin07t:890_3: tañce pārājikena codetī”tiādiṃ codanābhedaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:890_5: rāgadosattādisabhāvato ca visabhāgatāpi atthīti āha “yasmā pana…pe…
tika-vin07t:891_2: taṃmanasikāro ca avipannakammassa nimittato phalūpacārena kammanti vuccatīti āha “taṃ nissāya uppajjanato”ti.
tika-vin07t:891_3: Parivāsādiṃ nissāya mānattādīnaṃ uppajjanato “purimaṃ purima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:893_1: Evaṃ tathāsaññīti aññassa methunādikiriyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ so”ti evaṃ tathāsaññī.
tika-vin07t:893_3: idha pana kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanā adhikā.
tika-vin07t:896_1: Dasame bahūnanti dubbalatāya araññādisevāya cittaṃ samāhitaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:896_2: Dukkhassantakiriyāya tasmiṃ attabhāve buddhavacanaggahaṇadhāraṇādisaṅkhātaṃ byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assa,
tika-vin07t:896_9: idameva vacanaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyampi “aṭṭha māse”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:897_1: Ettha ca bhikkhūnaṃ catūsu kulesu pakkapiṇḍiyālopabhojananissitatāya,
tika-vin07t:897_2: macchamaṃsabhojanavirahitassa ca kulassa dullabhatāya tattha laddhesu bhattabyañjanesu macchamaṃsasaṃsaggasaṅkāya,
tika-vin07t:897_3: dunnivāraṇatāya ca bhikkhūnaṃ sarīrayāpanampi na siyāti bhagavatā macchamaṃsaṃ sabbathā appaṭikkhipitvā tīhi koṭīhi aparisuddhameva paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin07t:897_4: Yadi hi taṃ bhagavā sabbathā paṭikkhipeyya,
tika-vin07t:897_5: bhikkhū maramānāpi macchādisaṃsaggasaṅkitaṃ bhattaṃ na bhuñjeyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:897_6: tato taṇḍuladhaññādiṃ paṭiggahetvā nidahitvā sayaṃ pacitvā bhuñjituṃ tadupakaraṇabhūtaṃ dāsidāsaṃ,
tika-vin07t:897_7: udukkhalamusalādikañca bhikkhūnaṃ pattādi viya avassaṃ gahetuṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyāti titthiyānaṃ viya gahaṭṭhāvāso eva siyā,
tika-vin07t:897_11: Kappatīti yadi tesaṃ vacanena saṅkā na vattati, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:897_12: na taṃ vacanaṃ lesakappaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:898_1: Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya akatanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva- saddo,
tika-vin07t:898_3: tasmā bhikkhūnañca maṅgalādīnañcāti missetvā katampi na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:898_4: Keci pana yathāṭhitavasena avadhāraṇaṃ gahetvā “vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:899_3: tato vīsatimo bhāgo saṅghabhedakassa āyukappanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:899_4: taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu kappaṭṭhakathāya na sameti “kappavināse eva muccatī”tiādi vacanato.
tika-vin07t:899_6: Kappaṃ saggamhīti ettha paṭisandhiparamparāya kappaṭṭhatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:900_3: “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhanato pubbepi
tika-vin07t:900_4: pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:901_2: Vohārenāti tāhi tāhi upapattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādinā vohārena,
tika-vin07t:901_4: Anusāvanāyāti attano laddhiyā gahaṇatthameva anu punappunaṃ kaṇṇamūle mantasāvanāya,
tika-vin07t:901_6: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anusāvanāya tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā attano pakkhe paviṭṭhabhāvassa saññāṇatthaṃ “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
tika-vin07t:902_0: “Lajjī rakkhissatī”ti vacanato āpattibhayena ārocanaṃ lajjīnaṃ eva bhāroti āha “lajjīhi bhikkhūhī”ti,
tika-vin07t:902_2: Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:902_5: Āpatti pana aḍḍhayojanabbhantareneva agilānassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:903_3: Apaññatte sikkhāpade samanubhāsanakammasseva abhāvato “na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:903_10: Āpattiyeva na jātāti saṅghādisesāpatti na jātā eva.
tika-vin07t:904_2: Yo visaññī vā bhīto vā vikkhitto vā “paṭinissajjitabba”ntipi,
tika-vin07t:904_8: na paṭinissajjāmīti cittena appaṭinissajjananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:907_1: Ekādasame yasmā ubbāhikādisammutikammaṃ bahūnampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:907_2: tasmā “na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:907_3: Aṅgāni panettha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ pahāya anuvattanaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā vuttasadisāneva gahetabbāni.
tika-vin07t:910_3: tassa ca visesanassa paranipātoti āha “tattha tattha patitaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t:911_3: Codakaṃ paṭippharaṇatāti codakassa paṭiviruddho hutvā avaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:911_8: Na sampāyanatāti “yaṃ tvaṃ codako vadesi ‘mayā esa āpattiṃ āpanno diṭṭho’ti,
tika-vin07t:911_12: kattha aya”ntiādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭhena sampādetvā akathanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:912_0: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti iminā nidānavacanena sabbāpi āpattiyo saṅgahitāti āha “yassa siyā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:912_2: ayaṃ pana viseso yathā tattha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:915_2: Tañhi sandhāya parato “na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:915_5: Tena pana yogato janapadopi “kīṭāgiri”icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti āha “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti.
tika-vin07t:917_1: tañca “ārāmādiatthāya rukkharopane akappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi vaṭṭatī”ti vakkhamānattā
tika-vin07t:917_2: idhāpi vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:917_7: Akappiyavohārepi ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:917_8: Yaṃkiñci mātikanti sukkhaṃ vā asukkhaṃ vā.
tika-vin07t:917_11: Iminā ca kulasaṅgahatthāya ganthāpanādipi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:918_0: Vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codento “nanu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:918_1: Yathā ārāmādiatthaṃ kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:918_2: tathā vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:918_5: Mahāpaccariādīsu vuttampi hi pamāṇamevāti nāyaṃ virodho,
tika-vin07t:918_6: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttassa sayaṃ ropanassa tattheva vuttena udakasiñcanena saha saṃsandananayadassanamukhena pamāṇamevāti patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:918_9: kiñcāpi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sayaṃ ropanaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:918_11: tasmā yathā ārāmādiatthāya kappiyaudakaṃ sayaṃ siñcitumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:918_12: tathā vatthupūjanatthāya ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin07t:918_13: Tampi na virujjhatīti yadetaṃ vatthupūjanatthāyapi ganthanādiṃ paṭikkhipitvā ārāmādiatthāya sayaṃ ropanasiñcanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:918_14: tampi pāḷiyā saṃsandanato pubbāparaṃ na virujjhati.
tika-vin07t:919_0: Taṃ kathaṃ na virujjhatīti āha “tatra hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:919_2: Pupphādīhi kulasaṅgahappasaṅge “mālāvaccha”nti visesitattā kulasaṅgahatthameva ropanaṃ adhippetanti viññāyatīti āha “mālāvacchanti vadanto”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:919_5: Aññatra panāti ārāmādiatthāya mālāvacchādīnaṃ ropane pana.
tika-vin07t:919_6: Pariyāyoti sayaṃkaraṇakārāpanasaṅkhāto pariyāyo vohāro atthavisesoti attho atthi upalabbhati,
tika-vin07t:919_8: Evamettha pariyāyasaddassa karaṇakārāpanavasena atthe gayhamāne “ganthentipi ganthāpentipī”ti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:919_13: Tattha pariyāyaṃ idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvāti tattha “mālāvacchaṃ ropentī”tiādīsu “mālāvaccha”nti kulasaṅgahatthatāsūcanakassa
tika-vin07t:919_15: Idha “ganthentī”tiādīsu tathāvidhavisesavacanābhāvato tassa pariyāyassa abhāvañca ñatvā.
tika-vin07t:920_0: Sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayeneva ropanādi,
tika-vin07t:921_1: Kulitthiādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇatoti kulitthiādīnaṃ haraṇasseva visesetvā paṭikkhittattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:921_6: Kaṇṇikāti bahūnaṃ pupphānaṃ vā mālānaṃ vā ekato bandhitassa nāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t:922_3: kappiyavohārena vā akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:922_7: kāyapayogassa kārāpane ca vacīpayogassa ca bahuttena.
tika-vin07t:924_0: Nīpapupphaṃ nāma kadambapupphaṃ. Purimanayenevāti “bhikkhussa vā”tiādinā vuttanayena.
tika-vin07t:925_0: Kadalikkhandhamhītiādinā vuttaṃ sabbameva sandhāya “taṃ atioḷārikamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:925_3: “Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakaṃ bandhitumpi na vaṭṭatī”ti imassa upalakkhaṇattā pupphadāmolambanādiatthāya rajjubandhanādipi na vaṭṭatīti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:925_4: aññe pana “pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakanti visesitattā tadatthaṃ kaṇṭakameva bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:925_11: Dhammarajju nāma cetiyādīni parikkhipitvā tesañca rajjuyā ca antarā pupphappavesanatthāya bandharajju.
tika-vin07t:925_12: “Sithilavaṭṭitā vā rajjuvaṭṭiantare pupphappavesanatthāya evaṃ bandhā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t:926_2: Vākena vā daṇḍakena vāti pupphanāḷaṃ phāletvā pupphena ekābaddhaṃ ṭhitavākena,
tika-vin07t:926_4: etena pupphaṃ bījagāme saṅgahaṃ na gacchati pañcasu bījesu appaviṭṭhattā paṇṇaṃ viya,
tika-vin07t:926_5: tasmā kappiyaṃ akārāpetvāpi kopane doso natthi.
tika-vin07t:926_7: tampi atitaruṇassa abhāvā vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:926_8: pariṇatassa pana makuḷassa pattānaṃ sinehe pariyādānaṃ gate visuṃbhāvo eva vikāso,
tika-vin07t:926_12: tampi tambulapaṇṇādīsu samānanti vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:926_13: pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu ca na katthaci pupphānaṃ kappiyakaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin07t:926_16: “Pasibbake viyā”ti vuttattā pupphapasibbake vā pasibbakasadisabandhe vā yattha katthaci cīvare vā pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:926_17: Bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti rajjuādīhi bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:926_18: pupphasseva pana acchinnadaṇḍavākehi bandhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:927_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:927_1: tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:927_3: “Purimaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmetī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā purimaṃ pupphakoṭiṃ phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā parikkhipanavasena pana atikkamantassa āpattiyeva.
tika-vin07t:927_4: Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya suttavākakoṭiyā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:927_5: “Ekavāraṃ haritvā vā parikkhipitvā vā”ti idaṃ pubbe vuttacetiyādiparikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin07t:928_3: Pupphāni ṭhapentenāti aganthitapupphāni aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvāpi ṭhapentena.
tika-vin07t:929_3: Ākāseyeva kīḷantīti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ mayā nītā”ti evaṃ mukheneva ubhopi vadantā kīḷanti.
tika-vin07t:929_5: Pāsakakīḷāyāti dvinnaṃ tivaṅgulappamāṇānaṃ dārudantādimayānaṃ pāsakānaṃ catūsu passesu ekakādivasena
tika-vin07t:929_6: bindūni katvā phalake khipitvā uparibhāge diṭṭhabindūnaṃ vasena sāriyo apanetvā kīḷanakajūtakīḷāya.
tika-vin07t:930_5: Apphoṭentīti dviguṇitavāmahatthe dakkhiṇahatthena tāḷetvā saddaṃ karonti.
tika-vin07t:932_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “sāriputtā”ti idaṃ ekasesanayena sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ ubhinnaṃ ālapanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:933_1: Aṭṭhārasa vattānīti “na upasampādetabba”ntiādīni “na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabba”nti pariyosānāni kammakkhandhake āgatāni aṭṭhārasa vattāni.
tika-vin07t:934_1: Parasantakaṃ deti dukkaṭamevāti vissāsagāhena dānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:935_0: Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi pupphaṃ dentena vatthupūjanatthāyeva dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:935_1: Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyāti ettakameva vuttattā “imaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvissantī”ti mātāpitūnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:936_2: Tattha tatthāti magge vā cetiyaṅgaṇe vā.
tika-vin07t:936_3: “Sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ na labhantī”ti idaṃ sāmaṇerehi gihīnaṃ kammaṃ kāritaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:936_4: na pana pupphadānaṃ hotīti sāmaṇerānampi na vaṭṭanato.
tika-vin07t:936_6: “Avisesena vutta”nti iminā sabbesampi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:937_1: Paricchinnesupi rukkhesu “idha phalāni sundarānī”tiādiṃ vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:938_2: Vuttanayenāti paṇṇadānampi pupphaphalādīsu vuttanayena kulasaṅgaho hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:939_0: Pubbe vuttappakāranti mama vacanena bhagavato pāde vandathātiādinā vuttappakārasikkhāpade paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:939_3: Ettha ca assajipunabbasukehi ācariyesu anekavidhesu anācāresu paññapetabbā āpattiyo sikkhāpadantaresu
tika-vin07t:939_4: paññattā evāti tā idha apaññapetvā kuladūsakānaṃ pabbājanīyakammavasena niggahaṃ kātuṃ tattheva sammā
tika-vin07t:939_5: avattitvā kārakasaṅghaṃ chandagāmitādīhi pāpentānaṃ samanubhāsanāya saṅghādisesaṃ āropitañca idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin07t:939_7: Paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisānevāti ettha aṅgesupi yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:942_2: Yo hi jaro ekasmiṃ divase āgantvāpi gato anantaresu dvīsu divasesu anuppajjitvā tatiye divase uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:942_4: Yo pana tatiyepi anuppajjitvā catutthe eva divase uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:942_7: “Akāmena avasenā”ti iminā appaṭikammakaraṇaṃ nāma yasmā alajjilakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:942_9: tasmā āpanno puggalo “pacchā parivasissāmī”ti vikkhipituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin07t:942_10: saṅghena ca anicchantasseva parivāso dātabboti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:942_13: so bhikkhu abbhetabboti evaṃ bhikkhusaddadvayassa yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:942_14: Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā abbhenti,
tika-vin07t:947_2: ekasesanayena vā puttīpi gahitāti āha “bahū dhītaro cā”ti.
tika-vin07t:948_3: upari sikkhāpade “na heva kho pana paṭicchanna”ntiādinā etassa sikkhāpadassa visayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “alañca
tika-vin07t:948_4: kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsitu”nti visayantarabhūtasotarahassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā,
tika-vin07t:948_6: “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vuttattā ca.
tika-vin07t:949_0: Idāni cakkhuraheneva āpattiṃ paricchinditvā dassento “sacepi hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:949_5: Na hi kavāṭapidahanena sotassa raho vigacchati,
tika-vin07t:949_7: “Antodvādasahatthepī”ti idaṃ dutiyasikkhāpade āgatasotassa rahena āpajjitabbaduṭṭhullavācāpattiyā sabbathā anāpattibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:949_8: Dvādasahatthato bahi nisinno hi tattha sotassa rahasabbhāvato duṭṭhullavācāpattiyā anāpattiṃ na karoti,
tika-vin07t:949_9: tathā ca “anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti sāmaññato na vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:949_11: Tasmā tathā taṃ avatvā sabbathā anāpattiṃ dassetumeva “dvādasahatthe”ti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:949_12: Yadi hi cakkhusseva rahabhāvaṃ sandhāya vadeyya,
tika-vin07t:949_13: “antodvādasahatthe”ti na vadeyya appaṭicchanne tato dūre nisinnepi cakkhussa rahāsambhavato.
tika-vin07t:949_14: Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto kiñci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti,
tika-vin07t:950_1: Nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānoti methunakāyasaṃsaggādivasena raho nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānoti attho.
tika-vin07t:950_3: Na appaṭijānamānoti alajjīpi appaṭijānamāno āpattiyā na kāretabbova.
tika-vin07t:950_4: So hi yāva dosaṃ na paṭijānāti,
tika-vin07t:951_0: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin07t:953_1: paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabboti ettha paṭijānamānoti pāḷiyaṃ anāgatampi adhikārato āgatamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:954_0: Vadāpethāti tassa iddhiyā vigatāsaṅkopi taṃ ovadanto āha,
tika-vin07t:954_1: anupaparikkhitvā adese nisinnā “mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekāsane thero raho nisinno”ti evaṃ mādisehipi tumhe tumhākaṃ avaṇṇaṃ vadāpetha kathāpayittha,
tika-vin07t:954_3: Evamakāsinti nigūhitabbampi imaṃ visesādhigamaṃ pakāsento taṃ saddhāpetumeva evamakāsinti attho.
tika-vin07t:954_4: Rakkheyyāsimanti imaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ aññesaṃ mā pakāsayi.
tika-vin07t:955_2: Sace pana so rahonisajjassādaṃ paṭivinodetvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārādinā aññavihito,
tika-vin07t:955_8: Itarathā āpatti eva itthiyā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdane viya,
tika-vin07t:955_12: anantarañcāti dvepi visuṃ āpattipaññāpanavasena paññattāni na honti rahonisajjādīsu āpattiyā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattattā.
tika-vin07t:955_13: Pārājikādiāpattīhi pana kenaci coditassa anuvijjakehi vinicchayakāraṇanayadassanatthaṃ evaṃ vatthuvasena dvidhā vibhajitvā paññattāni,
tika-vin07t:955_14: imāneva ca yasmā bhikkhunīnampi vinicchayanayaggahaṇāya alaṃ,
tika-vin07t:955_15: tasmā tāsaṃ visuṃ na vuttānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:956_0: Idha aniyatavasena vuttānaṃ pārājikasaṅghādisesapācittiyānaṃ tiṇṇampi aññamaññaṃ sadisasamuṭṭhānāditāya
tika-vin07t:959_2: nisajjaṃ kappetu”nti avatvā “paṭikkhittaṃ mātugāmenā”tiādinā vuttattā “eko”ti paccattapadaṃ paṭikkhittapadena na sameti,
tika-vin07t:960_5: Kasmā pana itthī idheva anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:960_7: Imassa sikkhāpadassa methunaṃ vinā duṭṭhullavācāya vasena āgatattā.
tika-vin07t:960_8: Methunameva hi itthiyo aññamaññaṃ paṭicchādenti mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā niddūpagatamhi bhikkhumhi viya.
tika-vin07t:961_0: Kāyenāpi duṭṭhullobhāsasambhavato imasmiṃ sikkhāpade cakkhussa raho,
tika-vin07t:961_1: sotassa raho ca adhippetoti āha “anandho abadhiro”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:961_2: Keci pana vibhaṅge “nālaṃ kammaniyanti na sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu’nti ettakameva vatvā
tika-vin07t:961_3: ‘na sakkā hoti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitu’nti avuttattā appaṭicchannepi ṭhāne raho aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ disvā
tika-vin07t:961_4: ekāya itthiyā kāyasaṃsaggopi sakkā āpajjitunti antodvādasahatthe savanūpacāre ṭhito abadhiropi andho
tika-vin07t:961_5: kāyasaṃsaggassāpi sabbhāvābhāvaṃ na jānātīti kāyena duṭṭhullobhāsanasabbhāvaṃ amanasikatvāpi kāyasaṃsaggāpattiyāpi
tika-vin07t:961_7: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:961_8: taṃ pana kāyena duṭṭhullobhāsanasambhavaṃ amanasikatvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:961_10: Teneva “imasmiṃ sikkhāpade sotassa raho eva adhippeto…pe…
tika-vin07t:961_11: kenaci pana ‘dvepi rahā idha adhippetā’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:961_13: Yaṃ pana cakkhussa rahābhāvasādhanatthaṃ “na hi appaṭicchanne okāse cakkhussa raho sambhavatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:961_14: taṃ na yuttaṃ atidūratare ṭhitassa kāyena obhāsanampi hatthaggāhādīnipi sallakkhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-vin07t:961_18: atha kho “anandho badhiroti ca andho vā abadhiropi na karotī”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:961_20: “Antodvādasahatthe”tiiminā sotassa raho dvādasahatthena paricchinnoti idaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:961_21: Cakkhussa raho pana yattha ṭhitassa kāyavikārādayo na paññāyanti,
tika-vin07t:961_23: Badhiro pana cakkhumāpīti duṭṭhullavācāsaṅghādisesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:961_24: Duṭṭhullāpatti vuttāti purimasikkhāpade vuttehi adhikavasena duṭṭhullāpatti ca vuttāti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t:961_25: na pana duṭṭhullāpatti evāti kāyasaṃsaggassāpi idha gahetabbato.
tika-vin07t:962_0: Tisamuṭṭhānantiādi pana purimasikkhāpade āgatehi adhikassa duṭṭhullavācāsaṅghādisesassa vasena vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:968_2: Gotamakacetiyaṃ nāma gotamayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati.
tika-vin07t:969_1: Navamaṃ vā dasamaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:969_2: Sace bhaveyyāti sace kassaci kaṅkhā bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t:970_8: ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti dvīhi padehi dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ abhāvadassanena atthatakathinassa pañcamāsabbhantare
tika-vin07t:971_3: dasāhaparamabhāvoti idañhi vuttaṃ hotīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:971_5: Tattha ettako kāloti “dasāhaparamatā”ti vutto yo kālo,
tika-vin07t:972_8: Dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaññeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:972_13: Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin07t:972_16: devadinnañca khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anulomāni.
tika-vin07t:972_18: Iminā dīghato vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇaṃ vitthārato tato upaḍḍhappamāṇaṃ vikappanupaganti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:972_19: Tathā hi “sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo,
tika-vin07t:972_20: vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hattho hotī”ti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:972_21: tasmā sugataṅgulena dvādasaṅgulā sugatavidatthi vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hatthoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:972_22: Evañca katvā “sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhānehi ca sameti.
tika-vin07t:973_2: Tassa yo aruṇoti cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo.
tika-vin07t:973_3: Cīvaruppādadivasena saddhinti cīvaruppādadivasassa ādibhūtena atikkantaaruṇena saddhinti attho,
tika-vin07t:973_4: idañca bhagavatā “dasāhaparama”nti vatvā puna “ekādase aruṇuggamane”ti vuttattā pubbāparasaṃsandanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:973_6: “Dasame aruṇe”ti vutte eva hi dasāhaparamena saddhiṃ sameti.
tika-vin07t:973_7: Divasapariyosānassa avadhibhūtaanāgatāruṇavasena hi divasaṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:973_8: na pana divasassa ādibhūtāruṇavasena parivāsādīsu tathā aggahaṇato,
tika-vin07t:973_9: idha pana bhagavatā divasassa ādiantaparicchedadassanavasena “ekādase aruṇuggamane”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:973_10: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ divasassa ādibhūtaṃ taṃdivasanissitampi aruṇaṃ gahetvā “ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:973_11: Aruṇoti cettha sūriyuggamanassa purecaro vaḍḍhanaghanaratto pabhāvisesoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:974_0: Vacanīyoti saṅghāpekkho. Vacanabhedoti “ñattiyaṃ dve āpattiyo saratī”tiādinā vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:975_1: “Na idha saññā rakkhatī”ti idaṃ vematikañca anatikkantasaññañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:976_0: Anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvātiādi nisīdanasanthataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:976_1: Yena hi purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ anādiyitvā navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:976_2: tassa taṃ nissaggiyampi tato aññassa paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjantassa anāpattikaranti sijjhanato ayamattho sabbanissaggiyesupi sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:977_4: Tassa tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhitaticīvare viya avippavāsādinā kattabbavidhi na kātabboti dasseti,
tika-vin07t:977_6: Tato paranti catumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjituṃ anuññātanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:977_10: tathā vikappitaṃ parikkhārādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:978_1: catuhatthe minitvā pañcamaṃ hatthaṃ muṭṭhiṃ katvā minitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:978_3: tasmā pañcapi hatthe muṭṭhiṃ katvāva minitabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:978_5: Dvihatthena antaravāsakena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ sakkāti āha “pārupanenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:978_8: tena ca tesu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:979_0: Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmīti imaṃ saṅghāṭiadhiṭṭhānaṃ ukkhipāmi pariccajāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:979_3: Vācāya adhiṭṭhātabbāti ettha kāyenapi cāletvā vācampi bhinditvā kāyavācāhi adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ “kāyena aphusitvā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:979_9: Tato dūre ṭhitampi ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhentena adhiṭṭhātabbameva.
tika-vin07t:979_11: Na hi sakkā sabbathā ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:979_12: Ekasmiṃ vihāre ṭhapetvā tato aññasmiṃ ṭhapitanti adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:979_13: Keci pana “tathāpi adhiṭṭhite na doso”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:979_18: Etena ca tecīvaradhutaṅgaṃ pariharantena paṃsukūlādivasena laddhaṃ vatthaṃ dasāhabbhantare katvā rajitvā
tika-vin07t:979_19: pārupituṃ asakkontena parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvāva dasāhaṃ atikkametabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:979_21: Teneva “rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:979_23: “Puna adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti idañca saṅghāṭiāditicīvaranāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:980_0: Baddhasīmāyaṃ avippavāsasīmāsammutisambhavato na tattha dupparihāratāti āha “abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin07t:981_1: Tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti vassikamāsato paraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā,
tika-vin07t:981_2: iminā catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ upari adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti viññāyati tato paccuddharāyogā.
tika-vin07t:981_7: no gimhe”ti ettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati,
tika-vin07t:981_8: kurundiyaṃ pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:981_10: ‘catumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu’nti hi vutta”nti.
tika-vin07t:981_13: tasmā kurundiyaṃ vuttanayenāpi vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati.
tika-vin07t:981_14: Adhiṭṭhānavijahanesu ca vassānamāsaābādhānaṃ vigamena vijahanaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi na uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:981_15: tasmā samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatanayena yāva paccuddhārā adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:981_17: “Dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti iminā saṅghāṭiādīsu viya dutiye adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati,
tika-vin07t:981_19: Mahāpaccariyaṃ cīvaravasena paribhogakiccassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya anāpatti vuttā senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe viya.
tika-vin07t:981_21: taṃ senāsanatthāyevāti niyamitaṃ na hoti navasu cīvaresu gahitattā,
tika-vin07t:981_22: tasmā attano nāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā nidahitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ viya yathā tathā viniyujjitabbamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:981_23: Pāvāro kojavoti imesampi paccattharaṇādīnaṃ lokepi voharaṇato senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇato visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:982_0: “Hīnāyāvattanenā”ti idaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā bhikkhupaṭiññāya ṭhitassa ceva titthiyapakkantassa
tika-vin07t:982_1: ca bhikkhuniyā ca bhikkhunibhāve nirapekkhatāya gihiliṅgatitthiyaliṅgaggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:982_2: Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:982_6: Dve cīvarāni pārupantassāti gāmappavese diguṇaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:982_7: “Esa nayo”ti iminā pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatītiādiatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:983_0: Aññaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ nāma natthīti sutte āgataṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:984_0: Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha atimahantaṃ cīvaraṃ muṭṭhipañcakādipacchimappamāṇayuttaṃ katvā samantato
tika-vin07t:984_1: chindanenāpi vicchindanakāle chijjamānaṭṭhānaṃ chiddasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati evāti sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:984_4: Parikkhāracoḷaṃ pana vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇato ūnaṃ katvā chinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati adhiṭṭhānassa anissayattā.
tika-vin07t:984_5: Tāni puna baddhāni ghaṭitāni adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:984_6: Keci pana “vassikasāṭikacīvare dvidhā chinne yadipi ekekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pacchimapacchimappamāṇaṃ pahoti,
tika-vin07t:984_7: ekasmiṃyeva khaṇḍe adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhati, na itare,
tika-vin07t:985_2: tasmā “sammukhe”ti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvāpi atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:985_4: Atha vā sammukhena attano vācāya eva vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā.
tika-vin07t:985_5: Parammukhena vikappanā parammukhāvikappanāti karaṇatthenāpi attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:985_8: Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakeneva vikappanākiccassa niṭṭhitattā,
tika-vin07t:985_9: atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkame na nissaggiyaṃ janetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:985_11: na vaṭṭatīti sayaṃ apaccuddharaṇaṃ paribhuñjane pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:985_12: adhiṭṭhāne paresaṃ vissajjane dukkaṭañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:986_2: etena ca paccuddhārepi kate cīvarampi vikappitacīvarameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:986_8: paribhogakāle pana sampatte paccuddharāpetvā adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:986_10: paccuddhāreneva vikappanāya vigatattā atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:986_15: Yañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:986_19: vikappetī”ti ca “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya pācittiya”nti ca “anāpatti so vā deti,
tika-vin07t:986_20: tassa vā vissāsanto paribhuñjatī”ti ca sāmaññato vuttattā,
tika-vin07t:986_21: aṭṭhakathāyañca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ vā vikappanaṃ vā paccuddharāmī”tiādinā paccuddhāraṃ adassetvā “mayhaṃ santakaṃ
tika-vin07t:986_22: paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā”ti evaṃ attano santakattaṃ amocetvāva paribhogādivaseneva paccuddhārassa vuttattā,
tika-vin07t:986_23: “tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ vināpi visuṃ paribhogassa,
tika-vin07t:986_24: nidahanassa ca vuttattā vikappanānantarameva paccuddharāpetvā anadhiṭṭhahitvā eva ticīvaravirahitaṃ vikappanārahaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjituṃ,
tika-vin07t:986_27: paccuddhāretuñca vuttattā paccuddhārena tesaṃ atirekapattatā dassitāti sijjhati tesu ekasseva adhiṭṭhātabbato.
tika-vin07t:987_0: Paññattikovido na hotīti evaṃ vikappite “anantarameva evaṃ paccuddharitabba”nti vinayakammaṃ na jānāti.
tika-vin07t:988_1: Yaṃ panettha “viruddhaṃ viya dissatī”ti vatvā taṃ virodhāsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “ticīvarasaṅkhepena…pe…
tika-vin07t:988_3: taṃ “adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti sāmaññato vuttepi ticīvarampi vikappetīti ayamattho na sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:988_10: Tasmā ettha pubbāparavirodho na dissati sāmaññavacanassa vuttāvaseseyeva avatiṭṭhanato.
tika-vin07t:988_11: Yaṃ panettha ticīvarassāpi vikappanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:988_12: Tattha ticīvarasaṅkhepena parihariyamānesu ekampi paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:988_13: ticīvarato pana ekaṃ vā sakalameva vā apanetvā aparaṃ ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepena pariharitukāmassa
tika-vin07t:988_14: vā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā parikkhāracoḷavaseneva sabbacīvaraṃ paribhuñjitukāmassa vā purimaṃ adhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:988_15: paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evamadhippāyena “ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hotī”tiādi
tika-vin07t:988_18: Atha punapi tadeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātukāmo hutvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:988_19: taṃ “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti iminā vacanena na sameti.
tika-vin07t:988_20: Yadi hi sesacīvarāni viya ticīvarampi paccuddharitvā vikappetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:988_21: “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti idaṃ vacanameva niratthakaṃ siyā sesacīvarehi ticīvarassa visesābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:988_23: Ticīvaraṃ pana vikappetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:988_24: teneva dutiyakathinasikkhāpadassa anāpattivāre “vikappetī”ti idaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:988_25: vīmaṃsitvā yathā pāḷiyā saddhiṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin07t:989_0: Tuyhaṃ demītiādīsu pariccattattā manasā asampaṭicchantepi sampadānabhūtasseva santakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:989_3: Yassa pana ruccatītiādi ubhohipi pariccattatāya assāmikataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:990_0: “Taṃ na yujjatī”ti idaṃ antodasāhe eva vissāsaggahaṇaṃ sandhāya anāpattivārassa āgatattā,
tika-vin07t:990_1: idha nissaggiyacīvarassa kappiyabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ lesena gahitattā ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:990_3: vissāsaggahite ca puna laddhe doso na dissatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:994_1: Paṭisiddhapariyāpannenāti vippavasituṃ paṭisiddhesu tīsu cīvaresu antogadhena,
tika-vin07t:995_2: “Sabhāyeti liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā”ti vatvā puna sayampi “sabhāye”ti iminā voharanto sabhā-
tika-vin07t:995_6: Liṅgabyattayena sabhāti ca liṅgantarayutto sabhāsaddapariyāyo sabhāyasaddoti attho.
tika-vin07t:996_1: Vasitabbaṃ natthīti cīvarahatthapāseyeva vasitabbaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-vin07t:996_3: Sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hatthapāsā na vijahitabbanti ettha sabhāyadvārānamantare vīthi gehāpi gahitā eva honti ādipariyosānānaṃ gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:996_4: Ettha ca dvāravīthigharesu vasantena gāmappavesanasahaseyyādidosaṃ pariharitvā supaṭicchannatādiyutteneva bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:996_5: sabhā pana yadi sabbesaṃ vasanatthāya sālāsadisā katā,
tika-vin07t:996_6: antarārāme viya yathāsukhaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:996_9: Nivesanādīni bahigāmato sanniviṭṭhāni gahitāni antogāme ṭhitānaṃ gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:996_14: Ettha ca satthassa katipāhaṃ katthaci niviṭṭhasseva parikkhepo hoti,
tika-vin07t:997_1: Gāmato bahi issarānaṃ samuddatīrādīsu katabhaṇḍasālā udositoti āha “yānādīna”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t:998_2: Nadīparihāroti visuṃgāmādīnaṃ viya nadīparihārassa avuttattā cīvarahatthapāso evāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:998_3: aññe pana “iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena nadīparihāropi visuṃ siddho,
tika-vin07t:998_6: Ettha ca vihārassa nānākulasantakabhāvepi avippavāsasīmāparicchedabbhantare sabbattha cīvaraavippavāsasambhavato
tika-vin07t:998_7: tassā padhānattā tattha satthaparihāro na labbhatīti “vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:998_10: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāsā na vijahitabbanti ettha satthahatthapāso gahito.
tika-vin07t:1000_2: Tattha yasmiṃ vihāreti tassa antopariveṇādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1000_4: Chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassāti ujukaṃ avakkhittaleḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1001_0: Agamanapatheti tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyake samuddamajjhe ye dīpakā,
tika-vin07t:1001_4: vaḍḍhatī”ti iminā cīvaravippavāsasattabbhantarato samānasaṃvāsāya sattabbhantarasīmāya accantavisadisataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1001_5: Tathā hi bahūsu bhikkhūsu ekato nisīditvā samantā sattabbhantaraparicchedesu yathāsakaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin07t:1001_6: pariharantesu ekekassa bhikkhuno nisinnokāsato paṭṭhāya paccekaṃ sattabbhantarassa paricchedo aññamaññavisadiso
tika-vin07t:1001_12: Sā hi yojanikāyapi parisapariyantatova paṭṭhāya samantā sattabbhantarapaacchinnā ekāva hoti.
tika-vin07t:1001_15: tasmā aññāva sattabbhantarasīmā añño sattabbhantarato paricchinno cīvaravippavāsaparihāro abbhokāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1002_3: Vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti uttarāsaṅge ca bahigāme ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiyañca paṭhamaṃ vinayakammaṃ katvā pacchā uttarāsaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā antaravāsake kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1002_4: Ettha ca bahigāme ṭhapitassāpi vinayakammavacanato parammukhāpi ṭhitaṃ vissajjituṃ,
tika-vin07t:1002_6: Daharānaṃ gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1002_9: Tesaṃ pana purāruṇāva uṭṭhahitvā saussāhena gacchantānaṃ aruṇe antarā uṭṭhitepi na paṭippassambhati “yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1002_12: Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvātiādimhi saussāhattā gamanakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhi na vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1002_14: Nissayo ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha dhenubhayādīhi ṭhitānaṃ yāva bhayavūpasamā ṭhātabbato “antoaruṇeyeva gamissāmī”ti niyametuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1002_16: tattha antarāruṇe uggatepi nissayo na paṭippassambhati bhesajjatthāya gāmappaviṭṭhadaharānaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:1002_17: Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutito pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sammannitabbato.
tika-vin07t:1002_18: Paviṭṭhānanti ācariyantevāsikānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ gatānaṃ avippavāsasīmattā neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti,
tika-vin07t:1003_0: “Idha apaccuddharaṇa”nti iminā adhiṭṭhānavikappanāni viya paccuddharaṇampi kāyena vā vācāya vā kattabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1003_1: Kāyavācāhi kattabbassa akaraṇatoti idaṃ kāyavācāsamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1006_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ cīvarapaccāsā nikkhipitunti cīvarapaccāsāya satiyā nikkhipitunti attho.
tika-vin07t:1006_2: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti ettha dutiyakathine viya sāmivaseneva karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1007_3: etampi kāle ādissa dinnaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1007_5: pāḷiyaṃ “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti idañca “akālacīvara”nti vacanasāmaññato labbhamānaṃ sabbampi dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1007_6: atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ paṭhamaaniyate sotassa raho viya.
tika-vin07t:1007_7: Saṅghassa hi kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ akāle uppannacīvaraṃ viya sammukhībhūtehi vutthavassehi,
tika-vin07t:1007_8: avutthavassehi ca sabbehipi bhājetabbatāsāmaññena akālacīvaraṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ atthuddhāravasena pāḷiyaṃ “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_9: na pana “tato bhājetvā laddhacīvarampi akāle laddhacīvarampi vutthavassānaṃ ekamāsaparihāraṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_11: paccāsācīvare asati dasāhaparihārameva labhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_12: aṭṭhakathāyampi “ādissa dinna”nti vacanasāmaññato labbhamānaṃ sabbaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassetuṃ “ekapuggalassa
tika-vin07t:1007_13: vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammīti dinna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_14: na pana tathāladdhaṃ vā akāle laddhaṃ vā anatthatakathinānaṃ dasāhabbhantare adhiṭṭhātabbanti dassetunti
tika-vin07t:1007_16: Tathā hi accekacīvarasikkhāpade akāle uppannampi accekacīvaraṃ “yāvacīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_17: tassa aṭṭhakathāyañca “pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ uppannassa accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso,
tika-vin07t:1007_18: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā ca parihāro vutto,
tika-vin07t:1007_19: tameva parihāraṃ sandhāya ‘chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1007_20: Tasmā kālepi akālepi ca yathātathā laddhaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ vutthavassānaṃ ekamāsaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_21: pañcamāsaṃ vā yathārahaṃ parihāraṃ labhati evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1008_0: Evaṃ pana avatvā padabhājanaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:1008_1: Tattha evanti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tato ce uttarī”ti imassa māsaparamato uttarīti attho vutto,
tika-vin07t:1008_3: Padabhājaniyaṃ evamatthaṃ avatvā aññathā attho vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1008_6: Attano gatikaṃ karotīti anantarā dutiyadivasādīsu uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ māsaparamaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1008_7: adatvā attano dasāhaparamatāya eva patiṭṭhāpetīti attano gatikaṃ karotīti.
tika-vin07t:1008_8: Tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvaranti ettha pana mūlacīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1008_9: Tañhi vīsatimadivasato uddhaṃ dvāvīsatimadivasādīsu uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ attanā saddhiṃ ekato sibbetvā
tika-vin07t:1008_10: ghaṭitaṃ dasāhaparamaṃ gantuṃ adatvā navāhaparamatādivasena attano gatikaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:1008_11: ekato asibbetvā visuṃ ṭhapitaṃ pana paccāsācīvaraṃ dasāhaparamameva.
tika-vin07t:1009_4: navāhā kāretabbantiādi paccāsācīvarassa uppannadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1009_8: kāretabba”nti idaṃ satiyā eva paccāsāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1009_9: Sace pana “ito paṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ na labhissāmī”ti icchitaṭṭhānato paccāsāya upacchinnāya aññatthāpi yena kenaci upāyena paccāsaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin07t:1009_11: sabbathā paccāsāya upacchinnāya dasāhātikkantaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1009_12: Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbanti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ visabhāgaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1012_1: Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ bhattavissagganti bhattassa udare vissajjanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1012_4: Tattha nāma tvanti so nāma tvaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1012_7: pitūnaṃ pitā ca mātā ca pitāmahā,
tika-vin07t:1012_9: tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahāvaṭṭāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:1012_10: Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇena mātāmaho ca pitāmahī mātāmahī ca gahitāva honti.
tika-vin07t:1013_0: Payoge payoge bhikkhussa dukkaṭanti “dhovā”ti āṇāpanavācāya ekāya eva tadanuguṇassa sabbassāpi payogassa āṇattattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1014_1: Tadavinābhāvato dhovanassa “kāyavikāraṃ katvā”ti ca “antodvādasahatthe”ti ca vuttattā kāyena dhovāpetukāmataṃ
tika-vin07t:1014_2: appakāsetvā dānakhipanapesanādiṃ karontassa ca dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvā bahi ṭhatvā kāyavācāhi
tika-vin07t:1014_3: āṇāpetvā khipanapesanādiṃ karontassa ca anāpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1015_2: Bhikkhubhāvato parivattaliṅgāpi bhikkhunī bhikkhūnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannā eva.
tika-vin07t:1016_1: Tāvakālikaṃ gahetvāti attanā katipāhaṃ pārupanādiatthāya tāvakālikaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin07t:1016_4: tassā dhovāpanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1019_1: Pañcame apaññatte sikkhāpadeti gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade apaññatte.
tika-vin07t:1019_3: Hatthataleyeva dassetvāti hatthatalato sesakāyassa adassanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:1021_0: Purimasikkhāpade viya idha dvādasahattho upacāraniyamo natthīti āha “upacāraṃ muñcitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1021_1: Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ antamaso harīṭakakhaṇḍampi datvā vā “dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā parivattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:1021_3: “Taṃ acittakabhāvena na sametī”ti iminā ñātibhāvājānanādīsu viya bhikkhunībhāvājānanādivasenāpi acittakataṃ pakāseti.
tika-vin07t:1022_4: Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti mahatiyāpi tāva bhisicchaviyā anadhiṭṭhānupagattā anāpatti,
tika-vin07t:1022_6: Pattatthavikādīni pana vikappanupagapacchimāni gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1022_11: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1026_1: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti iminā bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ anuññātanti āha “neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1026_2: Paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena liṅgaṃ gahetvā pacchā laddhiṃ gaṇhantopi titthiyapakkantako evāti āha “nivāsetvāpi laddhi na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1027_0: Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatīti etthāpi vihāracīvarādiatthāya pavisantenapi tiṇādīhi paṭicchādetvāva gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1027_1: na tveva naggena āgantabbanti sāmaññato dukkaṭassa vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1027_4: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ obhaggavibhaggatāya asāruppaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1028_1: Aññassatthāyāti etthāpi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattati evāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1028_2: Idha pana aññassa acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarassa atthāya aññātakaappavārite viññāpentassa nissaggiyena anāpattīti attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t:1028_3: itarathā “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti iminā viseso na bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t:1028_6: taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti ca “yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1031_2: Tañhi vāṇijakehi dussāni paggahetvā dassanaṭṭhānatāya “paggāhikasālā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1031_4: “Ticīvarikenā”ti iminā acchinnaticīvarato aññassa vihārādīsu nihitassa cīvarassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1031_8: tāvakālikampi alabhantassa bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ katvā tiṇapaṇṇehi chadanaṃ viya viññāpanampi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1032_1: Pāḷiyā na sametīti “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti tatuttariviññāpanaāpattippasaṅge eva vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1032_2: “Aññassatthāyāti na vutta”nti idaṃ aññassatthāya tatuttari viññāpane nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t:1032_8: Tasmā aññassatthāya viññāpentassāpi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin07t:1032_9: Pāḷiyaṃ pana imassa sikkhāpadassa attano sādiyanapaṭibaddhatāvasena pavattattā “aññassatthāyā”ti anāpattivāre na vuttanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1032_15: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1035_1: Aṭṭhame yo kattāti dāyakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1035_3: “Appagghaṃ cetāpetī”ti idaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyā anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1035_8: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgānī”ti aññātakaviññattitā pakāsitā,
tika-vin07t:1035_9: keci pana “dāyakena dātukāmomhīti attano santike avuttepi yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo,
tika-vin07t:1035_12: dūtena vā dāyakena vā “āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhata”nti ārocitepi mukhavevaṭiyakappiyakārakādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_17: Desanāmattameva cetaṃ ‘dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyyā’ti sayaṃ āharitvāpi piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya dadantesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin07t:1035_18: Mukhavevaṭiyakappiyakārakādayo hi dāyakena pariccattepi vatthumhi “asukassa santike cīvarapiṇḍapātādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_19: gaṇhathā”ti aniddiṭṭhattā eva “na kiñci vattabbā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1035_20: na pana tassa vatthuno mukhavevaṭiyādīnaṃ santakattā,
tika-vin07t:1035_21: tasmā idhāpi dāyakena vā dūtena vā “yaṃ icchatha,
tika-vin07t:1035_23: Agghavaḍḍhanakanti cīvare agghavaḍḍhanakaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1038_1: Navame pāḷiyaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannāti paccekaṃ niyametvā cīvaracetāpannā,
tika-vin07t:1038_2: ekekena visuṃ visuṃ niyamitā cīvaracetāpannāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1038_3: Ubhova santā ekenāti ubho ekatova santā,
tika-vin07t:1041_4: kāraṃ katvā vuttoti āha “ajja ekadivasaṃ amhāka”nti.
tika-vin07t:1042_1: Yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena
tika-vin07t:1042_3: sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya,
tika-vin07t:1042_4: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin07t:1042_5: taṃ nissaggiyavatthudukkaṭavatthubhūtaṃ akappiyacīvaracetāpannaṃ “asukassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ āgamanasuddhiyā asati,
tika-vin07t:1042_6: sikkhāpade āgatanayena dūtavacane ca asuddhe sabbathā paṭikkhepo eva kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1042_7: na pana “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vattuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1042_8: tadanusārena na veyyāvaccakarañca niddisituṃ āgamanadūtavacanānaṃ ubhinnaṃ asuddhattā.
tika-vin07t:1042_9: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena pana āgamanasuddhiyā sati dūtavacane asuddhepi sikkhāpade āgatanayena sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1042_10: Tena ca yathā dūtavacanāsuddhiyampi āgamane suddhe veyyāvaccakarampi niddisituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1042_11: evaṃ āgamanāsuddhiyampi dūtavacane suddhe vaṭṭati evāti ayamattho atthato siddhova hoti,
tika-vin07t:1042_12: ubhayasuddhiyaṃ vattabbameva natthīti ubhayāsuddhipakkhameva sandhāya mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kappiyakārakopi
tika-vin07t:1043_0: Yaṃ panettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1043_1: taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā vuttaṃ yathāvuttanayena āgamanasuddhiādinā sappayojanattā.
tika-vin07t:1043_3: pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena ca vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyyā”ti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo vutto,
tika-vin07t:1043_4: so aniṭṭhappasaṅgo eva na hoti abhimatattā.
tika-vin07t:1043_5: Tathā hi sikkhāpade eva “paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti akappiyavohārena vadato dūtassa kappiyena
tika-vin07t:1043_6: kammena veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo vutto āgamanassa suddhattā,
tika-vin07t:1043_7: āgamanassāpi asuddhiyaṃ pana kappiyenāpi kammena veyyāvaccakaro na niddisitabboti attheva āgamanassa suddhiasuddhīsu payojanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1043_10: Dūtena hi akappiyavohāreneva vutte eva āgamanasuddhi gavesitabbā,
tika-vin07t:1043_12: tattha ca tassa vacanakkamena pucchitvā ca yuttiādīhi ca sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1043_13: Idhāpi hi sikkhāpade “cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhata”nti dūtavacaneneva cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dātuṃ pesitabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-vin07t:1043_14: Yadi hi sabbathā āgamanasuddhi na viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:1044_0: Pāḷiyañca “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”tiādi dūtavacanassa akappiyattepi āgamanasuddhiyā sati paṭipajjanavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1044_3: “Saññatto”tiādi “evaṃ dūtena puna vutte eva codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1044_6: cetāpehi me cīvara”’nti idaṃ dūtenābhatarūpiyaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ attanā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattāva “dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1044_7: cetāpehi me cīvara”nti vadanto rūpiyassa pakatattā tena rūpiyena parivattetvā “dehi cetāpehī”ti rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1044_8: samāpajjanto nāma hotīti taṃ dosaṃ dūrato parivajjetuṃ vuttaṃ rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇena saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭharūpiye viya.
tika-vin07t:1044_9: Vuttañhi tattha “na vattabbo imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1044_10: Tasmā na idaṃ viññattidosaṃ parivajjetuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1044_13: teneva dūtaniddiṭṭhesu rūpiyasaṃvohārasaṅkābhāvato aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi āharāpetabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1044_14: Tatthāpi “dūtena ṭhapitarūpiyena cetāpetvā cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti evaṃ āharāpetabbanti adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1044_15: Ṭhānaṃ bhañjatīti ettha ṭhānanti ṭhitiyā ca kāraṇassa ca nāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1044_18: Ṭhitaṃ pana akopetvā āmisapaṭiggahaṇādīsu āgatakāraṇameva bhañjati,
tika-vin07t:1045_0: Yatassa cīvaracetāpannantiādi yena attanā veyyāvaccakaro niddiṭṭho,
tika-vin07t:1045_3: Evaṃ bhikkhunā vatthusāmikānaṃ vutte te codetvā denti,
tika-vin07t:1045_5: Tena ca yo sayaṃ acodetvā upāsakādīhi pariyāyena vatvā codāpeti,
tika-vin07t:1045_6: tesu sattakkhattumpi codetvā cīvaraṃ dāpentesu tassa anāpatti siddhā hoti sikkhāpadassa anāṇattikattā.
tika-vin07t:1046_0: Kenaci aniddiṭṭho attano mukheneva byāvaṭabhāvaṃ veyyāvaccakarattaṃ patto mukhavevaṭiko.
tika-vin07t:1046_1: “Avicāretukāmatāyā”ti iminā vijjamānampi dātuṃ anicchantā ariyāpi vañcanādhippāyaṃ vinā vohārato natthīti vadantīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1046_4: Kappiyakārakānaṃ hattheti dūtena niddiṭṭhakappiyakārake sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1047_1: “Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti iminā cīvaratthāyeva na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1047_2: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā vatthusāminā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakabhedesupi piṇḍapātādīnampi atthāya dinne ca ṭhānacodanādi
tika-vin07t:1048_1: anāmasitvā”ti vuttattā “saṅghassa vihāratthāya demā”tiādinā āmasitvā vadantesu paṭikkhipitabbameva.
tika-vin07t:1048_3: gaṇādīsupi saṅghassatthāya sampaṭicchantesupi paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1048_5: taṃ na yuttaṃ saṅghacetiyādīnaṃ atthāya dukkaṭassa vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1048_6: Codetīti tassa dosābhāvaṃ ñatvāpi kodhena vā lobhena vā bhaṇḍadeyyanti codeti.
tika-vin07t:1048_7: So eva hi musāvādādipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭādiāpattīhi sāpattiko hoti,
tika-vin07t:1048_8: gīvātisaññāya pana vatvā niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā viramantassa natthi āpatti.
tika-vin07t:1049_2: vaṭṭatīti ettha “bhikkhusaṅghassa catupaccayaparibhogatthāya taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā “bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro
tika-vin07t:1049_3: paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā “ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammī”ti vā vattumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1049_4: idañca saṅghassa paribhogatthāya diyyamānaññeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1049_5: puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1049_8: taṃ katha”nti hi ādinā sabbattha saṅghavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1050_8: assāmika’ntisaññāya attanā gahetvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1051_1: “Suddhacittāna”nti idaṃ sahatthena ca akappiyavohārena ca karonte sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1051_2: Sassasampādanatthanti evaṃ asuddhacittānampi pana sayaṃ akatvā kappiyavohārena āṇāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1051_3: “Kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ sahatthādinā katataḷākattā “asāruppa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1051_5: pana taṃ paccayaṃ paribhuñjantassapi vā saṅghassa āpatti na viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:1052_0: “Kasatha vapathā”ti vacane sabbesampi akappiyaṃ siyāti āha “avatvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1052_1: Ettako nāma bhāgoti ettha ettako kahāpaṇoti idampi sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1052_2: Tathā vuttepi hi tadā kahāpaṇānaṃ avijjamānattā āyatiṃ uppannaṃ aññesaṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1052_9: yena minanarakkhaṇādipayogena pacchā dhaññaparibhoge āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t:1052_12: Teneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti niyamavacane akappiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1053_1: vaṭṭatīti ettha nivāsaṭṭhānattā puggalassāpi suddhacittena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1054_5: Khettādayo pana sabbe saṅghasseva vaṭṭanti pāḷiyaṃ puggalikavasena gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1054_7: “khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā suttantesu āgatapaṭikkhepo bhagavatā āpattiyāpi hetubhāvena
tika-vin07t:1054_8: katoti bhagavato adhippāyaṃ jānantehi saṅgītimahātherehi khettapaṭiggahaṇādinissito ayaṃ sabbopi pāḷimuttavinicchayo
tika-vin07t:1059_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ kosiyakāraketi kosakārakapāṇānaṃ kosato nibbattattā kosiyena suttena vatthādiṃ karonte.
tika-vin07t:1062_2: Tattha pana odātādimissakasaññāya suddhakāḷakānaññeva santhatassa karaṇavasena cettha dvebhāgato adhikesu
tika-vin07t:1062_3: suddhakāḷakesu anadhikasaññāya santhatassa karaṇavasena ca acittakatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1064_2: miha secaneti dhātuatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vaccampi passāvampi karontī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1067_1: Pañcame tattha sandississatīti sakāya katikāya ayuttakāritāvasena viññūhi sandississatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1067_2: Araññakaṅgādīni tīṇi pāḷiyaṃ senāsanādipaccayattayassa ādiaṅgavasena vuttāni,
tika-vin07t:1068_6: Keci pana “idaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma navasu cīvaresu nisīdanacīvarameva, nāññaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1068_7: Nisīdanasikkhāpadepi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade viya ‘nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī’ti ca aṭṭhakathāyañcassa
tika-vin07t:1068_8: ‘santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā
tika-vin07t:1068_10: tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī’ti ca vuttattā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1068_11: taṃ na yuttaṃ idha pamāṇaniyamassa avuttattā,
tika-vin07t:1068_14: Nisīdanacīvaraṃ pana channaṃ cīvarānaṃ khaṇḍapilotikāni pamāṇayuttameva santharitvā santhataṃ viya karonti.
tika-vin07t:1069_2: sugatavidatthiūne anūnantisaññāya ca vasenettha acittakatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1069_3: Vitānādīnaññeva atthāya karaṇe anāpattivacanato nipajjanatthāya karotopi āpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1069_4: Paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti kosiyesu suddhakāḷakānañca vatthūnaṃ akappiyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1069_11: paribhuñjane ca vijaṭetvā kappiyavasena kate na doso.
tika-vin07t:1072_2: Nivāsaṭṭhāne laddhānipi tiyojanato paraṃ harituṃ na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1073_1: Taṃ harantassāti paṭhamaṃ paṭilābhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya tiyojanato uddhaṃ harantassāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1073_2: Tathā harantassa hi corehi acchinditvā puna dinnaṭṭhānato tiyojanaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1073_3: Keci pana “mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgesu ‘paṭhamappaṭilābho’ti vuttattā dutiyapaṭilābhaṭṭhānato tiyojanātikkamepi anāpattī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1073_5: dutiyapaṭilābhassāpi paṭilābhaṭṭhāne pavisanato vāsatthāya gamanaṭṭhānato puna gamane viya.
tika-vin07t:1073_6: Kāyabandhanādīnanti dvipaṭalakāyabandhanādīnaṃ antare pakkhittaṃ pasibbake pakkhittasadisaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1076_1: Sattame pāḷiyaṃ anāpattivāre aparibhuttaṃ katabhaṇḍaṃ dhovāpetīti ettha paribhuttassa kambalādikatabhaṇḍassa
tika-vin07t:1076_2: dhovāpanaṃ purāṇacīvaradhovāpanasikkhāpadena āpattikaranti tannivattanatthaṃ “aparibhuttaṃ katabhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1079_1: Aṭṭhame suvaṇṇamayakahāpaṇena kahāpaṇopi rajate eva saṅgayhatīti āha “sovaṇṇamayo vā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1079_2: Rūpiyamayo vāti rajatena rūpaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā katakahāpaṇo.
tika-vin07t:1080_4: Idāni taṃ catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthuṃ sarūpato dassento “rajata”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1080_7: tathāpi sikkhāpade “jātarūparajata”nti padeneva vuttanti tampi dassetuṃ “rajata”nti idaṃ visuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1080_8: Padabhājane pana mātikāpadeneva siddhattā taṃ avatvā tena saha saṅgayhamānameva dassetuṃ “rajataṃ nāma kahāpaṇo”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1080_13: paribhoge pana pañcasahadhammikehi paṭiggahitānaṃ dhaññavirahitamuttādīnaṃ kāraṇā uppannapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ sabbesampi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1080_14: Keci pana “dhaññampi pañcasahadhammikehi paṭiggahitaṃ muttādikhettādi viya sabbesampi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1080_15: kevalaṃ saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ kappiyavohārena ca uppannassa dhaññassa vicāraṇameva sandhāya ‘tassevetaṃ akappiya’nti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1081_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vātiādi rūpiye heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1081_2: “Idha nikkhipāhī”ti vutte uggaṇhāpanaṃ hotīti āha “idha nikkhipāhīti na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:1081_4: hotīti yasmā asāditattā tato uppannapaccayā vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin07t:1081_6: Yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya sati tato uppannampi na kappati,
tika-vin07t:1082_0: “Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpita”nti iminā cetāpitaṃ ce,
tika-vin07t:1082_2: Īdisañhi saṅghamajjhe nissajjanaṃ katvāva chaḍḍetvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1082_3: Keci pana “yasmā nissaggiyavatthuṃ paṭiggahetvāpi cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghe nissaṭṭhaṃ kappiyakārakehi
tika-vin07t:1082_5: tasmā vināva upāyaṃ bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1082_9: Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti kappiyakārakehi vaḍḍhiyā payojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1083_4: Iṇaparibhogoti bhagavatā anuññātampi kattabbaṃ akatvā paribhuñjanato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1083_6: Paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge.
tika-vin07t:1083_8: Iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha “hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhutta”ntiādināpi atītapaccavekkhaṇā vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1083_11: Satipaccayatā vaṭṭatīti paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1083_12: Paṭiggahaṇe ca paribhoge ca paccavekkhaṇāsati avassaṃ laddhabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1083_14: Keci pana “satipaccayatā paccaye sati bhesajjaparibhogassa kāraṇe satī”ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1083_15: tesampi paccaye satīti paccayasabbhāvasallakkhaṇe satīti evamattho gahetabbo paccayasabbhāvamattena sīlassa asujjhanato.
tika-vin07t:1083_16: “Paribhoge akarontasseva āpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa bhedo dassito,
tika-vin07t:1083_19: pana sesapaccayesu ca iṇaparibhogādivacanena paccayasannissitasīlasseva bhedoti evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1084_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1084_5: Ettha desanāggahaṇena vuṭṭhānampi chinnamūlānaṃ abhikkhutāpaṭiññāpi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:1084_6: Chinnamūlānampi hi pārājikāpattivuṭṭhānena heṭṭhā parirakkhitaṃ bhikkhusīlaṃ visuddhaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:1085_2: Sattannaṃ sekkhānanti ettha kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi saṅgahitā tesaṃ āṇaṇyaparibhogassa dāyajjaparibhoge saṅgahitattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1085_6: Tattha mā me āmisadāyādāti evaṃ me-
tika-vin07t:1086_2: “Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthī”ti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu āsaṅkā nāma na kātabbā,
tika-vin07t:1086_5: Sace na oramatīti agatigamanena dhammāmisaparibhogato na oramati.
tika-vin07t:1086_6: “Āpatti nāma natthī”ti idaṃ alajjīnaṃ dhammena uppannapaccayaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1087_0: “Dhammiyādhammiyaparibhogo paccayavasena veditabbo”ti vuttattā heṭṭhā lajjiparibhogo paccayavasena ca ekakammādivasena ca vutto evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1087_1: Teneva duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ codakacuditakabhāve ṭhitā dve alajjino dhammaparibhogampi sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1087_2: “ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā”ti vuttā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dhammāmisaparibhoge virodhābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1087_3: Lajjīnameva hi alajjinā saha tadubhayaparibhogā na vaṭṭantīti.
tika-vin07t:1088_0: Dhammaparibhogoti “ekakammaṃ ekuddeso”tiādinā vuttasaṃvāso ceva nissayaggahaṇadānādiko sabbo nirāmisaparibhogo ca veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1088_1: “Na so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā lajjino alajjipaggahe āpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1088_4: iminā ca lajjino vaṇṇabhaṇanādilābhaṃ paṭicca āmisagarukatāya vā gehasitapemena vā taṃ alajjiṃ paggaṇhanto lajjī sāsanaṃ antaradhāpeti nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1088_5: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu upatthambhito alajjī balaṃ labhitvā pesale abhibhavitvā nacirasseva sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ karotīti.
tika-vin07t:1089_0: “Dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatī”ti iminā āmisaparibhogato dhammaparibhogova garuko,
tika-vin07t:1089_2: “Dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā alajjussannatāya sāsane osakkante,
tika-vin07t:1089_3: lajjīsu ca appahontesu alajjimpi pakatattaṃ gaṇapūrakaṃ gahetvā upasampadādikaraṇena ceva keci alajjino
tika-vin07t:1089_4: dhammāmisaparibhogena saṅgahetvā sesālajjigaṇassa niggahena ca sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1090_0: Keci pana “koṭiyaṃ ṭhito ganthoti vuttattā ganthapariyāpuṇanameva dhammaparibhogo,
tika-vin07t:1090_2: Tasmā alajjīhipi saddhiṃ uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1090_5: ekakammādīsu bahūsu dhammaparibhogesu alajjināpi saddhiṃ kattabbāvatthāyuttaṃ dhammaparibhogaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1090_7: Na hi ekakammādiko vidhi dhammaparibhogo na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ anāmisattā dhammāmisesu apariyāpannassa kassaci abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1090_13: ayaṃ dhammapaṭisandhāro nāmā”ti evaṃ saṅghakammādipi dhammakoṭṭhāse dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1090_14: Tesu pana dhammakoṭṭhāsesu yaṃ gaṇapūraṇādivasena alajjino apekkhitvā uposathādi vā tesaṃ santikā dhammuggahaṇanissayaggahaṇādi vā karīyati,
tika-vin07t:1090_15: taṃ dhammo ceva paribhogo cāti dhammaparibhogoti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:1090_16: etaṃ tathārūpapaccayaṃ vinā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1090_18: Yaṃ pana alajjisataṃ anapekkhitvā tajjanīyādiniggahakammaṃ vā parivāsādiupakārakammaṃ vā uggahaparipucchādānādi vā karīyati,
tika-vin07t:1090_23: Nissayadānampi terasasammutidānādi ca vattapaṭivattasādiyanādiparibhogassāpi hetuttā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1091_0: Yo pana mahāalajjī uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:1091_1: tassa saddhivihārikādīnaṃ upasampadādiupakārakammampi uggahaparipucchādānādi ca kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1091_5: Dhammāmisaparibhogavivajjanenāpi hi dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho adhippeto,
tika-vin07t:1091_7: Tasmā yaṃ yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ upatthambhāya pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārāya saddhammaparihānādiatthāya hoti,
tika-vin07t:1091_8: taṃ sabbampi paribhogo vā hotu aparibhogo vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1091_11: Dhammāmisaparibhogesu cettha alajjīhi ekakammādidhammaparibhogo eva pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārasaddhammaparihānādiatthāya hoti,
tika-vin07t:1091_13: Na hi alajjīnaṃ paccayaparibhogamattena pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārādi hoti,
tika-vin07t:1091_16: Tathā hi katasikkhāpadavītikkamā alajjipuggalā uposathādīsu paviṭṭhā “tumhe kāyadvāre,
tika-vin07t:1091_17: vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karothā”tiādinā bhikkhūhi vattabbā honti,
tika-vin07t:1091_18: yathā vinayañca atiṭṭhantā saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena suṭṭhu niggahetabbā,
tika-vin07t:1091_19: tathā akatvā tehi saha saṃvasantāpi alajjinova honti “ekopi alajjī alajjisatampi karotī”tiādivacanato.
tika-vin07t:1091_20: Yadi hi te evaṃ na niggahitā siyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1091_21: saṅghe kalahādiṃ vaḍḍhetvā uposathādisāmaggīkammapaṭibāhanādinā pesalānaṃ aphāsuṃ katvā kamena te devadattavajjiputtakādayo
tika-vin07t:1091_22: viya parisaṃ vaḍḍhetvā attano vippaṭipattiṃ dhammato vinayato dīpentā saṅghabhedādimpi katvā nacirasseva
tika-vin07t:1091_24: tesu pana saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena niggahitesu sabbopāyaṃ upaddavo na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1092_4: dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1093_0: Tasmā ekakammādidhammaparibhogova āmisaparibhogatopi ativiya alajjivivekena kātabbo,
tika-vin07t:1094_2: saṅghakammāni nappavattantīti evaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ saṅghakammākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitattāpi cetaṃ sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:1094_3: tathā parivattaliṅgassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunupassayaṃ gacchantassa paṭipattikathāyaṃ “ārādhikā ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo,
tika-vin07t:1094_9: tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labbhatī”ti evaṃ alajjinīsu dutiyikāgahaṇādīsu saṃvāsāpattiparihārāya
tika-vin07t:1094_10: nadīpāragamanādigarukāpattiṭṭhānānaṃ anuññātattā tatopi alajjisaṃvāsāpatti eva saddhammaparihānihetuto
tika-vin07t:1094_13: anāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharituṃ garukāpattiṭṭhānavītikkamaṃ ācariyā anujānanti,
tika-vin07t:1094_14: tathā asaṃvāsapadassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhātā nāma.
tika-vin07t:1094_15: Ettha yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu saha vasanti,
tika-vin07t:1094_17: tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā eso saṃvāso nāmā”ti evaṃ lajjīheva ekakammādisaṃvāso vaṭṭatīti pakāsito.
tika-vin07t:1095_3: ye gaṇapūrake katvā kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin07t:1095_6: te ce gaṇapūraṇā hutvā kammaṃ sādhenti,
tika-vin07t:1095_7: kevalaṃ katvā agatigamanena karontānaṃ āpattikarā honti sabhāgāpattiāpannā viya aññamaññaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_10: Sañcicca hi vītikkamacitte uppanne alajjino “na puna īdisaṃ karissāmī”ti cittena lajjino ca honti,
tika-vin07t:1095_11: tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānāpi na oramanti,
tika-vin07t:1095_15: Tasmāpi alajjino asaṃvāsikesu agaṇetvā tapparivajjanatthaṃ sodhetvāva uposathādikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_17: pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathakaraṇassa ayuttatā pakāsitā,
tika-vin07t:1095_19: phāsu hotī”ti evaṃ alajjimpi lajjidhamme patiṭṭhāpetvā uposathakaraṇappakāro ca vutto,
tika-vin07t:1095_22: parisuddhoti maṃ dhārethā”ti ca evaṃ uposathaṃ karontānaṃ parisuddhatā ca pakāsitā,
tika-vin07t:1095_24: sabbathā lajjidhammaṃ anokkamantehi saṃvāsassa ayuttatāya nissayadānaggahaṇapaṭikkhepo,
tika-vin07t:1095_25: tajjanīyādiniggahakammakaraṇañca ukkhepanīyakammakaraṇena sānuvattakaparisassa alajjissa asaṃvāsikattapāpanavidhi ca vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1095_27: aṭṭhakathāvacanehi ca pakatattehipi apakatattehipi sabbehi alajjīhi ekakammādisaṃvāso na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1095_28: karontānaṃ āpatti eva dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahatthāyeva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_29: Teneva dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pakatattāpi alajjino vajjiputtakā yasattherādīhi mahantena vāyāmena saṅghato viyojitā.
tika-vin07t:1095_30: Na hi tesu pārājikādiasaṃvāsikā atthi tehi dīpitānaṃ dasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ lahukāpattivisayattā.
tika-vin07t:1096_2: Dāyakehi asatiyā dinnaṃ rūpiyaṃ tehi puna sakasaññāya gaṇhante adātuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1096_3: nissaggiyavatthuṃ gaṇhāhīti dātuñca na vaṭṭatīti āha “tava coḷakaṃ passāhī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1096_4: Evaṃ vatvāpi pana naṭṭhavatthusmiṃ viya nissajjitabbābhāvepi āpatti desetabbāva.
tika-vin07t:1096_5: Asatiyāpi hi taṃ vatthuṃ vatthādinā sahatthena gahetvā “idaṃ demī”ti dinnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1096_6: tadā pariccāgasabbhāvato dānameva hoti “appagghaṃ dassāmī”ti mahagghassa dāne viya.
tika-vin07t:1096_7: Paṭiggaṇhantassa ca asatiyā diyyamānatte ñātepi adinnādānaṃ na hoti dāyakehi dinnattā,
tika-vin07t:1096_10: teneva cettha ‘tava coḷakaṃ passā’ti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1100_1: Navame jātarūpādicatubbidhanissaggiyavatthu idha rūpiyaggahaṇeneva gahitanti āha “jātarūparajataparivattana”nti.
tika-vin07t:1101_2: Rūpiyaṃ nāma satthuvaṇṇotiādīsu kiñcāpi kevalaṃ rajataṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1102_1: Pāḷiyaṃ rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti attanā diyyamānaṃ sakasantakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1102_6: Pacchime pana tike “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti,
tika-vin07t:1102_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti iminā nayena sabbattha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1102_10: na muttādidukkaṭavatthu ante “pañcannaṃ saha anāpattī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1102_15: Tañca dukkaṭavatthumhi tathasaññāya vā atathasaññāya vā vimatiyā vā parivattentassapi hotiyeva acittakattā imassa sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin07t:1103_0: Idāni “nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena anāgatattepi nayato
tika-vin07t:1103_2: Ettha ca yasmā rūpiyena parivattitaṃ arūpiyaṃ nissaṭṭhampi sabbesampi akappiyattā nissaggiyameva na hoti
tika-vin07t:1103_4: kevalaṃ pana idaṃ chaḍḍetvā pācittiyameva parivattakena desetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1103_6: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”ntiādi tiko bhagavatā na vutto,
tika-vin07t:1103_7: tīsupi padesu parivattiyamānassa arūpiyattena nissaggiyavacanāyogā rūpiyasseva nissajjitabbato.
tika-vin07t:1103_8: Rūpiyasseva hi nissaṭṭhassa ārāmikādīhi paṭipajjanavidhi pāḷiyaṃ dassito,
tika-vin07t:1103_13: Teneva pattacatukke “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyaṃ kātu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1103_15: Attano vā hītiādi dutiyatikānulomeneva tatiyattikassa sijjhanappakāraṃ samatthetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1103_17: yasmā hi yathā attano arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpentassa ekasmiṃ ante rūpiyasambhavato “rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato eva hotī”ti dutiyattiko vutto,
tika-vin07t:1103_18: evaṃ attano rūpiyena parassa arūpiyaṃ cetāpentassāpi hotīti tatiyo tiko vattabbo bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:1103_19: so pana dutiyattikeneva ekato rūpiyapakkhasāmaññena sijjhatīti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttoti.
tika-vin07t:1103_20: Tattha ekantena rūpiyapakkheti ekena antena rūpiyapakkhe,
tika-vin07t:1104_0: Idāni dutiyattike arūpiyapadassa atthabhūtesu dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūsu dukkaṭavatthunā rūpiyādiparivattane
tika-vin07t:1104_2: Dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuntiādi pana dukkaṭavatthunā parivattanappasaṅge pāḷiyaṃ avuttassāpi atthassa nayato labbhamānataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1104_5: Aññatra sahadhammikehīti “pañcannaṃ saha anāpattī”ti vacanato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1104_6: tenāpi kayavikkayasikkhāpadassa kappiyavatthunissitataṃ eva sādheti. Imaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1105_0: Evaṃ dukkaṭavatthunā rūpiyādiparivattane āpattibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni kappiyavatthunāpi dassetuṃ “kappiyavatthunā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1105_3: Muttādidukkaṭavatthumpi uggahetvā kāritampi pañcannampi na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1105_5: “imaṃ kahāpaṇādiṃ kammakārānaṃ datvā bījaṃ samuṭṭhāpehī”ti evaṃ aññaṃ āṇāpetvā vā samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin07t:1105_6: Mahāakappiyoti attanāva bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā aññassa mūlasāmikassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1105_7: So hi corehi acchinnopi puna laddho jānantassa kassacipi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1105_9: taḷākādīsu viya acchinno vaṭṭatīti ācariyā vadeyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1105_10: Na sakkā kenaci upāyenāti saṅghe nissajjanena,
tika-vin07t:1105_11: corādiacchindanādinā ca kappiyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t:1105_14: Dukkaṭavatthumpi hi tammūlikakappiyavatthuñca na sakkā kenaci upāyena tena rūpena kappiyaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1105_15: Yadi pana so bhikkhu tena kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthunā puna rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin07t:1105_16: taṃ rūpiyaṃ nissajjāpetvā aññesaṃ kappiyaṃ kātumpi sakkā bhaveyyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1106_0: Pattaṃ kiṇātīti ettha “iminā kahāpaṇādinā kammārakulato pattaṃ kiṇitvā ehī”ti ārāmikādīhi kiṇāpanampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1106_6: Iminā pana vacanena yaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadaṃ “anāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1106_10: Pāḷiyañhi nissaṭṭharūpiyena ārāmikādīhi sappiyādiṃ parivattāpetuṃ “so vattabbo ‘āvuso,
tika-vin07t:1106_13: na vattabbo ‘imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā’ti.
tika-vin07t:1106_14: Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ ‘sappi vā”’tiādinā rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ parimocetvāva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1106_15: “Iminā rūpiyena kiṃ āharīyatū”ti pucchanto “imaṃ āharā”ti vuttepi adhikārato “iminā rūpiyena imaṃ āharā”ti
tika-vin07t:1106_16: bhikkhūhi āṇatto eva hotīti taṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ parivajjetuṃ “na vattabbo ‘imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā”’ti
tika-vin07t:1106_20: tasmā idaṃ sāṇattikaṃ kayavikkayameva anāṇattikanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1107_0: Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattāti yena uggahitamūlena patto kīto,
tika-vin07t:1107_4: Yadi hi tena rūpiyena aññaṃ rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin07t:1107_5: taṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade āgatanayeneva nissajjāpetvā sesehi paribhuñjitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti.
tika-vin07t:1108_5: parivattanaparivattāpanesu aññatarabhāvo cāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1111_2: idaṃ pacchā chaḍḍetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1111_5: Sesañātakesu saddhādeyyavinipātasambhavato tadabhāvaṭṭhānampi dassetuṃ “mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1111_6: Na sakkā taṃ paṭikkhipitunti ettha yathā rūpiyaṃ bhatakānaṃ datvā assāmikabhūmiyaṃ ayobījasamuṭṭhāpane
tika-vin07t:1111_7: bhatiyā khaṇantānaṃ santikā gahitabhaṇḍakabhāvepi pācittiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1111_12: tadatthañca tesaṃ rūpiyaṃ dentassa rūpiyasaṃvohārova hoti akappiyavohārena rajanacchalliādīnaṃ āharāpane kayavikkayo viya,
tika-vin07t:1112_1: Puññaṃ bhavissatīti detīti ettha sace bhikkhu attano bhaṇḍassa appagghataṃ ñatvāpi akathetvā “idāneva upaparikkhitvā gaṇha,
tika-vin07t:1112_3: itaro ca attano diyyamānassa mahagghataṃ ajānanto “ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā tumhākamevā”ti datvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t:1112_5: Vippaṭisārissa puna sakasaññāya āgatassa yaṃ adhikaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1117_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame aḍḍhaterasapalāti māgadhikāya mānatulāya aḍḍhaterasapalaparimitaṃ udakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1117_2: tathā parimitaṃ yavamāsādiṃ gaṇhantiṃ sandhāyāti keci.
tika-vin07t:1117_6: taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1117_8: Sā ca catumuṭṭhikehi kuḍuvehi aṭṭha kuḍuvā,
tika-vin07t:1117_9: tāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo magadhanāḷiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:1117_10: Purāṇā pana “sīhaḷanāḷi tisso nāḷiyo gaṇhātī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1117_11: tesaṃ matena magadhanāḷi idāni pavattamānāya catukuḍuvāya damiḷanāḷiyā catunāḷikā hoti,
tika-vin07t:1117_12: tato magadhanāḷito upaḍḍhañca purāṇadamiḷanāḷisaṅkhātaṃ patthaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:1117_13: etena ca “omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhātī”ti pāḷivacanañca sameti,
tika-vin07t:1120_0: Evaṃ loke nāḷiyā magadhanāḷi diguṇāti dassitā,
tika-vin07t:1120_1: evañca gayhamāne omakapattassa ca yāpanamattodanagāhikā ca siddhā hoti.
tika-vin07t:1120_2: Na hi sakkā aṭṭhakuḍuvato ūnodanagāhinā pattena athūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā yāpetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1120_3: Teneva verañjakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pattho nāma nāḷimattaṃ hoti ekassa purisassa alaṃ yāpanāya.
tika-vin07t:1121_0: Ālopassa anurūpanti ettha “byañjanassa mattā nāma odanato catutthabhāgo”ti brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1121_1: vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgameva byañjanaṃ anurūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1121_2: Odanagatikānevāti odanassa anto eva pavisanasīlāni siyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1125_1: Dutiye pāḷiyaṃ ahaṃ pattena te bhikkhū santapessāmīti seso.
tika-vin07t:1125_3: Pañcabandhanepi patte aparipuṇṇapāke patte viya adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin07t:1125_4: “Tipupaṭṭakena vā”ti vuttattā tambalohādīhi kappiyalohehi ayopattassa chiddaṃ chādetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1125_6: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade akāḷavaṇṇampi kappiyapattaṃ viññāpentassa āpatti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1125_10: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1128_4: ārāmika”nti puggalānampi ārāmikanāmena dāsaggahaṇe anuññāte eva ārāmikānaṃ gahitattā khettavatthādīni
tika-vin07t:1128_7: “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā hi paṭikkhittesu ekasseva puggalikavasena gahaṇe anuññāte
tika-vin07t:1128_8: itarītarānaṃ tathā na gahetabbatā siddhāva hoti.
tika-vin07t:1128_9: Yañca pilindavacchattherena dāyakakulassa dārikāya suvaṇṇamālāvasena tiṇaṇḍupakassa nimmānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1128_12: iddhimassa iddhivisaye”ti vacanato kulasaṅgahādi na hotīti katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1128_13: keci pana “khīṇāsavānaṃ lābhicchāya abhāvato kulasaṅgahepi ājīvakopo natthī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1128_14: taṃ na yuttaṃ khīṇāsavānampi ājīvavipattihetūnaṃ piṇḍapātādīnaṃ parivajjetabbato.
tika-vin07t:1129_6: Ajja sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmapāko na hotīti āha “navanītaṃ tāpentassā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1130_0: Ettha panāti navanīte viseso atthīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1130_1: Dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti dhotameva paṭiggahitumpi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1131_0: Mahāsivattherassa pana vatthuno viyojitattā dadhiguḷikādīhi yuttatāmattena savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1131_2: pacitvā vā nirāmisameva katvā paribhuñjiṃsūti adhippāyo,
tika-vin07t:1131_3: na pana dadhiguḷikādīhi saha vikāle bhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin07t:1131_6: Tattha adhotaṃ paṭiggahetvāpi taṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dadhiādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1131_9: Ettāvatāti navanīte laggamattena visuṃ dadhiādivohāraṃ aladdhena appamattena dadhiādināti attho,
tika-vin07t:1131_10: etena visuṃ paṭiggahitadadhiādīhi saha pakkaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1131_13: paṭiggahaṇe tāva dadhiādīhi asambhinnarasattā bhattena sahitena guḷapiṇḍādi viya savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1131_15: itarathā pacanakkhaṇe paccamānadadhiguḷikādīhi sambhinnarasatāya sāmaṃpakkaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1132_1: savatthukapaṭiggahitattābhāve āmisena saha bhikkhunā pakkassa sayaṃpākadoso vā parisaṅkīyati yāvakālikatā vā,
tika-vin07t:1132_2: tattha na tāva sayaṃpākadoso ettha sambhavati sattāhakālikattā.
tika-vin07t:1132_5: Atha paṭiggahitadadhiguḷikādinā saha attanā pakkattā savatthukapakkaṃ viya bhaveyyāti parisaṅkīyati,
tika-vin07t:1132_6: tadā āmisena saha paṭiggahitattāti kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1132_8: Tathā ca upaḍḍhattherānaṃ matameva aṅgī kataṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:1132_9: Tattha ca sāmaṇerādīhi pakkampi yāvakālikameva siyā paṭiggahitakhīrādiṃ pacitvā anupasampannehi katasappiādi viya ca,
tika-vin07t:1132_13: sodhetvā vā patte ākirantīti niyamo atthi,
tika-vin07t:1132_14: aṭṭhakathāyañca “yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1132_16: purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā vacanenapetaṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin07t:1132_17: tasmā idha kukkuccakānaṃ kukkuccuppattiyā nimittameva na dissati.
tika-vin07t:1132_19: evaṃ “lajjī sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti,
tika-vin07t:1132_22: Yadi hi etaṃ yāvakālikasaṃsaggaparihārāya vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:1132_24: Gahaṭṭhehi dinnasappiādīsu ca āmisasaṃsaggasaṅkā na vigaccheyya.
tika-vin07t:1132_25: Na hi gahaṭṭhā evaṃ vilīyāpetvā pana taṇḍulādiṃ apanetvā puna pacanti,
tika-vin07t:1132_26: apica bhesajjehi saddhiṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā yathā khīrādi khayaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin07t:1132_28: na ca tampi yuttaṃ dadhiādikhayakaraṇatthaṃ “puna pacitvā detī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1132_29: Tasmā mahāsivattheravāde kukkuccaṃ akatvā adhotampi navanītaṃ tadahupi punadivasādīsupi pacituṃ,
tika-vin07t:1132_30: taṇḍulādimissaṃ sappiādiṃ attanāpi aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna takkādikhayatthaṃ pacituñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1133_0: Tattha vijjamānassapi paccamānakkhaṇe sambhinnarasassa yāvakālikassa abbohārikattena savatthukapaṭiggahitapurepaṭiggahitānampi
tika-vin07t:1133_2: Teneva “ettāvatā savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1133_3: Visuṃ paṭiggahitena pana khīrādiāmisena navanītādiṃ missetvā bhikkhunā vā aññehi vā pakkatelādibhesajjaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitasaṅkhyameva gacchati,
tika-vin07t:1133_5: Yaṃ pana purepariggahitabhesajjehi appaṭiggahitaṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelādikaṃ anupasampanneheva
tika-vin07t:1133_7: tattha pakkhittakhīrādikassapi tasmiṃ khaṇe sambhinnarasatāya purepaṭiggahitattāpattito.
tika-vin07t:1133_9: aññehi vā pakkatelādīsupi sace āmisaraso paññāyati,
tika-vin07t:1134_3: etena tehi yuttampi sappiādi atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1136_3: Tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānanti ajjhohāre ajjhohāre tīṇi dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1136_4: Kiñcāpi paribhogatthāya vikāle paṭiggahaṇapacanaparissāvanādīsu pubbapayogesu pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1136_6: tathāpi ettha āpattiyā eva bhavitabbaṃ paṭikkhittassa karaṇato āhāratthāya vikāle yāmakālikādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe viya.
tika-vin07t:1136_7: Yasmā khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkabhesajjatele kasaṭaṃ āmisagatikaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1136_11: Sace vasāya saha pakkattā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1136_16: Roganiggahatthāya eva vasāya anuññātattaṃ sallakkhetvā pacchā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
tika-vin07t:1137_0: “Madhukarīhi nāma madhumakkhikāhī”ti idaṃ khuddakabhamarānaṃ dvinnaṃ eva visesananti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1137_4: Silesasadisanti sukkhatāya vā pakkatāya vā ghanībhūtaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1138_0: Ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti nikkasaṭarasassapi sattāhakālikataṃ dasseti “ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ sāmaññato vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1138_8: taṃ ambaphalarasādimissatāya yāmakālikattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ,
