tika-vin07t:1138_11: Nirāmisameva vaṭṭati tattha paviṭṭhayāvakālikassa abbohārikattāti idaṃ guḷe kate tattha vijjamānampi
tika-vin07t:1138_12: kasaṭaṃ pākena sukkhatāya yāvajīvikattaṃ bhajatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1138_13: Tassa yāvakālikatte hi sāmaṃpākena purebhattepi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ siyāti.
tika-vin07t:1138_14: “Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā”ti idaṃ ucchurase cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hutvā ṭhitakasaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1138_15: tena ca aparissāvitena appaṭiggahitena anupasampannehi kataṃ sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1138_17: Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1139_0: Taṃ tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pakkakāle yāvakālikattaṃ vijahatīti āha “taṃ yutta”nti.
tika-vin07t:1139_1: Sītodakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītodakena madditvā parissāvetvā pacitvā kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1139_5: Madhukapupphaṃ panātiādi yāvakālikarūpena ṭhitassapi avaṭṭanakamerayabījavatthuṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1140_1: Āhārakiccaṃ karontāni etāni kasmā evaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti codanāparihārāya bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena
tika-vin07t:1140_2: tappasaṅgena sabbānipi odissakāni ekato dassetuṃ “sattavidhaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1140_3: Apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni virūpāni visaharaṇato mahāvisayattā mahantāni cāti mahāvikaṭāni.
tika-vin07t:1141_1: evaṃ paribhoge anapekkhatāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1141_2: Evaṃ aññesupi kālikesu anajjhoharitukāmatāya suddhacittena bāhiraparibhogatthāya niyamepi paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1141_3: vijahatīti idampi visuṃ ekaṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanakāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_3: evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo “sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1142_6: Aññathā hi saddappayogopi na saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin07t:1142_7: “Gaṇṭhipadepi ca ayameva pāṭho dassito”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_9: “Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ “sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_11: tena vissajjitattā”ti iminā upasampannassa dānampi sandhāya “vissajjetī”ti idaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1142_12: Upasampannassa nirapekkhadinnavatthumhi paṭiggahaṇassa avigatattepi sakasantakatā vigatāva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1142_15: sakasantakattañcāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi nissaggiyaṃ hoti, na ekena.
tika-vin07t:1142_19: “Vissajjetī”ti etasmiñca pāḷipade kassaci adatvā anapekkhatāya chaḍḍanampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_21: Paṭiggahaṇe hi vijahite puna paṭiggahetvā paribhogo sayameva vaṭṭissati,
tika-vin07t:1142_23: etena ca vatthumhi ajjhoharaṇāpekkhāya sati paṭiggahaṇavissajjanaṃ nāma visuṃ na labbhatīti sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:1142_24: Itarathā hi “paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhova paṭiggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:1142_25: “Appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā ekassa santakaṃ aññena paṭiggahitampi nissaggiyaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1143_0: Evanti “puna gahessāmī”ti apekkhaṃ akatvā suddhacittena pariccattataṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin07t:1143_1: Paribhuñjantassa anāpattidassanatthanti nissaggiyamūlikāhi pācittiyādiāpattīhi anāpattidassanatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1143_2: Paribhoge anāpattidassanatthanti ettha pana nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhassa kāyikaparibhogādīsu yā dukkaṭāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1146_3: Taṃ “katvā nivāsetabba”nti imassa purimaddhamāse vā pacchimaddhamāse vā katvā pacchimamāseva nivāsetabbanti
tika-vin07t:1146_4: evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nivāsaneyeva āpattiyā vuttattāti.
tika-vin07t:1146_5: Yaṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso pariyesanakkhettaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1146_7: taṃ tasmiṃyeva addhamāse katvā nivāsetabbanti evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1146_8: Idha vuttanayeneva atthe gahite virodho natthi.
tika-vin07t:1147_2: Pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghaṃ vā attānaṃ vā appavāretvāva anusaṃvaccharaṃ dāyakā.
tika-vin07t:1148_1: “Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti etena antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1148_2: Ekamāsanti hemantassa pacchimuposathena saha gaṇetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1148_3: Tasmiṃ uposathadivase eva hi taṃ mūlacīvaraṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1148_6: laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti ettha ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca dvīhānāgatāya…pe…
tika-vin07t:1148_7: dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,
tika-vin07t:1148_8: antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:1148_10: tadaheva rajanakappapariyosānehi niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā “ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1148_12: niṭṭhitā ca “dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1148_15: niṭṭhitā ca “antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1148_16: Paṭhamakattikatemāsipuṇṇamito paraṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca yāva cīvarakālo nātikkamati,
tika-vin07t:1149_0: Ettha ca “tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti avisesena vuttepi vassānato pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena
tika-vin07t:1149_1: anāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā tehi divasehi dasāhaṃ anatikkamantena vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin07t:1149_3: tato pana pubbe dasāhātikkamena niṭṭhitāpi na adhiṭṭhātabbā adhiṭṭhānassa akhettattā.
tika-vin07t:1149_6: Yadi evaṃ “dasāhānāgatāyā”ti iminā kiṃ payojananti ce?
tika-vin07t:1149_7: Vassānato pubbe eva dasāhe atikkante niṭṭhitā vassūpanāyikadivase eva adhiṭṭhātabbāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1150_0: Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti temāsabbhantare dasāhe appahonte navāhānāgatāya kattikatemāsipuṇṇamāya sattamito paṭṭhāya laddhā,
tika-vin07t:1150_2: Tathā hi “māso seso gimhānanti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabba”nti pariyesanakkhettaṃ vatvā
tika-vin07t:1150_3: “vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vuttattā katāyapi akatāyapi māsamattaṃ anadhiṭṭhātabbatā siddhā.
tika-vin07t:1150_4: Yasmā ca akatā vassikasāṭikasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin07t:1150_7: tasmā cātumāsaṃ akatattā eva parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin07t:1150_9: akatā ca cīvarakāle dasāhaparamasikkhāpadeneva parihāraṃ labhatīti ayamattho labbhati.
tika-vin07t:1150_12: “Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti suttaṃ panettha sesacīvarānaṃ evaṃ kālaniyamābhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1150_13: Na hi tenettha aññaṃ payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin07t:1151_0: Kadā adhiṭṭhātabbātiādikurundivacanenāpi “yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasāhabbhantare
tika-vin07t:1152_1: Etesañhi asamaye pariyesananivāsanāpattiyā eva anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1152_2: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā anivatthaṃ corā harantīti evaṃ āpadāsu
tika-vin07t:1152_4: idha pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ ayaṃ nissaggiyā anāpatti pāḷito sayameva sijjhatīti imaṃ adassetvā asijjhamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1152_5: naggassa nhāyato dukkaṭāpattiyā eva anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “acchinnacīvarassā”tiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1152_6: Na hi esā anāpatti avutte sijjhatīti.
tika-vin07t:1152_9: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1155_2: acchindīti ettha yaṃ te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ,
tika-vin07t:1155_4: na aññathāti kupito acchindīti evaṃ ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1156_1: Ekaṃ dukkaṭanti yadi āṇatto avassaṃ acchindati,
tika-vin07t:1156_5: Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti yadi āṇatto anantarāyena acchindati,
tika-vin07t:1156_6: āṇattikkhaṇeyeva vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyaāpattiyo payogakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva āpattiyā āpajjitabbato,
tika-vin07t:1157_2: tena ca sāmaṇerakāle datvā upasampannakāle acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:1157_3: “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1157_4: Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1157_9: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1160_3: Vāyantā tiriyaṃ suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭentā vatthe ghanabhāvaṃ āpādenti,
tika-vin07t:1161_0: “Itarasmiṃ tatheva dukkaṭa”nti iminā vāyituṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttaparicchedaniṭṭhiteyeva dukkaṭampi hoti,
tika-vin07t:1162_0: Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti ettha ekavāraṃ adhiṭṭhite pacchā vītaṃ adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1162_2: Sace pana antarantarā dasā ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ saparicchedaṃ vītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1162_4: Ettha ca kappiyasuttaṃ gahetvā aññātakaappavāritenāpi akappiyatantavāyena “suttamatthi,
tika-vin07t:1162_8: evaṃ vadanto akappiyatantavāyena vāyāpeti nāma, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t:1163_1: Anāpatti cīvaraṃ sibbetuntiādīsu iminā sikkhāpadeneva anāpatti,
tika-vin07t:1163_5: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1166_3: Teneva tassa vibhaṅge “antamaso dhammampi bhaṇatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1169_1: Aṭṭhame chaṭṭhiyaṃ uppannacīvarassa ekādasamāruṇo cīvarakāle uṭṭhātīti āha “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā”tiādi,
tika-vin07t:1169_2: tena ca “dasāhānāgata”nti vuttattā pañcamito paṭṭhāya puṇṇamito pubbe dasasu aruṇesu uṭṭhitesupi cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1169_3: Puṇṇamiyā saha ekādasa divasā labbhantīti ettakameva iminā sikkhāpadena laddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1169_4: chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ sabbacīvaraṃ paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaseneva yāva cīvarakālaṃ nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1170_1: Idāni paṭhamakathinādisikkhāpadehi tassa tassa cīvarassa labbhamānaṃ parihāraṃ idheva ekato sampiṇḍetvā dassento “atirekacīvarassā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1170_3: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā”ti ayameva pāṭho pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin07t:1170_5: dasadivasādhikā pañca māsāti pāṭhena bhavitabba”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1170_8: Yaṃ panettha mātikāṭṭhakathāyañca “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho,
tika-vin07t:1170_9: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti likhanti,
tika-vin07t:1170_10: taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ “pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hotī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1170_11: Imameva ca pamādalikhitaṃ gahetvā bhadantabuddhadattācariyena ca “parihārekamāsova,
tika-vin07t:1171_0: Accekacīvarasadise aññasminti pubbe adhiṭṭhite uppannakālākārādi sādisena accekacīvarasadise aññasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:1171_5: Anaccekacīvarampi hi cīvarakālaṃ atikkamayato pācittiyameva accekacīvarattike viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1174_1: Navame antarantarā gharametthāti antaragharanti gāmo vuttoti āha “antogāme”ti.
tika-vin07t:1174_2: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “upasampajja”nti sānusāraṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1174_6: etena ca purimasikkhāpade anatthatakathinānaṃ kathinamāsepi asamādānacāro na labbhatīti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1175_0: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti ettha gāmapariyante ṭhitagharūpacārato paṭṭhāya eko leḍḍupāto parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1175_3: Majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārassapi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1176_0: “Kosambiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hotī”ti āgatattā “kosambakasammuti anuññātā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1176_1: “Ayañca pacchimadisaṃ gato hotī”ti iminā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa sakalampi cīvaramāsaṃ vippavasituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1176_2: tato aññattha gamanakicce sati vihārato bahi chārattaṃ vippavāso anuññātoti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:1179_1: Dasame ropitamālavacchatoti kenaci niyametvā ropitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1179_2: Anocitaṃ milāyamānaṃ ocinitvā yattha katthaci pūjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1179_3: Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā.
tika-vin07t:1179_5: tattha dethāti ettha niyametvā “asukassa dehī”ti vuttepi doso natthi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1191_6: “Jānitabbato”ti hetuno vipakkhepi nibbāne vattanato anekantikatte parehi vutte “na mayā ayaṃ hetu vutto”ti
tika-vin07t:1191_7: taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ puna “jātidhammatoti mayā vutta”ntiādīni vadati.
tika-vin07t:1192_1: Sampajānamusāvādeti attanā vuccamānassa atthassa vitathabhāvaṃ pubbepi jānitvā,
tika-vin07t:1193_2: “Dhanunā vijjhatī”tiādīsu viya “cakkhunā diṭṭha”nti pākaṭavasena vuttanti āha “oḷārikenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1194_1: Gato bhavissatīti etthāpi sanniṭṭhānato vuttattā musāvādo jāto.
tika-vin07t:1194_4: Jātiādīhi dasahi akkosavatthūhi paraṃ davā vadantassa hi taṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1194_9: tassa puggalassa viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1194_10: Vatthuviparītatāya hi asati visaṃvādanapurekkhāratāya viññāpitepi musāvādo na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1194_19: kevalaṃ musā bhaṇantassa idha pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1197_1: Dutiye pubbe patiṭṭhitārappadesaṃ puna are patteti paṭhamaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitanemippadese parivattetvā puna bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhiteti attho.
tika-vin07t:1198_5: Acchiddakagaṇanā nāma ekaṭṭhānadasaṭṭhānādīsu sāriyo ṭhapetvā anukkamena gaṇanā. Ādi-
tika-vin07t:1198_8: so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti jānāti. Yabha-
tika-vin07t:1199_2: Sopi āpattiyāti upasaggādivisiṭṭhehipi vadanto pācittiyāpattiyāva kāretabbo.
tika-vin07t:1200_1: Dubbhāsitanti sāmaññato vuttattā pāḷiyaṃ anāgatehipi parammukhā vadantassapi dubbhāsitamevāti ācariyā vadanti tato lāmakāpattiyā abhāvā,
tika-vin07t:1201_1: Anusāsanīpurekkhāratāya vā pāpagarahitāya vā vadantānaṃ cittassa lahuparivattibhāvato antarantarā kope uppannepi anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1201_6: Na hīti vattabba”ntiādinā itarāni samuṭṭhānāni paṭikkhipitvā pañcamasseva vuttattā āha “dubbhāsitāpatti panettha vācācittato samuṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1201_7: Davakamyatāya hi kāyavācācittehi omasantassapi vācācittameva āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1201_8: na pana kāyo vijjamānopi dhammadesanāpatti viya kevalaṃ kāyavikāreneva.
tika-vin07t:1201_9: Omasantassa pana kiñcāpi idha dubbhāsitāpattiyā anāpatti,
tika-vin07t:1204_5: tassa kammaṃ pesuññanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1205_0: Idhāpi jātiādīhi dasahi vatthūhi pesuññaṃ upasaṃharantasseva pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1205_3: Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1208_1: Catutthe purimabyañjanena sadisanti “rūpaṃ anicca”nti ettha anicca-
tika-vin07t:1209_3: Etena gāthāya pacchimapāde vuccamāne sāmaṇero paṭhamapādādiṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t:1209_5: tasmiṃ nissadde eva itarena vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1210_2: nilīyitvā gaṇhate mige”ti evamādikaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ attheva,
tika-vin07t:1210_3: buddhaghosācariyādīhi porāṇaṭṭhakathānayena vuttampi idha saṅgahetabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1211_0: 46. Pāḷiyaṃ akkharāyātiādi liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, akkharenātiādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1212_1: Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti parisāya dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā ekato ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā anupasampannassa akathetvā aññe uddissa bhaṇantassāpi anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1212_2: Sace pana dūre nisinnampi uddissa bhaṇati,
tika-vin07t:1215_3: nirantaraṃ tissova rattiyo vasitvā catutthadivasādīsu sayantasseva āpatti,
tika-vin07t:1215_10: Ekūpacāro ekena maggena pavisitvā abbhokāsaṃ anukkamitvā sabbattha anuparigamanayoggo,
tika-vin07t:1215_12: Tattha pana kuṭṭādīhi rundhitvā visuṃ dvāraṃ yojenti,
tika-vin07t:1215_16: “etampi ekūpacārameva mattikādīhi pihitadvāro viya gabbho”ti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1215_17: Aññathā gabbhe pavisitvā pamukhādīsu nipannānupasampannehi sahaseyyāparimuttiyā gabbhadvāraṃ mattikādīhi
tika-vin07t:1215_18: pidahāpetvā uṭṭhite aruṇe vivarāpentassapi anāpatti bhaveyyāti.
tika-vin07t:1216_0: Tesaṃ payoge payoge bhikkhussa āpattīti ettha keci “anuṭṭhahanena akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti vuttā tasmiṃ khaṇe sayantassa kiriyābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1216_7: hi dvārāsaṃvaraṇena cetaṃ akiriyasamauṭṭhānampi hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1217_0: “Uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassā”ti idaṃ sambaddhabhittike vattabbameva natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1217_1: Uparimatale sayitassa saṅkā eva natthīti “heṭṭhāpāsāde”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1218_2: Yattha tīsu dvīsu vā passesu bhittiyo baddhā,
tika-vin07t:1218_5: Vāḷasaṅghāṭo nāma parikkhepassa anto thambhādīnaṃ upari vāḷarūpehi katasaṅghāṭo.
tika-vin07t:1218_6: Parikkhepassa bahigateti ettha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi,
tika-vin07t:1218_7: tattha sace bhūmito vatthu uccaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1218_8: ubhato uccavatthuto heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ nibbakosabbhantarepi anāpatti eva tattha senāsanavohārābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:1218_9: Atha vatthu nīcaṃ bhūmisamameva senāsanassa heṭṭhimatale tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:1218_10: tattha parikkheparahitadisāya nibbakosabbhantare sabbattha āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t:1218_11: paricchedābhāvato parikkhepassa bahi eva anāpattīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1218_12: Parimaṇḍalaṃ vātiādi majjhe udakapatanatthāya ākāsaṅgaṇavantaṃ senāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1218_13: Tattha aparicchinnagabbhūpacāreti ekekagabbhassa dvīsu passesu pamukhena gamanaṃ paricchinditvā diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhato
tika-vin07t:1218_14: anūnaṃ kuṭṭaṃ katvā ākāsaṅgaṇena pavesaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t:1218_16: Gabbhaparikkhepoti caturassapāsādādīsu samantā ṭhitagabbhabhittiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1219_0: Pāṭekkasannivesāti ekekadisāya gabbhapāḷiyo itaradisāsu gabbhapāḷīnaṃ abhāvena,
tika-vin07t:1219_1: bhāvepi vā aññamaññabhitticchadanehi asambandhatāya pāṭekkasannivesā nāma vuccati. Taṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1219_2: sandhāya vuttanti tattha pācittiyena anāpattīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1219_4: Tādisāya hi gabbhapāḷiyā pamukhaṃ tīsu disāsu bhittīnaṃ abhāvena ekadisāya gabbhabhittimattena sabbacchannaṃ cūḷaparicchannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t:1219_6: Yadi pana tassa pamukhassa itaradisāsupi ekissaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1219_9: Bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāyāti ettha uccavatthuṃ akatvā bhūmiyaṃ katagehassa pamukhaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1219_12: tena vatthunā parikkhittasaṅkhyameva pamukhaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1219_14: Jagatiyā pamāṇaṃ vatvāti pakatibhūmiyā nipanno yathā jagatiyā upari sayitaṃ na passati,
tika-vin07t:1219_16: Ekadisāya ujukameva dīghaṃ katvā sannivesito pāsādo ekasālasanniveso. Dvīsu,
tika-vin07t:1219_17: tīsu vā catūsupi vā disāsu siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānādivasena katā dvisālādisannivesā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1219_19: Parikkhepo viddhastoti pamukhassa parikkhepaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1220_1: Upaḍḍhacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannaṃ senāsanaṃ dukkaṭassa ādiṃ vatvā pāḷiyaṃ dassitattā tato adhikaṃ sabbacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādikampi
tika-vin07t:1220_2: sabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi pācittiyasseva vatthubhāvena dassitaṃ sikkhāpadassa paṇṇattivajjattā,
tika-vin07t:1220_4: Satta pācittiyānīti pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyadvayaṃ sāmaññato ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1221_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasatī”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1221_2: anikkhamitvā pana purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā antochadane nisinnassāpi punadivase sahaseyyena anāpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1221_3: Senambamaṇḍapavaṇṇaṃ hotīti sīhaḷadīpe kira uccavatthuko sabbacchanno sabbaaparicchanno evaṃnāmako sannipātamaṇḍapo atthi,
tika-vin07t:1221_7: tīsu bhāgesu dve bhāgā yebhuyyanti iminā nayena cūḷakacchannaparicchannatādīni veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t:1224_1: Chaṭṭhe mātugāmena saddhiṃ catutthadivase sayantassāpi iminā sikkhāpadena ekāva āpatti.
tika-vin07t:1224_2: Keci pana purimasikkhāpadenāpīti dve āpattiyo vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1224_3: taṃ na yuttaṃ “anupasampannenā”ti anitthiliṅgena vuttattā napuṃsakena pana catutthadivase sayantassa sadukkaṭapācittiyaṃ vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1224_5: tadanulomikā pana purisaubhatobyañjanakena saha sayantassa iminā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1227_1: Sattame na yakkhenātiādīnaṃ “aññatra viññunā”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin07t:1227_4: Tādisenapi hi saha ṭhitāya desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1228_1: purisaṃ vā dvādasahatthūpacāre apakkosāpanaṃ ettha akiriyā.
tika-vin07t:1228_2: Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā,
tika-vin07t:1231_3: kiṃ tumhehi adhigata”nti evaṃ nippīḷiyamānena atibaddhiyamānena.
tika-vin07t:1231_7: “Cittakkhepassa vā abhāvā”ti iminā khittacittavedanāṭṭatāpi ariyānaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1232_1: Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ paṇṇattiajaānanavasena ekantato acittakasamuṭṭhānameva hoti ariyānaṃ paṇṇattivītikkamābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1232_2: Jhānalābhīnañca satthu āṇāvītikkamapaṭighacittassa jhānaparihānato bhūtārocanaṃ na sambhavati.
tika-vin07t:1235_1: Navame tattha bhaveyyāti tattha kassaci mati evaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t:1235_2: Aṭṭhakathāvacanameva upapattito daḷhaṃ katvā patiṭṭhapento “imināpi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1239_1: Dasame appapaṃsumattikāya pathaviyā anāpattivatthubhāvena vuttattā upaḍḍhapaṃsumattikāyapi pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1239_2: Na hetaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti sakkā vattuṃ jātājātavinimuttāya tatiyapathaviyā abhāvato.
tika-vin07t:1240_0: Vaṭṭatīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāti okāsassa aniyamitattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1240_1: Imaṃ valliṃ khaṇāti pathavīkhaṇanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā imināva sikkhāpadena āpatti,
tika-vin07t:1240_3: Ubhayampi sandhāya vutte pana dvepi pācittiyā honti.
tika-vin07t:1240_4: Udakapappaṭakoti udake antobhūmiyaṃ paviṭṭhe tassa uparibhāgaṃ chādetvā tanukapaṃsu vā mattikā vā paṭalaṃ hutvā patamānā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:1240_5: tasmiṃ udake sukkhepi taṃ paṭalaṃ vātena calamānā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:1241_2: Mūsikukkaraṃ nāma mūsikāhi khanitvā bahi katapaṃsurāsi.
tika-vin07t:1241_3: Acchadanantiādivuttattā ujukaṃ ākāsato patitavassodakena ovaṭṭhameva jātapathavī hoti,
tika-vin07t:1241_4: na chadanādīsu patitvā tato pavattaudakena tintanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1247_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame niggahetuṃ asakkontoti sākhaṭṭhakavimāne sākhāya chijjamānāya chijjante tattha
tika-vin07t:1247_2: achedanatthāya devatāya upanītaṃ puttaṃ disvāpi kuṭhārinikkhepavegaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkontoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1247_4: Rukkhānaṃ viya chedanādīsu akuppanañhi rukkhadhammo nāma.
tika-vin07t:1248_3: Itaroti uppannaṃ kodhaṃ aniggaṇhanto rājauparājādīnaṃ rasmimattaggāhakajano viya na uttamasārathīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1248_4: Visaṭaṃ sappavisanti sarīre dāṭhāvaṇānusārena vitthiṇṇaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ kaṇhasappavisaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:1248_7: Atha vā soti tatiyamaggena kodhaṃ vinetvā ṭhito bhikkhu arahattamaggena orapāraṃ jahātīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1248_12: Tadubhaye pana chandarāgaṃ jahanto “jahāti orimapāra”nti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1249_4: Bhūtānaṃ gāmoti mahābhūtānaṃ haritatiṇādibhāvena samaggānaṃ samūho.
tika-vin07t:1249_5: Tabbinimuttassa gāmassa abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “bhūtā eva vā gāmo”ti vuttaṃ. Pātabya-
tika-vin07t:1249_7: Sā ca pātabyatā chedanādi eva hotīti āha “tassā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1250_1: saddo ettha vijātapariyāyoti “puttaṃ vijātā itthī”tiādīsu viya pasūtavacanoti āha “pasūtānī”ti,
tika-vin07t:1251_1: Kāriyadassanamukheneva kāraṇañca gahitanti āha “bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassita”nti.
tika-vin07t:1252_1: “Bījato sambhūto bhūtagāmo bīja”nti iminā uttarapadalopena “padumagacchato nibbattaṃ pupphaṃ paduma”ntiādīsu viyāyaṃ vohāroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1252_2: Yaṃ bījaṃ bhūtagāmo nāma hotīti nibbattapaṇṇamūlaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1254_0: Seleyyakaṃ nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā gandhajāti.
tika-vin07t:1254_3: Makuḷaṃ pana rukkhattacaṃ akopentenapi gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1255_0: “Pānīyaṃ na vāsetabba”nti idaṃ attano pivanapānīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1255_3: Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti mūlaṃ anotāretvā paṇṇamattaniggamanamattenapi vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin07t:1255_4: Tattha kappiyampi akaronto chinnanāḷikeraveḷudaṇḍādayo kopetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1256_0: “Caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti vuttattā kevalaṃ caṅkamanādhippāyena vā maggagamanādhippāyena vā akkamantassa,
tika-vin07t:1256_1: tiṇānaṃ upari nisīdanādhippāyena nisīdantassa ca doso natthi.
tika-vin07t:1257_5: Kappiyanti vatvāvāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttepi vacanakkhaṇeva aggisatthādinā bījagāme vaṇaṃ kātabbanti vacanato pana pubbe kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1257_7: Karontena ca bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutteyeva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1257_8: Bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva adhikatattā.
tika-vin07t:1257_9: “Kaṭāhepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā kaṭāhato nīhatāya miñjāya vā bīje vā yattha katthaci vijjhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1257_12: vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1260_1: Dutiye aññaṃ vacananti yaṃ dosavibhāvanatthaṃ parehi vuttavacanaṃ taṃ tassa ananucchavikena aññena vacanena paṭicarati.
tika-vin07t:1261_2: tadeva pucchitamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vadati pakāsetīti aññavādakanti āha “aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-vin07t:1263_1: Anāropite aññavādaketi vuttadukkaṭaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataaññenaññapaṭicaraṇavasena yujjati,
tika-vin07t:1263_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena pana musāvādena aññenaññaṃ paṭicarantassa pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1267_1: Bhikkhuṃ lāmakato cintāpanatthaṃ aññesaṃ taṃ avaṇṇakathanaṃ ujjhāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1267_2: Aññesaṃ pana avatvā aññamaññaṃ samullapanavasena bhikkhuno dosappakāsanaṃ khiyyanaṃ nāmāti ayametesaṃ bhedo.
tika-vin07t:1268_1: Aññaṃ anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpetīti aññena anupasampannena ujjhāpeti.
tika-vin07t:1268_2: Tassa vā taṃ santiketi tassa anupasampannassa santike taṃ saṅghena sammataṃ upasampannaṃ khiyyati.
tika-vin07t:1268_3: Idhāpi musāvādena ujjhāpanādīnaṃ sambhavato dukkaṭaṭṭhānāni ca ādikammikassa anāpatti ca iminā eva sikkhāpadena
tika-vin07t:1268_11: ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ vāti imānettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1271_2: Imaṃ pana aṭṭha māse maṇḍapādīsu ṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ atthavisesaṃ gahetvā bhagavatā paṭhamameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti adhippāyaṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin07t:1271_4: aṭṭhamāse”tiādivacanena anupaññattisadisena pakāsetvā visuṃ anupaññatti na vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1271_5: Parivāre panetaṃ anujānanavacanaṃ anupaññattiṭṭhānanti “ekā anupaññattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1272_2: Te hi vassena sīghaṃ na nassanti.
tika-vin07t:1272_6: tena ca vassabhayena sayaṃ aññattha gacchantassa āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1272_7: Abbhokāsikānaṃ temanatthāya niyametvā dāyakehi dinnampi attānaṃ rakkhantena rakkhitabbameva.
tika-vin07t:1273_0: “Valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā”ti iminā gimhānepi meghe uṭṭhite abbhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:1273_1: Tatra tatrāti cetiyaṅgaṇādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ abbhokāse niyametvā nikkhittā.
tika-vin07t:1273_2: Majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti yattha samantato sammajjitvā aṅgaṇamajjhe sabbadā kacavarassa saṅkaḍḍhanena majjhe vālikā sañcitā hoti.
tika-vin07t:1273_5: Yattha vā pana koṇesu vālikā sañcitā,
tika-vin07t:1273_6: tattha tato paṭṭhāya aparadisābhimukhā haritabbāti keci atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1273_7: Keci pana “sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānassa padavaḷañjena avikopanatthāya sayaṃ asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano pādābhimukhaṃ vālikā haritabbāti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1273_8: tattha “majjhato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanassa payojanaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin07t:1274_2: na aṭanīsu pādappavesanavisesenāti dassetuṃ “yo vā pana kocī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1275_1: pācittiyanti ettha meghuṭṭhānābhāvaṃ ñatvā “pacchā āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti ābhogena gacchantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin07t:1276_0: Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti āgantukesu kiñci avatvā nisīditvā “āvāsikā eva uddharissantī”ti gatesupi āvāsikānameva palibodho.
tika-vin07t:1276_1: Mahāpaccarivāde pana “idaṃ amhāka”nti avatvāpi nisinnānamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1276_2: “Santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā”ti vuttattā anāṇattiyā paññāpitattāpi dukkaṭe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1276_4: So hi uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pāḷipāṭhaṃ sāreti pavattetīti ussārakoti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1277_2: Bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbāti cimilikāya sati tassā upari,
tika-vin07t:1277_4: “Sīhacammādīnaṃ pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo”ti iminā mañcapīṭhādīsu attharitvā puna saṃharitvā ṭhapanādivasena
tika-vin07t:1277_6: bhūmattharaṇādivasena paribhogo pana attano pariharaṇaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1277_8: bahipi mañce paññattāni hontī”ti evaṃ attano attano atthāya mañcādīsu paññapetvā pariharaṇavatthusmiṃ –
tika-vin07t:1280_1: “Āgantvā uddharissāmīti gacchatī”ti vuttattā aññenapi kāraṇena anotāpentassapi āgamane sāpekkhassa anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1280_3: vuttalakkhaṇe dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin07t:1280_7: leḍḍupātātikkamo”ti evamettha nirapekkhatāya saddhiṃ cha aṅgāni vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:1283_1: Pañcame pāvāro kojavoti paccattharaṇatthāyeva ṭhapitā uggatalomā attharaṇavisesā.
tika-vin07t:1284_1: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttamevatthaṃ savisesaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “kiñcāpi vutto”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1285_1: Yena mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vīnanti,
tika-vin07t:1285_4: “Āpucchanaṃ pana vatta”nti iminā āpatti natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1285_7: vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin07t:1289_5: upacāre nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1293_1: “Sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ ananurūpato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1293_2: Pāpagarahitāya hi akupitacittena nikkaḍḍhāpentassa iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti natthi “kupito anattamano”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1293_4: Pāḷiyaṃ “alajjiṃ nikkaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu cittassa lahuparivattitāya antarantarā kope uppannepi anāpatti alajjitādipaccayeneva nikkaḍḍhanassa āraddhattā.
tika-vin07t:1293_7: kopena nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1296_5: apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1299_1: Navame “mahallako nāma vihāro sassāmiko”ti vuttattā saññācikāya kuṭiyā anāpattīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1299_3: Sā aparipūrūpacārāpi hotīti vivariyamānaṃ kavāṭaṃ yaṃ bhittiṃ āhanati,
tika-vin07t:1299_4: sā sāmantā kavāṭavitthārappamāṇā upacārarahitāpi hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1299_5: Ālokaṃ vātapānaṃ sandheti ghaṭayatīti ālokasandhīti kavāṭaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1299_6: Dvāravātapānūpacārato aññattha punappunaṃ limpanādiṃ karontassa piṇḍagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1300_0: Keci pana “pāḷiyaṃ pācittiyassa avuttattā dukkaṭa”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1300_3: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti haritayutte khette ṭhatvā chādentassa dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1300_4: Keci pana “tādise khette vihāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1301_1: Ujukameva chādananti chādanamukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya yāva piṭṭhivaṃsakūṭāgārakaṇṇikādi,
tika-vin07t:1301_3: Iminā pana yena sabbasmiṃ vihāre ekavāraṃ chādite taṃ chādanaṃ ekamagganti gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ “dve magge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1301_4: Pariyāyena chādanampi imināva nayena yojetabbanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1301_5: taṃ “punappunaṃ chādāpesī”ti imāya pāḷiyā ca “sabbampi cetaṃ chadanaṃ chadanūpari veditabba”nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca sameti.
tika-vin07t:1302_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “maggena chādentassa pariyāyena chādentassā”ti idañca iṭṭhakādīhi,
tika-vin07t:1302_2: Keci pana “pantiyā chāditassa chadanassa upari chadanamukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ ujukameva ekavāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1303_0: Tatiyāya magganti ettha tatiyāyāti upayogatthe sampadānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1303_3: Tiṇapaṇṇehi labbhatīti tiṇapaṇṇehi chādetvā upari ullittāvalittakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1303_5: Tiṇṇaṃ maggānanti maggavasena chāditānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ chadanānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1306_1: Dasame mātikāyaṃ sappāṇakaudakaṃ tiṇena vā mattikāya vā siñceyya,
tika-vin07t:1306_3: Atha vā udakaṃ gahetvā bahi siñceyya,
tika-vin07t:1306_4: tasmiñca udake tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā āharitvā pakkhipeyyāti ajjhāharitvā attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1306_7: Vuttanti mātikāyaṃ “tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1307_0: Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ bāhiraparibhogaṃ sandhāya vatthuvasena vuttaṃ abbhantaraparibhogassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin07t:1307_1: Tadubhayampi “sappāṇaka”nti katvā vadhakacittaṃ vināva siñcane paññattattā “paṇṇattivajja”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1307_6: tādisameva ca udakaṃ vinā vadhakacetanāya kenacideva karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ siñcananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1315_12: Attano sīlarakkhaṇatthaṃ aparānapekkhatāya yena kāmaṃ gantuṃ catasso disā arahati,
tika-vin07t:1316_3: Paguṇā vācuggatāti pāṭhato ca atthato ca paguṇā mukhe sannidhāpanavasena vācuggatā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t:1316_6: Pubbe kira mahātherā pariyattianantaradhānāya ekekassa gaṇassa dīghanikāyādiekekadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ niyyātentā
tika-vin07t:1316_7: “tumhe etaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca pariharatha,
tika-vin07t:1316_8: sakkontā uttaripi uggaṇhathā”ti evaṃ sakaladhammaṃ ganthavasena niyyātenti,
tika-vin07t:1316_9: tattha te ca bhikkhū ganthanāmena dīghabhāṇakā majjhimabhāṇakāti voharīyanti,
tika-vin07t:1316_10: te ca attano bhārabhūtaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ pariccajitvā aññaṃ uggahetuṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin07t:1317_0: Tattha heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggāti mahāvaggato heṭṭhimā sagāthakavaggo,
tika-vin07t:1317_3: Tikanipātato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāti ekakanipātadukanipāte sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1317_4: Dhammapadampi saha vatthunā jātakabhāṇakena attano jātakena saddhiṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1317_5: Tato oraṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccarivādassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1317_8: bhikkhunopi pubbāparānusandhiādikusalatāya ca na hotīti “taṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1317_9: Abhidhamme kiñci uggahetabbanti na vuttanti ettha yasmā vinaye kusalattikādivibhāgo,
tika-vin07t:1317_10: suttantesu samathavipassanāmaggo ca abhidhammapāṭhaṃ vinā na viññāyati,
tika-vin07t:1317_12: tasmā suttavinayānaṃ gahaṇavasena abhidhammaggahaṇaṃ vuttamevāti visuṃ na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1317_13: Yathā “bhojanaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti vutte “byañjanaṃ khāditabba”nti avuttampi vuttameva hoti tadavinābhāvato,
tika-vin07t:1318_0: Parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāyāti parimaṇḍalāni paripuṇṇāni padesu sithiladhanitādibyañjanāni yassaṃ, tāya.
tika-vin07t:1319_3: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā nāma parivattaliṅgā vā pañcasatasākiyāniyo vā.
tika-vin07t:1320_1: Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti nimantitā hutvā bhojanapariyosāne gantukāmā na honti,
tika-vin07t:1321_0: Imāsu katarāpatti pariharitabbāti codanaṃ pariharanto āha “sā rakkhitabbā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1325_5: evaṃ phullamukhapadumaṃ avītaguṇagandhaṃ nimmale antalikkhe ādiccaṃ viya ca attano tejasā tapantaṃ tato
tika-vin07t:1325_6: eva virocamānaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutiyā aṅgīrasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ passāti.
tika-vin07t:1325_7: Rajoharaṇanti sarīre rajaṃ puñchatīti rajoharaṇanti puñchanacoḷassa nāmaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1325_9: Visuddhimaggādīsu pana “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”tiādi obhāsagāthā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1325_13: Idha pana pāḷiyā eva vuttattā therassāpi udānagāthāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1331_1: Catutthe āmisanirapekkhampi āmisahetu ovadatītisaññāya bhaṇantassapi anāpatti sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin07t:1331_6: avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1335_1: Chaṭṭhe kathinavattanti kathinamāse cīvaraṃ karontānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1335_2: Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva vatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti sutvā
tika-vin07t:1335_6: vuttanayena sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1338_1: Sattame pāḷiyaṃ gacchāma bhagini gacchāmāyyāti bhikkhupubbakaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1339_0: Dvidhā vuttappakāroti pādagamane pakkhagamaneti dvidhā vuttappakāro.
tika-vin07t:1339_1: Upacāro na labbhatīti yo parikkhittādigāmassa ekaleḍḍupātādiupacāro vutto,
tika-vin07t:1339_9: Tattha appavisitvāpi upacārato bahi addhayojanabbhantaragatena maggena gacchantopi maggassa dvīsu passesu
tika-vin07t:1339_10: addhayojanabbhantaragataṃ gāmūpacāraṃ sabbaṃ okkamitvā gacchaticceva vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1339_11: Addhayojanato bahi gatena maggena gacchanto na gāmūpacāragaṇanāya kāretabbo,
tika-vin07t:1339_13: Evañca sati anantarasikkhāpade nāvāyeva gāmatīrapassena gacchantassa gāmūpacāragaṇanāya āpatti samatthitā hoti.
tika-vin07t:1339_14: Na hi sakkā nāvāya gāmūpacārabbhantare pavisituṃ.
tika-vin07t:1339_16: Etthantare saṃvidahiteti ettha na kevalaṃ yathāvuttarathikādīsu eva saṃvidahane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1340_0: Addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassāti asati gāme addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa.
tika-vin07t:1340_1: Yasmiñhi gāmakhettabhūtepi araññe addhayojanabbhantare gāmo na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1341_7: gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1341_8: Ekatoupasampannādīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gacchantassa pana mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin07t:1344_2: nirantaranti nadito addhayojanabbhantare padese niviṭṭhagāmehi nirantaratā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1344_3: Ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññanti tathā niviṭṭhagāmābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1344_4: Agāmakatīrapassenātiādi pana atirekaaddhayojanavitthataṃ nadiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1344_5: Tato ūnavitthārāya hi nadiyā majjhenāpi gamane tīradvayassāpi addhayojanabbhantare gatattā gāmantaragaṇanāya,
tika-vin07t:1344_9: Teneva hi yojanato ūnāya nadiyā addhayojanabbhantaragatatīravaseneva āpattigaṇanaṃ vuttameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:1344_11: Tattha kiñcāpi samuddataḷākādīsu pācittiyaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1344_14: yoniso vā manasi karontassa gāmantarokkamanādīsupi āpattisambhavato paṇṇattivajjatā,
tika-vin07t:1347_2: pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti idaṃ iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1347_3: Pañcahi sahadhammikehi kataviññattiparikathādīhi uppannaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1350_1: Dasame upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenāti mātugāmena rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1350_2: taṃ pana acelakavagge pañcamampi upanandaṃ ārabbha paññattesu catutthattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1356_1: “Gacchanto vā āgacchanto vā”ti idaṃ addhayojanavasena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1356_2: Aññe uddissa paññattañca bhikkhūsu appasannehi titthiyehi sāmaññatopi paññattampi bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1359_1: Dutiye abhimāreti abhibhavitvā bhagavantaṃ māraṇatthāya payojite dhanudhare.
tika-vin07t:1359_2: Nanu “rājānampi mārāpesī”ti vacanato idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ajātasattuno kāle paññattanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1359_3: evañca sati pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa…pe…
tika-vin07t:1359_7: So kira ājīvako bimbisārakālato pabhuti antarantarā bhikkhū nimantetvā dānaṃ dento ajātasattukālepi sikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:1359_10: Tasmā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ vatthu dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1361_1: Imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuvaseneva viññattito gaṇabhojanatthatā siddhāti taṃ avatvā padabhājane asiddhameva
tika-vin07t:1361_4: “Yena kenaci vevacanenā”ti vuttattā “bhojanaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādisāmaññanāmenāpi gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1361_5: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ addhānagamanādivatthūsu “idheva bhuñjathā”ti vuttavacanassa kukkuccāyanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1361_6: tampi odanādināmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā eva katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1361_7: Ekato gaṇhantīti aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ekato ṭhatvā gaṇhanti.
tika-vin07t:1362_0: “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vuttattā pāḷi (vaṇṇanā) yaṃ “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehī”tiādino
tika-vin07t:1362_1: vuttattā ca bhojananāmena viññattameva gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1362_2: tañca aññena viññattampi ekato gaṇhantānaṃ sabbesampi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1362_3: Visuṃ gahitaṃ pana viññattaṃ bhuñjato paṇītabhojanādisikkhāpadehi āpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1363_0: Āgantukapaṭṭanti acchinditvā anvādhiṃ āropetvā karaṇacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1363_1: Ṭhapetīti ekaṃ antaṃ cīvare bandhanavasena ṭhapeti.
tika-vin07t:1363_2: Paccāgataṃ sibbatīti tasseva dutiyaantaṃ parivattitvā āhataṃ sibbati.
tika-vin07t:1363_3: Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ bandhatīti cīvarena laggaṃ karonto punappunaṃ tattha tattha suttena bandhati.
tika-vin07t:1363_6: Valetīti anekaguṇasuttaṃ hatthena vā cakkadaṇḍena vā vaṭṭeti ekattaṃ karoti.
tika-vin07t:1363_8: yasmiṃ suttaguḷaṃ pavesetvā veḷunāḷikādīsu ṭhapetvā paribbhamāpetvā suttakoṭito paṭṭhāya ākaḍḍhanti.
tika-vin07t:1364_6: Gaṇo bhijjatīti nimantitasaṅgho na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1365_0: Adhivāsetvā gatesūti ettha akappiyanimantanādhivāsanakkhaṇe pubbapayoge dukkaṭampi natthi,
tika-vin07t:1365_1: viññattito pasavane pana viññattikkhaṇe itarasikkhāpadehi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1365_3: Tāni cāti kummāsādīni ca tehi bhikkhūhi ekena pacchā gahitattā ekato na gahitāni.
tika-vin07t:1366_1: mocetabbā”ti etena bhattuddesakena akappiyanimantane sādite sabbesampi sāditaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1366_2: Ekato gaṇhantānaṃ gaṇabhojanāpatti ca hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1366_3: Dūtassa dvāre āgantvā puna “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1369_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitāti kulapaṭipāṭiyā dātabbā bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā na ṭhitā,
tika-vin07t:1370_2: Vikappanāva idha anupaññattivasena mātikāyaṃ anāropitāpi parivāre “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti anupaññattiyaṃ gaṇitā.
tika-vin07t:1370_3: Tattha kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccarivādassa pacchā kathanena parammukhāvikappanā patiṭṭhapitā,
tika-vin07t:1370_5: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1370_6: dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1371_1: Khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vāti pañcabhojanāmisaṃ bhattato upari ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1372_0: Vikappanāya akaraṇato akiriyāvasena idaṃ vācāyapi samuṭṭhitanti āha “vacīkamma”nti.
tika-vin07t:1375_3: Apātheyyādiatthāya paṭiyāditantisaññāya gaṇhantassāpi āpatti eva acittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin07t:1375_4: Attano atthāya “imassa hatthe dehī”ti vacanenāpi āpajjanato “vacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1378_2: kāraṃ avatvā”ti iminā kātabbasaddasāmatthiyā laddhaṃ iti-
tika-vin07t:1378_5: sadde payuttepi atirittaṃ katameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1379_1: “Pavārito”ti idañca kattuatthe nipphannanti dassetuṃ “katapavāraṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhuttāvī-
tika-vin07t:1379_5: Sattuṃ pana pisitvā piṭṭhaṃ katvā temetvā pūvaṃ katvā pacanti,
tika-vin07t:1379_7: “Paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitameva paṭikkhipati nāmā”ti vuttattā yaṃ yaṃ alajjisantakaṃ vā attano apāpuṇakasaṅghikādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1379_8: vā paṭikkhepato pavāraṇā na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1380_0: Āsannataraṃ aṅganti hatthapāsato bahi ṭhatvā onamitvā dentassa sīsaṃ āsannataraṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1381_1: “Imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadatīti kiñci anāmetvā vadati.
tika-vin07t:1381_2: Kevalaṃ vācābhihārassa anadhippetattā gaṇhathāti gahetuṃ āraddhaṃ kaṭacchunā anukkhittampi pubbepi evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1381_5: Dvinnaṃ samabhārepīti parivesakassa ca aññassa ca bhattapacchibhājanavahane samakepīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1382_0: Rasaṃ gaṇhathāti ettha kevalaṃ maṃsarasassa apavāraṇājanakassa nāmena vuttattā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1382_1: Maccharasantiādīsu maccho ca rasañcāti atthassa sambhavato vatthunopi tādisattā pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin07t:1382_2: “idaṃ gaṇhathā”tipi avatvā tuṇhībhāvena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipatopi hoti eva.
tika-vin07t:1383_0: “Uddissa kata”nti maññamānoti ettha vatthuno kappiyattā “pavāritova hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1383_4: Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti bhattassa bahutarabhāvena pavāraṇāsambhavakāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1383_5: aññathā karambakepi macchādibahubhāve pavāraṇā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1383_7: evaṃ parato “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ duddasamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1383_9: tampi “appataraṃ na pavāretī”ti vacanena na sameti.
tika-vin07t:1383_10: Visuṃ katvā detīti “rasaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā vācāya visuṃ katvā detīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1383_12: Tathā aviyojitepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya asambhavato appavāraṇāpahoṇakassa nāmena vuttattā bhattamissakayāguṃ
tika-vin07t:1383_14: aññathā vā ettha yathā pubbāparaṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin07t:1384_0: Nāvā vā setu vātiādimhi nāvādiabhiruhanādikkhaṇe kiñci ṭhatvāpi abhiruhanādikātabbattepi gamanatapparatāya ṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1384_1: janasammaddena pana anokāsādibhāvena kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1384_2: Acāletvāti vuttaṭṭhānato aññasmimpi padese vā uddhaṃ vā apesetvā tasmiṃ eva pana ṭhāne parivattetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin07t:1385_1: taṃ “akappiya”nti iminā tena missaṃ odanādi atirittaṃ hoti evāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1386_0: So puna kātuṃ na labhatīti tasmiññeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamakatena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti puna so eva kātuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin07t:1386_2: Aññena hi katato añño puna kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin07t:1386_3: Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1386_9: Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ettha mukhādīsu laggampi āmisaṃ sodhetvāva atirittaṃ bhuñjitabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1387_1: Vācāya āṇāpetvā atirittaṃ akārāpanato akiriyasamuṭṭhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1394_1: Khādanīye khādanīyatthanti pūvādikhādanīye vijjamānakhādanīyakiccaṃ khādanīyehi kātabbaṃ jighacchāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1394_2: atthaṃ payojanaṃ neva pharanti na nipphādenti.
tika-vin07t:1394_3: Ekasmiṃ dese āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ vā aññasmiṃ dese uṭṭhitabhūmirasādibhedena āhārakiccaṃ asādhentampi
tika-vin07t:1394_5: Keci pana “ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi vikāle na kappati evāti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vutta”ntipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1394_6: Pakatiāhāravasenāti aññehi yāvakālikehi ayojitaṃ attano pakatiyāva āhārakiccakaraṇavasena.
tika-vin07t:1394_9: Tenevettha mayampi mūlakamūlādīnaṃ pariyāyantaradassanena adassanaṃ karimha upadesatova gahetabbato.
tika-vin07t:1395_2: rukkhavalliādīnaṃ matthakoti heṭṭhā vuttameva sampiṇḍetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1395_3: Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ “aparipakkānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1395_4: Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ yāvakālikanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1396_2: Tattha hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso.
tika-vin07t:1399_3: pācittiyanti ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyapadehi yāvakālikameva saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1399_5: Tathāpi “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti idha ceva –
tika-vin07t:1401_1: “yāmakālika”nti vacanasāmatthiyato ca bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālikaṃ sannidhikārakakataṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_5: Aṅgulilekhā paññāyatīti sinehābhāvepi pattassa succhavitāya paññāyati.
tika-vin07t:1401_11: Na hi vatthuṃ apariccajitvā tatthagatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccajituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t:1401_16: Na hi dhovanena āmisaṃ apanetuṃ vāyamantassa paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā vattati.
tika-vin07t:1401_18: patte pana vattamānā apekkhā taggatike āmisepi vattati evanāmāti āmise anapekkhatā ettha na labbhati,
tika-vin07t:1401_19: tato āmise avijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ punadivase pācittiyaṃ janetīti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1401_24: evañca paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:1401_26: idaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ katvā visuṃ vattabbaṃ cīvarāpekkhāya vattamānāyapi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:1401_27: Etasmiñca upāye sati gaṇṭhikāhatapattesu avaṭṭanatā nāma na siyāti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-vin07t:1401_28: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhanissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1402_1: Dveti purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ yāmakālikaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannidhipaccayā ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1402_2: yāmakālikasaṃsaṭṭhatāya yāvakālikattabhajanena anatirittapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni.
tika-vin07t:1405_1: Navame paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni bhojanāni paṇītabhojanānīti pāḷiyaṃ pana bhojanāni pubbe vuttattā pākaṭānīti adassitāni,
tika-vin07t:1405_2: tādisehi paṇītehi missattā paṇītabhojanāni nāma honti.
tika-vin07t:1405_4: Sappibhattanti ettha kiñcāpi sappinā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1405_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī”tiādinā vuttattā na sakkā aññaṃ vatthuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1405_7: Aṭṭhakathācariyā eva hi īdisesu ṭhānesu pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1406_1: Tasmā anāpattīti ettha visaṅketena pācittiyābhāvepi sūpodanadukkaṭā na muccatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1406_3: akappiyasappinā”ti ca idaṃ kappiyākappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1407_3: bhesajjaparicchedaṃ vā katvā saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhānato taduttari viññāpentena,
tika-vin07t:1407_4: paricchedabbhantarepi na bhesajjakaraṇīyena rogena bhesajjaṃ viññāpentena ca samo hotīti “mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1410_0: 263. Dasame ghanabaddhoti ghanamaṃsena sambaddho, kathinasaṃhatasarīroti attho.
tika-vin07t:1411_3: Evañca nāsikāya paviṭṭhampi mukhadvāraṃ paviṭṭhameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1411_9: Teneva bhikkhunā tāpitena udakena cirapaṭiggahitena ca akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthena ca saha āmisaṃ bhuñjantassāpi sāmapākādidoso na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1411_13: Bhikkhū pana etaṃ adhippāyaṃ tadā na jāniṃsu.
tika-vin07t:1412_2: Tena tato sukhumaṃ ākāse paribbhamanakaṃ dissamānampi abbohārikanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1413_1: tassa orimantenā”ti iminā ākāse ujuṃ ṭhatvā parena ukkhittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabbo,
tika-vin07t:1414_0: Ettha ca pavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti,
tika-vin07t:1414_1: āsanassa pacchimantato paṭṭhāyā”tiādinā paṭiggāhakānaṃ āsannaṅgassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya paricchedassa
tika-vin07t:1414_2: dassitattā idhāpi ākāse ṭhitassa paṭiggāhakassa āsannaṅgabhūtapādaṅgulassa pārimantabhūtato paṇhipariyantassa
tika-vin07t:1414_4: dāyakassa pana orimantabhūtato pādaṅgulassa heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1414_5: Imināva nayena bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā ussīse nisinnassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassapi āsannasīsaṅgassa pārimantabhūtato
tika-vin07t:1415_5: Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvāti puñchitepi rajanacuṇṇasaṅkāya sati paṭiggahaṇatthāya vuttaṃ, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:1415_6: Taṃ panāti patitarajaṃ appaṭiggahetvā upari gahitapiṇḍapātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1415_9: Tathā akatvā gahitepi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjato anāpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1416_2: Datvā apanayanakāle pana chārikā vā bindūni vā patanti,
tika-vin07t:1416_8: Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhihariyamānassa pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā uparibhāge hatthaṃ pasāretvā phusituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1417_4: Tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1418_0: Tena āharāpetunti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1418_1: taṃ idha ānehīti āṇāpetvā tena āharāpetuṃ itarassa vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1418_2: Na tato paranti tadaheva sāmaṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1418_3: Tadaheva paṭiggahitaṃ pana punadivasādīsu appaṭiggahetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1419_1: tesaṃ cuṇṇehi thullaccayaappaṭiggahaṇāpattiyo na hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1419_2: “Navasamuṭṭhita”nti eteneva ucchuādīsu abhinavalaggattā abbohārikaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1419_5: Tena ca paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu pañcasupi samiddhesu ajjhoharitukāmatāya gahitameva paṭiggahitaṃ nāma hoti ajjhoharitabbesu
tika-vin07t:1419_7: Tathā bāhiraparibhogatthāya gahetvā ṭhapitatelādiṃ ajjhoharitukāmatāya sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1420_0: Kesañcītiādīsu anupasampannānaṃ atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānampi hatthato muttamatte eva paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin07t:1420_1: atha kho bhājane patitameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin07t:1420_2: Bhājanañca bhikkhunā punadivasatthāya apekkhitamevāti taggatampi āmisaṃ duddhotapattagataṃ viya paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1420_3: na vijahatīti āsaṅkāya “sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabba”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1420_6: “Pattagatā yāgū”ti iminā pattamukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhepi kūṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā,
tika-vin07t:1420_7: uggahitā vā na hoti bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭhattāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1420_9: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma majjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1420_10: Na pidahitabbanti hatthato muttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1420_12: hatthato muttampi vā aphusitvā uparipidhānaṃ pātentassa na doso.
tika-vin07t:1421_0: Paṭiggaṇhātīti chāyatthāya upari dhārayamānā mahāsākhā yena kenaci chijjeyya,
tika-vin07t:1421_1: tattha laggarajaṃ mukhe pāteyya cāti kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:1422_0: Dutiyattherassāti “therassa pattaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti tena attano pariccajāpetvā dutiyattherassa deti.
tika-vin07t:1422_2: Kāraṇanti ettha yathā “sāmaṇerā ito amhākampi dentī”ti vitakko uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:1423_1: Uddhanaṃ āropetabbanti anaggikaṃ uddhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1423_2: Uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakkataṇḍulā heṭṭhā pavisitvā paccatīti āha “sāmaṃpākañceva hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1424_0: Ādhārake patto ṭhapitoti appaṭiggahitāmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇatthāya ṭhapito.
tika-vin07t:1424_1: Ekaggahaṇenevāti sāmaṇerānaṃ gahitassa puna acchaḍḍanavasena gahaṇena.
tika-vin07t:1424_5: Himakarakā nāma kadāci vassodakena saha patanakā pāsāṇalekhā viya ghanībhūtaudakavisesā,
tika-vin07t:1424_8: Purebhattameva vaṭṭatīti appaṭiggahitāpattīhi abbohārikampi vikālabhojanāpattīhi sabbohārikanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1425_0: Laggatīti mukhe ca hatthe ca mattikāvaṇṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1426_6: aññampi yaṃkiñci mūlapaṇṇādivisabhesajjaṃ chinditvā chārikaṃ akatvāpi appaṭiggahitampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1431_1: Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame mayhaṃ nāmāti bhikkhunā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā dinnampi sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1431_5: ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1437_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ khuddake ghareti ettha khuddakaṃ gharaṃ nāma pañcahatthato ūnakavitthāraṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1437_2: Tattha ca piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāse avijahitepi piṭṭhivaṃsātikkamo hotīti āha “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1437_3: Yathā tathā vā katassāti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ āropetvā vā anāropetvā vā katassa.
tika-vin07t:1442_1: Chaṭṭhe “pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttattā yo apariyesitabbo upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dissati,
tika-vin07t:1442_2: so sacepi pakativacanassa savanūpacāraṃ atikkamma ṭhito upagantvā āpucchitabbo.
tika-vin07t:1443_1: Anāpattivāre cettha antarārāmādīnaññeva vuttattā vihārato gāmavīthiṃ anuññātakāraṇaṃ vinā atikkamantassāpi āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t:1444_3: tathāpi aññassa gharūpacāraṃ anokkamitvā vīthimajjheneva gantvā icchiticchitagharadvārābhimukhe ṭhatvā manusse oloketvā gacchantassāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin07t:1444_4: Tattha keci “vīthiyaṃ atikkamantassa gharūpacāragaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1448_1: Pāḷiyaṃ kālaṃ āharissathāti ajjatanaṃ kālaṃ vītināmessatha,
tika-vin07t:1448_3: “Atthi pavāraṇā bhesajjapariyantā ca rattipariyantā cā”ti tatiyakoṭṭhāse niyamitameva bhesajjaṃ niyamitakālantareyeva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1451_1: Aṭṭhame ekamekanti ettha duvaṅginīpi tivaṅginīpi senā saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t:1454_0: 319. Navame senāya catuttho sūriyatthaṅgamo, agilānatāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1457_1: Dasame pāḷiyaṃ kati te lakkhāni laddhānīti kittakā tayā laddhāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1462_1: Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ kiṇṇapakkhittāti piṭṭhapūvādiṃ apakkhipitvā kiṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ dhaññaṅkurādisurābījaṃ pakkhipitvā katā.
tika-vin07t:1463_5: Bījato paṭṭhāyāti yathāvuttānaṃ piṭṭhādīnaṃ majjatthāya bhājane pakkhittakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin07t:1464_1: Loṇasovīrakaṃ suttañca anekehi dabbasambhārehi abhisaṅkhato bhesajjaviseso.
tika-vin07t:1464_2: Uyyuttasikkhāpadānaṃ acittakalokavajjesu lokavajjatā pubbe vuttanayāvāti tattha kiñcipi avatvā idha tehi
tika-vin07t:1464_3: asādhāraṇavatthuvisesasiddhāya acittakapakkhepi akusalacittatāya taṃ lokavajjatādivisesaṃ dassetumeva
tika-vin07t:1464_6: taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato sāratthadīpaniyaṃ viraddhaṭṭhānavisodhanavasena vuttanti tattheva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1467_0: 330. Dutiye hasādhippāyatā, upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1470_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ hasadhamme hasadhammasaññītiādīsu uplavādimattaṃ kiṃ hasadhammo hotīti gahaṇavasena sati
tika-vin07t:1470_2: karaṇīye kariyamānaṃ hasadhammaṃ hasadhammoti gahaṇavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1470_3: Ussārentoti udake ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ tīre āropento.
tika-vin07t:1471_0: Patanuppatanavāresūti udakassa uparitale maṇḍūkagatiyā patanuppatanavasena gamanatthaṃ khittāya ekissā kathalāya vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1477_0: 345. Pañcame upasampannatā, tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya vāyamananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1480_1: Chaṭṭhe alātaṃ patitanti aggikapālato bahi patitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1480_2: Vijjhātanti vijjhātaṃ alātaṃ kapālaggimhi pakkhipitvā jālentassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1480_3: tathā kevalaṃ indhanaṃ pātentassapi vijjhātaṃ kapālaggiṃ mukhavātādinā ujjālentassapi.
tika-vin07t:1483_1: Sattame pāḷiyaṃ nagare thakiteti ettha raññā ciraṃ nahāyitukāmena “ahaṃ bahi uyyāne katārakkho vasissāmi,
tika-vin07t:1483_5: taṃ divasaṃ puna aggahitālaṅkārena pabuddhamattenāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1486_1: Aṭṭhame paṭiladdhanavacīvarenāti ettha pubbe akatakappaṃ katipāhaṃ nivāsanatthāya tāvakālikavasena laddhampi saṅgayhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1487_1: “Navaṃ nāma akatakappa”nti sāmaññato vuttattā aññena bhikkhunā kappabinduṃ datvā paribhuttaṃ cīvaraṃ, tena vā,
tika-vin07t:1487_2: tato labhitvā aññena vā kenaci dinnampi katakappameva navaṃ nāma na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1487_3: “Nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā”ti vuttattā aṃsabaddhakāsāvampi pārupitabbato kappaṃ kātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1487_4: Cammakāranīlaṃ nāma cammaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ kātuṃ yojiyamānaṃ nīlaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1498_1: Sattamassa paṭhame usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso.
tika-vin07t:1498_2: Na hettha kiñci jīvitaṃ nāma visuṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:1498_4: Appamattena vattaṃ kātabbanti yathā pāṇakānaṃ vihesāpi na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1504_1: Tatiye “tassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā”ti vuttattā yassa adhikaraṇaṃ saṅghakammena nihataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1505_2: anāpattī”ti vuttattā anādariyatādi viya ukkoṭanaṃ sayaṃ akusalaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1505_4: pana vimatiyā ca ukkoṭaneneva akusalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1508_3: Chādetukāmatāya hi sati eva avassaṃ aññassa ārocanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1508_4: vatthupuggalassa ca ārocanā nāma na hotīti paṭicchādanamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1508_5: Koṭi chinnā hotīti chādessāmīti dhuranikkhepe satipi puggalaparamparāya gacchantī āpattikoṭi chijjati.
tika-vin07t:1509_1: “Anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāmā”ti idaṃ duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anupasampannassa…pe…
tika-vin07t:1509_2: ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāro,
tika-vin07t:1509_4: Sukkavissaṭṭhikāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullaattakāmā panassa ajjhācāro nāmā”ti iminā vacanena virujjhatīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1509_5: Puggalapemena chādayato cettha “aññe garahissantī”ti bhayavasena chādanakkhaṇe paṭighova uppajjatīti “dukkhavedana”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1512_2: Gabbhe sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ paripuṇṇamassāti gabbhavīso.
tika-vin07t:1513_3: Dvādasa māse mātu kucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātaṃ upasampādentīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1513_5: dvādasamāsiko saṃvaccharo”ti vacanato “cattāro māsā parihāyantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1513_8: Tasmā tatiyo tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko hoti.
tika-vin07t:1513_9: Te dve māse gahetvāti nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsato yāva jātadivasabhūtā mahāpavāraṇā.
tika-vin07t:1513_11: tesaṃ atthāya adhikamāsato laddhe dve māse gahetvā.
tika-vin07t:1513_13: “Nikkaṅkhā hutvā”ti idaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vassānaṃ ekaadhikamāse gahetvā tato vīsatiyā vassesupi cātuddasīatthāya
tika-vin07t:1513_14: catunnaṃ māsānaṃ parihāpanena sabbadā paripuṇṇavīsativassataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1513_15: Pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissatīti mahāpavāraṇādivase atikkante gabbhavassena saha vīsativasso bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1513_16: Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā.
tika-vin07t:1514_5: taṃ ñatvā upajjhāyena hutvā upasampādananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1517_0: 409. Chaṭṭhe theyyasatthabhāvo, ñatvā saṃvidhānaṃ, avisaṅketena gamananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1521_1: Aṭṭhame antarāyanti antarā vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-vin07t:1521_3: Ānantariyadhammāti anantare bhave phalanibbattane niyuttā cetanādidhammāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1521_6: pana kalyāṇaputhujjanabhūtāya ca balakkārena dūsentassa ānantariyasaasameva.
tika-vin07t:1521_7: Mokkhantarāyikatā pana lolāyapi pakatattabhikkhuniyā dūsakassa tasmiṃ attabhāve magguppattiyā abhāvato vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1523_1: Rasena rasanti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena pañcakāmaguṇapaabhogarasaṃ samānetvā.
tika-vin07t:1524_0: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamāti ettha aṭṭhi eva nimmaṃsatāya kaṅkalanti ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1524_5: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā aññenapi ākārena yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā vuttaṃ viparītato gahetvā parehi vuttepi amuñcitvā
tika-vin07t:1524_6: voharantassāpi vuttanayānusārena tadanuguṇaṃ samanubhāsanakammavācaṃ yojetvā āpattiyā āropetuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1524_7: āpattiyā adassanādīsu tīsu yaṃ kiñci abhirucitaṃ nimittaṃ katvā ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuñca labbhati.
tika-vin07t:1524_8: Samanubhāsanaṃ akatvāpi “māyasmā evaṃ avacā”ti bhikkhūhi vuttamatte laddhiyā appaṭinissajjanapaccayāya
tika-vin07t:1527_0: 424. Navame “ukkhitto anosārito”ti vuttattā ariṭṭhassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1528_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “ekacchanne”ti sāmaññato vuttattā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjane paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassa arahatopi ukkhittānuvattakānampi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin07t:1531_0: 428. Dasame pireti sambodhanatthe nipātapadaṃ. Sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpadadvaye vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1536_2: asikkhitukāmassa lesena evaṃ vacananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1539_3: Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatītiādi bhikkhubhikkhunīnaññeva vuttaṃ alajjilakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1539_5: pana gahaṭṭhānañca sādhāraṇavasena yathāsakaṃ sikkhāpadavītikkamanapaṭigūhanādito veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1539_8: kappiye akappiyasaññitāya karontopi taṅkhaṇikāya alajjitāya evaṃ karonti.
tika-vin07t:1540_1: Parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāparavitāraṇādivādāti ettha arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ kuhakānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā
tika-vin07t:1540_5: parato sutvā nāmādijānanena paravitāraṇo atthītivādino aññāṇavādā,
tika-vin07t:1541_0: Cattāro maggā ca phalāni cāti ettha ca-
tika-vin07t:1541_5: dhammakathikattherā pana paṃsukūlikattherehi ābhataṃ suttaṃ sutvā –
tika-vin07t:1543_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
tika-vin07t:1545_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
tika-vin07t:1547_0: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti. –
tika-vin07t:1548_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā attanova vādaṃ patiṭṭhapentā pārājikānāpajjanavasena ṭhitā paṭipattisaṅgahitā pariyattiyeva mūlanti āhaṃsūti.
tika-vin07t:1548_1: Tenāha “sace pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1548_3: Etena ca parikkhīṇe kāle lajjigaṇaṃ alabhantena vinayadharena alajjinopi pakatatte saṅgahetvā tehi saha
tika-vin07t:1548_4: dhammāmisasambhogaṃ saṃvāsaṃ karontena bahū kulaputte upasampādetvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1551_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ ko pana vādo bhiyyoti tehi aññehi bhikkhūhi diṭṭhadvattivārato bhiyyo pana vitthārena uddisiyamāne pātimokkhe nisinnapubbatā atthi ce,
tika-vin07t:1551_4: Tañca yathādhammo kāretabboti tanti kāraṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1551_6: Yathā dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito,
tika-vin07t:1551_7: tathā tāya āpattiyā kāretabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1554_0: 451. Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena vāti ettha pāsāṇādinissaggiyapahāropi saṅgahito.
tika-vin07t:1555_3: Mokkhādhippāyena daṇḍakoṭiyā sappādiṃ ghaṭṭetvā maṇḍūkādiṃ mocentassapi anāpatti eva. Kupitatā,
tika-vin07t:1555_4: upasampannassa na mokkhādhippāyena pahāroti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1558_1: Pañcame na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭanti ettha kimidaṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1558_6: Na hi paharitukāmatāya asati tappaccayā kāci āpatti yuttā,
tika-vin07t:1558_7: uggiraṇassa pana attano sabhāvena asaṇṭhitattā tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ na jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1558_8: asuddhacittena katapayogattā ca ettha anāpatti na yuttāti dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1562_1: Chaṭṭhe “attaparittāṇaṃ karontā”ti idaṃ na ca veramūlikā anuddhaṃsanāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1565_0: 464. Sattame upasampannassa aphāsukāmatā, kukkuccuppādananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1568_3: Suyyati etthāti sutīti evañhi atthe gayhamāne savanaṭṭhānasamīpe aññasmiṃ assavanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:1568_5: saddasseva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yattha ṭhatvā”tiādi vuttaṃ, na suti-
tika-vin07t:1572_0: 474. Navame dhammakammatā, jānanaṃ, chandaṃ datvā khiyyananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1575_2: taṃ ñatvā kammato paṭṭhāya ekasīmaṭṭhassa samānasaṃvāsikassa hatthapāsavijahananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1578_2: saṅghena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ datvā khiyyitukāmatāya khiyyananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1584_1: Navamavaggassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ saṃsuddhagahaṇikoti ettha gahaṇīti gabbhāsayasaññito mātu kucchippadeso,
tika-vin07t:1587_1: Dutiye āvasathassāti ettha antoārāme vā hotu aññattha vā,
tika-vin07t:1587_2: yattha katthaci attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āvasatho nāma.
tika-vin07t:1587_6: āsaṅkantīti tasmiṃ nimmanussaṭṭhāne pacchā ākiṇṇamanusse jātepi visaritvā gamanakāle aññassa adiṭṭhattā tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkanti.
tika-vin07t:1587_7: Patirūpaṃ nāma kappiyabhaṇḍe sayaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ gahetvā akappiyabhaṇḍe patirūpānaṃ upāsakādīnaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t:1587_8: cetiyādipuññe niyojanaṃ vā dāpetvā nirapekkhagamanaṃ vā.
tika-vin07t:1590_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ bhayakathanti rājacorādibhayaṃ vā rogāmanussadubbhikkhakantārādibhayaṃ vā ārabbha pavattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1590_8: Lokakkhāyikanti “ayaṃ loko kena nimmito”tiādinā lokasabhāvakkhānavasena pavattanakathā.
tika-vin07t:1590_10: Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā.
tika-vin07t:1590_14: Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ dvattiṃsatiracchānakathā nāma honti.
tika-vin07t:1590_15: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-
tika-vin07t:1590_20: Tasmā evaṃ pakāraṃ ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ niratthakakathaṃ kathetīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1591_1: Ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā vihāraṃ gacchantāti ettha gāmūpacārato bahi nikkhante antarārāmādīnamupacāraṃ paviṭṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1591_2: Gāmūpacārabbhantare pana paṭipassaddhussāhānampi puna tameva vā aññaṃ vā gāmaṃ pavisitukāmatāya sati āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin07t:1591_4: gantabba”nti idaṃ pana purebhattaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ vikāle sañjāte vikāle gāmappavesassa āpucchitabbatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1592_1: Antarārāmantiādīsūti ettha ussavadivasādīsu manussehi gāme padakkhiṇaṃ kārentaṃ jinabimbādiṃ pūjetukāmehi
tika-vin07t:1592_2: vā rogavūpasamādiyatthaṃ manussehi yācitehi vā bhikkhūhi suppaṭicchannādividhiṃ akatvāpi vīthimajjheneva
tika-vin07t:1592_7: Vesāliṃ anupariyāyitvā parittaṃ karontenāpi ānandattherena suppaṭicchannatādiṃ akopenteneva,
tika-vin07t:1592_9: Keci pana “antarārāmādigāmantare ṭhitehi garuṭṭhānīyānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanādivasena gāmavīthiṃ otarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1592_10: tampi antaragharaṃ pavisantaṃ pati kātuṃ na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1592_11: Antarārāmādikappiyabhūmiṃ pana uddissa gacchantaṃ pati kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti khāyati,
tika-vin07t:1598_3: moghapuriso veditabboti hīnajjhāsayavasena ayaṃ tucchapurisoti ñātabbo,
tika-vin07t:1598_4: hīnāya paccaye lolatāya puggalassa tucchatā ñātabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1598_6: ito paresu ca pañcasu attanā kārāpitassa paṭilābhe eva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1601_0: 526. Chaṭṭhe poṭakitūlanti tiṇagacchajātikānaṃ tūlaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1604_0: 531-536. Sattame nisīdanassa pamāṇātikkantatā, attano karaṇādinā paṭilābhoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1606_0: 537-547. Iminā nayena aṭṭhamanavamadasamesupi aṅgāni veditabbāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin07t:1611_1: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame paṭidesetabbākāradassananti evaṃ āpattiṃ navakassa santike desetabbākāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1611_2: Iminā lakkhaṇena sambahulānaṃ āpattīnampi vuḍḍhassa santike ca desetabbākāro sakkā viññātunti.
tika-vin07t:1611_4: dhamme āpajjiṃ asappāye pāṭidesanīye”ti evaṃ sambahulāsu.
tika-vin07t:1611_9: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaraghare ṭhitāya hatthato sahatthā yāvakālikaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1614_3: gilānassa aniccabhattādiṃ gahetvā bhuñjananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1615_2: ananuññātaṃ yāvakālikaṃ appaṭisaṃviditaṃ ajjhārāme paṭiggahetvā agilānassa ajjhoharaṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1619_1: Sekhiyesu yasmā vattakkhandhake vuttavattānipi sikkhitabbattā sekhiyāneva,
tika-vin07t:1619_2: tasmā pārājikādīsu viyettha pāḷiyaṃ paricchedo na kato.
tika-vin07t:1619_4: dukkaṭa”nti avatvā “sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti sabbattha pāḷi āropitā.
tika-vin07t:1619_5: Padabhājane pana “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā sabbattha anādariyakaraṇe dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1620_6: Tasmā yathā sāruppaṃ hoti evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgulānusārena nivāsanaññeva adhippetanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1620_7: Teneva vakkhati “yo pana bhikkhu sukkhajaṅgho vā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1620_8: Kurundiyaṃ “ajānantassa anāpattī”ti ādaraṃ katvā uggaṇhantassāpi ajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1620_11: Parimaṇḍalaggahaṇena ukkhipitvā nivāsanampi paṭikkhittanti āha “ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1621_3: Tattha ca vatthuvijānanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1621_4: Paṇṇattivijānanena tassāpi antogadhabhāvato idaṃ vatthuṃ evaṃ vītikkamantassa āpattīti vijānanto hi paṇṇattiṃ vijānātīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1621_5: Upatissattheravāde cettha paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvā aparimaṇḍalanivāsanādivatthumeva jānantassa paṇṇattivītikkamānādariyābhāvā
tika-vin07t:1621_7: tañca na yuttaṃ kosambakkhandhake vaccakuṭiyaṃ udakāvasesaṃ ṭhapentassa paṇṇattivijānanābhāvepi āpattiyā vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1621_8: Vuttañhi tattha “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno hoti …pe…
tika-vin07t:1621_9: so aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1621_19: So tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1621_21: Khandhakavattānañhi sekhiyattā tattha vutto nayo imesaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1621_22: idha vutto ca tesaṃ sādhāraṇova hotīti.
tika-vin07t:1621_24: natthi āpattī”ti evaṃ idha vutto āpattinayo tatthāpi dassito.
tika-vin07t:1621_25: Tasmā phussadevattheravāde eva ṭhatvā vatthuvijānanacitteneva sabbasekhiyāni sacittakāni,
tika-vin07t:1621_31: Tenevettha “asañciccāti purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsessāmīti evaṃ asañciccā”tiādinā vatthuajānanavaseneva anāpattivaṇṇanā katā,
tika-vin07t:1622_1: taṃ lokavajja”nti iminā lakkhaṇavacanenāpi cetaṃ sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:1622_3: Itarathā paṇṇattivijānanacittavasena sabbasikkhāpadānampi sacittakapakkhe cittassa akusalattaniyamena
tika-vin07t:1622_5: idañca vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā iminā vacanena nivattetabbassa sikkhāpadassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1622_6: Na ca sekhiyesu vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu viya akusalamevāti niyamo atthi,
tika-vin07t:1622_8: “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti cetaṃ pāḷivacanaṃ vatthuṃ jānitvā tīhi cittehi vītikkamameva anādariyaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1622_9: na paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā akusalacitteneva vītikkamanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1622_19: Kevalaṃ tattha tattha vuttapaṭipakkhakaraṇavasena tatiyaṅgayojanameva viseso.
tika-vin07t:1624_4: Etthāpi parimaṇḍalasikkhāpadassa sādhāraṇattā jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā anolambetvā parimaṇḍalameva pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1625_1: Vivaritvā nisīdatoti vihāre viya ekaṃsapārupanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1625_2: “Vāsatthāya upagatassā”ti vuttattā vāsādhippāyaṃ vinā dhammadesanaparittabhaṇanādiatthāya sucirampi nisīdantena
tika-vin07t:1625_4: Nisīdanapaṭisaṃyuttesu eva ca sikkhāpadesu “vāsūpagatassā”ti anāpattiyā vuttattā vāsatthāya antaragharaṃ
tika-vin07t:1625_8: Keci pana “ekekasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ gantvā vāsapariggahe kate tato aññehi yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1625_10: tāva tumhākaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ demī’ti dinne aññehi avāsādhippāyehi antarārāme viya yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1625_16: tāva tumhākaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ demī”ti dentopi hi tāvakālikameva deti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa.
tika-vin07t:1627_1: Ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti kaṭito uddhaṃ kāyabandhanādidassanavasenevukkhipanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ piṇḍāya carato pattaggahaṇādimattassa anuññātattā.
tika-vin07t:1627_3: Nisinnakāle hi khandhe laggapattatthavikādito dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantassa kaṭito uddhampi dissati,
tika-vin07t:1627_5: Āsane nisīdantassāpi ca pārupitacīvaraṃ kiñci ukkhipitvā saṅghāṭiṃ jaṅghapiṇḍehi anukkhipitvāva nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1627_6: Imasmiññeva pana sikkhāpade “vāsūpagatassā”ti vuttattā nisīdanapaṭisaṃyuttesu chaṭṭhaaṭṭhamesu avuttattā
tika-vin07t:1627_8: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi tesaṃ visesaṃ avatvā idheva “vāsūpagatassa pana anāpattī”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1630_1: Dutiyavaggādiujjagghikaappasaddesu nisīdanapaṭisaṃyuttesupi vāsūpagatassa anāpatti na vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1630_3: Pāḷipotthakesu panetaṃ kesuci peyyālena byāmohitattā na suṭṭhu viññāyati.
tika-vin07t:1630_4: Yattha ca antaraghare dhammaṃ vā desentassa,
tika-vin07t:1630_5: pātimokkhaṃ vā uddisantassa mahāsaddena yāvaparisasāvanepi anāpatti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ tathā ānandattheramahindattherādīhi ācaritattā.
tika-vin07t:1633_0: 603. Patte gahaṇasaññā assa atthīti pattasaññīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “patte saññaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1635_2: Heṭṭhā orohatīti samantā okāsasambhavato hatthena samaṃ kariyamānaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati.
tika-vin07t:1635_3: Pattamatthake ṭhapitāni pūvāni eva vaṭaṃsakākārena ṭhapitattā “pūvavaṭaṃsaka”nti vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:1635_4: Keci pana “pattaṃ gahetvā thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ racitvā diyyamānameva gaṇhato āpatti,
tika-vin07t:1635_5: hatthagate eva pana patte diyyamāne thūpīkatampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1635_6: taṃ na gahetabbameva “samatittika”nti bhāvanapuṃsakavasena sāmaññato vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1638_1: Catutthavaggādīsu sapadānanti ettha dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1639_2: “Vattabbaṃ natthī”ti iminā pāḷiyāva sabbaṃ viññāyatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1639_3: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ asañciccātiādīsu vatthumattaṃ ñatvā bhuñjanena āpattiṃ āpajjantasseva puna paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā
tika-vin07t:1639_7: Tadeva puna aññavihitatāya vā aviññattamidantisaññāya vā bhuñjane “asatiyā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1640_1: “Aññassatthāyā”ti idamassa sikkhāpadassa attano atthāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhuñjane eva paññattattā iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1640_2: Pañcasahadhammikānaṃ pana atthāya aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhāne viññāpento viññattikkhaṇe aṭṭhakathāsu suttānulomato
tika-vin07t:1640_4: Sañcicca bhuñjanakkhaṇe sayañca aññe ca micchājīvato na muccantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1641_3: Bhuñjantena pana corādibhayaṃ paṭicca mahantampi aparimaṇḍalampi katvā sīghaṃ bhuñjanavasenettha āpadā.
tika-vin07t:1644_1: Anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāravivaraṇe pana payojanābhāvā “āpadāsū”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1645_1: Sabbaṃ hatthanti hatthekadesā aṅguliyo vuttā “hatthamuddā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-vin07t:1645_2: tasmā ekaṅgulimpi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1649_1: “Aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā sabbaṃ hatthaṃ antomukhe pakkhipanasikkhāpadassapi
tika-vin07t:1649_5: Tasmāti yasmā ghanayāguādivirahitaṃ nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1650_2: Maṇḍalabaddhānīti dīghasalākāsu tiriyaṃ valayākārena salākaṃ ṭhapetvā suttehi baddhāni dīghañca tiriyañca
tika-vin07t:1650_3: ujukameva salākāyo ṭhapetvā daḷhabaddhāni ceva tiriyaṃ ṭhapetvā dīghadaṇḍakeheva saṅkocārahaṃ katvā sutteheva
tika-vin07t:1650_5: Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti saha daṇḍakena chinnatālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:1650_6: Chattapādukāyāti yasmiṃ chattadaṇḍakoṭiṃ pavesetvā chattaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhā chāyāya nisīdanti,
tika-vin07t:1651_0: 637. Cāpoti majjhe vaṅkakājadaṇḍasadisā dhanuvikati. Kodaṇḍoti viddhadaṇḍā dhanuvikati.
tika-vin07t:1654_1: Sattamavagge rukkhato patitoti ekaṃ olambanasākhaṃ gahetvā patito.
tika-vin07t:1655_1: Na kathetabbanti therena attano kaṅkhāṭṭhānassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1655_2: Daharassa atthakosallaṃ ñātuṃ pucchitena uccāsane nisinnassa ācariyassa anuyogadānanayena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1656_1: Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti ettha udakagaṇḍusakaṃ katvā ucchukacavarādiñca mukheneva harituṃ udakesu chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1666_4: tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā samadassanatthaṃ aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇena
tika-vin07t:1666_5: laddhūpasampadaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamiñceva tāya saha nikkhantā bhagavato āṇāya bhikkhūnaññeva santike ekatoupasampannā
tika-vin07t:1666_7: Tā hi bhagavatā ānandattherassa yācanāya pabbajjaṃ anujānantena “etha bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin07t:1666_8: mama sāsane tumhepi pavisathā”ti vuttā viya jātā.
tika-vin07t:1666_9: Sākiyāniyo eva saraṇasīlāni datvā kammavācāya upasampāditattā “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1666_10: Na hi etāhi aññā ehibhikkhunibhāvādinā upasampannā nāma santi.
tika-vin07t:1668_0: ‘Ehi bhadde’ti maṃ avoca, sā me āsūpasampadā”ti. –
tika-vin07t:1672_2: upasampadañca gaṇhāhī”ti bhagavato āṇā upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā ahosīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1672_4: bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajja upasampajjassūti maṃ avaca āṇāpesi,
tika-vin07t:1672_5: sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā āsi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1673_2: pana aññāni ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadāni yasmā bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanidānavatthādīsu eva sādhāraṇavasena paññattāni,
tika-vin07t:1673_3: pacchā pana tāni bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā tāsaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānābhāvena
tika-vin07t:1673_4: “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”tiādinā tadanurūpavasena parivattetvā asādhāraṇasikkhāpadehi
tika-vin07t:1673_6: Yasmā ca nesaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo sakkā ñātuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1673_7: tasmā tāni vajjetvā asādhāraṇānaṃ eva idha vibhaṅgo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1674_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti avatvā “samāpajjeyyā”ti vuttattā “bhikkhu āpattiyā na kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1674_3: etena akiriyāsamuṭṭhānāpi ayaṃ āpatti hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1674_5: mayaṃ panettha evaṃ takkayāma “kāyasaṃsaggakkhaṇe sādiyantiyā kiriyāya abhāvepi tato pubbe pavattitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1674_7: parehi magge kariyamānupakkamena niccalassa sādiyato sukkavissaṭṭhi viya pubbapayogābhāvepi vā tasmiññeva
tika-vin07t:1674_8: khaṇe parūpakkamena janiyamānāya attano kāyacalanādisaṅkhātāya kiriyāya,
tika-vin07t:1674_9: sā hi sādiyamānena tassā cittenāpi samuṭṭhitā kiriyā nāma hoti avāyamitvā parūpakkamena methunasādiyane viya,
tika-vin07t:1674_10: bhikkhūnaṃ pana parūpakkamajanitaṃ kiriyaṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā attanā kariyamānapayogavaseneva ‘kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin07t:1674_11: samāpajjeyyā’ti evaṃ visesetvāva sikkhāpadassa paññattattā sādiyamānepi na doso.
tika-vin07t:1674_12: Itarathā hi tabbahulanayenettha kiriyatte gayhamāne aññesampi kiriyākiriyasikkhāpadānaṃ kiriyattaggahaṇappasaṅgo siyā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1677_1: Dutiye purimenātiādi sundarīnandāya vajjapaṭicchādane paññattataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1677_3: “Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte”ti vuttattā paṇṇattiṃ ajānantiyāpi “idaṃ vajjaṃ na pakāsessāmī”ti chandena dhuraṃ nikkhepakkhaṇe pārājikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1677_4: Taṃ pana paṭicchādanaṃ yasmā “pesalā ñatvā garahissantī”ti bhayeneva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1677_7: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “kiñcāpi vajjapaṭicchādanaṃ pemavasena hoti,
tika-vin07t:1677_8: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassitameva hotī”ti evaṃ paṇṇattivītikkamacitteneva chādanaṃ domanassatte kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1681_1: Catutthe lokassādasaṅkhātaṃ mittehi aññamaññaṃ kātabbaṃ santhavaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1682_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti yā tisso itthiyo,
tika-vin07t:1682_1: tāsu vuttaṃ taṃ methunaṃ na seveyya.
tika-vin07t:1682_3: tayo paṇḍake ca upasaṅkamitvā methunaṃ na seveti attho.
tika-vin07t:1683_2: “Methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattā paccayo hotī”ti iminā kāriyopacārena kāyasaṃsaggo methunadhammoti vuttoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1688_1: Saṅghādisesakaṇḍe “dutiyassa ārocetī”ti etthāpi dvīsupi aḍḍakārakesu yassa kassaci dutiyassa kathaṃ yo
tika-vin07t:1688_2: koci ārocetīti evamattho gahetabboti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin07t:1690_1: Tesaṃ anatthakāmatāyāti “coro”ti vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā keci daṇḍissanti jīvitā voropessantīti evaṃ saññāya.
tika-vin07t:1690_2: Etena kevalaṃ bhayena vā parikkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ vā sahasā “coro”ti vutte daṇḍitepi na dosoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1690_3: Rājapurisānañhi “coro aya”nti uddissa kathane eva gīvā,
tika-vin07t:1690_5: pana ārāmikādīnaṃ vā sammukhā “asuko coro evamakāsī”ti kenaci vuttavacanaṃ nissāya ārāmikādīsu rājapurisānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1690_6: vatvā daṇḍāpentesupi bhikkhussa na gīvā rājapurisānaṃ avuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1690_9: “Tvaṃ etassa santakaṃ acchindā”ti āṇattopi hi sace aññena acchindāpeti,
tika-vin07t:1690_13: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti uddissa vadantassāpi daṇḍe gahitepi na gīvā eva daṇḍaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā,
tika-vin07t:1690_14: “asukabhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti āṇāpetvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna paṭikkhipane viya.
tika-vin07t:1691_0: Dāsādīnaṃ sampaṭicchane viya tadatthāya aḍḍakaraṇe bhikkhūnampi dukkaṭanti āha “akappiyaaḍḍo nāma na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1691_1: Kenaci pana bhikkhunā khettādiatthāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā aḍḍe katepi taṃ khettādisampaṭicchane
tika-vin07t:1691_2: viya sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ na hoti pubbe eva saṅghassa santakattā,
