tika-vin07t:1691_4: Dāsādīnampi pana atthāya rakkhaṃ yācituṃ vohārikena puṭṭhena saṅghassa uppannaṃ kappiyakkamaṃ vattuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1691_5: ārāmikādīhi ca aḍḍaṃ kārāpetuñca vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1691_6: Vihāravatthādikappiyaaḍḍaṃ pana bhikkhuno sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1692_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttoti rakkhaṃ yācantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vutto uddissaanuddissavasena rakkhāyācanavinicchayo,
tika-vin07t:1695_1: Pāḷiyaṃ dutiye mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikantiādīsu mallarājūnaṃ gaṇo mallagaṇo.
tika-vin07t:1695_5: Tathā kumārabhattiko ca gaṇo bhaṭiputtagaṇo”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1696_4: taṃ ñatvā ananuññātakāraṇā vuṭṭhāpananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1699_1: Tatiye parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti gāmantarassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā.
tika-vin07t:1699_4: pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā gāmaṃ pavisantiyā gharūpacāre ṭhitassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa upacārassa atikkamo
tika-vin07t:1699_5: nāma paṭhamaleḍḍupātaṭṭhānasaṅkhātassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānassa atikkamo evāti āha “parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1700_2: “Catugāmasādhāraṇattā”ti iminā vihārato catūsu gāmesu yattha katthaci pavisituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha kāraṇamāha.
tika-vin07t:1701_0: Paratīrameva akkamantiyāti nadiṃ anotaritvā orimatīrato laṅghitvā vā ākāsādinā vā paratīrameva atikkāmentiyā.
tika-vin07t:1702_1: “Tenevā”tiādinā dassanūpacāre virahite savanūpacārassa vijjamānattepi āpatti hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1705_1: Catutthe kārakagaṇassāti imassa kammaṃ kātabbanti yehi sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1706_1: Pāḷiyaṃ asante kārakasaṅgheti ettha vijjamānaṃ sudūrampi gantvā āpucchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1706_2: Antarāye pana sati sammā vattantaṃ osāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin07t:1709_1: Pañcame tanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avacanaṃ “anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādi pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin07t:1709_3: udakadantaponato aññaṃ sahatthā gahetvā ajjhoharaṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1712_1: Chaṭṭhe paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva “na detī”ti vuttakāraṇena uyyojitāya hatthato itarāya paṭiggahopi natthi.
tika-vin07t:1712_5: tena itarissā gahetvā bhojanapariyosānanti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1719_1: Dutiye ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhanti nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1719_2: nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi yaṃ uddissa dāyakehi dinnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1721_2: Yamakaṃ pacitabbanti sappiñca telañca ekato pacitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1722_4: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “attano kappiyabhaṇḍena ‘idaṃ nāma āharā’ti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1730_1: Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa paṭhame badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā tehi kattabbabyañjanavikati.
tika-vin07t:1733_4: pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1734_1: Sattame aviññattiyā laddhanti attano viññattiṃ vinā laddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1734_2: Pubbāparaviruddhanti sayaṃ karaṇe pācittiyanti idaṃ kārāpane dukkaṭavacanena virujjhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1734_5: Aññāya viññattipi hi imissā aviññattiyā laddhamevāti.
tika-vin07t:1736_4: tattha harite vaccādiṃ kātumpi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1737_2: Ārāme ṭhatvāti ṭhitanisannaṭṭhāne eva ṭhatvā samantato gīvaṃ parivattetvāpi passati, anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1737_7: anāpattiyampi gamanāya avuttattā ca na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1749_2: Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti visibbanadivasato pañca divase atikkāmetvā dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte.
tika-vin07t:1749_3: Antopañcāhe pana dhuranikkhepepi anāpatti eva “aññatra catūhapañcāhā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1750_0: 900. Catutthe pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ aparivattanaṃ, ananuññātakāraṇā pañcāhātikkamoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1754_5: Tañhi rukkhasārādimayaṃ antochiddaṃ catūsu passesu cammonaddhaṃ vāditabhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1764_0: 978. Cittāgāravaggassa paṭhame pāṭekkā āpattiyoti gīvāya parivattanappayogagaṇanāya.
tika-vin07t:1765_4: Tattha āthabbaṇamanto nāma āthabbaṇavedavihito parūpaghātakaro manto.
tika-vin07t:1765_5: Khīlanamanto nāma verimāraṇatthāya sāradārumayaṃ khīlaṃ mantetvā pathaviyaṃ ākoṭanamanto.
tika-vin07t:1770_1: Aṭṭhamavaggassa paṭhame sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānāti gabbhinivagge sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttā dve.
tika-vin07t:1770_2: Sikkhamānā icceva vattabbāti sammutikammādīsu aññathā vutte kammaṃ kuppatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1771_1: Ekādasame pārivāsiyena chandadānenāti parivutthena navikappavutthena vigatena chandadānenāti attho,
tika-vin07t:1772_1: “Vuṭṭhitāyā”ti etena “idāni kammaṃ na karissāmā”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā kāyena avuṭṭhahitvā nisinnāyapi parisāya kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1772_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāpatti avuṭṭhitāya parisāyā”ti sāmaññato vuttattā,
tika-vin07t:1772_6: pārivāsikapārisuddhidānena uposatho kātabbo aññatra avuṭṭhitāya parisāyā”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin07t:1772_7: tadaṭṭhakathāyampi “pārivāsiyapārisuddhidānaṃ nāma parisāya vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1772_8: avuṭṭhitāya pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā ca “kammaṃ na karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnāyapi kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1779_1: Taṃ atthavinicchayaṃ tādisaṃyeva yasmā vidū vadantīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1787_5: Padabhājanīye yesaṃ padānaṃ atthā yehi aṭṭhakathānayehi pakāsitāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:1787_6: Atha vā ye atthāti yojetabbaṃ. Hi-
tika-vin07t:1788_1: Visesakāraṇanti “yena samayena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūto parivitakko udapādi,
tika-vin07t:1788_2: tena samayenā”tiādinā vuttakāraṇaṃ viya visesakāraṇaṃ bhummavacananivattanakakāraṇanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1788_3: Etassāti abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya satthu cariyāvibhāvanassa vinayapaññattiyaṃ kiṃ payojanaṃ?
tika-vin07t:1790_2: Tasmā abhisambuddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ bodhirukkhamūle viharatīti yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:1791_0: Pāḷiyaṃ atha khoti ettha athāti etasmiṃ samayeti attho anekatthattā nipātānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1791_3: Tena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ pahāya paṭiccasamuppādamanasikāre adhikatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1791_10: Purimanayena vā vuttoti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto paccayākāro.
tika-vin07t:1794_3: tathāpi “yato pajānāti sahetudhamma”nti anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasseva kāraṇattena vuttanti.
tika-vin07t:1794_5: evaṃ dutiyavārepi “yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti gāthāya vuttattā “paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhāta”ntiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1794_6: No kallo pañhoti ayutto na byākātabbo,
tika-vin07t:1794_7: avijjamānaṃ attānaṃ siddhaṃ katvā “ko phusatī”ti tassa kiriyāya puṭṭhattā “ko vañjhāputto phusatī”tiādi viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1794_12: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1794_17: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1794_22: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-vin07t:1794_23: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti evaṃ āgatā atīte pañca,
tika-vin07t:1795_2: Kathaṃ nu khoti pana saṇṭhānākārādīsu issarādijanakaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1795_4: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti ca manussādīsu paṭhamaṃ kiṃ hutvā pacchā kiṃ ahosinti kaṅkhati.
tika-vin07t:1795_5: Ahaṃ nu khosmītiādi idāni attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1796_4: Pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasākāsīti rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu evaṃ idha khandhakapāḷiyā āgatanayena anulomapaṭilomaṃyeva manasākāsi.
tika-vin07t:1798_4: Avasesakālaṃ pana sabbaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattiyāpi vītināmesi.
tika-vin07t:1798_6: Ratanacaṅkameti bhagavato ciraṃ ṭhitassa caṅkamanādhippāyaṃ ñatvā devatāhi māpite ratanacaṅkame.
tika-vin07t:1798_7: Ratanagharanti bhagavato nisīdanādhippāyaṃ ñatvā devatāhi māpitaṃ ratanamayaṃ gehaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1799_1: Tatrāpi ajapālanigrodhamūlepi abhidhammaṃ vicinanto eva antarantarā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1799_2: Tatthāpi hi anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ sammasato sammāsambuddhassa pītisamuṭṭhitā chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo ratanaghare viya nicchariṃsu eva.
tika-vin07t:1799_3: “Huṃhu”nti karontoti “sabbe hīnajātikā maṃ mā upagacchantū”ti mānavasena,
tika-vin07t:1799_4: samīpaṃ upagatesu kodhavasena ca “apethā”ti adhippāyanicchāritaṃ huṃhuṃkāraṃ karonto.
tika-vin07t:1800_2: Devānaṃ vā antanti maggañāṇānaṃ vā antabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1802_1: Mucalindamūleti ettha ca mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho,
tika-vin07t:1802_5: Yā ca sattāhaṃ pavattattā sattāhavaddalikāti vuttāti āha “sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1802_6: Sītavātena dūsitaṃ dinametissā vaddalikāyāti sītavātaduddinīti āha “udakaphusitasammissenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1802_7: Ubbiddhatā nāma dūrabhāvena upaṭṭhānanti āha “meghavigamena dūrībhūta”nti.
tika-vin07t:1802_8: Indanīlamaṇi viya dibbati jotetīti devo, ākāso.
tika-vin07t:1805_4: Na hi buddhā mahagghaṃ pattaṃ paribhuñjanti.
tika-vin07t:1808_0: Kicchena me adhigatanti pāramipūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1808_2: Buddhānañhi cattāro maggā sukhāpaṭipadāva honti. Ha-
tika-vin07t:1809_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ brahmapati hutvā nibbatto,
tika-vin07t:1811_6: Tena vā pabbatādinā pakārena upamā assātipi attho.
tika-vin07t:1811_8: Uṭṭhāhīti dhammadesanatthāya cārikacaraṇatthaṃ imamhā āsanā kāyena,
tika-vin07t:1812_7: paralokañca vajjañca bhayato dassanasīlā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1812_8: Uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinīti gacchalatāpi pokkharaṇīpi vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1813_3: Idañca attano sayambhuñāṇena saupanissayānaṃ tesaṃ magguppattidiṭṭhataṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1813_5: “ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ ajānantesu manujesu desanāya vihiṃsā kāyavācākilamatho
tika-vin07t:1813_6: hotī”ti evaṃ vihiṃsasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ bhāsituṃ na icchiṃ.
tika-vin07t:1813_7: Idāni pana hetusampannā attano saddhābhājanaṃ vivarantu,
tika-vin07t:1815_3: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti kiṃ idāneva udapādi,
tika-vin07t:1815_5: kālavinimuttā ca sabbe dhammā sabbākārato diṭṭhāti?
tika-vin07t:1815_8: Na hi ekena cittena sabbadhammānaṃ nāmajātiādikaṃ paccekaṃ anantaṃ vibhāgaṃ vikappetuṃ sakkā vikappānaṃ viruddhānaṃ sahānuppattito,
tika-vin07t:1815_10: Yathā diṭṭhesu pana yathicchitākāraṃ ārabbha vikappo uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe cittapaṭe viya.
tika-vin07t:1815_11: Idhāpi āḷāraṃ nissāya āvajjanānantarameva sabbākārañāṇaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin07t:1815_13: atha kho pañcavaggiyā eva paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ jānissanti,
tika-vin07t:1815_16: udako ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbattoti evamādikaṃ sabbampi nissāya ñāṇaṃ uppajjati eva.
tika-vin07t:1815_17: Taṃ pana khaṇasampattiyā dullabhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ kamena oloketvā devatāya vutte ñāṇaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1815_18: Saddagatiyā hi bandhattā ekena ñāṇena ñātampi vuccamānaṃ kamena ñātaṃ viya paṭibhāti,
tika-vin07t:1815_20: Teneva “bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1815_22: tattha mayi gate kiṃ bhavissatī”ti evamādinā satthu hitesitāsandassanavasappavattesu.
tika-vin07t:1815_23: Sabbattha vacanagatiyaṃ kamavuttite paññāyamānepi ekeneva ñāṇena sakalāvabodho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1815_24: Bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyāti upakārassāpi vijjamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1815_25: na pana dhammadesanāya kāraṇattena anupakārānampi desanato.
tika-vin07t:1816_0: 11. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya, bodhissa ca antare tigāvute ṭhāne.
tika-vin07t:1817_3: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasaena vimutto.
tika-vin07t:1817_5: Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1818_2: Amatādhigamāya ugghosanato amatadundubhinti satthu dhammadesanā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1819_0: Arahasi anantajinoti anantajinopi bhavituṃ yuttoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1819_4: uppādavayantarahitatāya vā anantaṃ nibbānaṃ ajini kilesārayo madditvā gaṇhītipi anantajino.
tika-vin07t:1820_1: evaṃvidhe rūpakāyaratane īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1820_2: Evaṃ nāma kathanañhissa upanissayasampannassa aparakāle dukkhappattassa bhagavantaṃ upagamma pabbajitvā maggaphalapaṭivedhāya paccayo jāto.
tika-vin07t:1820_3: Tathāhesa bhagavā tena samāgamatthaṃ padasāva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
tika-vin07t:1821_13: Abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanova ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:1822_1: Uttarimanussadhammātiādīsu manussadhammato lokiyañāṇato upari ariyaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ samattho alamariyo.
tika-vin07t:1822_2: Ñāṇadassanavisesoti sabbaññutaññāṇassa pubbabhāgaṃ adhippetaṃ. Noti nu.
tika-vin07t:1822_4: Te ca “yadi esa padhānakāle ‘ahaṃ arahā’ti vadeyya,
tika-vin07t:1822_7: Idāni pana vijjamānameva guṇaṃ vadatī”ti ekapadena satiṃ labhitvā “buddho jāto”ti uppannagāravā āvusovādaṃ pahāya “no hetaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1823_3: Kilesakāmā eva vā āmisasukhena allīyanato kāmasukhallikāti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:1823_6: Ubho anteti yathāvutte lobho vā sassato vā eko anto,
tika-vin07t:1823_7: doso vā ucchedo vā ekoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1825_1: Evaṃ cattāropi magge ekato dassetvā idāni tehi maggehi paṭivijjhitabbāni cattāri ariyasaccāni dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin07t:1825_3: Jātipi dukkhātiādīsu tattha tattha bhave nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ rūpārūpadhammappavatti idha jāti nāma,
tika-vin07t:1825_4: sā ca tattha tattha bhavesu upalabbhamānānaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ vatthubhāvato dukkhā,
tika-vin07t:1825_9: Nandirāgasahagatāti ettha rūpādīsu nandati piyāyatīti nandī,
tika-vin07t:1825_10: sā eva rāgoti nandirāgoti bhāvappadhānoyaṃ niddeso,
tika-vin07t:1825_14: Rūpādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādanavasena pavattā kāmataṇhā nāma.
tika-vin07t:1825_26: vaṭṭañca cajanti paṭinissajjanti vimuccanti na allīyanti,
tika-vin07t:1825_27: tasmā cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayoti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1827_4: katañāṇasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ parivaṭṭānaṃ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1827_6: idaṃ dukkhasamudaya”nti evaṃ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtañāṇaṃ saccañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1827_7: Tesu eva “pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ bhāvetabba”nti evaṃ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṃ kiccañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1827_8: “Pariññātaṃ pahīnaṃ sacchikataṃ bhāvita”nti tassa kiccassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṃ katañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1827_9: Dvādasākāranti tesameva ekekasmiṃ sacce tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena dvādasākāraṃ.
tika-vin07t:1828_0: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti abhisambuddho arahattaṃ pattoti evaṃ na paṭijāniṃ.
tika-vin07t:1828_1: Yato ca khoti yato bodhimūle nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin07t:1828_3: Ñāṇañca pana meti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1828_5: Tattha akuppā me vimuttīti arahattaphalaṃ tassa maggasaṅkhātakāraṇato ca ārammaṇato ca akuppatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1829_2: Dhammacakkhunti idha catusaccadhammesu cakkhukiccakaraṇato sotāpattimaggo adhippeto.
tika-vin07t:1829_3: Yaṃ kiñcītiādi nibbānārammaṇattepi kiccavasena asammohato pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1830_1: Dhammacakkanti paṭivedhañāṇadhammañceva desanāñāṇadhammañca pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1830_2: Obhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā ṭhito obhāso.
tika-vin07t:1831_3: Attano paccakkhato adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-vin07t:1831_4: parassa saddhāya ettha na pavattatīti aparappaccayo.
tika-vin07t:1831_9: Keci pana “sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti vacanapariyosāne eva upasampadā sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:1831_10: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘ehi bhikkhūti bhagavato vacanenā’ti idaṃ ehibhikkhusaddopalakkhitavacanaṃ ehibhikkhuvacanantiādipadavasena
tika-vin07t:1831_14: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti iminā vacanena sameti.
tika-vin07t:1831_18: asekkhānaṃ pana “cara brahmacariya”nti pariyosānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ sikkhattayasamiddhito.
tika-vin07t:1833_4: Virajjatīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena na rajjati.
tika-vin07t:1833_8: Karaṇīyaṃ catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ kattabbaṃ pariññādivasena soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1833_10: kilesakkhayāya vā aparaṃ puna maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
tika-vin07t:1833_11: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato vattamānakkhandhasantānato aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ na bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1835_4: Susānaṃ maññeti susānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:1836_1: Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin07t:1836_8: Sāmaṃ attanāva ukkaṃso ukkhipanaṃ etissanti sāmukkaṃsikā,
tika-vin07t:1837_0: 27. Assadūteti assaāruḷhe dūte. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhikiriyaṃ. Abhisaṅkharesi akāsi.
tika-vin07t:1838_1: Yathādiṭṭhanti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhaṃ catussaccabhūmiṃ sesamaggattayena paccavekkhantassa,
tika-vin07t:1838_3: Mātu no jīvitanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1838_7: cara brahmacariya”nti ettakeneva bhagavā upasampadaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin07t:1838_8: Khīṇāsavānañhi ettakeneva upasampadā anuññātā pubbeva dukkhassa parikkhīṇattā.
tika-vin07t:1838_9: Cara brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadapūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1839_1: Seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnanti seṭṭhino ca anuseṭṭhino ca paveṇīvasena āgatā yesaṃ kulānaṃ santi,
tika-vin07t:1840_1: Mā ekena dveti ekena maggena dve bhikkhū mā agamittha.
tika-vin07t:1841_1: Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbakāmaguṇanissitā,
tika-vin07t:1842_0: Antalikkhe carante pañcābhiññepi bandhatīti antalikkhacaro, rāgapāso.
tika-vin07t:1843_0: Jānāti manti so kira “mahānubhāvo añño devaputto nivāretīti bhīto nivattissati nu kho”tisaññāya vatvā
tika-vin07t:1843_1: “nihato tvamasi antakā”ti vutte “jānāti ma”nti dummano palāyi.
tika-vin07t:1844_1: Parivitakko udapādīti yasmā ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayarahitānampi pabbajitukāmatā uppajjissati,
tika-vin07t:1844_3: tasmā tesampi pabbajjāvidhiṃ dassento evaṃ parivitakkesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1844_4: Upanissayasampannā pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbajanti.
tika-vin07t:1844_6: Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti ettha “kesamassuṃ ohāretvā”tiādivacanato kesacchedanakāsāyacchādanasaraṇadānāni pabbajjā nāma,
tika-vin07t:1844_11: Bhikkhūnañhi anārocetvā ekasīmāya “etassa kese chindā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1844_12: Pabbājetvāti kesādicchedanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā”ti visuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1844_13: Pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1844_14: anupasampannena bhikkhuāṇattiyā dinnampi saraṇaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin07t:1845_1: Nijjīvanissattabhāvanti “kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātū”tiādinayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:1846_1: paṭiggāhāpetabboti ettha “sabbadukkhanissaraṇatthāya imaṃ kāsāvaṃ gahetvā”ti vā “taṃ kāsāvaṃ datvā”ti vā vatvā “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante,
tika-vin07t:1846_2: anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti evaṃ yācanapubbakaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭicchāpeti.
tika-vin07t:1846_6: athāpīti ca atha vāti attho”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1846_7: “Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā pabbajjā na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1847_1: Dūre vandantopi hi pāde vandatīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1847_2: Upajjhāyena vāti ettha yassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:1847_4: Ābhisamācārikesu vinayanatthaṃ yaṃ ācariyaṃ katvā niyyātenti,
tika-vin07t:1847_6: Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva sabbaṃ sikkhāpeti,
tika-vin07t:1847_9: yathā upasampadākāle sayameva kammavācaṃ vācento upajjhāyova kammavācācariyopi hoti.
tika-vin07t:1848_0: Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā vicchedo na kātabboti āha “ekasambandhānī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1853_2: kiṃ amhākaṃ padhānenā”ti vāsanādosena vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā pantesu senāsanesu phalasamāpattiyāva vītināmanatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1853_3: taṃ disvā aññesampi diṭṭhānugatisamāpajjanatthañca ovadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1856_1: Idaṃ nesaṃ pubbakammanti tesaṃ tiṃsajanānaṃ ekato abhisamayassa pubbakammaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1859_1: Pāḷiyaṃ agarūti bhāriyaṃ na siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1859_3: Patte pakkhipīti taṃ nāgaṃ nihatatejaṃ dhammadesanāya santappetvā saraṇasīlāni datvā sakalarattiṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin07t:1859_4: payirupāsitvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭilānaṃ dassanatthaṃ patte pakkhipi,
tika-vin07t:1860_3: Sumanānaṃ buddhānaṃ manasā sadiso mano assāti sumanamanaso.
tika-vin07t:1860_8: Ahaṃ te dhuvabhattena paṭimānanaṃ karissāmīti seso.
tika-vin07t:1862_4: taṃ taṃ vā sattahitaṃ paṭicca haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1863_1: Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti puṇṇāya dāsiyā sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā chaḍḍitaṃ sāṇamayaṃ kimikulākulaṃ pariyesanavasena uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1863_2: yaṃ bhagavā bhūmiṃ kampento pārupitvā pacchā mahākassapattherassa adāsi,
tika-vin07t:1863_4: Kattha nu khotiādiparivitakko jaṭilānaṃ vividhapāṭihāriyadassanatthaṃ kato.
tika-vin07t:1863_5: Pāṇinā khaṇanto viya iddhiyā mattikaṃ apanetvā dinnattā vuttaṃ “pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1864_0: 46. Phāliyantu, kassapa, kaṭṭhānīti uruvelakassapena nivedite evamavocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-vin07t:1865_1: Antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamayeti ettha māghamāsassa avasāne catasso,
tika-vin07t:1865_2: phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ māsānaṃ antare aṭṭharattiyo antaraṭṭhakā nāma.
tika-vin07t:1866_5: Idaṃ nu tvaṃ mahāsamaṇāti idha nu tvaṃ. Dha-
tika-vin07t:1866_8: “Imasmiṃ padese tvaṃ nu kho ṭhitosī”ti pucchi.
tika-vin07t:1867_2: Kesamissaṃ sabbaṃ parikkhāraṃ udake pavāhetvātipi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1868_2: “Aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassānī”ti idaṃ nāgadamanādīni pannarasa pāṭihāriyāni vajjetvā vuttaṃ appakamadhikaṃ gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin07t:1869_1: Gayāyanti gayānāmikāya nadiyā adūrabhavattā gāmo itthiliṅgavasena gayā nāma jāto, tassaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1870_1: sukhaṃ vā”tiādinā cakkhuviññāṇavīthicittesu somanassadomanassaupekkhāvedanāmukhena sesārūpakkhandhānampi ādittataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1873_2: Upadhīsūti ettha dukkhasukhādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena cattāro upadhī kāmakhandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārūpadhīnaṃ vasena.
tika-vin07t:1873_3: Tesu khandhūpadhi idhādhippetoti āha “khandhūpadhīsu malanti ñatvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1875_2: bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno paṇunnapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano
tika-vin07t:1876_2: Chaḷaṅgasamannāgatoti iṭṭhādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitādipaṭipakkhā chaḷaṅgupekkhā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1876_4: Saṅkhāyasevanā adhivāsanā parivajjanā vinodanāsaṅkhātāni cattāri apassenā nissayā etassāti caturāpasseno,
tika-vin07t:1876_6: Paṇunnāni apanītāni diṭṭhigatikehi paccekaṃ gahitāni diṭṭhisaccāni yassa,
tika-vin07t:1876_9: Kāmesanā bhavesanābrahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā esanā sammadeva avayā anūnā saṭṭhā nisaṭṭhā anenāti samavayasaṭṭhesano.
tika-vin07t:1876_15: Ete hi ariyā vasanti etthāti ariyavāsāti vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:1876_16: Te pana vāsā vutthā vasitā sampāditā yena,
tika-vin07t:1879_1: tesu sabbajeṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balāni bhagavato kāyassa dasabalāni nāma.
tika-vin07t:1879_3: majjhimapurisānaṃ pana dasannaṃ koṭisahassānañca balaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:1880_2: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā vuttāni ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1880_13: Dasahi asekkhehi aṅgehīti arahattaphalasampayuttehi pāḷiyaṃ “asekkhā sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
tika-vin07t:1880_16: asekkhā sammāvimuttī”ti evaṃ vuttehi dasahi asekkhadhammehi samannāgato.
tika-vin07t:1880_17: Ettha ca dassanaṭṭhena vuttā sammādiṭṭhi eva jānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇantipi vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1880_18: vuttāvasesā pana phalacittasampayuttā sabbe phassādidhammā sammāvimuttīti vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1883_10: Upasaddo ca upagamanattho maggasaddenapi sambandhitabboti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1883_12: yasmā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ upagatañāṇañceva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1883_15: Upaññātaṃ nibbānanti upapattiyā anumānena ñātaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1883_17: anumānena ñātaṃ paccakkhato dassanatthāya gavesantoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1884_0: Nirodho ca nirodhūpāyo ca ekasesena nirodhoti vuttoti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1885_0: Ito uttarīti ito mayā laddhasotāpattito uttari itaramaggattayaṃ yadipi natthi,
tika-vin07t:1885_1: tathāpi eso eva mayā gavesito nibbānadhammoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1886_2: Tesaṃ āyasmantānanti saparisānaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
tika-vin07t:1886_3: aggasāvakā pana attano ñāṇakiccassa mahantatāya katipāhaccayena.
tika-vin07t:1889_3: Uttiṭṭhapattanti ettha uttiṭṭhaṃ nāma piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ vuccati “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:1889_6: Tassa upanāme ko dosoti āha “tasmiṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1889_7: Tasmāti yasmā manussā etasmiṃyeva ete bhuñjantīti uttiṭṭhapatte ucchiṭṭhasaññino,
tika-vin07t:1889_13: yācanavacanena tassa anumatiṃ gahetunti vā attho.
tika-vin07t:1890_5: paraṃ jeṭṭhaṃ katvā tassovāde vattanatāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1890_14: Kāyenāti etadatthaviññāpakaṃ hatthamuddādiṃ dassento kāyena viññāpeti.
tika-vin07t:1890_15: Sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti upajjhāyena “sāhū”tiādīsu vuttesu saddhivihārikassa “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1891_4: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha na-
tika-vin07t:1891_8: Sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti āpadāummattakhittacittavedanaṭṭatādīhi vinā paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvāpi vadantassa gilānassapi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1891_9: Āpadāsu hi antarantarā kathā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1891_13: Pāḷiyaṃ “heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvā”ti idaṃ pubbe tattha ṭhapitapattādinā asaṅghaṭṭanatthāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1891_14: cakkhunā oloketvāpi aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1892_5: Jantāgharañhi nāma himapātabahulesu desesu tappaccayarogapīḷādinivāraṇatthaṃ sarīrasedāpanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1892_6: Tattha kira andhakārapaṭicchannatāya bahūpi ekato pavisitvā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā aggitāpaparihārāya mattikāya
tika-vin07t:1892_7: mukhaṃ limpitvā sarīraṃ yāvadatthaṃ sedetvā cuṇṇādīhi ubbaṭṭetvā nahāyanti.
tika-vin07t:1893_0: Aññattha netabboti yattha viharato sāsane anabhirati uppannā,
tika-vin07t:1893_2: Visabhāgapuggalānanti lajjino vā alajjino vā upajjhāyassa avaḍḍhikāme sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1893_3: Sace pana upajjhāyo alajjī ovādampi na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:1893_5: tattha upajjhāyaṃ vihāya lajjīheva saddhiṃ āmisādiparibhogo kātabbo.
tika-vin07t:1893_9: upacārasīmato bahi gantukāmena anāpucchā gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1896_1: Saddhivihārikavattakathāyaṃ saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbotiādīsu anādariyaṃ paṭicca dhammāmisehi asaṅgaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1899_1: Nasammāvattanādikathāyaṃ vattaṃ na pūreyyāti “vattakaraṇakālo”ti vatthuvijānanavasena ñatvā mānakosajjādivasena
tika-vin07t:1899_2: vā upajjhāyādīsu anādarena vā “akātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajānanatāya vā na kareyya,
tika-vin07t:1899_4: Asañcicca asatiyātiādīhi ca akarontassa pana anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1899_6: tasmā sekhiyesu vuttanayenevettha sabbopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1900_0: Sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ vā na jānātīti “mayi sādiyante akarontānaṃ āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t:1900_1: paṭikkhipitvā asādiyante āpatti na hotī”ti evaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1900_3: tesaṃ anāpattī”ti vacanato sace koci “tumhākaṃ saddhivihārike,
tika-vin07t:1903_4: Katavedinoti attano kataṃ upakāraṃ paṭikiriyāya ñāpakā.
tika-vin07t:1904_2: Pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsabalena caritvā ālopālopavasena pariyiṭṭhabhojanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1907_5: Taṃyeva titthāyatananti diṭṭhisaṅkhātatitthameva āyatanaṃ dukkhuppattiṭṭhānanti titthāyatanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1907_6: Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti āyasmantaṃ nissāya vasissāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1910_2: teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti sambandhayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:1910_3: Potthakesu pana “na teneva lakkhaṇenā”ti ettha na-
tika-vin07t:1910_4: kāraṃ chaḍḍetvā “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti likhanti,
tika-vin07t:1910_6: Tathā hi teneva lakkhaṇena āpattibhāve gayhamāne nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi āpatti evāti vuttalakkhaṇena āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin07t:1910_7: Tathā ca “nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati,
tika-vin07t:1910_8: tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabba”nti iminā anantaravacanena virodho siyā.
tika-vin07t:1912_2: kāraṃ ānetvā teneva saddhivihārikassa vutteneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1915_2: tassa santike nissayo gahetabbo”ti iminā lajjīsu eva nissayaggahaṇaṃ niyojeti alajjīsu paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:1915_3: Ettha ca paribhogasaddena ekakammādiko saṃvāso gahito paccayaparibhogassa sambhoga-
tika-vin07t:1915_5: etena ca sambhogasaṃvāsānaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ na kattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1915_16: Sabhāgataṃ olokemīti pana leso na kātabbo.
tika-vin07t:1916_1: kenaci antarāyena cirāyatīti saññāya sati labbhateva parihāro.
tika-vin07t:1917_0: Ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti gamane nirussāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1917_1: Saussāhassa pana senāsanapaṭisāmanādivasena katipāhe gatepi na doso.
tika-vin07t:1918_0: Tatreva vasitabbanti tatra sabhāgaṭṭhāne eva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1918_2: vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā upajjhāye saṅgaṇhanteyeva taṃsamodhāne nissayapaṭippassaddhi vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1918_3: tasmiṃ pana kodhena vā gaṇanirapekkhatāya vā asaṅgaṇhante aññesu gahito nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1919_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhiyaṃ vutto “koci ācariyo”tiādiko nayo upajjhāyapakkamanādīsupi netvā tattha ca vutto idhāpi netvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1920_0: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti upacārasīmato bahi aññasmiṃ vihāre antevāsikānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma vasanti.
tika-vin07t:1920_1: Tena bahiupacārepi antevāsikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antare āsannapadese vasati,
tika-vin07t:1920_3: Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhateva.
tika-vin07t:1923_1: Upajjhācariyalakkhaṇakathāyaṃ na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1924_3: Pacchimāni tīṇīti na paṭibalo uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1924_5: āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti imāni tīṇi.
tika-vin07t:1924_6: Kukkuccassa hi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayasaṅkhātadhammato vinodetuṃ apaṭibalatā nāma abyattatā eva hotīti sāpi āpattiaṅgameva vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1925_2: Taṃ ārabbha paññattā khandhakasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā.
tika-vin07t:1925_3: Sikkhāpadampi hi taṃ tattha paṭipūraṇatthikehi uggahaṇādivasena sikkhitabbato “sikkhā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1928_1: Titthiyaparivāsakathāyaṃ ājīvakassa vātiādīsu akiriyavādī ājīvako nāma,
tika-vin07t:1928_2: kiriyavādino pana nigaṇṭhāpi aññepi naggatitthikā acelakapade saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:1928_4: So ca teneva naggavesena bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ āgatassa,
tika-vin07t:1928_5: na paṭicchādetvā āgatassāti dassetuṃ “sace sopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1929_2: Vesiyā gocaro bahulaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ assāti vesiyāgocaro.
tika-vin07t:1929_4: Yobbannātītāti anividdhā eva mahallikabhāvaṃ pattā thullakumārī evāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1932_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne tādisampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1932_7: paṭicchannaṭṭhānepi ca vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:1932_8: Pākaṭaṭṭhānepi pana nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato ūnataraṃ avaḍḍhanakaṃ vaṭṭatīti ye gaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:1932_9: tesaṃ taṃ gahaṇaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ “mukhe panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1933_1: Avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatīti ettha pi-
tika-vin07t:1933_2: saddena kolaṭṭhimattato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1934_2: aññattha na kiñcipi vaṭṭatīti vuttanayaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1934_4: Yakkhummāroti kadāci kadāci āgantvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā hatthamukhādikaṃ avayavaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsanako yakkhova rogo.
tika-vin07t:1937_1: Na dānāhaṃ devassa bhaṭoti āpucchatīti raññā eva dinnaṭṭhānantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1937_4: tena taṃ taṃ amaccādimpi āpucchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1940_3: bhikkhūnaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento evamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1945_1: Palātopīti iṇasāmikānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā bhayena palāto.
tika-vin07t:1945_2: Gīvā hotīti iṇāyikabhāvaṃ ñatvā anādarena iṇamuttake bhikkhubhāve pavesitattā.
tika-vin07t:1945_4: Dātabbamevāti iṇāyikena dhanaṃ sampaṭicchatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin07t:1945_6: Aññehi ca bhikkhūhi “mā dhuraṃ nikkhipāhī”ti vatvā sahāyakehi bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1948_1: “Dāsacārittaṃ āropetvā kīto”ti iminā dāsabhāvaparimocanatthāya kītakaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin07t:1948_3: Tattha tattha cārittavasenāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ janapade dāsapaṇṇajjhāpanādinā adāsakaraṇaniyāmena.
tika-vin07t:1949_1: na vaṭṭatīti tā bhujissitthiyo “mayampi vaṇṇadāsiyo homā”ti attano rakkhaṇatthāya sayameva rājūnaṃ dāsipaṇṇe attano nāmaṃ likhāpenti,
tika-vin07t:1949_4: Tehi adinnā na pabbājetabbāti yattakā tesaṃ sāmino,
tika-vin07t:1950_0: Bhujisse pana katvā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatīti yassa vihārassa te ārāmikā dinnā,
tika-vin07t:1950_1: tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghaṃ ñāpetvā phātikammena dhanāni datvā bhujisse katvā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1950_2: Takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti kesuci janapadesu adāse karontā takkaṃ sīse āsiñcanti,
tika-vin07t:1950_5: Tathā dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāso evāti “neva pabbājetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1950_6: “Tāvakāliko nāmā”ti vuttattā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā vā pacchāpi gahetukāmatāya vā dinnaṃ sabbaṃ tāvakālikamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1950_7: Nissāmikadāso nāma yassa sāmikulaṃ aññātikaṃ maraṇena parikkhīṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1950_9: so pana samānajātikehi vā nivāsagāmavāsīhi vā issarehi vā bhujisso katova pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1950_11: Te hi katthaci dese rājadāsā honti,
tika-vin07t:1950_14: Dāsampi pabbājetvā sāmike disvā paṭicchādanatthaṃ apanento padavārena adinnādānāpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin07t:1953_1: Bhaṇḍukammāpucchānādikathāyaṃ kammārabhaṇḍūti daharatāya amoḷibandho muṇḍikasīso kammāradārako eva vutto.
tika-vin07t:1953_2: Tulādhāramuṇḍakoti ettha tulādhārāti tambasuvaṇṇādīnaṃ tulaṃ hatthena dhāretīti kammārā “tulādhārā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1953_5: Ekāva sikhā pañca veṇiyo katvā bandhanena pañcasikhāti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:1953_7: tassa sikhaṃ chindantā kañci bhikkhuṃ ajānāpetvāva pabbājesuṃ.
tika-vin07t:1953_16: pabbājentassapi anāpattī”ti vuttattā sañcicca anāpucchā kese ohārentassa dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1953_18: Ekasikhāmattadharoti ettha ekena kesena sikhā ekasikhāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1953_20: Ekakesampi pana anāpucchā chindituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t:1955_1: Nissayamuccanakassa vattesu pañcakachakkesu pana “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni…pe…
tika-vin07t:1955_2: anubyañjanaso”ti ettha sabbopi cāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ñātāyaṃ ñāto hoti.
tika-vin07t:1955_4: anāpattiṃ jānātī”ti idañca attanā ñātaṭṭhānesu āpattādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1958_1: Pokkharavassanti pokkhare padumagacche viya atemitukāmānaṃ sarīrato pavaṭṭanakavassaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1958_2: Tasmiṃ kira vassante temitukāmāva tementi, na itare.
tika-vin07t:1958_3: “Bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gato nāma natthīti attano santake rajje sabbampi sāpateyyaṃ sayameva paribhuñjissatīti
tika-vin07t:1958_5: gantvā pana gehe sakalarattiṃ mahādānañceva buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa āsanapaññattiṭṭhānālaṅkārañca saṃvidahantova vītināmesi.
tika-vin07t:1959_1: pattaṃ vā aggahesīti bhagavā attano pitu nivesanameva gamissatītisaññāya naggahesi.
tika-vin07t:1959_4: Bhikkhāya cāro caraṇaṃ etassāti bhikkhācāro, khattiyo.
tika-vin07t:1960_0: Uttiṭṭheti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre uddissa ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe.
tika-vin07t:1960_1: Nappamajjeyyāti nimantanādivasena labbhamānapaṇītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍāya caraṇavasena tattha nappamajjeyya.
tika-vin07t:1960_2: Dhammanti anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ careyya.
tika-vin07t:1960_3: Sukhaṃ setīti catūhi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1961_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede agocare caraṇavasena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dhammaṃ duccaritaṃ na ca care.
tika-vin07t:1961_2: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvāti nivesane nisinnena bhagavatā ñātisamāgame attano piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ nissāya pavattāya gāthāya vuttaṃ imaṃ dutiyagāthaṃ sutvā.
tika-vin07t:1962_0: Dhammapālajātakantiādīsu pana tato parakālesupi rañño pavatti parinibbānaṃ pāpetvā yathāpasaṅgavasena dassetuṃ vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1962_2: Sirigabbhaṃ gantvāti ettha yadi hi bhagavā tadaheva gantvā na passeyya,
tika-vin07t:1962_3: sā hadayena phalitena mareyyāti agamāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1963_1: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1963_8: Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī parehi asādhāraṇehi pañcakalyāṇādīhi sahitattā sā evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1963_11: vācāya pana bhagavatā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti vutte gāravena paṭikkhipituṃ avisahanto “āmā”ti avoca.
tika-vin07t:1964_2: Nivattetuṃ na visahīti “mā naṃ nivattayitthā”ti bhagavatā vuttattā nāsakkhi.
tika-vin07t:1966_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhana”nti. –
tika-vin07t:1967_1: Adhimattaṃ rāhuleti rāhule pabbajite nandapabbajjāya uppannadukkhatopi adhikataraṃ dukkhaṃ ahosīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1967_2: Ito pacchāti ito vuttasokuppattito aparadivasesu anāgāmīnaṃ ñātisinehapaṭighacittuppādābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:1967_3: Pāḷiyaṃ puttapemantiādi raññā puttasinehassa tibbabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1967_4: Puttasineho hi attanā sahajātapītivegasamuṭṭhitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā pavattanavasena “chaviṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1970_4: Tassa atipātanaṃ pabandhavasena pavattituṃ adatvā satthādīhi atikkamma abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin07t:1970_6: So pana atthato pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanāva.
tika-vin07t:1970_8: verahetutāya verasaṅkhātaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ maṇati nīharatīti virati “veramaṇī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:1970_9: viramati etāyāti vā “viramaṇī”ti vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti samādānavirati vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1971_5: tassa vādo abhūtataṃ ñatvāva bhūtato viññāpanacetanā musāvādo.
tika-vin07t:1972_0: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ ariyānaṃ bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-vin07t:1972_2: Bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena bhojananti idha sabbaṃ yāvakālikaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin07t:1972_5: vikāle vā yāvakālikassa bhojanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ vikālabhojanantipi attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t:1973_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassanaṃ visūkadassanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1973_2: Dassananti cettha pañcannampi viññāṇānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya dassana-
tika-vin07t:1973_5: saddehi cettha attano naccanagāyanādīnipi saṅgahitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1974_0: Mālāti baddhamabaddhaṃ vā antamaso suttādimayampi alaṅkāratthāya piḷandhiyamānaṃ “mālā”tveva vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1974_1: Gandhanti vāsacuṇṇādivilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1976_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ āvaraṇaṃ karontīti sabbasaṅghārāme pavesanivāraṇaṃ karonti.
tika-vin07t:1976_2: Saṅghārāmo āvaraṇaṃ kātabboti saṅghārāmo āvaraṇo kātabbo,
tika-vin07t:1976_6: “Yattha vā vasatī”ti iminā sāmaṇerassa vassaggena laddhaṃ vā sakasantakameva vā nibaddhavasanakasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1976_7: Yattha vā paṭikkamatīti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1979_3: tathā tesaṃ niggahaṃ akarontesu aññehi āvaraṇādiniggahakammaṃ kātabbameva.
tika-vin07t:1979_4: Saṅgaṇhantīti “paraparisato bhinditvā gaṇhissāmī”ti dānādicatūhi saṅgahavatthūhi upalāḷanavasena saṅgaṇhanti.
tika-vin07t:1979_7: Bhinditvā gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti bhinditumpi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1979_9: Ādīnavaṃ pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti sāsanagāravena vā parānuddayatāya vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1980_1: Upasampannānampi pārājikasamāpattiyā saraṇagamanādisāmaṇerabhāvassāpi vinassanato senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin07t:1980_3: Purimikāya puna saraṇāni gahitānīti saraṇaggahaṇena saha tadahevassa vassūpagamanampi dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1980_6: pacchāpi vā vassāvāsikañca cīvaramāsesu saṅghe uppannaṃ kālacīvarañca purimikāya upagantvā avipannasīlo sāmaṇero labhati eva.
tika-vin07t:1980_7: Sace pacchimikāya gahitānīti pacchimikāya vassūpagamanañca chinnavassatañca dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1980_8: Tassa hi kālacīvare bhāgo na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin07t:1981_0: Vassāvāsikalābho pana yadi senāsanasāmikā dāyakā senāsanaguttatthāya pacchimikāya upagantvā vattaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:1981_1: attano senāsane vasantassapi vassāvāsikaṃ dātabbanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1981_3: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā lacchatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1981_4: tampi vassāvāsike dāyakānaṃ imaṃ adhippāyaṃ nissāya vuttañce, sundaraṃ.
tika-vin07t:1982_2: akusalaṃ pana surāpānaveramaṇisīlabhedo ca hoti mālādidhāraṇādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1982_4: Tānipi hi sañcicca vītikkamantassa taṃ taṃ bhijjati eva,
tika-vin07t:1982_5: itarītaresaṃ pana abhijjamānena nāsanaṅgāni na honti.
tika-vin07t:1983_1: accagamā”tiādinā saṅghamajjhe desāpetvā saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbanti adhippāyo pārājikattā tesaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1983_3: Ayameva hi nāsanā idha adhippetāti liṅganāsanākāraṇehi pāṇātipātādīhi avaṇṇabhāsanādīnaṃ saha patitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1984_3: ko imesaṃ bhedoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “sassatucchedānañhi aññataradiṭṭhiko”ti.
tika-vin07t:1984_5: yo hi “attā issaro vā nicco dhuvo”tiādinā vā “attā ucchijjissati vinassissatī”tiādinā vā titthiyaparikappitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1984_6: yaṃ kiñci sassatucchedadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā voharati,
tika-vin07t:1984_9: Yo pana īdisaṃ diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā sāsanikova hutvā kevalaṃ buddhavacanādhippāyaṃ viparītato gahetvā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin07t:1984_11: tassa sā diṭṭhi pārājikaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1987_2: te ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānassa balavatāya napuṃsakapaṇḍakasadisattā “paṇḍakā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1987_3: Tesu āsittausūyapaṇḍakānaṃ dvinnaṃ kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṃ yonisomanasikārādīhi vītikkamato nivāretumpi sakkā,
tika-vin07t:1987_5: Pakkhapaṇḍakassa pana kāḷapakkhesu ummādo viya kilesapariḷāho avattharanto āgacchati,
tika-vin07t:1987_7: Tasmā so tasmiṃ pakkhe na pabbājetabboti vutto.
tika-vin07t:1987_9: Tattha āsittassāti mukhe āsittassa attanopi asucimuccanena pariḷāho vūpasammati.
tika-vin07t:1987_10: Usūyāya uppannāyāti usūyāya vasena attano sevetukāmatārāge uppanne asucimuttiyā pariḷāho vūpasammati.
tika-vin07t:1988_0: “Bījāni apanītānī”ti vuttattā bījesu ṭhitesu nimittamatte apanīte paṇḍako na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1988_3: bījesu pana apanītesu aṅgajātampi rāgena kammaniyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1988_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā bījuddharaṇe pārājikaṃ na paññattanti?
tika-vin07t:1988_13: Keci pana “yasmā bījuddharaṇakkhaṇe paṇḍako na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1988_14: tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe pārājikaṃ na paññattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1988_15: Yasmā pana so uddhaṭabījo bhikkhu aparena samayena vuttanayena paṇḍakattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin07t:1988_19: tasmā esa paṇḍakattupagamanakālato paṭṭhāya jātiyā napuṃsakapaṇḍakena saddhiṃ yojetvā ‘upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti abhabboti vutto,
tika-vin07t:1988_22: bhāvakkhayena panassa ahetukasadisatāya maggopi na uppajjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1988_23: Apare pana “pabbajjato pubbe upakkamena paṇḍakabhāvamāpannaṃ sandhāya ‘upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1988_24: upasampannassa pana pacchā upakkamena upasampadāpi na vigacchatī”ti,
tika-vin07t:1988_26: Yadaggena hi pabbajjato pubbe upakkamena abhabbo hoti,
tika-vin07t:1989_1: Pabbajjā na vāritāti ettha pabbajjāgahaṇeneva upasampadāpi gahitā.
tika-vin07t:1989_3: Tasmiṃyevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti ettha pana apaṇḍakapakkhepi pabbajjāmattameva labhati,
tika-vin07t:1989_5: paṇḍakapakkhe pana āgate liṅganāsanāya nāsetabboti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1992_3: taṃ vā jānanti kolaññāti ñātakānaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1992_4: Theyyāya liṅgaggahaṇamattampi idha saṃvāso evāti āha “tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1993_0: Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandananti attanā musāvādena dassitavassakkamena bhikkhūnaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin07t:1993_2: daharabhikkhu ca vuḍḍhānaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1994_1: sayameva pana pabbajitvā sāmaṇeravassāni gaṇentopi ubhayatthenako eva.
tika-vin07t:1994_6: upasampannesu eva paññattāpattiṃ paṭicca ādikammikā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:1995_3: Yāva so suddhamānasoti “iminā liṅgena bhikkhū vañcetvā tehi saṃvasissāmī”ti asuddhacittābhāvena suddhacitto.
tika-vin07t:1995_4: Tena hi asuddhacittena liṅge gahitamatte pacchā bhikkhūhi saha saṃvasatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin07t:1995_7: Tasmā ubhayatthenakopi liṅgatthenake eva pavisatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1995_8: Yo pana rājādibhayena suddhacittova liṅgaṃ gahetvā vicaranto pacchā “bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetvā jīvissāmī”ti asuddhacittaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin07t:1995_9: so cittuppādamattena theyyasaṃvāsakopi na hoti suddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā.
tika-vin07t:1995_10: Sace pana so bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sāmaṇeravassagaṇanādiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:1995_13: Yaṃ pana parato saha dhuranikkhepena “ayampi theyyasaṃvāsako,
tika-vin07t:1995_15: taṃ bhikkhūhi saṅgamma saṃvāsādhivāsanavasena dhuranikkhepaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1995_17: Tassa tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na vuccatīti sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:1995_18: Ettha ca corādibhayaṃ vināpi kīḷādhippāyena liṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajitālayaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t:1995_19: vandanādiṃ asādiyantopi “sobhati nu kho me pabbajitaliṅga”ntiādinā suddhacittena gaṇhantopi theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin07t:1996_1: idañca bhikkhūnaññeva niyamitabhattagahaṇe saṃvāsopi sambhaveyyāti sabbasādhāraṇabhattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1996_2: Saṃvāsaṃ pana asādiyitvā abhikkhukavihārādīsu vihārabhattādīni bhuñjantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti eva.
tika-vin07t:1997_1: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1997_2: “theyyasaṃvāsako”ti pana nāmaṃ ajānantopi “evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā “evaṃ karonto samaṇo nāma na hotī”ti vā “yadi ārocessāmi,
tika-vin07t:1997_3: chaḍḍessanti ma”nti vā “yena kenaci pabbajjā me na ruhatī”ti jānāti,
tika-vin07t:1997_5: Yo pana paṭhamaṃ “pabbajjā evaṃ me gahitā”tisaññī kevalaṃ antarā attano setavatthanivāsanādivippakāraṃ pakāsetuṃ lajjanto na katheti,
tika-vin07t:1997_7: Anupasampannakāleyevāti ettha avadhāraṇena upasampannakāle theyyasaṃvāsakalakkhaṇaṃ ñatvā vañcanāyapi nāroceti,
tika-vin07t:1997_9: So parisuddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1997_10: laddhūpasampadattā tadanuguṇasseva saṃvāsassa sāditattā saṃvāsatthenakopi na hoti.
tika-vin07t:1997_12: saṃvāsārahassa liṅgassa gahitattā saṃvāsasādiyanamattena saṃvāsatthenako hoti.
tika-vin07t:1998_1: Theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
tika-vin07t:1998_3: Yaṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā na saṃvāsatthenako”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1998_5: Itarathā sāmaṇerassapi bhikkhuvassagaṇanādīsu liṅgānurūpasaṃvāso eva sāditoti saṃvāsatthenakatā na siyā
tika-vin07t:1998_8: evaṃ sāmaṇeropi pārājikaṃ samāpanno sāmaṇerapaṭiññāya apariccattattā saṃvāsatthenako na hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1998_9: Sobhatīti sampaṭicchitvāti kāsāvadhāraṇe dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā gihibhāvaṃ sampaṭicchitvā.
tika-vin07t:1999_0: Yo koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1999_2: etena vihāre bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vassagaṇanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2002_0: Titthiyapakkantakādikathāsu tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatteti vīmaṃsādiadhippāyaṃ vinā “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge kāyena dhāritamatte.
tika-vin07t:2002_1: Sayamevāti titthiyānaṃ santikaṃ agantvā sayameva saṅghārāmepi kusacīrādīni nivāseti.
tika-vin07t:2002_3: gacchatīti ājīvakānaṃ santike tesaṃ pabbajanavidhinā “ājīvako bhavissāmī”ti gacchati.
tika-vin07t:2002_4: Tassa hi titthiyabhāvūpagamanaṃ pati sanniṭṭhāne vijjamānepi “gantvā bhavissāmī”ti parikappitattā padavāre dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2002_5: Dukkaṭanti pāḷiyā avuttepi methunādīsu vuttapubbapayogadukkaṭānulomato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2002_6: Etena ca sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge sampaṭicchite pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2002_8: thullaccayakkhaṇe nivattantopi āpattiṃ desāpetvā muccati evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2002_10: evaṃ saṅghabhedepi lohituppādepi bhikkhūnaṃ pubbapayogādīsu dukkaṭathullaccayapārājikāhi muccanasīmā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:2002_13: aññe ca pārājikakaṇḍe visuṃ sikkhāpadena pārājikādiṃ adassetvā idha abhabbesu eva vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2003_0: Taṃ laddhinti titthiyavese seṭṭhabhāvaggahaṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2003_1: Tesañhi titthiyānaṃ sassatādiggāhaṃ gaṇhantopi liṅge asampaṭicchite titthiyapakkantako na hoti,
tika-vin07t:2003_2: taṃ laddhiṃ aggahetvāpi “etesaṃ vatacariyā sundarā”ti liṅgaṃ sampaṭicchanto titthiyapakkantako hoti eva.
tika-vin07t:2003_3: Laddhiyā abhāvenāti bhikkhubhāve sālayatāya titthiyabhāvūpagamanaladdhiyā abhāvena,
tika-vin07t:2003_4: etena ca āpadāsu kusacīrādiṃ pārupantassāpi naggassa viya anāpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2004_0: Upasampannabhikkhunā kathitoti ettha saṅghabhedakopi upasampannabhikkhunāva kathito,
tika-vin07t:2007_2: Vissarabhayenāti nāgassa sarīraṃ disvā bhikkhuno viravanabhayena.
tika-vin07t:2007_3: Kapimiddhādīsu nāgasarīraṃ nuppajjatīti taduppattisīmaṃ dassento āha “vissaṭṭho”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2010_2: Tiracchānādiamanussajātito manussajātikānaññeva puttesu mettādayopi tikkhavisadā honti lokuttaraguṇā viyāti āha “manussitthibhūtā janikā mātā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2010_5: Ānantariyenāti ettha cutianantaraṃ niraye paṭisandhiphalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t:2010_6: tasmiṃ anantare janakattena niyuttaṃ ānantariyaṃ, tena.
tika-vin07t:2010_8: kulitthiyā aticāriniyā puttopi attano pitaraṃ ajānitvā ghātento pitughātakova hoti.
tika-vin07t:2011_0: 114. Avasesanti anāgāmiādikaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ manussaviggahapārājike vuttameva.
tika-vin07t:2012_1: Ayaṃ saṅghabhedakoti pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2012_2: Pubbe eva pārājikaṃ samāpanno vā vatthādidosena vipannopasampado vā saṅghaṃ bhindantopi anantariyaṃ na phusati,
tika-vin07t:2013_1: Lohitaṃ uppādetīti tathāgatassa verīhi abhejjakāyatāya kenaci balakkārena cammādichedaṃ katvā bahi lohitaṃ paggharāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t:2013_2: āvudhādipahārena pana lohitaṃ ṭhānato calitvā kuppamānaṃ ekattha sañcitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2013_3: ettakena pana pahāradāyako lohituppādako nāma hoti devadatto viya.
tika-vin07t:2013_4: Cetiyaṃ pana bodhiṃ vā paṭimādiṃ vā bhindato ānantariyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:2013_6: Bodhirukkhassa pana ojoharaṇasākhā ceva sadhātukaṃ cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā ca chinditabbā,
tika-vin07t:2016_3: Ekassa hi bhāvadvayaṃ saha nuppajjati yamake paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:2016_4: Dutiyabyañjanaṃ pana kammasahāyena akusalacitteneva bhāvavirahitaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin07t:2016_6: na bhāvo tassa kenaci paccayena paccayattassa paṭṭhāne avuttattā.
tika-vin07t:2016_7: Kevalaṃ bhāvasahitānaṃyeva byañjanaliṅgānaṃ pavattidassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīnī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:2016_9: idha pana akusalabalena indriyaṃ vināpi byañjanaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2016_10: Ubhinnampi cesaṃ ubhatobyañjanakānaṃ yadā itthiyā rāgo uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:2016_16: Tattha vicāraṇakkamoti paṭisandhikkhaṇe eva itthipurisaliṅgānampi pātubhāvappakāsake kurundivacane ayuttatāpakāsanatthaṃ atthavicāraṇakkamo.
tika-vin07t:2016_17: Aṭṭhasāliniyañhi “itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2019_3: anupajjhāyako upasampādetabbo”ti idheva paññāpiyamānasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2019_4: “Kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti idaṃ upajjhāyābhāvepi “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho,
tika-vin07t:2019_5: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti matassa vā vibbhamantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa,
tika-vin07t:2019_6: aññassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassāpi nāmena sabbattha upajjhāyakittanassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2019_10: Aṭṭhakathāyampissa “upajjhāyaṃ akittetvā”ti avatvā “upajjhāyaṃ agāhāpetvā sabbena sabbaṃ upajjhāyavirahitaṃ”icceva atthoti vutto.
tika-vin07t:2019_11: Pāḷiyaṃ saṅghena upajjhāyenāti “ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho,
tika-vin07t:2019_12: itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2019_13: Evaṃ gaṇena upajjhāyenāti etthāpi “ayaṃ itthannāmo gaṇassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā yojanā veditabbā,
tika-vin07t:2019_14: evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva dukkaṭasseva vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:2019_17: Tattha paṇḍakādīhi upajjhāyehi kariyamānesu kammesu paṇḍakādike vināva yadi pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati,
tika-vin07t:2022_1: Apattacīvaravatthūsupi pattacīvarānaṃ abhāvepi “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti kammavācāya sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2022_2: Itarathā sāvanāya hāpanato kammakopo eva siyā.
tika-vin07t:2022_3: Keci pana “paṭhamaṃ anuññātakammavācāya upasampannā viya idānipi ‘paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’nti avatvā
tika-vin07t:2022_6: Anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya hi aparāmasanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanavipatti eva hoti “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti padassa hāpane viya.
tika-vin07t:2022_8: upasampadaṃ yācāmī”tiādivākyena ayācetvā tampi upasampādento “ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vatvāva yadi kammavācaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:2022_11: Sabbapacchā hi anuññātakammavācato kiñcipi parihāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:2022_13: Aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:2023_1: Sāmaṇerabhāgasamakoti ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānampi āmisabhāgassa samakameva diyyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t:2023_2: pattacīvaraparikammamattapaṭibaddhapabbajjatāya pana sāmaṇerasadisā ete paṇḍupalāsāti dassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2023_10: Bhesajjantiādinā pana gihīnaṃ bhesajjakaraṇādidoso ettha na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2026_1: Hatthacchinnādivatthūsu kaṇṇamūleti sakalassa kaṇṇassa chedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2026_3: Yassa pana kaṇṇāviddheti heṭṭhā kuṇḍalādiṭhapanacchiddaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2026_7: Sakkā hoti sandhetunti avirūpasaṇṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2027_0: Khujjasarīroti vaṅkasarīro. Brahmuno viya ujukaṃ gattaṃ sarīraṃ yassa, so brahmujjugatto, bhagavā.
tika-vin07t:2028_0: Parivaṭumoti samantato vaṭṭakāyo, etena evarūpā eva vāmanakā na vaṭṭantīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2029_0: Kūṭakūṭasīsoti anekesu ṭhānesu piṇḍikamaṃsataṃ dassetuṃ āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:2029_3: Anupubbatanukena sīsenāti cetiyathūpikā viya kamena kisena sīsena,
tika-vin07t:2029_4: thūlaveḷupabbaṃ viya ādito paṭṭhāya yāvapariyosānaṃ samathūlena uccena sīsena samannāgato nāḷisīso nāma.
tika-vin07t:2031_5: Oṭṭhacchinnakoti ubhosu oṭṭhesu yattha katthaci jātiyā vā pacchā vā satthādinā apanītamaṃsena oṭṭhena samannāgato.
tika-vin07t:2032_4: Ettha ca vinicchayo kuṭṭhādīsu vutto evāti āha “vinicchayo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2033_10: etena aggapādo ca paṇhi ca sadisoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2034_2: Piṭṭhipādaggena caṅkamantoti “pādassa bāhirantenāti ca abbhantarantenā”ti ca idaṃ pādatalassa ubhohi pariyantehi caṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2035_2: Yo ca karaṇasampannopi ekamevakkharaṃ hikkārabahuso vadati,
tika-vin07t:2035_4: Yo vā pana hikkaṃ niggahetvāpi anāmeḍitakkharameva siliṭṭhavacanaṃ vattuṃ samattho,
tika-vin07t:2036_0: Āpattito na muccatīti ñatvā karontova na muccati.
tika-vin07t:2039_1: Nissayapaṭisaṃyuttavatthūsu bhikkhūhi samāno bhāgo diṭṭhisīlādiguṇakoṭṭhāso assāti bhikkhusabhāgo,
tika-vin07t:2042_2: so karaṇīyo yassāti visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2042_4: anāpattīti gamanasaussāhatāya tathā vasantopi addhiko eva,
tika-vin07t:2042_6: Etena ca parissamādiabhāve senāsanādisampadaṃ paṭicca vasato āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2042_7: Tañca agamanapaccayā divase divase āpajjatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2042_13: anāpattī”ti vuttattā evarūpaṃ avidheyyataṃ vinā nissayadāyakarahitaṭṭhāne vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2043_2: tattha gantabbanti ettha pana sacepi “asuko thero ettha āgamissati āgamissatī”ti āgamentasseva vassūpanāyikadivaso hoti. Hotu,
tika-vin07t:2043_3: vasitaṭṭhāne vassaṃ anupagamma yattha nissayo labbhati,
tika-vin07t:2044_1: Gottenapīti “āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ nāmaṃ avatvā gottanāmenapīti attho,
tika-vin07t:2044_2: tena “konāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhena gottanāmena “āyasmā kassapo”ti vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2044_3: Tasmā aññampi kiñci tassa nāmaṃ pasiddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2044_4: tasmiṃ vā khaṇe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ nāmaṃ paññāpitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2044_9: Tasmimpi khaṇe “ayaṃ tisso”ti vā “nāgo”ti vā nāmaṃ karontehi anusāsakasammutito paṭhamameva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2044_13: upajjhāyo me bhante tisso nāmā”tiādinā viññāpentena ubhinnampi citte “mamedaṃ nāma”nti yathā saññā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:2044_15: Sace pana tasmiṃ khaṇe pakatināmena vatvā pacchā tissa-
tika-vin07t:2045_0: Tattha ca kiñcāpi upajjhāyasseva nāmaṃ aggahetvā yena kenaci nāmena “tissassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādināpi
tika-vin07t:2045_1: puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammaṃ sukatameva hoti anupajjhāyakādīnaṃ upasampadākammaṃ viya upajjhāyassa abhāvepi
tika-vin07t:2045_2: abhabbattepi kammavācāya puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammassa sijjhanato.
tika-vin07t:2045_3: Upasampadāpekkhassa pana yathāsakaṃ nāmaṃ vinā aññena nāmena anussāvite kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin07t:2045_5: Tattha ṭhito añño anupasampanno viya gahitanāmassa vatthupuggalassa tattha abhāvā,
tika-vin07t:2045_7: Tasmā upasampadāpekkhassa pakatināmaṃ parivattetvā anupubbena nāgādināmena anussāvetukāmena paṭikacceva
tika-vin07t:2045_8: “tvaṃ nāgo”tiādinā viññāpetvā anusāsanaantarāyikadhammapucchanakkhaṇesupi tassa ca saṅghassa ca yathā
tika-vin07t:2046_0: Yaṃ pana upasampadāpekkhaupajjhāyānaṃ ekattha gahitaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2046_3: Gahitato hi aññasmiṃ gahite byañjanaṃ bhinnaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:2046_5: hi byañjanato ca abhinnā eva ñatti,
tika-vin07t:2047_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pacchato “āyasmato”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2047_1: tathāpi “āyasmā sāriputto atthakusalo”tiādinā nāmassa purato āyasmanta-
tika-vin07t:2047_3: Tañca ekattha yojetvā aññattha ayojitepi ekattha purato yojetvā aññattha pacchato yojanepi sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma na hoti nāmassa ahāpitattā.
tika-vin07t:2047_4: Teneva pāḷiyampi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti ekattha yojetvā “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”tiādīsu “āyasmato”ti na yojitanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2047_6: tathāpi sabbaṭṭhānepi ekeneva pakārena yojetvā eva vā ayojetvā vā anussāvanaṃ pasatthataranti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2050_1: Ekato saheva ekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanā,
tika-vin07t:2050_6: Ekena vāti dvinnampi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekāya eva kammavācāya anussāvane ekenācariyenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2050_7: “Ayaṃ buddharakkhito ca ayaṃ dhammarakkhito ca āyasmato saṅgharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin07t:2050_8: ekena ācariyena dvinnaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvananayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2050_9: Imināva nayena tiṇṇampi ekena ācariyena ekakkhaṇe anussāvanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2051_1: aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvinnaṃ dvīhi vā,
tika-vin07t:2051_3: ekakena vā ācariyena tayopi ekato anussāvane kātunti attho,
tika-vin07t:2051_5: “Na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti idaṃ ekena ācariyena dvīhi vā tīhi vā upajjhāyehi dve vā tayo vā upasampadāpekkhe
tika-vin07t:2051_6: ekakkhaṇe ekāya anussāvanāya ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhepapadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2051_7: Na pana nānācariyehi nānupajjhāyehi tayo ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha “sace pana nānācariyā nānupajjhāyā…pe…
tika-vin07t:2051_10: sumanatthero tissattherassa saddhivihārika”nti evaṃ upajjhāyehi aññamaññaṃ saddhivihārikānaṃ anussāvanakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2051_16: Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva attano saddhivihārikaṃ anussāvetīti ettha vattabbameva natthi,
tika-vin07t:2051_18: Anupajjhāyakassapi yena kenaci anussāvite upasampadā hoti,
tika-vin07t:2051_19: kimaṅgaṃ pana saupajjhāyakassa upajjhāyeneva anussāvaneti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2054_4: saddo eva vā upajjhā upayogapaccattavacanesu ya-
tika-vin07t:2054_5: kāralopaṃ katvā evaṃ vutto karaṇavacanādīsu upajjhā-
tika-vin07t:2054_7: Pāḷiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitabbanti attanāva kattubhūtena karaṇabhūtena attānameva kammabhūtaṃ pati sammananakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2054_11: aññatrāpi terasasammutiādīsu imināva lakkhaṇena attanāva attā sammannitabbova.
tika-vin07t:2054_12: Apica sayaṃ kammārahattā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādiko gaṇo sabbattha icchitabbo.
tika-vin07t:2055_0: Saccakāloti “nigūhissāmī”ti vañcanaṃ pahāya saccasseva te icchitabbakālo.
tika-vin07t:2055_1: Bhūtakāloti vañcanāya abhāvepi manussattādivatthuno bhūtatāya avassaṃ icchitabbakālo,
tika-vin07t:2056_0: Sabbakammavācāsu atthakosallatthaṃ panettha upasampadākammavācāya evamattho daṭṭhabbo –
tika-vin07t:2056_2: Tañca kiñcāpi yo saṅgho savanakiriyāya niyojīyati,
tika-vin07t:2056_5: saddasannidhāne paṭhamapurisapayogova saddavidhūhi samāciṇṇo bhagavantaāyasmantādisaddasannidhānesu viya “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo.
tika-vin07t:2056_12: Garuṭṭhānīyesu hi gāravavasena majjhimapurisapayoguppattiyampi paṭhamapurisapayogaṃ payujjanti “desetu sugato dhamma”ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2056_14: āvusoti sadde apekkhitvā idha paṭhamapurisapayogo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:2056_15: taṃ na yuttaṃ “ācariyo me bhante hohi,
tika-vin07t:2056_17: imaṃ pabbajitaṃ anuyuñjāhī”tiādīsu tappayogepi majjhimapurisapayogasseva dassanato.
tika-vin07t:2057_7: Idha pana paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin07t:2057_8: majjhimesu janapadesu dasavaggato paṭṭhāya saṅghoti gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2057_12: Sace pana anussāvako sabbehi bhikkhūhi vuḍḍhataro hoti,
tika-vin07t:2057_18: Keci pana “ekattha ‘āvuso’ti vatvā aññattha ‘bhante’ti vuttepi natthi doso ubhayenāpi ālapanassa sijjhanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2058_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo “suṇātū”ti saṅghaṃ savane niyojeti,
tika-vin07t:2058_3: Tena ca hatthapāse ṭhitasseva upasampadā ruhatīti sijjhati hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa “aya”nti na vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:2058_4: Teneva anusāsakasammutiyaṃ so hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitattā “aya”nti na vutto.
tika-vin07t:2058_8: So ca imasmiṃ paṭhamanāmapayoge evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2058_13: Tassa ca upajjhāyataṃ samaṅgibhāvena dassetuṃ “itthannamassa āyasmato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2058_14: Etena “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa saddhivihārikabhūto upasampadāpekkho”ti evamādinā nayena nāmayojanāya saha attho dassitoti.
tika-vin07t:2058_15: Ettha ca “āyasmato”ti padaṃ avatvāpi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2058_16: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti ettha “āyasmato”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2059_0: Nanu cettha upajjhāyopi upasampadāpekkho viya hatthapāse ṭhito eva icchitabbo,
tika-vin07t:2059_1: atha kasmā “ayaṃ itthannāmo imassa itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ upajjhāyaparāmasanepi ima-
tika-vin07t:2059_4: Kevalañhi kammanipphattiyā santapadavasena avijjamānassapi upajjhāyassa nāmakittanaṃ anupajjhāyassa upasampadādīsupi karīyati.
tika-vin07t:2059_5: Tasmā upajjhāyassa asannihitatāyapi tapparāmasanamatteneva kammasiddhito “imassā”ti niddisituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2060_0: Parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehīti abhabbatādikehi upasampadāya avatthukarehi ceva pañcābādhahatthacchinnādīhi
tika-vin07t:2060_2: Evaṃ vutto eva ca āpattimattakarehi pañcābādhādīhi aparimuttassapi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t:2060_4: Evaṃ vutte eva apattacīvarassāpi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t:2060_7: Evaṃ tena saṅghe ayācitepi “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vutte eva kammaṃ avipannaṃ hoti, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t:2060_8: Upajjhāyenāti upajjhāyena karaṇabhūtena itthannāmaṃ upajjhāyaṃ katvā kammabhūtaṃ upasampadaṃ dātuṃ nipphādetuṃ kattubhūtaṃ saṅghaṃ yācatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2061_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallanti ettha patto kālo imassāti pattakālaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2061_7: Yo hi koci tattha apattakallataṃ maññissati,
tika-vin07t:2061_9: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya anussāvanāsu “yassāyasmato khamati…pe…
tika-vin07t:2062_0: Tattha vatthusampadā nāma yathāvuttehi ekādasahi abhabbapuggalehi ceva antimavatthuajjhāpannehi ca añño
tika-vin07t:2062_2: etasmiṃ puggale sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2063_0: Antarāyikehi dhammehi cassa parisuddhatā nāma yathāvuttasseva upasampadāvatthubhūtassa puggalassa ye
tika-vin07t:2063_1: ime bhagavatā paṭikkhittā pañcābādhaphuṭṭhatādayo mātāpitūhi ananuññātatāpariyosānā ceva hatthacchinnatādayo
tika-vin07t:2063_2: ca dosadhammā kārakasaṅghassa āpattādiantarāyahetutāya “antarāyikā”ti vuccanti tehi antarāyikehi dosadhammehi
tika-vin07t:2063_4: imissā ca sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2063_5: Kataṃ pana kammaṃ sukatameva hoti ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassapuggalaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2064_0: Sīmāsampadā pana uposathakkhandhake vakkhamānanayena sabbadosavirahitāya baddhābaddhavasena duvidhāya sīmāya vaseneva veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:2064_1: Tādisāya hi sīmāya sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2065_0: Parisasampadā pana ye ime upasampadākammassa sabbantimena paricchedena kammappattā dasahi vā pañcahi vā anūnā pārājikaṃ anāpannā,
tika-vin07t:2065_6: vajjanīyapuggalānaṃ saṅghassa hatthapāse abhāvo cāti imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:2065_7: Evarūpāya ca parisasampadāya sati eva idaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2065_8: Tattha purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññatarassapi abhāve kataṃ kammaṃ vipajjati,
tika-vin07t:2066_0: Pubbakiccaniṭṭhāpanaṃ nāma yānimāni “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttāni “upajjhaṃ gāhāpanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2066_2: tato taṃ hatthapāsato bahi ṭhapetvā anusāsakasammutikammakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2066_4: tena ca paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā saṅghassa ñāpetvā upasampadāpekkhaṃ ‘āgacchāhī’ti hatthapāse eva abbhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2066_5: tena ca bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā upasampadāyācāpanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2066_7: sammatena ca pucchana”nti imāni aṭṭha pubbakiccāni,
tika-vin07t:2066_9: Etasmiñca pubbakammaniṭṭhāpane sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2066_10: Etesu pana pubbakammesu akatesupi kataṃ kammaṃ yathāvuttavatthusampattiādīsu vijjamānesu akuppameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:2066_11: Tadevamettha pattakallaṃ imehi pañcahi aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2066_13: vakkhamānesu ca sabbesu kammesu pattakallatā yathārahaṃ yojetvā ñātabbā.
tika-vin07t:2067_0: Itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyāti upasampadānipphādanena taṃsamaṅgiṃ kareyya karotūti patthanāyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2067_2: Yathā hi “devadattaṃ sukhāpeyyā”ti vutte sukhamassa nipphādetvā taṃ sukhasamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho hoti,
tika-vin07t:2067_3: evamidhāpi upasampadamassa nipphādetvā taṃ upasampadāsamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2067_4: Payojakabyāpāre cetaṃ yathā sukhayantaṃ kañci suddhakattāraṃ koci hetukattā sukhahetunipphādanena sukhāpeyyāti vuccati,
tika-vin07t:2067_5: evamidhāpi upasampajjantaṃ suddhakattāraṃ puggalaṃ hetukattubhūto saṅgho upasampadāhetunipphādanena upasampādeyyāti vutto.
tika-vin07t:2067_6: Etena ca sukhaṃ viya sukhadāyakena saṅghena puggalassa diyyamānā tathāpavattaparamatthadhamme upādāya
tika-vin07t:2067_7: ariyajanapaññattā upasampadā nāma sammutisaccatā atthīti samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2067_8: Ettha ca “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vuttattā parivāsādīsu viya yācanānuguṇaṃ “itthannāmassa
tika-vin07t:2067_9: upasampadaṃ dadeyyā”ti avatvā “itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyā”ti vuttattā idaṃ upasampadākammaṃ dāne asaṅgahetvā
tika-vin07t:2068_5: kāre vuttamatte eva ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2068_7: Upasampadāti saṅghena diyyamānā nipphādiyamānā upasampadā yassa khamati.
tika-vin07t:2068_11: Khamati saṅghassa itthannāmassa upasampadāti pakatena sambandho.
tika-vin07t:2068_15: so bhāseyyā”ti tikkhattuṃ vuccamānopi saṅgho tuṇhī niravo ahosi,
tika-vin07t:2068_18: Tuṇhībhāvenevetaṃ saṅghassa ruccanabhāvaṃ dhārayāmi bujjhāmi pajānāmīti attho. Iti-
tika-vin07t:2071_1: Ekaporisā vātiādi sattānaṃ sarīracchāyaṃ pādehi minitvā jānanappakāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2071_3: Idañca utuppamāṇācikkhanādi ca āgantukehi saddhiṃ vīmaṃsitvā vuḍḍhanavabhāvaṃ ñatvā vandanavandāpanādikaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2071_6: sova pamiyate anena saṃvaccharanti pamāṇanti āha “utuyeva utuppamāṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t:2071_10: Tenāha “yattakehi divasehi yassa yo utu aparipuṇṇo,
tika-vin07t:2071_12: Tattha yassa taṃ khaṇaṃ laddhūpasampadassa puggalassa sambandhī yo utu yattakehi divasehi aparipuṇṇo,
tika-vin07t:2072_0: Chāyādikameva sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyitabbato kathetabbato saṅgītīti āha “idamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2072_2: Tvaṃ kiṃ labhasīti tvaṃ upasampādanakāle kataravassaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2072_6: Idañca saṃvaccharācikkhanaṃ vinā vuttampi na ñāyatīti iminā utuācikkhaneneva sāsanavassesu vā kaliyugavassādīsu
tika-vin07t:2072_7: vā sahassime vā satime vā asukaṃ utuṃ labhāmīti dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2072_9: Vattabbakamato pana kaliyugavassādīsu sabbadesapasiddhesu asukavasse asukautumhi asukamāse asuke kaṇhe
tika-vin07t:2072_10: vā sukke vā pakkhe asukatithivāravisesayutte nakkhatte pubbaṇhādidivasabhāge ettake chāyāpamāṇe,
tika-vin07t:2072_11: nāḍikāpamāṇe vā mayā upasampadā laddhāti vadeyyāsīti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2072_12: “Idaṃ suṭṭhu uggahetvā āgantukehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ ñatvā paṭipajjāhī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2072_13: Pāḷiyaṃ kissa tvanti kiṃ tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ akāsīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2073_1: Upasampadaṃ yācīti pabbajjañca upasampadañca yācīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2073_4: “Osāretabbo”ti iminā purimo ukkhittabhāvo vibbhamitvā puna laddhūpasampadampi na muñcati.
tika-vin07t:2073_5: Tena ca sambhuñjanādīsupi bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2073_6: Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ettha sahaseyyāpi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2073_10: Yo pana āpattiṭṭhāne anāpattidiṭṭhitāya āpattiṃ na passati,
tika-vin07t:2073_12: so yasmā ettāvatā alajjī nāma na hoti.
tika-vin07t:2073_13: Paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā vītikkamaṃ karonto eva hi alajjī nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t:2073_16: Tena sāpettha āpatti na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2073_17: Yo panettha imaṃ adhippāyaṃ asallakkhentena kenaci “anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti iminā pācittiyena anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t:2073_18: alajjisambhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjati evāti āpattiniyamo vutto,
tika-vin07t:2074_3: lajjīnaṃ paggahesu ca pesalānaṃ sukhāvahe mahante vinayamhi yathā atthakārī atthānuguṇaṃ karontova yasmā yoniso paṭipajjati nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:2080_0: 132. Uposathakkhandhake taranti otaranti etthāti titthaṃ, laddhi. Itoti sāsanaladdhito.
tika-vin07t:2081_1: Āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhitoti ettha desanārocanānampi saṅgaho.
tika-vin07t:2081_2: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā āpatti…pe…
tika-vin07t:2082_0: Manujenāti āsannena saha. Pareti dūraṭṭhepi parapuggale sandhāya giraṃ no ca bhaṇeyyāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:2083_0: “Āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vuttattā garukāpattipi āvikaraṇamattena vuṭṭhātīti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:2083_3: yathābhūtañhi attānamāvikarontaṃ pesalā bhikkhū “akāmā parivatthabba”ntiādivacanaṃ nissāya anicchamānampi
tika-vin07t:2083_4: naṃ upāyena parivāsādīni datvā avassaṃ suddhante patiṭṭhāpessanti,
tika-vin07t:2083_5: tato tassa avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vasena phāsu hoti.
tika-vin07t:2083_9: pubbe paññattampi pana pārājikādisikkhāpadaṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā “tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ
tika-vin07t:2083_10: āgacchantī”tiādinā pārājikuddesādivasena vinayamātikaṃ katvā nidānuddesena saha sayameva saṅgahetvā “pātimokkha”nti
tika-vin07t:2084_0: 136. Etaṃ 34 veditabbanti yasmiṃ tasmiṃ cātuddase vā pannarase vāti evaṃ atthajātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2087_2: Tassaṃ pana disāyaṃ nimitte asati yattha atthi,
tika-vin07t:2087_4: dakkhiṇāya disāyā”tiādinā samantā vijjamānaṭṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā puna “puratthimāya anudisāyā”ti paṭhamakittitaṃ kittetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:2087_6: Tikkhattuṃ sīmāmaṇḍalaṃ sambandhantenāti vinayadharena sayaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā kevalaṃ nimittakittanavacaneneva
tika-vin07t:2087_7: sīmāmaṇḍalaṃ samantā nimittena nimittaṃ bandhantenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2087_8: Taṃ taṃ nimittaṭṭhānaṃ agantvāpi hi kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2087_9: Tiyojanaparamāya sīmāya samantato tikkhattuṃ anuparigamanassa ekadivasena dukkarattā vinayadharena sayaṃ
tika-vin07t:2087_10: adiṭṭhampi pubbe bhikkhūhi yathāvavatthitaṃ nimittaṃ “pāsāṇo bhante”tiādinā kenaci vuttānusārena sallakkhetvā
tika-vin07t:2088_0: Suddhapaṃsupabbatoti na kenaci kato sayaṃjātova vutto.
tika-vin07t:2088_3: Hatthippamāṇatoti ettha bhūmito uggatappadesena hatthippamāṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2088_4: Catūhi vā tīhi vāti sīmābhūmiyaṃ catūsu,
tika-vin07t:2088_6: Ekissā eva pana disāya ṭhitehi tato bahūhipi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2088_7: Dvīhi pana dvīsu disāsu ṭhitehipi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2088_8: Tasmāti yasmā ekena na vaṭṭati, tasmā.
tika-vin07t:2088_9: Taṃ bahiddhā katvāti kittitanimittassa asīmattā antosīmāya karaṇaṃ ayuttanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2089_4: Atimahantopīti bhūmito hatthippamāṇaṃ anuggantvā heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ otiṇṇaghanato anekayojanappamāṇopi.
tika-vin07t:2089_5: Sace hi tato hatthippamāṇaṃ kūṭaṃ uggacchati,
tika-vin07t:2090_0: Antosārānanti tasmiṃ khaṇe taruṇatāya sāre avijjamānepi pariṇāmena bhavissamānasārepi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2090_3: Etena ca sārarukkhamissampi vanaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2090_5: Vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karontīti rukkhaghaṭāya antare rukkhe acchinditvā vatiādīhi vihāraparicchedaṃ katvāva
tika-vin07t:2090_6: antorukkhantaresu eva pariveṇapaṇṇasālādīnaṃ karaṇavasena yathā antovihārampi vanameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:2090_8: Yadi hi sabbaṃ rukkhaṃ chinditvā vihāraṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t:2090_9: vihārassa avanattā taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ vanaṃ ekattha kittetabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t:2090_10: Idha pana antopi vanattā “vanaṃ na kittetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2090_12: “nimittassa upari vihāro hotī”tiādinā anantare vuttadosaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:2090_14: rukkhavirahitaṭṭhāne katavihārassa ekapasse ṭhitavanassa ekadesanti attho.
tika-vin07t:2091_2: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avebhaṅgiyavinicchaye “yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu…pe…
tika-vin07t:2091_3: garubhaṇḍa”nti vuttattā tanutaro veḷudaṇḍoti ca sūcidaṇḍoti ca gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2091_4: Vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādīsūti veḷupabbe vā naḷapabbe vā kapallakādimattikabhājanesu vāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2091_5: Taṅkhaṇampīti taruṇapotake amilāyitvā viruhanajātike sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2091_6: Ye pana pariṇatā samūlaṃ uddharitvā ropitāpi chinnasākhā viya milāyitvā cirena navamūlaṅkuruppattiyā jīvanti,
tika-vin07t:2092_1: Koṇanti sīmāya catūsu koṇesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2092_2: Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti tesaṃ catunnaṃ koṇānaṃ bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitesu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2092_3: aññissā disāya cāparanti evaṃ cattāropi maggā catūsu disāsu kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2092_4: Evaṃ pana kittitamattena kathaṃ ekābaddhatā vigacchatīti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin07t:2092_5: Parato gataṭṭhānepi ete eva te cattāro maggā.
tika-vin07t:2093_0: “Uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā”ti idañca pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ nadīpāragamane nadilakkhaṇassa āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2093_2: “Nadicatukkepi eseva nayo”ti iminā ekattha kittetvā aññattha parato gataṭṭhānepi kittetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2093_3: Teneva ca “assammissanadiyo catassopi kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti asammissa-
tika-vin07t:2093_6: Nadiṃ bhinditvāti yathā udakaṃ anicchantehi kassakehi mahoghe nivattetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t:2095_4: “Nimittānaṃ satenāpī”ti iminā ekissāya eva disāya bahunimittāni “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ?
tika-vin07t:2095_13: Sīmāya upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti āyatiṃ bandhitabbāya sīmāya nesaṃ vihārānaṃ paricchedato bahi sīmantarikappahonakaṃ upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin07t:2095_17: Baddhasīmāsadisānīti yathā baddhasīmāsu ṭhitā aññamaññaṃ chandādiṃ anapekkhitvā paccekaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ labhanti,
tika-vin07t:2096_2: Idañca kammārahena saha abbhānakārakānampi pahonakatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2096_3: “Nimittupagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā”ti idaṃ yathārucitaṭṭhāne rukkhanimittādīnaṃ dullabhatāya vaḍḍhitvā ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:2096_4: baddhasīmānaṃ saṅkarakaraṇato ca pāsāṇanimittassa ca tadabhāvato yattha katthaci ānetvā ṭhapetuṃ sukaratāya
tika-vin07t:2096_7: Caturaṅgulappamāṇāpīti yathā khandhasīmāparicchedato bahi nimittapāsāṇānaṃ caturaṅgulamattaṭṭhānaṃ samantā nigacchati,
tika-vin07t:2096_9: evaṃ tesupi ṭhapitesu caturaṅgulamattā sīmantarikā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2097_1: Te pana kittentena padakkhiṇato anupariyāyanteneva kittetabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin07t:2097_2: Khaṇḍasīmato hi pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena ṭhatvā “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha
tika-vin07t:2097_3: sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā tathā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇābhimukhena ṭhatvā “dakkhiṇāya disāya
tika-vin07t:2097_4: kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā puratthimāya disāya pacchimābhimukhena ṭhatvā “pacchimāya disāya
tika-vin07t:2097_5: kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā dakkhiṇāya disāya uttarābhimukhena ṭhatvā “uttarāya disāya
tika-vin07t:2097_6: kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā puna pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena
tika-vin07t:2097_8: Evaṃ bahūnampi khaṇḍasīmānaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇā paccekaṃ kittetabbā.
tika-vin07t:2097_11: Ubhinnampi na kopentīti ubhinnampi kammaṃ na kopenti.
tika-vin07t:2098_2: Nimittaṃ na kātabbanti taṃ rājiṃ vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2098_3: Idañca yathāvuttesu nimittesu anāgatattena na vaṭṭatīti siddhampi avinassakasaññāya koci mohena nimittaṃ
tika-vin07t:2098_5: Evaṃ upari “bhittiṃ akittetvā”tiādīsupi siddhamevatthaṃ punappunaṃ kathane kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2098_6: Sīmāvipatti hi upasampadādisabbakammavipattimūlanti tassā sabbaṃ dvāraṃ sabbathā pidahanavasena vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2098_7: Sabbaṃ vatvāva idha ācariyā vinicchayaṃ ṭhapesunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2099_1: Silāmayāya pana bhittiyā nimittupagaṃ ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ taṃtaṃdisāya kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2099_2: Anekasilāhi cinitaṃ sakalabhittiṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti ekavacanena vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:2099_3: Antokuṭṭamevāti ettha antokuṭṭepi nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsato anto eva sīmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2099_4: Pamukhe nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvāti gabbhābhimukhepi bahipamukhe gabbhavitthārappamāṇe ṭhāne pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin07t:2099_5: Evañhi gabbhapamukhānaṃ antare ṭhitakuṭṭampi upādāya anto ca bahi ca caturassasaṇṭhānāva sīmā hoti.
tika-vin07t:2100_0: Anto ca bahi ca sīmā hotīti majjhe ṭhitabhittiyā saha caturassasīmā hoti.
tika-vin07t:2101_0: “Uparipāsādeyeva hotī”ti iminā gabbhassa ca pamukhassa ca antarā ṭhitabhittiyā ekattā tattha ca ekavīsatiyā
tika-vin07t:2101_3: Heṭṭhimatale kuṭṭoti heṭṭhimatale catūsu disāsu ṭhitakuṭṭo.
tika-vin07t:2101_5: tīsu vā disāsu eva kuṭṭo tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin07t:2101_7: Heṭṭhāpi otaratīti catunnampi bhittīnaṃ anto bhittīhi saha ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ pahonakattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2101_9: catunnaṃ pana bhittīnaṃ bāhirantaraparicchede heṭṭhābhūmibhāge udakapariyantaṃ katvā otarati.
tika-vin07t:2101_10: Na pana bhittīnaṃ bahi kesaggamattampi ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2101_12: Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti uparisīmappamāṇassa antogadhānaṃ heṭṭhimatale catūsu disāsu
tika-vin07t:2101_13: kuṭṭānaṃ tulārukkhehi ekasambandhataṃ tadanto pacchimasīmappamāṇatādiñca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2101_14: Kiñcāpettha niyyūhakādayo nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsatāya bajjhamānakkhaṇe sīmā na honti,
tika-vin07t:2101_15: baddhāya pana sīmāya sīmaṭṭhāva hontīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:2101_17: “Uparimatalena sambaddho hotī”ti idaṃ kuṭṭānaṃ antarā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ thambhānaṃ abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2101_19: kuṭṭe uparimatalena asambandhepi sīmaṭṭhatthambhānaṃ upari ṭhito pāsādo sīmaṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin07t:2102_0: Sace pana bahūnaṃ thambhapantīnaṃ upari katapāsādassa heṭṭhā pathaviyaṃ sabbabāhirāya thambhapantiyā anto nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā baddhā hoti,
tika-vin07t:2102_2: Etthāpi yaṃ tāva sīmaṭṭhatthambheheva dhāriyamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2102_6: asīmaṭṭhāya bāhiratthambhapantiyā ca samadhuraṃ dhāriyamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2102_10: Tasmā kammaṃ karontehi garuke nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā sabbaṃ taṃ āsaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvāva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2103_0: Tālamūlakapabbateti tālakkhandhamūlasadise heṭṭhā thūlo hutvā kamena kiso hutvā uggato hi tālasadiso nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t:2103_2: Paṇavasaṇṭhānoti majjhe tanuko heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthiṇṇo.
tika-vin07t:2103_3: Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa heṭṭhā,
tika-vin07t:2104_4: “So ca pāsāṇo sīmaṭṭho”ti iminā īdisehi susirapāsāṇaleṇakuṭṭādīhi paricchinne bhūmibhāge eva sīmā patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t:2104_8: Sace pana so susirapāsāṇo bhūmiṃ anāhacca ākāsagatova olambati,
tika-vin07t:2104_10: Susirapāsāṇā pana sayaṃ sīmāpaṭibaddhattā sīmā honti.
tika-vin07t:2104_11: Kathaṃ pana pacchimappamāṇarahitehi etehi susirapāsāṇādīhi sīmā na otaratīti idaṃ saddhātabbanti?
tika-vin07t:2105_0: Apicettha susirapāsāṇabhittianusārena mūsikādīnaṃ viya sīmāya heṭṭhimatale otaraṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin07t:2105_1: Heṭṭhā pana pacchimasīmappamāṇe ākāse dvaṅgulamattabahalehi pāsāṇabhittiādīhipi uparimatalaṃ āhacca ṭhitehi sabbaso,
tika-vin07t:2105_2: yebhuyyena vā paricchinne sati upari bajjhamānā sīmā tehi pāsāṇādīhi antaritāya tapparicchinnāya heṭṭhābhūmiyāpi
