tika-vin07t:2454_15: Dhammikapaṭissavassa asaccāpane pana tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “mayā asamavekkhitvā paṭissavaṃ katvā so na saccāpito,
tika-vin07t:2454_16: taṃ me khamathā”tiādinā khamāpane vacanakkamo ñāpetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2455_1: Pāḷiyaṃ maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetunti tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ puna gantvāpi mānathaddhatāya
tika-vin07t:2455_2: yathābhūtaṃ dosaṃ āvikatvā akhamāpanena “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto khamāpetuṃ na sakkhi,
tika-vin07t:2455_3: so punadeva sāvatthiṃ paccāgantvāpi mānaniggahatthāyeva punapi satthārā pesito purimanayeneva khamāpetuṃ asakkonto punāgacchi.
tika-vin07t:2455_4: Athassa bhagavā “asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyyā”tiādināva dhammaṃ desetvā mānanimmathanaṃ katvā anudūtadānaṃ anuññāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2456_2: āpattiṃ desāpetabbo”ti vuttattā pageva gahaṭṭho khamati ce,
tika-vin07t:2457_1: Ukkhepanīyakammesu tīsu ariṭṭhavatthusmiṃ āpattiṃ āropetvāti visuṃ saṅghamajjheva pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2457_5: tena tena pakārena yojetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t:2457_6: Gahaṇākāraṃ pana vināpi “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin07t:2457_9: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla”nti evaṃ sāmaññatopi kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2458_1: “Yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya bhaṇḍanādīni karotī”ti iminā diṭṭhiṃ nissāya uppannāni eva bhaṇḍanādīni idha adhippetāni,
tika-vin07t:2458_3: Yo pana “bhaṇḍanādīnaṃ karaṇe doso natthī”ti diṭṭhiko hutvā bhaṇḍanādiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:2463_4: pārivāsikā ca tesaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin07t:2463_8: “Vattaṃ karontī”ti ettakamattasseva vuttattā saddhivihārikādīhipi abhivādanādiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2464_0: “Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne”ti idaṃ pavāraṇādivasesu saṅghe pavārente anupagatachinnavassādīhi kariyamānapārisuddhiuposathampi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2465_0: “Pārivāsikassevā”ti idaṃ abbhānārahapariyosāne sabbe garukaṭṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2465_1: Tesampi paccekaṃ oṇojanassa anuññātattā tadavasesā pakatattā eva taṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin07t:2466_1: Hatthapāse ṭhitenāti dāyakassa hatthapāse paṭiggahaṇaruhanaṭṭhāneti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2468_3: Attano vacane pavattanakammanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:2468_4: “mā pakkamāhī”ti vā “ehi vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāva”nti vā evaṃ attano āṇāya pavattanakakammaṃ na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2468_5: Evañhi kenaci savacanīye kate anādarena atikkamituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:2468_6: buddhassa saṅghassa āṇā atikkantā nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t:2469_2: Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti vassaggena na labhati.
tika-vin07t:2470_1: Sace vāyamantopīti ettha avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā avāyamantopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t:2472_2: Mañce vā pīṭhe vāti ettha vā-
tika-vin07t:2472_4: tena taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīsu dīghāsanesupi nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2473_0: Na vattabhedadukkaṭanti vuḍḍhatarassa jānantassāpi vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2478_6: Keci pana “tadaheva puna vattaṃ samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmassa ratticchedaparihāratthampī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2479_0: “Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantī”ti vuttattā visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahi eva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2479_1: “Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2479_2: “Mahāmaggato okkammā”ti idaṃ maggapaṭipannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upacārātikkamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2480_0: “Sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇe eva gacchatī”ti iminā ārocanāya katāya sabbesupi bhikkhūsu vihāragatesu
tika-vin07t:2480_1: ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāsadoso vā na hoti ārocitattā sahavāsassāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2480_3: Abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti katampi akatameva hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2483_4: Pāḷiyaṃ “paṭikassito saṅghena udāyi bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā…pe…
tika-vin07t:2483_5: mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti idaṃ karaṇavasena vipariṇāmetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanāya paṭikassitoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2483_6: Atha vā “mūlāya paṭikassanā khamati saṅghassā”ti uttarapadena saha paccattavaseneva yojetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2484_1: mūlāya paṭikassitvā”ti ettha antarā ekissā āpattiyā hetubhūtāya udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase
tika-vin07t:2484_2: ākaḍḍhitvā tassā antarāpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detūti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:2484_3: Āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabboti tassa atekicchabhāvaṃ teneva saṅghassa pākaṭaṃ kāretvā lajjigaṇato viyojanavasena vissajjetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2485_0: Sataṃ āpattiyoti kāyasaṃsaggādivasena ekadivase āpannā sataṃ āpattiyo.
tika-vin07t:2485_4: tiṇṇaṃ samodhānaparivāsānañcāti imesaṃ sabbesaṃ parivāsānaṃ kammavācāpariyosāne.
tika-vin07t:2486_1: “Dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā”ti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacārātikkamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2486_2: Gāmassāti na vuttanti gāmassa upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatīti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2486_3: Tena gāmūpacāre ṭhitāpi tattha dassanasavanūpacāre atikkamitvā ṭhitā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca tassā ratticchedaṃ na karontīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:2487_0: Anikkhittavattabhikkhūnaṃ vuttanayenevāti upacārasīmāya paviṭṭhānaṃ vasena ratticchedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2487_4: “Sammannitvā dātabbā”ti iminā sammatāya sahavāsepi ratticchedo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2489_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabba”nti idaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanākammavācānantarameva dātuṃ vuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:2489_5: Mūlāyapaṭikassitassa pana pañcadivasāni parivasitvā yācitassa mānattacaraṇakāle āpannāya tatiyāya antarāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:2489_7: Evañca dinnamānattassa ekena chārattena pubbe dinnamānattāhi tīhi āpattīhi saha catassannampi āpattīnaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:2489_8: Iminā pana nayena abbhānārahakāle āpannāya antarāpattiyā,
tika-vin07t:2489_10: “Ekāhappaṭicchannādivasena pañcā”ti idaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccekaparivāsadānamānattadānaabbhānāni ekekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2489_11: “Antarāpattivasena catasso”ti idampi mānattadānaabbhānāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassane ekattaṃ āropetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2492_3: appaṭicchannāya antarāpattiyā mūlāyapaṭikassane katepi tesaṃ makkhitabhāvasambhavato.
tika-vin07t:2492_4: Tasmā “mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi parivutthadivasāpi sabbe makkhitāva hontī”ti imassānantaraṃ “samodhānaparivāso cassa dātabbo”ti evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t:2495_3: Appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dassetunti ajānanādinā paṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā mānattārahatāvacanena appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ. “Ekassa, āvuso,
tika-vin07t:2495_5: Ettha ekassa ajānanapaṭicchannamāsassa parivāsāraho na hoti,
tika-vin07t:2495_6: kevalaṃ āpattiyā appaṭicchannattā mānattāraho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2495_8: Saṅghādisesānaṃ parivāsadānādisabbavinicchayassa samuccayattā panesa samuccayakkhandhakoti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:2500_1: Samathakkhandhake khīṇāsavassa vipulasatiṃ nissāya dātabbo vinayo codanādiasāruppānaṃ vinayanupāyo sativinayo.
tika-vin07t:2501_3: codentīti ettha pana ummattakassa idaṃ ummattakaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2501_6: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena anācārena āpannāya āpattiyā gaggaṃ bhikkhuṃ codentīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2501_7: Paṭhamaṃ mūḷho hutvā pacchā amūḷhabhāvaṃ upagatassa dātabbo vinayo amūḷhavinayo.
tika-vin07t:2502_1: Dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyabhāvasampādikā kiriyā yebhuyyasikāti imasmiṃ atthe sa-
tika-vin07t:2502_5: Yebhuyyabhāvaṃ nissitasamathakiriyā yebhuyyasikāti evaṃ yebhuyyasikāsaddassa attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2502_7: Yathāvuttasalākaggāhena hi dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyabhāve siddhe pacchā taṃ yebhuyyabhāvaṃ nissāyeva adhikaraṇavūpasamo hoti,
tika-vin07t:2503_1: “Sesamettha tajjanīyādīsu vuttanayamevā”ti etena tajjanīyādisattakammāni viya idampi tassapāpiyasikākammaṃ asucibhāvādidosayuttassa,
tika-vin07t:2503_2: saṅghassa ca vinicchaye atiṭṭhamānassa kattabbaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ niggahakammanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2503_3: Etasmiñhi niggahakamme kate so puggalo “ahaṃ suddho”ti attano suddhiyā sādhanatthaṃ saṅghamajjhaṃ otarituṃ,
tika-vin07t:2503_4: saṅgho cassa vinicchayaṃ dātuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin07t:2503_5: taṃ kammakaraṇamatteneva ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2504_1: Keci panettha “so tathā niggahito niggahitova hoti,
tika-vin07t:2504_3: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ osāraṇā na vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2504_4: Aññe pana “pāḷiyaṃ na upasampādetabbantiādinā sammāvattanassa vuttattā sammāvattitvā lajjidhamme okkantassa
tika-vin07t:2504_5: osāraṇā avuttāpi tajjanīyādīsu viya nayato kammavācaṃ yojetvā osāraṇā kātabbā evā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:2504_8: vattaṃ paripūretvā paṭippassaddhiṃ labhissati. No ce,
tika-vin07t:2507_1: Virūpato vipariṇāmaṭṭhena cittaṃ dukkhaṃ vipaccatīti āha “cittadukkhatthaṃ vohāro”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2508_0: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca tassa tassa kammassa viññātattāti vitthārato āgatakammavaggassa ādito paṭṭhāya vaṇṇanāmukhena
tika-vin07t:2509_1: Pāḷiyaṃ ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t:2509_2: Bahiddhā vāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t:2511_1: Sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārena akusalābyākatabhāvena vuccamāne kusalassāpi āpattikāraṇattā
tika-vin07t:2511_3: tathā avatvā “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti evaṃvacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2511_5: yadi hi āpatti nāma paramatthadhammasabhāvā bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t:2511_7: Yasmā duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathādīsu dassitadosappasaṅgato paramatthasabhaāvatā na yuttā,
tika-vin07t:2511_9: tasmā “siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”ntipi nippariyāyato na vattabbā.
tika-vin07t:2511_10: Yadi pana akusalaabyākatadhammasamuṭṭhitattameva upādāya pariyāyato “siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2511_11: Tadā kusaladhammasamauṭṭhitattampi upādāya pariyāyato “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusala”ntipi vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t:2511_12: Yato cetaṃ vacanaṃ āpattiyā akusalābyākatūpacārārahattassa kusalūpacārānārahattassa visuṃ kāraṇasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2511_13: tasmā yaṃ taṃ kāraṇavisesaṃ sandhāya idaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2512_0: Idāni pana yo aṅgappahonakacittameva sandhāya āpattiyā akusalādibhāvo vutto,
tika-vin07t:2512_4: Āpattādhikaraṇe kusalacittaṃ aṅganti paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvā kusalacittena cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu bhūmisodhanādivasena
tika-vin07t:2512_6: Tasmiṃ satīti tasmiṃ āpattādhikaraṇe vijjamāne kusalacittasamuṭṭhitattena kusalavohārārahāya āpattiyā vijjamānāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2512_7: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “tasmiṃ satī”ti imassa “tasmiṃ kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite”ti attho vutto,
tika-vin07t:2513_0: Na sakkā vattunti yadi sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā akusalādisamuṭṭhitattena akusalādivohāro karīyati,
tika-vin07t:2513_1: tadā kusalavohāropi kattabboti “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin07t:2513_3: Tasmāti yasmā kusalādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samānepi āpattiyā aṅgappahonakatte kusalavohārova āpattiyā paṭikkhitto,
tika-vin07t:2513_5: tasmā nayidaṃ aṅgappahonakaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya vuttanti “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin07t:2513_6: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti idaṃ āpattiyā samuṭṭhāpakattena aṅgappahonakaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ cittamattaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2513_8: Etena āpattiyā akusalādibhāvopi kenaci nimittena pariyāyatova vutto,
tika-vin07t:2514_1: “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti idañhi yaṃ kiñci kadāci katthaci kāraṇaṃ bhavantaṃ aniyatakāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:2514_2: Yaṃ pana sabbasikkhāpadesu āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarahati,
tika-vin07t:2514_4: Akusalañhi paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā vītikkamantassa sabbāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2514_5: lokavajjāpattiyā pana paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassapi kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2514_6: Kevalaṃ paṇṇattivajjāpattīsu kusalābyākatacittapavattikkhaṇe eva akusalaṃ na vattati,
tika-vin07t:2514_8: Abyākataṃ pana kāyavacībhūtaṃ kusalākusalādīnaṃ pavattikkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannassa sahaseyyāpattiyanti
tika-vin07t:2514_9: sabbāpattiyā aṅgameva hoti channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavācaṅgavirahitattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:2514_10: Tasmā imesaṃ akusalābyākatānaṃ sabbāpattimūlakattameva sandhāya idaṃ āpattiyā akusalattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2514_12: Yattha pana pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalampi āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2514_13: tatthāpi āpattiyā tadupacārena kusalattavohāro ayutto sāvajjānavajjānaṃ ekattavohārassa viruddhattā.
tika-vin07t:2515_0: Tattha ekantato akusalamevāti akusalacittena samuṭṭhahanato kāraṇūpacārato evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2515_4: Akusalaṃ hotīti akusalasamuṭṭhitāya kāraṇūpacārena akusalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2515_5: Sahaseyyādivasena āpajjanato abyākataṃ hotīti itthiyādīhi saha piṭṭhipasāraṇavasappavattakāyadvārasaṅkhātarūpābyākatavaseneva
tika-vin07t:2515_9: aññatvā ca āpajjanavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya akusalattaabyākatattasaṅkhātaṃ yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ vikappasabhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2516_0: Yadi evaṃ asañciccāpajjanapakkhe kusalenāpi āpajjanato tampi vikappaṃ sandhāya “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā
tika-vin07t:2516_1: kusala”ntipi kasmā na vuttanti āha “sace panā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2516_3: Acittakasamuṭṭhānānaṃ “kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti etena sāvajjabhūtāya āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārenāpi anavajjabhūtakusalavohāro ayuttoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2516_4: “Na ca tatthā”tiādinā kusalassa āpattiyā kāraṇattaṃ vijjamānampi tathā voharituṃ ayuttanti paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:2516_12: “Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti idaṃ kāraṇūpacārena pariyāyato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2517_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āpattiyā nippariyāyatova akusalādisabhāvataṃ samatthetuṃ bahuṃ papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2517_1: taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyameva paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:2517_2: Tenevetthāpi “yaṃ cittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hotī”tiādinā akusalacittassāpi āpattiyā kāraṇattena bhinnatāva dassitā.
tika-vin07t:2517_4: taṃ heṭṭhā dassitamevāti idha na vitthārayimha.
tika-vin07t:2517_5: Evaṃ vītikkamato yo vītikkamoti ettha akusalacittena ñatvā vītikkamantassa kāyavacīvītikkamasamuṭṭhitā āpattivītikkamoti vutto.
tika-vin07t:2520_1: Pāḷiyaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ ekaṃ samathaṃ anāgammātiādi pucchā.
tika-vin07t:2520_3: Siyātissa vacanīyanti eteneva vūpasamaṃ siyāti vattabbaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2520_8: Ubbāhikāya khīyanake pācittiyaṃ na vuttaṃ tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin07t:2521_1: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvāti khuddakamahantehi saññāṇehi yuttāyo katvā.
tika-vin07t:2522_2: sammatīti ettha sammukhāvinayena apalokanādikammaṃ sampajjatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2528_1: Puthupāṇikanti muṭṭhiṃ akatvā vikasitahatthatalehi piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t:2530_3: Ettha ca dumāsassa vā dvaṅgulassa vā atikkantabhāvaṃ ajānantassāpi kesamassugaṇanāya acittakāpattiyo hontīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2531_0: Kocchenāti usīratiṇādīni bandhitvā samaṃ chinditvā gahitakocchena.
tika-vin07t:2532_6: tatopi adhikamattāyuttaṃ katvā kathanaṃ vikārakathanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t:2533_1: Pāḷiyaṃ taruṇaññeva ambanti taruṇaṃ asañjātabījaṃ eva ambaphalaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2534_1: Cattāri ahirājakulānīti sabbesaṃ ahibhedānaṃ catūsu eva saṅgahato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2535_0: Virūpakkhehi me mettanti virūpakkhajātikehi nāgehi saha mayhaṃ mittabhāvo hotu,
tika-vin07t:2535_2: te sukhitā niddukkhā averā hontūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2535_5: Apādakehīti ahikulehi saha sabbasattesu odhiso mettāpharaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2535_6: Mā maṃ apādako hiṃsīti tāya mettāya attarakkhāvidhānadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2536_0: Sabbe sattātiādi attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā sabbasattesu anodhiso mettāpharaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2536_1: Tattha mā kañci pāpamāgamāti kañci sattaṃ lāmakaṃ dukkhahetu,
tika-vin07t:2537_0: Evaṃ mettāya attaguttiṃ dassetvā idāni ratanattayānussaraṇena dassetuṃ “appamāṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2538_3: Yasmā mayā mettādīhi tumhākañca mayhañca rakkhā katā,
tika-vin07t:2538_4: yasmā ca sohaṃ bhagavato namo karomi,
tika-vin07t:2539_2: Bīje hi chinne opakkamikapaṇḍako nāma abhabbo hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2539_3: Eke pana “bījassāpi chedanakkhaṇe dukkaṭāpatti eva kamena purisindriyādike antarahite paṇḍako nāma abhabbo hoti,
tika-vin07t:2539_5: Tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassāti muṭṭhippahārādīhi attano dukkhaṃ uppādentassa.
tika-vin07t:2540_1: Pāḷiyaṃ tuyheso pattoti “yo ca arahā ceva iddhimā ca,
tika-vin07t:2540_4: Taṃ pattaṃ gahetvā tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyīti ettha veḷuparamparāya baddhapattassa uparibhāge
tika-vin07t:2540_5: ākāse nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ anupariyāyitvā ṭhitabhāvaṃ sandhāya “pattaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2540_6: na pana thero hatthena pattaṃ sayameva aggahesi.
tika-vin07t:2540_7: Keci pana vadanti “iddhibalena taṃ pattaṃ veḷuparamparato muñcitvā theraṃ anubandhamāno aṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin07t:2540_8: so ca anena hatthena gahito viya ahosī”ti.
tika-vin07t:2540_9: Tathā ṭhitameva pana sandhāya “bhāradvājassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2540_11: anubandhiṃsūti ye ca manussā paṭhamaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ nāddasaṃsu,
tika-vin07t:2540_13: Thero ca sīhabyagghādirūpaṃ gahetvā vikubbaniddhiṃ dasseti,
tika-vin07t:2540_14: te ca acchariyabbhutajātā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2540_17: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ na dassetabbanti ettha “yo pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti,
tika-vin07t:2540_19: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evamāgatā attano sarīrassa vikārāpādanavasappavattā vikubbaniddhi adhippetāti
tika-vin07t:2540_22: sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā āvajjetvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti “bahuko homī”ti evaṃ dassitā adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma.
tika-vin07t:2541_0: 253. Pāḷiyaṃ na acchupiyantīti na phusitāni honti. Rūpakākiṇṇānīti itthirūpādīhi ākiṇṇāni.
tika-vin07t:2542_2: Etassa valayādhārakassa anuccatāya ṭhapitā pattā na paripatantīti “tayo patte ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2542_6: Ete ca uccatarā honti pattehi saha patanasabhāvā.
tika-vin07t:2542_10: Tādisassa dāruādhārakassa avitthiṇṇatāya ṭhapitopi patto patatīti “anokāso”ti vutto.
tika-vin07t:2543_4: Sabbattha pana hatthappamāṇato abbhantare ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2544_1: Pattamāḷakanti upacikānaṃ anuṭṭhahanatthāya bhūmito uccataraṃ kataṃ vedikākāramāḷakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2544_6: Aññena pana bhaṇḍakenāti aññena bhārabandhanena bhaṇḍakena.
tika-vin07t:2544_7: “Bandhitvā olambetu”nti vuttattā pattatthavikāya aṃsabaddhako yathā laggitaṭṭhānato na parigaḷati,
tika-vin07t:2544_9: Bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti upari nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindantīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2545_1: Pariharitunti divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2545_2: Pattaṃ alabhantena pana ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2546_1: “Paṭiggahaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā ucchiṭṭhahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā pattaṃ paripphositvā dhovanaghaṃsanavasena hatthaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:2546_2: ettakena pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hattho dhovito nāma na hoti.
tika-vin07t:2546_3: Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti pattaṃ aphusitvā tattha udakameva ucchiṭṭhahatthena ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusaṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t:2546_4: vāmahattheneva vā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2546_5: Bahi udakena vikkhāletvāti dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisamattaṃ vikkhāletvā bahi gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2546_6: Paṭikhāditukāmoti ettha na sayaṃ khāditukāmopi aññesaṃ khādanārahaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin07t:2547_3: Nisseṇimpīti catūhi daṇḍehi cīvarappamāṇena āyatacaturassaṃ katvā baddhapaṭalampi.
tika-vin07t:2547_4: Ettha hi cīvarakoṭiyo samakaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ yathāsukhaṃ sibbanti.
tika-vin07t:2547_5: Tattha attharitabbanti tassā nisseṇiyā upari cīvarassa upatthambhanatthāya attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2547_6: Kathinasaṅkhātāya nisseṇiyā cīvarassa bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti majjhimapadalopīsamāsoti āha “yāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2547_7: Tattha yasmā dvinnaṃ paṭalānaṃ ekasmiṃ adhike jāte tattha valiyo honti,
tika-vin07t:2547_8: tasmā dupaṭṭacīvarassa paṭaladvayampi samakaṃ katvā bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2548_0: Pāḷiyaṃ kathinassa anto jīratīti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyanto jīrati.
tika-vin07t:2548_1: Kathinanissitañhi cīvaraṃ idha nissayavohārena “kathina”nti vuttaṃ “mañcā ghosantī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:2548_2: Anuvātaṃ paribhaṇḍanti kathine bandhanarajjūhi cīvarassa samantā pariyantassa ajīraṇatthaṃ yehi kehici coḷakehi dīghato anuvātaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2548_3: tiriyato paribhaṇḍañca sibbitvā kātuṃ yattha rajjuke pavesetvā daṇḍesu paliveṭhetvā cīvarasamakaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t:2548_5: Keci pana “kathinasaṅkhātesu kilañjādīsu eva ajīraṇatthāya anuvātaparibhaṇḍakaraṇaṃ anuññāta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2548_8: Aññaṃ nisseṇinti dīghato ca tiriyato ca aññaṃ daṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā bandhituṃ.
tika-vin07t:2551_3: Addhānamaggo paṭipajjitabboti ettha addhayojanaṃ addhānamaggo nāma,
tika-vin07t:2551_6: tattha ṭhatvā saṅghāṭikaṇṇādiṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā gamane padavārena āpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2553_4: Udakena otthariyyatīti samantā vassodakaṃ āgantvā kūpe patatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2554_2: Arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma cakkasaṇṭhānaṃ anekāraṃ are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena,
tika-vin07t:2555_3: Pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvāti samantā caturassākārena phalakādīni ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin07t:2556_5: Yattha uṇhapāyāsādiṃ pakkhipitvā upari bhojanapātiṃ ṭhapenti bhattassa uṇhabhāvāvigamanatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2556_9: Idañca āsittakūpadhānaṃ paccantesu na jānanti kātuṃ,
tika-vin07t:2556_11: Keci pana “gihiparibhogo ayomayādi sabbopi ādhāro āsittakūpadhānameva anulometī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:2557_1: Pattaṃ nikkujjitunti ettha kammavācāya asambhogakaraṇavaseneva nikkujjanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2557_4: taṃ vaḍḍhaṃ kammavācāya saṅghena saddhiṃ asambhogaṃ saṅgho karotūti attho.
tika-vin07t:2558_1: Asambhogaṃ saṅghena karaṇanti saṅghena vaḍḍhassa asambhogakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2558_5: asambhogaṃ saṅghenāti ettha saṅghena asambhogo hotīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2558_8: aṭṭhakathāyañca “koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo”ti vuttattā patte nikkujjite tassa santakaṃ ñatvā gaṇhantassa dukkaṭamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2559_3: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ te aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
tika-vin07t:2559_4: Bhikkhūnaṃ alābhāya parisakkatītiādīsu alābhāya parisakkanādito viratoti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2560_1: Yāva pacchimā sopānakaḷevarāti paṭhamasopānaphalakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2560_2: Tañhi pacchā dussena santhatattā eva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2560_3: “Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatī”ti idaṃ thero anāgate bhikkhūnaṃ celapaṭikassa akkamanapaccayā
tika-vin07t:2560_4: apavādaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā nivāraṇena bhagavato anukampaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin07t:2561_0: 269-270. Bījaninti caturassabījaniṃ. Ekapaṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādinā ekena pattena katachattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2562_2: Dīghaṃ kārentīti kesehi saddhiṃ acchinditvā ṭhapāpenti.
tika-vin07t:2562_4: heṭṭhā hanukapasse dveti cattāro koṇā paññāyanti,
tika-vin07t:2562_6: Pāḷiyaṃ dāṭhikaṃ ṭhapāpentīti uttaroṭṭhe massuṃ acchinditvā ṭhapāpenti.
tika-vin07t:2563_3: Bandhanamattanti vāsidaṇḍādīnaṃ koṭīsu apātanatthaṃ lohehi bandhanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2564_2: tattha bandhitabba”nti etena asañcicca kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā paviṭṭhassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2564_3: Murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā katanti evaṃ bahurajjuke ekato katvā nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi katanti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2564_5: Vikāraṃ pana adassetvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā nirantaraṃ veṭhitaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2564_6: Teneva dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ “bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ ‘bahurajjuka’nti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2565_1: Pāḷiyaṃ gaṇṭhikaphalakaṃ pāsakaphalakanti ettha dārudantādimayesu phalakesu gaṇṭhikapāsakāni appetvā cīvare ṭhapetuṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2567_4: Na hi pakataṅgulena caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe avilaggaṃ khādituṃ sakāti.
tika-vin07t:2568_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sakāya niruttiyā buddhavacanaṃ dūsentīti māgadhabhāsāya sabbesaṃ vattuṃ sukaratāya hīnajaccāpi uggaṇhantā dūsentīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2569_0: 289. Mā bhikkhū byābādhayiṃsūti lasuṇagandhena bhikkhū mā bādhayiṃsu.
tika-vin07t:2575_1: Senāsanakkhandhake sisireti sisirakāle himapātavasena sattāhavaddalikādivassapātavassena ca uppanno kharo
tika-vin07t:2575_4: tena ca vihārena vātātapo paṭihaññatīti atthoti āha “vihārena paṭihaññatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:2576_1: Āviñchanachiddanti yattha aṅguliṃ vā rajjusaṅkhalikādiṃ vā pavesetvā kavāṭaṃ ākaḍḍhantā dvārabāhaṃ phusāpenti,
tika-vin07t:2576_3: Senāsanaparibhoge akappiyaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ “sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2576_4: Cetiye vedikāsadisanti vātapānadāruṃ vā jālaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā dāruṭṭhāne cetiye vedikāya paṭṭādīni viya iṭṭhakādīhi uddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2576_6: Thambhakavātapānaṃ nāma tiriyaṃ dārūni adatvā uddhaṃ ṭhapitadārūhi eva kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:2576_7: Coḷakapādapuñchanaṃ bandhitunti vātapānappamāṇena pādapuñchanasadisaṃ coḷakādinā bandhitvā vagguliādippavesananivāraṇatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2577_4: Āyatacaturassā pana sattaṅgapañcaṅgāpi uccapādā na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin07t:2577_5: Vetteheva caturassādiākārena kataṃ bhaddapīṭhanti āha “vettamayaṃ pīṭha”nti.
tika-vin07t:2577_6: Dārupaṭṭikāya uparīti aṭaniākārena ṭhitadārupaṭalassa heṭṭhā uddhaṃ pādaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:2577_8: Eḷakassa pacchimapādadvayaṃ viya vaṅkākārena ṭhitattā panetaṃ “eḷakapādapīṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2577_10: latā ca muñcitvā avasesaṃ gacchādikaṃ sabbampi tiṇajāti evāti āha “yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t:2578_1: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yattha gīvāya saha sakalaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t:2578_5: taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā katvā sibbitaṃ yathā koṭito koṭi vitthārato puthulaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2578_8: taṃ pana antesu ṭhapitacoḷaṃ koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇaṃ kataṃ tikaṇṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2578_9: Tesu tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānamantaraṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2578_10: majjhaṭṭhānaṃ koṭito koṭiṃ āhacca muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2579_1: uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchatī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā gonakādiakappiyampi uṇṇamayattharaṇaṃ bhisiyaṃ pakkhipitvā sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2580_1: Cammamayaṃ pana bimbohanaṃ tūlapuṇṇampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2580_4: Paribhijjatīti mañcādito sāriyamānā pīṭhakoṭiādīsu nisīdantehi ghaṃsiyamānā bhisi paribhijjati.
tika-vin07t:2580_6: Pāḷiyaṃ chaviṃ uppāṭetvā harantīti bhisicchaviṃ corā haranti.
tika-vin07t:2580_7: Phositunti corehi haritassa pacchā haritasaññāṇaphusitabindūni dātuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2582_1: “Karohī”ti vattumpi na labbhatīti āṇattiyā eva paṭikkhittattā dvārapālaṃ “kiṃ na karosī”tiādinā pariyāyena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2582_2: Jātakapakaraṇanti jātakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ itthipurisādi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2582_3: “Parehi kārāpetu”nti vuttattā buddharūpampi sayaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin07t:2583_1: Upacāro na hotīti gabbhassa bahi samantā anuparigamanassa okāso nappahoti.
tika-vin07t:2583_4: Kappakataṃ viya sārakhāṇuke ākoṭetvā evaṃ katameva “āharimaṃ bhittipāda”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2583_5: Upatthambhanatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetunti jiṇṇabhittipādena bahi samānabhāraṃ khāṇukappasīsena ussāpetvā mūlena bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2584_0: Ubhatokuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā katapadesassāti yathā bahi ṭhitā ujukaṃ anto nisinne na passanti,
tika-vin07t:2584_1: evaṃ dvārābhimukhaṃ pidahanavasena bhittiñca aññato dvārañca yojetvā kataṭṭhānaṃ vadati.
tika-vin07t:2584_3: Vaṃsaṃ datvāti purisappamāṇe pāde nikhaṇitvā tesaṃ upari piṭṭhivaṃsasadisaṃ passavaṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā osāretvā.
tika-vin07t:2584_4: Ekaṃ daṇḍakoṭiṃ atiuccāya vihārabhittikoṭiyā ekaṃ koṭiṃ nīce vaṃsapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapanavasena daṇḍake pasāretvā.
tika-vin07t:2584_5: Cakkalayutto kiṭikoti kavāṭaṃ viya vivaraṇathakanasukhatthaṃ cakkalabandhakiṭikaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2584_8: kappasīsehi vā upatthambhanīhi ukkhipitvā pacchā otaraṇakiṭikampi.
tika-vin07t:2585_0: 301. Pānīyaṃ otappatīti pānīyabhājanesu ṭhapitapānīyaṃ ātapena santappati.
tika-vin07t:2587_1: Āloko antaradhāyīti yo buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā ānubhāvena mahanto obhāso ahosi,
tika-vin07t:2587_2: yena cassa padīpasahassena viya vigatandhakāro maggo ahosi,
tika-vin07t:2587_3: so bahinagare chavasarīrasamākulaṃ duggandhaṃ bībhacchaṃ āmakasusānaṃ pattassa bhayena pītivege mandībhūte antaradhāyi.
tika-vin07t:2588_0: Sataṃ hatthīti gāthāya hatthino satasahassānīti evaṃ paccekaṃ sahassa-
tika-vin07t:2588_2: Padavītihārassāti “buddhaṃ vandissāmī”ti ratanattayaṃ uddissa gacchato ekapadavītihārassa,
tika-vin07t:2588_5: taṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ yathāvuttā hatthiādayo sabbe nāgghanti nārahanti,
tika-vin07t:2589_0: Andhakāro antaradhāyīti puna balavapītiyā āloke samuppanne antaradhāyi.
tika-vin07t:2590_1: Dadeyyāti navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vihāre issariyaṃ dadeyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2594_3: “Taṃ na gāhetabba”nti vacanassa kāraṇamāha “paccayeneva hi ta”ntiādinā,
tika-vin07t:2594_4: paccayaññeva nissāya tattha vasitvā paṭijagganā bhavissantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2595_4: “Adātuṃ na labbhatī”ti iminā sañcicca adadantassa paṭibāhane pavisanato dukkaṭanti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:2596_0: “Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabbo”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “na tattha manussā vattabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2596_1: Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā paccaye dassantī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā.
tika-vin07t:2596_4: “Suddhacittattāva anavajja”nti idaṃ pucchitakkhaṇe kāraṇācikkhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti asuddhacittassapi pucchitapañhavisajjane dosābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:2596_5: Evaṃ pana gate maṃ pucchissantītisaññāya agamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2597_1: Muddavedikāyāti cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya ghaṭākārassa upari caturassavedikāya.
tika-vin07t:2598_4: Iti saddhādeyyeti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsikalābhavisayeti attho.
tika-vin07t:2599_1: tañca “tato catupaccayaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti dinnakhettādito uppannattā kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe “kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin07t:2599_2: paribhuñjathā”ti dāyakehi dinnavatthusadisaṃ hotīti āha “kappiyakārakānaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2601_0: “Kappiyabhaṇḍavasenā”ti sāmaññato vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cīvarataṇḍulādivaseneva cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ca-
tika-vin07t:2601_5: kappiyabhaṇḍavasena ca apalokanappakāraṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ pana evaṃ kattabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2602_0: Cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvāti saddhādeyyatatruppādādivasena tasmiṃ vassāvāse labbhamānaṃ cīvarasaṅkhātaṃ paccayaṃ “ettaka”nti paricchinditvā.
tika-vin07t:2602_3: vuḍḍho ca navakassā”ti idaṃ senāsanaggāhassa attanāva attano gahaṇaṃ asāruppanti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2602_5: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti ekakammavācāya sabbepi ekato sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2602_6: Niggahakammameva hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti.
tika-vin07t:2602_7: Teneva sattasatikakkhandhake “ubbāhikakammasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekatova sammatāti.
tika-vin07t:2604_2: Āvāsesu pakkhipitvāti “ito uppannaṃ asukasmiṃ asukasmiñca āvāse vasantā pāpetvā gaṇhantū”ti vācāya upasaṃharitvā.
tika-vin07t:2604_3: Pavisitabbanti mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvāva lābho gahetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2605_0: Ayampīti ettha yo paṃsukūliko paccayaṃ vissajjeti.
tika-vin07t:2605_2: Pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ dentīti paccayadāyakā denti.
tika-vin07t:2605_3: Etena gahaṭṭhehi pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnampi paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2605_4: Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadantīti ettha paṃsukūlikānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2606_0: Upanibandhitvā gāhāpetabbanti idha rukkhādīsu vasitvā cīvaraṃ gaṇhathāti paṭibandhaṃ katvā gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2607_1: Antarāmuttakaṃ pana pāṭipadaṃ atikkamitvāpi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2607_2: Nibaddhavattaṃ ṭhapetvāti sajjhāyamanasikārādīsu nirantarakaraṇīyesu kattabbaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:2608_3: Tañhi gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya ekacārikeneva vattitabbattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2609_0: Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattanti dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu dantakaṭṭhesu “divase divase ekameva dantakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t:2609_5: Khandhakavattanti vattakkhandhake āgataṃ piṇḍacārikavattato avasiṭṭhavattaṃ tassa “bhikkhācāravatta”nti visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:2610_0: Idāni yaṃ dāyakā pacchimavassaṃvutthānaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ denti,
tika-vin07t:2610_2: Āgantuko sace bhikkhūti cīvare gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu.
tika-vin07t:2610_4: Paṭhamavassūpagatāti āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā.
tika-vin07t:2610_5: Laddhaṃ laddhanti punappunaṃ dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2611_1: Paṭhamameva katikāya katattā “neva adātuṃ labhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2611_3: Tesameva dātabbanti vassūpagatesu aladdhavassāvāsikānaṃ ekaccānameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2612_2: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti “chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca
tika-vin07t:2612_3: imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī”ti anantare vuttanayena apalokanaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ saṅghena dinnattā vibbhantopi labhati.
tika-vin07t:2612_5: Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana temāsaṃ vasitvā gahetuṃ attanā,
tika-vin07t:2612_6: dāyakehi ca anumatattā bhatiniviṭṭhampi chinnavassopi vibbhantopi na labhatīti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2612_8: Teneva vassūpanāyikadivase eva dāyakehi dinnavassāvāsikaṃ gahitabhikkhuno vassacchedaṃ akatvā vāsova heṭṭhā vihito,
tika-vin07t:2612_12: Tasmā vassaggena gāhitaṃ chinnavassādayo na labhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2613_0: “Saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti etena vutthavassānampi vassāvāsikabhāgo saṅghikato amocito tesaṃ vibbhamena saṅghiko hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2613_1: Labhatīti “mama pattabhāgaṃ etassa dethā”ti dāyake sampaṭicchāpenteneva saṅghikato viyojitaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2617_1: Pāḷiyaṃ ubhayattha paribāhiroti kamena ubhayassapi muttattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2618_1: Yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahotīti mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ āsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahoti,
tika-vin07t:2618_3: Ettha mañcapīṭharahitesu asamānāsanikāpi tayo nisīdituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin07t:2618_5: Adīghāsanesu mañcapīṭhesu samānāsanikā eva dve nisīdituṃ labhanti duvaggasseva anuññātattā.
tika-vin07t:2619_0: Hatthinakho heṭṭhābhāge etassa atthīti hatthinakho, pāsādo.
tika-vin07t:2619_2: so sabbadisāsu anekehi hatthirūpehi samalaṅkato ṭhito.
tika-vin07t:2619_3: Tassūpari kato pāsādo hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhito viya hotīti āha “hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhita”nti.
tika-vin07t:2619_5: Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati “na kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabba”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:2619_6: Tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2619_7: gonakādiakappiyabhaṇḍavisaye eva vuttaṃ ekabhikkhussāpi tesaṃ gahaṇe dosābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:2619_9: gihīhi attano santakaṃ attharitvā dinnaniyāmenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2622_0: 321. Arañjaroti bahuudakagaṇhanikā mahācāṭi, jalaṃ gaṇhitumalanti arañjaro.
tika-vin07t:2623_0: Thāvarena ca thāvarantiādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu purimadvayaṃ thāvaraṃ,
tika-vin07t:2623_2: Samakameva detīti ettha ūnakaṃ dentampi vihāravatthusāmantaṃ gahetvā dūrataraṃ dukkhagopaṃ vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2623_7: “Nanu tumhākaṃ bahutarā rukkhāti vattabba”nti idaṃ sāmikesu attano bhaṇḍassa mahagghataṃ ajānitvā dentesu
tika-vin07t:2623_8: taṃ ñatvā theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2624_0: Vihārena vihāro parivattetabboti savatthukena aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ katapāsādādinā,
tika-vin07t:2625_0: “Kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā”ti iminā suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ akappiyamañcaṃ “saṅghassā”ti vuttepi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2625_7: Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ kappiyavohārena dinnaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2626_1: bhājetabbo”ti vuttattā vaṭṭakaṃsalohamayampi bhājanaṃ puggalikampi sampaṭicchitumpi pariharitumpi vaṭṭati
tika-vin07t:2626_3: Taṃ upari “kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā vaṭṭatī”tiādikena mahāpaccarivacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin07t:2626_4: Imassa hi “vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako bhājetabbo”ti vuttassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa
tika-vin07t:2626_6: Tasmā vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohamayaṃ yaṃ kiñci pādaggaṇhanakavārakampi upādāya abhājanīyameva.
tika-vin07t:2626_7: Gihīhi diyyamānampi puggalassa sampaṭicchitumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2626_8: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pattādiparikkhāraṃ viya sayameva paṭisāmetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2626_9: Gihisantakaṃ viya ārāmikādayo ce sayameva gopetvā viniyogakāle ānetvā paṭinenti,
tika-vin07t:2628_0: Anāmāsampīti suvaṇṇādimayampi sabbaṃ taṃ āmasitvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2630_0: “Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaro”ti idaṃ rajitacīvaraṃ ekasmiṃ maṭṭhe daṇḍamuggare veṭhetvā ekassa maṭṭhaphalakassa
tika-vin07t:2630_1: upari ṭhapetvā upari aparena maṭṭhaphalakena nikujjitvā eko upari akkamitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin07t:2630_2: Dve janā upari phalakaṃ dvīsu koṭīsu gahetvā aparāparaṃ ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t:2630_4: Hatthe ṭhapāpetvā hatthena paharaṇaṃ pana niṭṭhitarajanassa cīvarassa allakāle kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2630_5: Idaṃ pana phalakamuggarehi ghaṭṭanaṃ sukkhakāle thaddhabhāvavimocanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2631_0: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2631_2: “Paccattharaṇagatika”nti iminā mañcādīsu attharitabbaṃ mahācammaṃ eḷakacammaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2632_0: Chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇanti tālapaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pattakaṭāhanti pattapacanakaṭāhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2635_1: Pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍanikkhepanamattenātiādīsu khaṇḍaphullaṭṭhāne mattikāpiṇḍaṭṭhapanaṃ piṇḍanikkhepanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:2635_7: Ubbedhato pana anekabhūmakattā vaḍḍhakīhatthena vīsatihatthopi nānāsaṇṭhānavicittopi hoti.
tika-vin07t:2636_1: Ekassa sabbesu vihāresu navakammaṃ detīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2636_2: Sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhantīti navakammikā attano gāhitaṃ varaseyyaṃ sampattānaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ akatvā utukālepi paṭibāhanti.
tika-vin07t:2637_3: Evaṃ vissajjanampi thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṭṭhāne eva pavisati,
tika-vin07t:2637_5: Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā dātuṃ na icchati,
tika-vin07t:2637_7: tādisassa tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jaggāti na sabbaṃ tassa dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2637_9: Evañhītiādimhi vayānurūpaṃ tatiyabhāge vā upaḍḍhabhāge vā gahite taṃ bhāgaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2638_1: So sāmīti tassā bhūmiyā vihārakaraṇe sova sāmī,
tika-vin07t:2638_2: taṃ paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2638_5: Cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vāti saṅghikasenāsanaṃ nissāya tato bahi cayaṃ bandhitvā,
tika-vin07t:2641_2: evaṃ kattabbassa evaṃ nipphādetabbassa mañcapīṭhādino atthāya.
tika-vin07t:2643_0: “Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā nevāsikehi dhotapādādīhi vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne sañcicca adhotapādādīhi vaḷañjantasseva āpatti paññattāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2644_0: “Dvārampī”tiādinā sāmaññato vuttattā dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā.
tika-vin07t:2647_1: Uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattānīti ettha iti-
tika-vin07t:2651_1: vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitaṃ suggahitanti attho.
tika-vin07t:2652_2: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāmā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rañño vā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2653_0: Sabbaṃ pattassāmikassa hotīti cīvarādikampi sabbaṃ pattassāmikasseva hoti,
tika-vin07t:2653_2: na cīvarādinti vatvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2655_0: Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti “katarabhattaṃ vā tayā āharīyatī”ti dāyakaṃ apucchitvā.
tika-vin07t:2658_0: Vicchinditvāti “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti padaṃ avatvā. Tenevāha “bhattanti avadantenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2660_1: saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhūti ettha ye mātikaṃ āruḷhā,
tika-vin07t:2660_4: vā sayaṃ vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2660_6: Mātikaṃ āropetvāti “saṅghato gaṇhāmī”tiādinā vuttamātikābhedaṃ dāyakassa viññāpetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2661_0: Paṭibaddhakālato pana paṭṭhāyāti tattheva vāsassa nibaddhakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin07t:2664_2: Bahūni salākabhattānīti tiṃsaṃ vā cattārīsaṃ vā bhattāni.
tika-vin07t:2665_1: Niggahena datvāti dūraṃ gantuṃ anicchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā datvā.
tika-vin07t:2665_2: Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti ettha vihāraṃ anāgantvā bhattaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāre attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2666_1: Uddisitvāpīti asukakule salākabhattāni tuyhaṃ pāpuṇantīti vatvā.
tika-vin07t:2667_1: Saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vāti daṇḍakammatthāya udakaghaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2668_2: Ekasseva pāpuṇantīti divase divase ekekasseva pāpitānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2669_1: “Salākavasena gāhitattā pana na sāditabbā”ti idaṃ asāruppavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2669_6: Laddhā vā aladdhā vā svepi gaṇheyyāsīti laddhepi appamattatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2670_1: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāme salākaṃ attano gahetvā.
tika-vin07t:2670_3: Devasikaṃ pāpetabbāti upacārasīmāya ṭhitassa yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbā.
tika-vin07t:2670_4: Evaṃ etesu agatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati itarathā saṅghikato.
tika-vin07t:2671_0: Amhākaṃ gocaragāmevāti salākabhattadāyakānaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2671_1: Vihāre therassa pattasalākabhattanti vihāre ekekasseva ohīnattherassa sabbasalākānaṃ attano pāpanavasena pattasalākabhattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2674_0: “Sve pakkho”ti ajja pakkhikaṃ na gāhetabbanti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbaṃ sattamiyā bhuñjanatthāya na gāhetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2674_3: Sve lūkhanti ajja āvāhamaṅgalādikaraṇato atipaṇītabhojanaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin07t:2675_0: Pakkhikabhattato uposathikassa bhedaṃ dassento āha “uposathaṅgāni samādiyitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2676_0: Gamiko āgantukabhattampīti gāmantarato āgantvā avūpasantena gamikacittena vasitvā puna aññattha gacchantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2676_2: “Lesaṃ oḍḍetvā”ti vuttattā lesābhāve yāva gamanaparibandho vigacchati,
tika-vin07t:2683_1: Saṅghabhedakakkhandhake pāḷiyaṃ anupiyaṃ nāmāti anupiyā nāma.
tika-vin07t:2684_2: Migabhūtena cetasāti katthaci alaggatāya migassa viya jātena cittena.
tika-vin07t:2685_3: yasmiṃ me pasanne bahulābhasakkāro uppajjeyyā”ti paṭhamaṃ uppannaparivitakkassa mandapariyuṭṭhānatāya devadattassa tasmiṃ khaṇe jhānaparihāni nāhosi,
tika-vin07t:2685_6: Dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakhettānīti ettha magadharaṭṭhe khuddakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ gāvutamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2685_9: Tesu majjhimena gāmakhettena dve vā khuddakena tīṇi vā gāmakhettāni,
tika-vin07t:2685_10: tassa sarīraṃ tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:2686_6: parehi vā ayaṃ satthā sammānīyatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2687_1: Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vā nāsāpuṭe pakkhipeyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2687_3: Tassā hi gahitagabbhāya vijāyitumasakkontiyā udaraṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti.
tika-vin07t:2689_1: Mā kuñjara nāgamāsadoti he kuñjara buddhanāgaṃ vadhakacittena mā upagaccha.
tika-vin07t:2689_7: Mā ca madoti mado tayā na kātabboti attho.
tika-vin07t:2690_2: tato adhikehi ekato paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanakaṃ gaṇabhojanapaṭipakkhaṃ bhojananti attho.
tika-vin07t:2693_6: Tena sahitā anusāsanī eva dhammī kathā.
tika-vin07t:2694_0: “Thullaccayaṃ desāpehī”ti idaṃ bhedapurekkhārassa uposathādikaraṇe thullaccayassa uposathakkhandhakādīsu paṭhamameva paññattattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2697_3: Pāpicchānaṃ yathāgatīti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yādisī gati abhisamparāyo.
tika-vin07t:2697_5: Imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattassa “paṇḍito”tiādinā upari vakkhamānākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2699_3: Na padūseyya visamissaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2702_1: Na pana ettāvatā saṅgho bhinno hotīti salākaggāhāpanamattena saṅghabhedānibbattito vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2702_2: Uposathādisaṅghakamme kate eva hi saṅgho bhinno hoti.
tika-vin07t:2703_1: devadattena paṭhamaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ upacita”ntiādinā ānantariyattaṃ vadatā bhagavatā tassa abhabbatāsaṅkhātā pārājikatā na paññattā.
tika-vin07t:2703_2: Etena āpatti viya abhabbatāpi paññattianantarameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:2703_4: Idha pana ādikammikassapi anāpattiyā avuttattā devadattādayopi na muttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2704_1: na tato paranti ekassa satipaṭṭhānassa paṭikkhepova idha adhammo,
tika-vin07t:2704_2: na pana tiṇṇaṃ satipaṭṭhānattavidhānaṃ tassa dhammattā.
tika-vin07t:2704_4: Vaḍḍhanesu pana cha indriyānīti anindriyassapi ekassa indriyattavidhānameva adhammo.
tika-vin07t:2704_8: terasāyatanānī”tiādinā yattha katthaci viparītato pakāsanaṃ sabbaṃ adhammo.
tika-vin07t:2704_10: Pakāsananti cettha tathā tathā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā arūpakkhandhāva adhippetā,
tika-vin07t:2704_12: akusalakammapathādīsu sāvajjaṭṭhena sarūpato adhammesu ca tadaññesu ca abyākatesu yassa kassaci koṭṭhāsassa
tika-vin07t:2704_13: bhagavatā paññattakkameneva pakāsanaṃ “dhammo”ti ca viparītato pakāsanaṃ “adhammo”ti ca dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2704_15: ayathābhūtato ca pakāsanavasena dhammādhammesu eva pavisanti,
tika-vin07t:2704_16: vinayādināmena pana visesetvā visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesameva dhammādhammakoṭṭhāse pavisatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2705_0: Imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāmātiādi dhammañca adhammañca yāthāvato ñatvāva pāpicchaṃ nissāya viparītato pakāsentasseva saṅghabhedo hoti,
tika-vin07t:2705_1: na pana tathāsaññāya pakāsentassāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2706_4: “Paññattaṃ apaññatta”nti dukaṃ “bhāsitaṃ abhāsita”nti dukena atthato samānameva,
tika-vin07t:2707_1: Pāḷiyaṃ samaggānañca anuggahoti yathā samaggānaṃ sāmaggī na bhijjati,
tika-vin07t:2708_1: Siyā nu khoti sambhaveyya nu kho.
tika-vin07t:2708_2: Tasmiṃ adhammadiṭṭhīti attano “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti etasmiṃ dīpane ayuttadiṭṭhi.
tika-vin07t:2708_3: Bhede adhammadiṭṭhīti “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpetvā anussāvanasalākaggāhāpanādinā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:2708_4: saṅghaṃ ekasīmāyameva ṭhitato catuvaggādisaṅghato viyojetvā ekakammādinipphādanavasena saṅghabhedakaraṇe
tika-vin07t:2708_6: Vinidhāya diṭṭhinti yā tasmiṃ “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpane attano adhammadiṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:2708_7: taṃ vinidhāya paṭicchādetvā “dhammo evāya”nti viparītato pakāsetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:2709_0: Bhede dhammadiṭṭhīti yathāvuttanayena saṅghabhedane doso natthīti laddhiko.
tika-vin07t:2709_1: Ayaṃ pana “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpane adhammadiṭṭhiko hutvāpi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya karaṇena saṅghabhedako atekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t:2709_2: Evaṃ bhede vematikoti imassa pana bhede vematikadiṭṭhiyā vinidhānampi atthi.
tika-vin07t:2709_4: Tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhibhede adhammadiṭṭhīti ayaṃ pana bhede adhammadiṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya katattā saṅghabhedako atekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t:2709_5: Sukkapakkhe pana sabbattha “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādidīpane vā bhede vā dhammadiṭṭhitāya diṭṭhiṃ avinidhāyeva katattā saṅghabhedakopi satekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t:2709_6: Tasmā “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādidīpane vā saṅghabhede vā ubhosupi vā adhammadiṭṭhi vā vematiko vā hutvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin07t:2709_7: vimatiñca vinidhāya “dhammo”ti pakāsetvā vuttanayena saṅghabhedaṃ karontasseva ānantariyaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2714_2: Pāḷiyaṃ abhivādāpetabboti vandanatthāya vassaṃ pucchanena navako sayameva vandatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2717_1: “Yathābhāga”nti ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā mañcapīṭhādiṃ papphoṭetvā pattharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:2717_2: datvā dānampi senāsanapaññāpanamevāti dassento āha “papphoṭetvā hi pattharituṃ pana vaṭṭatiyevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2720_2: Na mahātherassa bhāro hotīti anumodakaṃ āgametuṃ na bhāro.
tika-vin07t:2720_3: Ajjhiṭṭhova āgametabboti attanā ajjhiṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi anumodanteyeva nisīditabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t:2723_1: Manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha antovihārepi manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā bhikkhū netvā bhojenti.
tika-vin07t:2723_2: Āsanesu satīti nisīdanaṭṭhānesu santesu. Idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin07t:2723_3: āsanaṃ uccanti āsanne samabhūmibhāge paññattaṃ therāsanena samakaṃ āsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2723_4: therāsanato pana uccatare āpucchitvāpi nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2724_1: odano paṭiggahetabbo”ti idaṃ hatthatale vā pacchipiṭṭhiādidussaṇṭhitādhāre vā pattaṃ ṭhapetvā odanassa gahaṇakāle pattassa apatanatthāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2724_2: susajjite pana ādhāre pattaṃ ṭhapetvā ekena hatthena taṃ parāmasitvāpi odanaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:2725_3: bhojanantare pana pānīyapivanādinā nayena hatthaṃ dhovitvā puna bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2725_4: Potthakesu pana “pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā”ti likhanti,
tika-vin07t:2725_5: taṃ purimavacanena na sameti pariyosāne udakasseva “hatthadhovanaudaka”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:2725_7: bhantetiādi niṭṭhitabhattaṃ nisinnaṃ theraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2728_0: 366. Pāḷiyaṃ ṭhāpeti vāti tiṭṭha bhanteti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2729_4: disābhāganti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kenajja, bhante,
tika-vin07t:2729_5: yuttanti kena nakkhattena cando yuttoti attho.
tika-vin07t:2730_0: 369. Aṅgaṇeti abbhokāse. Evameva paṭipajjitabbanti uddesadānādi āpucchitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2736_3: bhagavā”ti pātimokkhuddesayācanaṃ anuposathe uposathakaraṇapaṭikkhepassa sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā therena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2736_4: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ tuṇhībhūtova tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesīti?
tika-vin07t:2736_5: Aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathādisaṃvāsakaraṇassa sāvajjataṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin07t:2736_6: tañca āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tathāpaṭipajjanatthaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ñāpetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2736_7: Keci panettha “aparisuddhampi puggalaṃ tassa sammukhā ‘aparisuddho’ti vattuṃ mahākaruṇāya avisahanto bhagavā tathā nisīdī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2736_9: mahāmoggallānattherenāpi taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā bahi nīharaṇassa akattabbatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t:2736_14: yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin07t:2736_17: sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabba”ntiādinā sāpattikaparisāya kattabbavidhi dassito.
tika-vin07t:2737_0: Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī”ti parehi saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ,
tika-vin07t:2737_1: attanā vā “mama anācāraṃ ete jānantī”ti saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ.
tika-vin07t:2737_3: saṅghikapaccayabhāgagahaṇādinā ca jīvikaṃ kappento “ahaṃ samaṇo”ti paṭiññaṃ adentopi atthato dento viya
tika-vin07t:2738_1: Mahāsamudde abhiramantīti bahuso dassanapavisanādinā mahāsamudde abhiratiṃ vindanti.
tika-vin07t:2738_2: Na āyatakeneva papātoti chinnataṭamahāsobbho viya na āditova ninnoti attho.
tika-vin07t:2741_1: Udāharitabbanti pāḷiyā avatvā tamatthaṃ yāya kāyaci bhāsāya udāhaṭampi udāhaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2742_0: Pure vā pacchā vāti ñattiārambhato pubbe vā ñattiniṭṭhānato pacchā vā.
tika-vin07t:2743_1: Katañca akatañca ubhayaṃ gahetvāti yassa katāpi atthi akatāpi.
tika-vin07t:2747_1: Puna codetuṃ attanā ādātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attādānanti āha “sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2747_3: Sopi hi dubbhikkhādikālo viya adhikaraṇavūpasamatthaṃ lajjiparisāya dūrato ānayanassa,
tika-vin07t:2747_4: āgatānañca piṇḍāya caraṇādisamācārassa dukkarattā akālo eva.
tika-vin07t:2748_2: saṃvattatīti ettha yathā abbhahimādiupakkilesavirahitānaṃ candimasūriyānaṃ sassirīkatā hoti,
tika-vin07t:2748_3: evamassāpi codakassa pāpapuggalūpakkilesavigamena sassirīkatā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2750_0: 400-1. “Dosantaro”ti ettha antara-saddo cittapariyāyoti āha “na duṭṭhacitto hutvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2751_0: Kāruññaṃ nāma karuṇā evāti āha “kāruññatāti karuṇābhāvo”ti.
tika-vin07t:2756_1: Bhikkhunikkhandhake “mātugāmassa pabbajitattā”ti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ saddhammassa appavattanakāraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2756_2: Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassantiādi khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ mataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2756_10: taṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññaviruddhampi taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matena likhitasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayameva gahetvā
tika-vin07t:2756_11: ācariyena likhitaṃ īdise kathāvirodhe sāsanaparihāniyā abhāvato,
tika-vin07t:2759_0: 404-8. Pāḷiyaṃ yadaggenāti yasmiṃ divase. Tadāti tasmiṃyeva divase. Vimānetvāti avamānaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t:2760_0: 410-1. Āpattigāminiyoti āpattiṃ āpannāyo. Kammavibhaṅgeti parivāre kammavibhaṅge.
tika-vin07t:2761_1: Pāḷiyaṃ dve tisso bhikkhuniyoti dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi.
tika-vin07t:2764_2: Tayo nissayeti rukkhamūlasenāsanassa tāsaṃ alabbhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2765_1: Aṭṭheva bhikkhuniyo yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhantīti aṭṭha bhikkhuniyo vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyāva gaṇhantiyo āgatapaṭipāṭiṃ paṭibāhanti,
tika-vin07t:2765_3: Anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapentīti issariyaṃ pavattentīti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2766_0: 430. Bhikkhudūtenāti bhikkhunā dūtabhūtena. Sikkhamānadūtenāti sikkhamānāya dūtāya.
tika-vin07t:2767_2: Navakammanti “navakammaṃ katvā vasatū”ti apaloketvā saṅghikabhūmiyā okāsadānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2773_2: amhākaṃ satthāraṃ jānāsī”ti idaṃ thero sayaṃ bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ jānantopi attanā sahagatabhikkhuparisāya ñāpanatthameva,
tika-vin07t:2773_3: subhaddassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa sāsanassa paṭipakkhavacanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ viññāpanatthañca evaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin07t:2773_4: Subhaddo hi kusinārāyaṃ bhagavati abhippasannāya khattiyādigahaṭṭhaparisāya majjhe bhagavato parinibbānaṃ
tika-vin07t:2773_5: sutvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhopi bhayena pahaṭṭhākāraṃ vācāya pakāsetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-vin07t:2773_6: idheva pana vijanapadese sutvā yathājjhāsayaṃ attano pāpaladdhiṃ pakāsessati,
tika-vin07t:2773_7: tato tameva paccayaṃ dassetvā bhikkhū samussāhetvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ kāretvā etassa pāpabhikkhussa,
tika-vin07t:2773_9: sāsanaṭṭhitiñca karissāmīti jānantova taṃ pucchīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2774_2: samūhaneyyā”ti idaṃ bhagavā mayā “ākaṅkhamāno”ti vuttattā ekasikkhāpadampi samūhanitabbaṃ apassantā,
tika-vin07t:2774_3: samūhane ca dosaṃ disvā dhammasaṅgahakā bhikkhū “apaññattaṃ na paññāpessāma,
tika-vin07t:2774_4: paññattaṃ na samucchindissāmā”tiādinā puna “paññattisadisāya akuppāya kammavācāya sāvetvā samādāya vattissanti,
tika-vin07t:2774_5: tato yāva sāsanantaradhānā appaṭibāhiyāni sikkhāpadāni bhavissantī”ti iminā adhippāyena avocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2776_2: tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”ti evaṃ thūlatare “tiṭṭhatu, bhagavā,
tika-vin07t:2777_4: Taṃ na gacchantīti na kulavaṃ gamenti.
tika-vin07t:2783_3: Upakkilesā vuttāti tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ete surāpānādayo upakkilesāti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:2784_2: Paṭikacceva gaccheyyanti yattha naṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamituṃ bhikkhū sannipatissanti,
tika-vin07t:2786_2: Pācīnakāti puratthimadisāya jātattā vajjiputtake sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2787_3: kasmā taṃ thero paṇāmesīti bhedavacanaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2787_4: Garunissayaṃ gaṇhāmāti nissayamuttāpi mayaṃ ekaṃ sambhāvanīyagaruṃ nissayabhūtaṃ gahetvāva vasissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2788_3: Pathabyā saṅghattheroti loke sabbabhikkhūnaṃ tadā upasampadāya vuḍḍho.
tika-vin07t:2789_2: Idañca “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti sutte yāvakālikasseva parāmaṭṭhattā
tika-vin07t:2789_3: siṅgīloṇassa yāvajīvikassa sannidhikatassa āmisena saddhiṃ paribhoge pācittiyaṃ vibhaṅganayeneva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2789_4: taṃ pana pācittiyaṃ vibhaṅge āgatabhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ “kathaṃ suttavibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2789_6: na khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyanti loṇamissabhojane vajjiputtakā anavajjasaññino ahesuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2789_7: Tathāsaññīnampi nesaṃ āpattidassanatthaṃ “sannidhikāre asannidhikārasaññī”ti idaṃ suttavibhaṅgaṃ uddhaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2790_3: yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahita”nti avatvā “tadahupaṭiggahita”nti vacanasāmatthiyato purepaṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin07t:2790_4: yāvakālikena saddhiṃ sambhinnarasaṃ kālepi na kappatīti sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:2790_6: Dukkaṭenapi na bhavitabbanti yadi hi sannidhikārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ maññatha,
tika-vin07t:2790_7: yāvajīvikassa loṇassa sannidhidosābhāvā dukkaṭena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2790_8: atha āmisena sambhinnarasassa tassa āmisagatikattā dukkaṭaṃ mā maññatha.
tika-vin07t:2790_9: Tadā ca hi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbaṃ āmisattupagamanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2790_10: Na hi ettha yāvajīvikantiādināpi dukkaṭābhāvaṃ samattheti.
tika-vin07t:2791_0: Pāḷiyaṃ rājagahe suttavibhaṅgetiādīsu sabbattha sutte ca vibhaṅge cāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2791_1: Tassa tassa vikālabhojanādino suttepi paṭikkhittattā vinayassa atisaraṇaṃ atikkamo vinayātisāro.
tika-vin07t:2791_2: “Nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatīti āgata”nti idaṃ vibhaṅge ca āgatadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2791_3: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ karontassāti sugatavidatthiyā vidatthittayappamāṇaṃ karontassa,
tika-vin07t:2800_2: anantaraṃ parivāroti yo vinayo saṅgahaṃ samāruḷho,
tika-vin07t:2801_1: Ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunāti rattindivaṃ samantā yojanappamāṇe atisukhumānipi rūpāni passanato ativiya parisuddhena pasādacakkhunā.
tika-vin07t:2801_2: “Atthi tattha paññattī”tiādīsu atthi nu kho tattha paññattītiādinā attho gahetabboti āha “tattha paññatti…pe…
tika-vin07t:2802_0: 2. Pucchāvissajjaneti pucchāya vissajjane. Vinītakathāti vinītavatthukathā, ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-vin07t:2803_1: Aṅgadvayavimuttassa samuṭṭhānassa abhāvepi tesu ekenaṅgena vinā ayaṃ āpatti na hotīti dassanatthameva “ekena samuṭṭhānenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2803_2: Idāni tesu dvīsu aṅgesu padhānaṅgaṃ dassetumāha “ettha hi cittaṃ aṅgaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2803_3: Yasmā pana maggenamaggappaṭipattisaṅkhātāya kāyaviññattiyā sevanacitteneva sambhave sati ayaṃ taṃ aṅgadvayaṃ
tika-vin07t:2803_4: upādāya bhagavatā paññattā āpattisammuti hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t:2803_5: Tasmā taṃ cittaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhātassa kāyassa aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:2803_7: Tassa pana taṃsamuṭṭhitakāyo eva aṅgaṃ abyavahitakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2803_9: Evaṃ uparipi sabbattha cittaṅgayuttasamuṭṭhānesu adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:2803_10: “Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhātī”tiādiparivāravacaneneva āpattiyā akusalādiparamatthasabhāvatā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu pariyāyatova vuttā,
tika-vin07t:2803_11: sammutisabhāvā eva āpattīti sijjhati samuṭṭhānasamuṭṭhitānaṃ bhedasiddhitoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2803_12: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyāti āpannāya pārājikāpattiyā kehicipi samathehi anāpattibhāvāpādanassa asakkuṇeyyattasaṅkhātamatthaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t:2804_1: Porāṇakehi mahātherehīti saṅgītittayato pacchā potthakasaṅgītikārakehi chaḷabhiññāpaasambhidādiguṇasamujjalehi mahātherehi.
tika-vin07t:2805_2: Soḷasa vārā dassitāti yehi vārehi ādibhūtehi upalakkhitattā ayaṃ sakalopi parivāro soḷasaparivāroti voharīyati,
tika-vin07t:2808_1: Pāḷiyaṃ nibbānañceva paññattīti ettha yasmā saṅkhatadhamme upādāya paññattā sammutisaccabhūtā puggalādipaññatti
tika-vin07t:2808_4: kārakavedakādirūpena pana parikappitena attasabhāvena virahitattā “anattā”ti vattuṃ yuttā.
tika-vin07t:2808_5: Tasmā ayaṃ paññattipi asaṅkhatattasāmaññato vatthubhūtena nibbānena saha “anattā iti nicchayā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:2808_6: Avijjamānāpi hi sammuti kenaci paccayena akatattā asaṅkhatā evāti.
tika-vin07t:2809_6: Piṭake tīṇi desayīti yasmā aññepi mahāvīrā sammāsambuddhā saddhammaṃ desayanti,
tika-vin07t:2809_7: tasmā aṅgīraso piṭakāni tīṇi desayīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:2809_9: Evaṃ nīyati saddhammoti yadi vinayapariyatti aparihīnā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:2810_0: Vinayapariyatti pana kathaṃ tiṭṭhatīti āha “ubhato cā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2810_3: Samuṭṭhānaṃ niyato katanti ekaccaṃ samuṭṭhānena niyataṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:2810_4: Tasmiṃ parivāre kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ niyatasamuṭṭhānaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2811_0: Sambhedaṃ nidānañcaññanti sambhedo sikkhāpadānaṃ aññamaññasamuṭṭhānena saṃkiṇṇatā,
tika-vin07t:2811_4: upari vakkhamāne ca parivārasutte eva dissanti.
tika-vin07t:2811_6: tasmā sakalasāsanādhārassa vinayassa ṭhitihetubhūtaṃ parivāraṃ sikkheti,
tika-vin07t:2812_1: Ādimhi tāva purimanayeti sabbapaṭhame paññattivāre āgatanayaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin07t:2812_2: tattha pana paññattivāre “paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti,
tika-vin07t:2812_4: Paratoti āgatabhāvaṃ pana sandhāya parato āgate sutte dissatīti veditabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2813_1: Aniyatā paṭhamikāti āpattiṃ apekkhitvāva itthiliṅgaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:2813_3: Pāḷiyaṃ nānubandhe pavattininti vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ ananubandhanasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2814_1: Eḷakalomasikkhāpadavatthusmiṃ “bhikkhuniyo eḷakalomāni dhovantiyo rajantiyo vijaṭentiyo riñcanti uddesaṃ paripuccha”nti āgatattā imaṃ riñcanti-
tika-vin07t:2814_2: padaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpadaṃ upalakkhitanti dassento “vibhaṅge ‘riñcanti uddesa’nti āgataṃ eḷakalomadhovāpanasikkhāpada”nti āha.
tika-vin07t:2815_1: Ratanasikkhāpadanti ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā paṭisāmanasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2817_0: 267. “Na desenti tathāgatā”ti etena chattapāṇissa dhammadesanāpaṭikkhepaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2819_1: Samuṭṭhānañhi saṅkhepanti ettha saṅkhipanti saṅgayhanti sadisasamuṭṭhānāni etthāti saṅkhepo,
tika-vin07t:2823_1: Kati āpattiyoti pārājikādīsu pañcasu āpattīsu methunādinnādānādiantogadhabhedaṃ apekkhitvā jātivasena ekattaṃ āropetvā pucchā katā.
tika-vin07t:2823_2: Kati āpattikkhandhāti antogadhabhedaṃ apekkhitvā paccekaṃ rāsaṭṭhenāti ettakamevettha bhedo.
tika-vin07t:2823_3: Vinītāniyeva vinītavatthūnīti āpattito viramaṇāni eva avippaṭisārapāmojjādidhammānaṃ kāraṇattā vatthūnīti vinītavatthūni,
tika-vin07t:2823_5: Veraṃ maṇatīti verahetuttā “vera”nti laddhanāmaṃ rāgādiakusalapakkhaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin07t:2824_0: Dhammassavanaggaṃ bhinditvā gacchatīti bahūsu ekato nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇantesu taṃ dhammassavanasamāgamaṃ kopetvā uṭṭhāya gacchati.
tika-vin07t:2825_5: Piyaṃ karotīti taṃ puggalaṃ pemaṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:2827_0: Bhujissabhāvakaraṇatoti taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā samathavipassanāsu serivihāritākaraṇatoti attho.
tika-vin07t:2830_3: Saṅghādisesādīnaṃ dukkaṭapariyosānānaṃ pañcannaṃ acittakānampi sambhavato “siyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2830_5: Hīnukkaṭṭhehi jātiādīhi omasane eva dubbhāsitassa paññattattā sā ekantavācācittasamuṭṭhānā evāti.
tika-vin07t:2831_0: Dutiyasamuṭṭhānanaye vācāya eva samāpajjitabbapāṭidesanīyassa abhāvā “na hī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2832_0: Tatiye pana vosāsamānarūpaṃ bhikkhuniṃ kāyavācāhi anapasādanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyasambhavato “siyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2833_0: Omasane pācittiyassa adinnādānasamuṭṭhānattepi tappaccayā paññattassa dubbhāsitassa pañcameneva samuppattīti
tika-vin07t:2833_1: dassetuṃ catutthavāre “dubbhāsitaṃ āpajjeyyāti na hīti vattabba”nti vatvā pañcamavāre “siyāti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2833_2: Kāyavikāreneva omasantassa panettha dubbhāsitabhāvepi kāyakīḷābhāvābhāvato dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2834_0: Chaṭṭhavāre pana vijjamānopi kāyo dubbhāsitassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t:2834_1: pañcamasamuṭṭhāne eva chaṭṭhampi pavisatīti dassetuṃ “na hī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2834_2: na pana tattha sabbathā dubbhāsitena anāpattīti dassetuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2834_3: Na hi davakamyatāya kāyavācāhi omasantassa dubbhāsitāpatti na sambhavati.
tika-vin07t:2834_5: taṃ chaṭṭhenapi samāpajjati eva dhammadesanāpatti viyāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2837_1: Dutiye pana kativāre paṭhamasamuṭṭhānena āpajjitabbānaṃ āpattīnaṃ lahudassanasukhatthaṃ kuṭikārādīni eva samuddhaṭāni,
tika-vin07t:2837_7: Ubhayenāpi kevalaṃ kāyeneva dukkaṭādīnaṃ sambhavaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2838_0: “Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhahantī”ti idaṃ idha visesetvā dassitānaṃ kāyatova samuṭṭhitānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2838_1: avisesato pana tā āpattiyo itarasamuṭṭhānehipi yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhahanti eva.
tika-vin07t:2839_0: “Tiṇavatthārakena cā”ti idaṃ saṅghādisesavajjitānaṃ catunnaṃ āpattīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2840_0: 279. Saṃvidahitvā kuṭiṃ karotīti vācāya saṃvidahati, sayañca kāyena karotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2843_1: Tatiyo pana gāthāvāro dutiyavārena vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t:2843_2: Tattha kāyova kāyikoti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “kāyikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2844_1: tato vivittahetuttā ca nīvaraṇavivekañca nibbānañca dassanasīlena.
tika-vin07t:2844_3: Idha panevaṃ añño pucchanto nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t:2844_4: upālitthero sayameva atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ pucchāvisajjanañca akāsīti iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:2849_1: Ājīvavipattipaccayāti ettha āgamma jīvanti etenāti ājīvo,
tika-vin07t:2852_2: Pañcāti ettha adhammikakatikādiṃ apaloketvā karontānaṃ animittanti attho.
tika-vin07t:2852_4: adhippāyādinā ñattikammādiṃ karontānaṃ thullaccayādi ca saṅgayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2852_6: “Natthaññā āpattiyo”ti idaṃ vipattiādibhāginiyo sāvajjāpattiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2856_1: Chaṭṭhe pariyāyavāre alobho pubbaṅgamotiādi sāsanaṭṭhitiyā aviparītato dhammavādissa vivādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2856_2: Aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni ṭhānānīti dhammādīsu adhammotiādinā gahetvā dīpanāni idheva bhedakaravatthūni,
tika-vin07t:2856_12: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā ādhānaggāhīduppaṭinissajjitānīti imesaṃ channaṃ yugaḷānaṃ vasena cha dhammā ceva
tika-vin07t:2856_13: lobhādayo cha hetū cāti dvādasa dhammā vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlāni.
tika-vin07t:2857_0: 294. Cuddasa mūlānīti tāneva dvādasa kāyavācāhi saddhiṃ cuddasa anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlāni.
tika-vin07t:2858_1: Pathavīkhaṇanādīsu paṇṇattivajjesu kusalābyākatacittamūlikā āpatti hotīti dassetuṃ “alobho pubbaṅgamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2858_2: Satta āpattikkhandhā ṭhānānītiādi sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattisambhavato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2858_4: “Cha hetū”ti idaṃ kusalānaṃ āpattihetuvohārassa ayuttatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2859_3: Tā eva hi ekasīmāyaṃ sāmaggimupagatānaṃ kammappattānaṃ anumatiyā sāvanakiriyānipphattisaṅkhātassa saṅghagaṇakiccasabhāvassa
tika-vin07t:2859_9: Kammañattikammavācāñattivasena hi duvidhāsu ñattīsu anussāvanāpi kammamūlakantveva saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin07t:2860_5: Tattha “vatthuvasenā”ti idaṃ “satta samathā dasa samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2860_6: “Pariyāyenā”ti idaṃ “dasa samathā satta samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2863_0: 297. Sattame sādhāraṇavāre sādhāraṇāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanakiccasādhāraṇā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-vin07t:2864_0: 298. Aṭṭhame tabbhāgiyavāre tabbhāgiyāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanato tappakkhikā.
tika-vin07t:2867_1: Navame samathāsamathasādhāraṇavāre “sabbe samathā ekatova adhikaraṇaṃ samenti udāhu nānā”ti pucchantena “samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā,
tika-vin07t:2867_4: Sammukhāvinayaṃ vinā kassaci samathassa asambhavā sesā chapi samathā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:2867_5: tesaṃ pana channaṃ aññamaññāpekkhābhāvato te aññamaññaṃ asādhāraṇā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:2871_0: Tattha sammukhāvinayo siyā kusalotiādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vinayakamme,
tika-vin07t:2871_1: vivādādimhi ca niyuttapuggalānaṃ samuppajjanakakusalādīnaṃ vasena sammukhāvinayādīnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2871_2: vivādādīnañca kusalādibhāvo tena tena upacārena vutto.
tika-vin07t:2871_3: Yasmā panetassa sammukhāvinayo nāma saṅghasammukhatādayo honti,
tika-vin07t:2871_4: tesañca anavajjasabhāvattā akusale vijjamānepi akusalattūpacāro na yutto āpattādhikaraṇassa akusalattūpacāro viya,
tika-vin07t:2872_2: tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhatītiādi sammukhāvinayassa itarehi samathehi niyamena saṃsaṭṭhataṃ,
tika-vin07t:2872_3: itaresaṃ pana channaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggābhāvañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2875_1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādi samathānaṃ adhikaraṇesu eva yathārahaṃ pavattiṃ,
tika-vin07t:2875_2: adhikaraṇāni vinā tesaṃ visuṃ aṭṭhānañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2875_3: Vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti adhikaraṇato samathehi viyojetvā asaṃsaṭṭhe katvā nānākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:2875_4: aññamaññaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhatāya ṭhitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nānattaṃ paññāpetuṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamakkhaṇe eva tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:2876_1: So mā hevanti yo evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t:2876_3: na ca labbhati samathānaṃ aññatra adhikaraṇā vūpasamalakkhaṇanti pahānāvatthānasaṅkhātaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin07t:2876_4: Lakkhaṇato pana adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ atthevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2876_5: Samathā adhikaraṇehi sammantīti apalokanādīhi catūhi kiccādhikaraṇehi sabbepi samathā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin07t:2877_2: Tadanantaro sammatinasammativāro ca adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhataṃ,
tika-vin07t:2877_4: Samathā samathehi sammantītiādiko samathādhikaraṇavāro samathānaṃ aññamaññaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2878_1: Samuṭṭhāpetivāro pana adhikaraṇehi adhikaraṇānaṃ uppattippakāradassanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t:2878_2: Na katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti attano sambhavamattena ekampi adhikaraṇaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2878_4: Tattha jāyantīti anantarameva anuppajjitvā paramparapaccayā jāyantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2878_5: “Dhammo adhammo”tiādinā ubhinnaṃ puggalānaṃ vivādapaccayā aññamaññakhemabhaṅgā honti,
tika-vin07t:2878_6: tappaccayā tesaṃ pakkhaṃ pariyesanena kalahaṃ vaḍḍhantānaṃ vivādo kañci mahāparisaṃ saṅghapariṇāyakaṃ lajjiṃ āgamma vūpasamaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin07t:2878_7: Tathā avūpasamante pana vivādo kamena vaḍḍhitvā sakalepi saṅghe vivādaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin07t:2878_8: tato anuvādādīnīti evaṃ paramparakkamena vūpasamakāraṇābhāve cattāri adhikaraṇāni jāyanti.
tika-vin07t:2881_1: Tadanantaravāre pana vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānantiādi adhikaraṇānaṃ vuttanayena aññamaññapaccayattepi saṃsaggabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2881_2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajatītiādīsu vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivādādhikaraṇabhāvameva bhajati,
tika-vin07t:2881_4: catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivādādhikaraṇattameva nissitaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva pariyāpannaṃ vivādādhikaraṇabhāveneva saṅgahitanti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:2882_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajatītiādi pana catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vūpasamane sati niyatasamathe dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2882_2: Tattha kati samathe bhajatīti attano upasamatthāya kittake samathe upagacchati,
tika-vin07t:2882_3: kittake samathe āgamma vūpasamaṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2882_4: Kati samathapariyāpannanti attānaṃ vūpasametuṃ katisu samathesu tehi samānavasena paviṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2882_5: Katihi samathehi saṅgahitanti vūpasamaṃ karontehi katihi samathehi vūpasamakaraṇatthaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2886_5: Nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhinti ettha paññattiṭṭhānapuggalādippakāsakaṃ nidānavacanaṃ nidānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t:2886_7: tehi avayavabhūtehi sahitaṃ taṃsamudāyabhūtaṃ khandhakaṃ pucchāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2886_8: Uttamāni padānīti āpattipaññāpakāni vacanāni adhippetāni. Tesaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:2886_9: kati āpattiyo hontīti tehi vacanehi paññattā kati āpattikkhandhā hontīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2886_12: kasmā pana “samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyo”ti sāmivasena niddeso katoti āha “yena yena hi padenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:2890_1: Ekuttarikanaye pana ajānantena vītikkantāti paṇṇattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā ajānantena vītikkantā pathavīkhaṇanasahaseyyādikā,
tika-vin07t:2890_2: sāpi pacchā āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṭikammaṃ akarontassa antarāyikāva hoti.
tika-vin07t:2891_0: Pārivāsikādīhi pacchā āpannāti vattabhedesu dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2891_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe āpajjitabbaantarāpattiyo sandhāyāti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:2891_4: Mūlavisuddhiyā antarāpattīti mūlāyapaṭikassanādīni akatvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ dinnaparivāsamānattavisuddhiyā
tika-vin07t:2891_6: Agghavisuddhiyāti antarāpattiṃ āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā odhānasamodhānavasena odhunitvā purimāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:2891_7: samodhāya tadagghavasena puna dinnaparivāsādisuddhiyā caraṇakāle puna āpannā antarāpatti.
tika-vin07t:2892_1: evaṃ desitāpi āpatti na vuṭṭhātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:2892_2: Dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā āpajjane sikhāppattadosaṃ dassento āha “aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikamevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2892_4: bhikkhūnampi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā thokaṃ thokaṃ sappiādikaṃ theyyāya gaṇhantānaṃ pādagghanake puṇṇe pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t:2892_5: Keci pana “aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikameva hotīti vuttattā aṭṭhavatthukamevetaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2893_0: Dhammikassa paṭissavassāti “idha vassaṃ vasissāmī”tiādinā gihīnaṃ sammukhā katassa dhammikassa paṭissavassa,
tika-vin07t:2893_1: adhammikassa pana “asukaṃ paharissāmī”tiādikassa paṭissavassa asaccāpanena āpatti natthi.
tika-vin07t:2894_2: akuppe ca aṭṭhatvā paṭicchādentopi adhammacuditako eva.
tika-vin07t:2898_5: patto dātabbo”tiādi vacanato anādariyena āmisasaṅgahaṃ akarontassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2899_4: Ovādaṃ agaṇhantoti bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniovādatthāya vuttaṃ vacanaṃ agaṇhanto bālagilānagamiyavivajjito.
tika-vin07t:2899_6: saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā santaruttarena gāmappavesanādīsu ca āpattiyopi aparibhogena āpajjitabbāpattiyova.
tika-vin07t:2899_10: Vinaye āgatā atthā venayikāti āha “dve atthā vinayasiddhā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2900_0: Pāḷiyaṃ appatto nissāraṇanti ettha pabbājanīyakammaṃ vihārato nissāraṇattā nissāraṇanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2900_1: tañca yasmā kuladūsakaṃ akaronto puggalo āpattibahulopi āveṇikalakkhaṇena appatto nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:2900_3: Yasmā pana āpattādibahulassāpi “ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2900_5: sabbathā pana suddho nirāpattiko dunnissāritoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:2901_0: Appatto osāraṇantiādīsu upasampadākammaṃ ettha osāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2901_1: tañca hatthacchinnādiko ekacco paṭikkhittattā appattopi sosārito,
tika-vin07t:2904_4: Sesā rattiñceva divā cāti ettha aruṇuggamane āpajjitabbā paṭhamakathinādī sabbā āpattiyopi rattindivānaṃ
tika-vin07t:2904_6: Atha vā uddhaste aruṇe āpajjitabbattā divā āpajjitabbesu eva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin07t:2904_8: pana rattandhakāre purisena saddhiṃ santiṭṭhanāpatti ca rattiyaññeva āpajjitabbā.
tika-vin07t:2905_0: Purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamanaanatirittabhojanādīni divā eva āpajjitabbāni.
tika-vin07t:2905_2: gaṇabhojanādīni ca divā eva āpajjitabbānī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:2905_3: Tasmā īdisā āpattiyo muñcitvā sesāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2906_0: Na ūnadasavassoti dasavassassa bālasseva paññattasikkhāpadattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2906_3: vuṭṭhāpiniṃ dve vassāni ananubandhādimpi ūnadasavassā āpajjanti.
tika-vin07t:2907_0: Appavārentoti anādariyena appavārento kenaci paccayena appavāretvā kāḷapakkhacātuddase saṅghe pavārente
tika-vin07t:2907_1: tattha anādariyena appavārento tameva āpattiṃ kāḷepi āpajjatīti juṇhe evāti niyamo na dissati,
tika-vin07t:2907_2: pacchimavassaṃvuttho pana pacchimakattikapuṇṇamiyameva pavāretuṃ labbhatīti tattha appavāraṇāpaccayā
tika-vin07t:2907_3: āpattiṃ āpajjamāno eva juṇhe āpajjatīti niyametabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2908_0: “Apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti iminā “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti niyamavacaneneva apaccuddharantassa dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2908_8: Alajjissa santike nissayaggahaṇādipi puggalassa santike eva āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:2909_0: Tīṇi adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānānīti yo ummattakopi vītikkamakāle,
tika-vin07t:2909_1: anummatto sañcicceva āpattiṃ āpajjitvā bhikkhūhi pacchā codito saramāno eva “na sarāmī”ti vadati,
tika-vin07t:2909_2: yo ca “supinaṃ viya sarāmī”ti vā musā vadati,
tika-vin07t:2909_3: yo ca ummattakakāle kataṃ sabbampi sabbesaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadati,
tika-vin07t:2909_4: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dinnāni tīṇi amūḷhavinayassa dānāni adhammikāni.
tika-vin07t:2910_2: “Diṭṭhiñca anissajjantānaṃyeva kammaṃ kātabba”nti idaṃ bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānassa diṭṭhiyā anissajjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2911_2: Bījaniggāhādiketi cittaṃ bījaniṃ gāhetvā anumodanādikaraṇeti attho.
tika-vin07t:2914_2: Avāpuraṇaṃ dātunti gabbhaṃ vivaritvā anto parikkhāraṭṭhapanatthāya vivaraṇakuñcikaṃ dātuṃ.
tika-vin07t:2914_3: Saṅghatthāya upanītaṃ sayameva anto paṭisāmitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:2915_0: Ādikammikesu paṭhamaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ uppajjatīti āha “paṭhamaṃ uppannavasenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:2915_1: Pāḷiyaṃ anāpatti vassacchedassāti vassacchedasambandhiniyā anāpattiyā evamattho.
tika-vin07t:2915_5: aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ avasesānaṃ yathākatika”nti vacanato ādito aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paccuṭṭhātabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2916_0: “Idha na kappantīti vadantopi paccantimesu āpajjatī”tiādinā sañcicca kappiyaṃ akappiyanti vā akappiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:2916_1: kappiyanti vā kathentassa sabbattha dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:2920_1: Pañcakesu āpucchitvā cārassa abhāvoti piṇḍapātikassa “nimantito sabhatto”ti imassa aṅgassa abhāvā tena
tika-vin07t:2920_3: Susānaṃ netvā puna ānītakanti susāne petakiccaṃ katvā nikkhantehi nhatvā chaḍḍitāni nivatthapārutavatthāni evaṃ vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:2921_3: Pañhāsahassaṃ pucchīti samathavipassanākammaṭṭhānesu pañhāsahassaṃ sammajjitvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin07t:2921_4: Itaropi daharo attano gatamaggattā sabbaṃ vissajjesi,
tika-vin07t:2921_7: Kiṃ tvaṃ āvusotiādikaṃ thero khīṇāsavo sammajjanānisaṃsaṃ sabbesaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ avocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2923_0: Ettakaṃ gayhūpaganti ettakaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamatthāya gahetabbavacananti yathā sutvā viññātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin07t:2923_2: Ettha ca “attano bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t:2923_4: “appaṭiññāyā”ti ekañca katvā purimehi dvīhi pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t:2923_6: Kathānusandhivinicchayānulomasandhivasena vatthuṃ na jānātīti codakena vā cuditakena vā vuttakathānusandhinā
tika-vin07t:2923_7: tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanānurūpena vadanto kathānusandhinā vatthuṃ na jānāti nāma,
tika-vin07t:2923_8: tañca suttavibhaṅge vinītavatthusaṅkhātena vinicchayānulomeneva vadanto vinicchayānulomasandhivasena vatthuṃ na jānāti nāma.
tika-vin07t:2923_9: Ñattikammaṃ nāma hotīti ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hotīti na jānātīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:2923_10: Ñattiyā kammappattoti ñattiyā niṭṭhitāyapi kammappatto eva hoti.
tika-vin07t:2923_11: Anussāvanaṭṭhāne eva kammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:2923_12: taṃ ñattiyā kāraṇaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2924_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pañca visuddhiyoti āpattito visuddhihetuttā, visuddhehi kattabbato ca pātimokkhuddesā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:2927_1: Chakkādīsu pāḷiyaṃ cha agāravāti buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsu, appamāde,
tika-vin07t:2927_3: tesu eva ca cha gāravā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:2927_4: “Chabbassaparamatā dhāretabba”nti idaṃ vibhaṅge āgatassa paramassa dassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2928_1: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi sattahīti “pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissa”ntiādinā musāvādasikkhāpade āgatehi sattahi.
tika-vin07t:2929_1: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti taṃ anatthassa acaraṇaṃ ettha etasmiṃ puggale,
tika-vin07t:2929_2: lokasannivāse vā kuto kena kāraṇena sakkā laddhunti āghātaṃ paṭivineti.
tika-vin07t:2930_9: Hoti ca na hoti ca tathāgato parammaraṇā,
tika-vin07t:2930_10: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato parammaraṇā”ti evaṃ āgatā dasa antaggāhikā diṭṭhiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2930_11: Micchādiṭṭhiādayoti micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappādayo aṭṭhamicchāñāṇamicchāvimuttīhi saddhiṃ dasa micchattā.
tika-vin07t:2931_2: taṃsampayuttaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vā sammāñāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2934_1: Uposathādipucchāsu pavāraṇagāthāti diṭṭhādīhi tīhi ṭhānehi pavāraṇāvācā eva.
tika-vin07t:2934_2: Evaṃ vuttānaṃ pana chandovicitilakkhaṇena vuttajātibhedā gāthā.
tika-vin07t:2940_0: 335. Aḍḍhuḍḍhasatānīti paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni. Viggahapadena manussaviggahaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2941_3: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkosoti “yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyyā”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2942_1: Antaravāsakanāmena aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2943_0: Cīvaraṃ datvāti samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā khiyyanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2943_3: Tatthevāti vassaṃvutthāya cārikaṃ apakkamitvā tattheva nivāsanaṃ paṭicca paññattasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2945_3: Chapaññāsasatanti vesāliyādīsu paññattāni dvattiṃsasikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesā chapaññāsasataṃ.
tika-vin07t:2946_0: Dasa gārayhāti vosāsaappaṭisaṃ viditasikkhāpadadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesāni dasa pāṭidesanīyāni.
tika-vin07t:2946_1: Dve sattati sekhiyāni surusurukārakasāmisenahatthenapānīyathālakapaṭiggahaṇasasitthakapattadhovanāni tīṇi ṭhapetvā sesāni sekhiyāni.
tika-vin07t:2949_5: Ovādoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā agamanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2950_1: “Ye ca yāvatatiyakā”ti pañhassa “ime kho yāvatatiyakā”ti vissajjanaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ “sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇa”ntiādipañhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:2950_2: vissajjane vattabbe yasmā taṃ avatvā “kati chedanakānī”tiādike aṭṭha pañhe antarā vissajjetvā tesaṃ anantarā
tika-vin07t:2950_6: tasmā taṃ ukkamavissajjanakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā pana ye ca yāvatatiyakāti ayaṃ pañho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:2951_4: Vassikā āraññakena cāti vassikasāṭikā pariyesanaaraññakesu senāsanesu viharaṇasikkhāpadena saha.
tika-vin07t:2952_4: Nisīdane ca yā sikkhāti pamāṇātikkantanisīdanakārāpane yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t:2952_5: Tathā vassikā yā ca sāṭikāti etthāpi.
tika-vin07t:2953_0: Pāḷiyaṃ sataṃ sattati chaccevime honti ubhinnaṃ asādhāraṇāti bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā chacattārīsa,
tika-vin07t:2953_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā tiṃsādhikaṃ satañcāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ asādhāraṇā ca chasattatiadhikaṃ sataṃ sikkhāpadānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2953_2: Sataṃ sattati cattārīti ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhānaṃ gaṇanā catusattatiadhikaṃ sataṃ sikkhāpadānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:2954_0: Vibhattiyoti āpattikkhandhā ceva uposathapavāraṇādayo ca adhippetā.
tika-vin07t:2957_1: Idanti “pārājikanti yaṃ vutta”ntiādinā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
